name: viserys
line: You dare! You give commands to me? To me? You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?

name: viserys
line: Kill these Dothraki dogs! I am your King!

name: viserys
line: I have no interest in hospitality or comfort. I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfils his end of the bargain and I have my crown.

name: viserys
line: Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is, I suppose it is preferable to beheading. What did Ned Stark want you for? Buying from a slaver?

name: viserys
line: Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.

name: viserys
line: Daenerys!

name: viserys
line: Daenerys! There’s our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn’t he a gracious host?

name: viserys
line: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won’t forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. (He pulls off her gown.) You have a woman’s body now. (She endures it as he strokes her breast.) I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don’t want to wake the dragon, do you?

name: viserys
line: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.

name: viserys
line: Where is he?

name: viserys
line: Where’s he going?

name: viserys
line: But he didn’t say anything. Did he like her?

name: viserys
line: When will they be married?

name: viserys
line: Is it true they lie with their horses?

name: viserys
line: Do you take me for a fool?

name: viserys
line: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.

name: viserys
line: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?

name: viserys
line: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo’s army. I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that’s what it took.

name: viserys
line: When do I meet with the Khal? We need to begin planning the invasion.

name: viserys
line: When?

name: viserys
line: I piss on Dothraki omens. I waited 17 years to get my throne back.

name: viserys
line: Make him happy.

name: viserys
line: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

name: viserys
line: Yes, my dear?

name: viserys
line: They do.

name: viserys
line: It's entirely possible.

name: viserys
line: The brave men didn't kill dragons. The brave men rode them. Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization this world has ever seen. The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne, which the Usurper is keeping warm for me. The swords of the vanquished, a thousand of them... melted together like so many candles.

name: viserys
line: Really? Why dragons?

name: viserys
line: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house, I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.

name: viserys
line: What have you seen?

name: viserys
line: A pirate ship?

name: viserys
line: I don't know. The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect. Scattered to the wind.

name: viserys
line: Yes, it is. What did I buy you for? To make me sad?

name: viserys
line: To teach my sister how to be a better lover? You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy? You pretty little idiot. Go on then. Get on with it.

name: viserys
line: You send this whore to give me commands? I should have sent you back her head!

name: viserys
line: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

name: viserys
line: What's this?

name: viserys
line: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

name: viserys
line: This stinks of manure. All of it.

name: viserys
line: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

name: viserys
line: You do not talk back to me!

name: viserys
line: You are a horselord's slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

name: viserys
line: She has to eat a whole heart? I hope that wasn’t my horse.

name: viserys
line: She’ll never keep it down.

name: viserys
line: Tell me what she is saying.

name: viserys
line: He won’t be a real Targaryen. He won’t be a true dragon.

name: viserys
line: They love her.

name: viserys
line: It’s not my law.

name: viserys
line: Whatever is hers is also mine.

name: viserys
line: I need a large army… I’m the last hope of a dynasty, Mormont. The greatest dynasty this world has ever seen, on my shoulders since I was five years old and no one has ever given me what they gave to her in that tent. Never. Not a piece of it… How can I carry what I need to carry without it? Hmm? Who can rule without wealth, or fear, or love? Oh, you stand there, all nobility and honor. You don’t think I see you looking at my little sister, hmm? Don’t think I know what you want? I don’t care. You can have her. She can be queen of the savages and dine on the finest bloody horseparts, and you can dine on whichever parts of her you like. But let me go.

name: viserys
line: You swore an oath to me. Does loyalty mean nothing to you?

name: viserys
line: And yet here you stand?

name: viserys
line: Daenerys! Where’s my sister?

name: viserys
line: Where is she? I’m here for the feast. The whore’s feast.

name: viserys
line: Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!

name: viserys
line: Khal Drogo! I’m here for the feast.

name: viserys
line: That is no place for a king.

name: viserys
line: Keep away from me!

name: viserys
line: There she is.

name: viserys
line: They can’t kill us. They can’t shed blood in their sacred city. (moving his sword over everyone in the room, stopping on Daenerys’ stomach) But I can. I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you. But he never paid for you.

name: viserys
line: Tell him I want what was bargained for or I’m taking you back. He can keep the baby. I’ll cut it out and leave it for him.

name: viserys
line: What’s he saying?

name: viserys
line: That was all I wanted. W-what was promised.

name: viserys
line: No! You cannot touch me! I am the dragon! I am the dragon! I want my crown! Ahh!

name: viserys
line: No. Dany! Dany, tell them, make them! You can’t!

name: viserys
line: Dany please!

name: rickon
line: Old Nan said they turn your skull into a cup and make you drink your own blood from it.

name: rickon
line: That’s what Old Nan said.

name: rickon
line: What’s That?

name: rickon
line: Where?

name: rickon
line: [Surprised] Me? I’m coming with you.

name: rickon
line: I’m coming with you.  I’m your brother.  I have to protect you.

name: rickon
line: We’re not Southerners.

name: rickon
line: And I don’t want to leave you.

name: rickon
line: [Crying, looks at OSHA]  I know how to swing a sword.

name: rickon
line: What's happening?

name: rickon
line: What's wrong with him?

name: rickon
line: We'll make you better. LUWIN I feel just fine.

name: rickon
line: (cries)

name: rickon
line: Do something!

name: rickon
line: I'm fine.

name: rickon
line: Jack and Billy. They'll give us some food.

name: rickon
line: They've all gone away.

name: rickon
line: No, they won't.

name: rickon
line: Here, Shaggydog.

name: rickon
line: He doesn't like chains.

name: rickon
line: No, l came to see Father.

name: rickon
line: He was down here. l saw him.

name: rickon
line: Last night, when l was sleeping. Here, Shaggydog.

name: robb
line: No.

name: robb
line: If we take Tywin's castle from him, the lords of Westeros will realize he's not invincible.  Take his home, take his gold, take his power.

name: robb
line: You begged me not to send Theon to negotiate with his father and I ignored your advice.

name: robb
line: Now Winterfell is burned to the ground.  The North is overrun with Ironborn and Bran and Rickon are gone.

name: robb
line: So, Casterly Rock?  I'm asking your advice.

name: robb
line: If Walder Frey cooperates.

name: robb
line: We'll lose the war and die the way father died. Or worse.

name: robb
line: We thank you for your hospitality, my lord.

name: robb
line: I have come to make my apologies, my lord, and to beg your forgiveness.

name: robb
line: My ladies.  All men should keep their word, kings most of all.  I was pledged to marry one of you and I broke that vow.  The fault is not with you.  Any man would be lucky to have any one of you.  I did what I did not to slight you, but because I loved another.  I know these words cannot set right the wrong I have done to you and your house.  I beg your forgiveness and pledge to do all I can to make amends so the Freys of the Crossing and the Starks of Winterfell may once again be friends.

name: robb
line: Thank you, my lord.

name: robb
line: My mother’s alone with Roose Bolton.  I should rescue her.

name: robb
line: Be kind.  She’s finally starting to like you.

name: robb
line: Perhaps I’ve made a terrible mistake.

name: robb
line: Striking your king is an act of treason.

name: robb
line: [Gets up from his seat and addresses WALDER] If you think the time is right, Lord Walder, by all means, let us bed them.

name: robb
line: I suppose it does seem strange from a foreigner’s perspective.

name: robb
line: It’s tradition. [TALISA stares at ROBB]  Without the bedding ceremony, there’s no real proof the lord and lady consummated their marriage.

name: robb
line: Boy or girl?

name: robb
line: Oh, do you?   It seems to me the father should have some say in his son’s naming.

name: robb
line: I do.

name: robb
line: Mother.

name: robb
line: It's not about glory. Your instructions were to wait for him to come to you.

name: robb
line: What value was the mill?

name: robb
line: Is he there now? Of course not.

name: robb
line: I wanted to draw the Mountain into the west, into our country where we could surround him and kill him. I wanted him to chase us, which he would have done because he is a mad without a strategic thought in his head. I could have that head on a spike by now. Instead, I have a mill.

name: robb
line: Willem and Martyn Lannister are 14 years old.

name: robb
line: Tywin Lannister has my sisters. Have I sued for peace?

name: robb
line: Do you think he'll sue for peace because we have his father's brother's great-grandsons?

name: robb
line: How many men did you lose?

name: robb
line: We need our men more than Tywin needs his!

name: robb
line: You would have. Right here today at this gathering if you had been patient.

name: robb
line: You know who isn't? Tywin Lannister.

name: robb
line: Did you ever think you'd marry one?

name: robb
line: Never?

name: robb
line: We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.

name: robb
line: By the time Bolton's bastard-RAMSAY got to Winterfell, the ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And BRAN and RICKON have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.

name: robb
line: No.

name: robb
line: There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.

name: robb
line: The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross. I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight. I don't think we're going to get one.

name: robb
line: Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.

name: robb
line: She freed Jaime Lannister. The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.

name: robb
line: What's your name, friend?

name: robb
line: Bring them in.

name: robb
line: Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?

name: robb
line: Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen--

name: robb
line: They were boys! Look at them.

name: robb
line: My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.

name: robb
line: Leave him.

name: robb
line: Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.

name: robb
line: This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.

name: robb
line: Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?

name: robb
line: I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.

name: robb
line: You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.

name: robb
line: That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.

name: robb
line: Kneel, my lord.

name: robb
line: Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?

name: robb
line: You were right.

name: robb
line: The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.

name: robb
line: What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.

name: robb
line: Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.

name: robb
line: What?

name: robb
line: Here. And we're here. King's Landing--

name: robb
line: I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.

name: robb
line: And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.

name: robb
line: Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.

name: robb
line: We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.

name: robb
line: We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.

name: robb
line: He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.

name: robb
line: He's a proud man and we've wounded him.

name: robb
line: It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.

name: robb
line: I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.

name: robb
line: I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.

name: robb
line: You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.

name: robb
line: Frey will wait. He knows we're coming.

name: robb
line: Edmure is the best match a Frey has had in the history of their house. We should all get some sleep.

name: robb
line: If you don't put some clothes on, I can't promise I won't attack you again.

name: robb
line: Who are you writing?

name: robb
line: Is that Valyrian?

name: robb
line: Gaaa? (sighs) Say hello for me.

name: robb
line: 'Ritsas.'

name: robb
line: Does she know her daughter's a queen?

name: robb
line: That will be a surprise, I expect.

name: robb
line: How am I supposed to sit here planning a war when you're over there looking like that?

name: robb
line: I will.

name: robb
line: What, now?  Are you certain?

name: robb
line: Angry? You're my queen.

name: robb
line: Maybe one of each.

name: robb
line: I love you. Do you hear me?  I love you.

name: robb
line: King in the North!

name: robb
line: I am the rightful king.

name: robb
line: Take that. -

name: robb
line: I am the King in the North!

name: robb
line: I've never met her.

name: robb
line: Frey, I suppose. I don't know her first name.

name: robb
line: An important bridge.

name: robb
line: It was before they killed my father. I still thought I could march south and rescue him in time, but only if I crossed that bridge.

name: robb
line: He was the best man I ever met. I know children always think that about their fathers, but

name: robb
line: He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them. The farmers plowing the fields are yours to protect. The charwomen scrubbing the floors, yours to protect. The soldiers you order into battle. He told me he woke with fear in the morning and went to bed with fear in the night. I didn't believe him. I asked him, "How can a man be brave if he's afraid?" "That is the only time a man can be brave," he told me.

name: robb
line: He would have liked you.

name: robb
line: He didn't care much about gold or glory.

name: robb
line: Because we'll never be safe until the Lannisters are defeated. And because I believe in justice.

name: robb
line: That would be a start.

name: robb
line: How? How?

name: robb
line: Tell me this isn't true.

name: robb
line: Why?

name: robb
line: No! You knew I would not allow it and you did it anyway.

name: robb
line: Jaime Lannister has played you for a fool. You've weakened our position. You've brought discord into our camp. And you did it all behind my back. Make sure she's guarded day and night.

name: robb
line: Send another 40 with our fastest horses.

name: robb
line: Still no word?

name: robb
line: Theon has my brothers. If we storm the castle

name: robb
line: Send word to your son. Any ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.

name: robb
line: Any ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy. He betrayed our cause. He betrayed me. And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.

name: robb
line: How am I? I've had to arrest my mother. The Lannisters have my sisters. The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers. I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.

name: robb
line: No. Forgive me. You're being kind. I have no right.

name: robb
line: That's not the kind of king I want to be.

name: robb
line: I don't know. The good kind. Most kings grew up as princes. They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown. I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.

name: robb
line: I'd like to hear you play the harp.

name: robb
line: How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?

name: robb
line: I don't want to marry the Frey girl.

name: robb
line: But you needed that bridge. I hope it's a very beautiful bridge.

name: robb
line: I know that.

name: robb
line: I love her.

name: robb
line: It is important to me.

name: robb
line: And that is what would be in store for me with one of Walder Frey's daughters,  what you and father had?

name: robb
line: Now you're arguing just to argue because you arranged it.

name: robb
line: My father is dead. And the only parent I have left has no right to call anyone reckless.

name: robb
line: Father, smith, warrior, mother ,maiden, crone, stranger.

name: robb
line: I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.

name: robb
line: I’m sending one of your cousins down to King’s Landing with my peace terms.

name: robb
line: Men who fought my father.

name: robb
line: I need his ships.

name: robb
line: If I left you with one of my bannermen, your father would know within a fortnight, and my bannerman would receive a raven with a message, "Release my son and you'll be rich beyond your dreams. Refuse and your house will be destroyed, root and stem.”

name: robb
line: Oh, I trust them with my life. Just not with yours.

name: robb
line: You insult yourself, Kingslayer. You've been defeated by a boy.

name: robb
line: You're held captive by a boy. Perhaps you'll be killed by a boy. (Grey Wind enters the cage. Jaime looks very nervous). Stannis Baratheon sent ravens to all the high lords of Westeros. King Joffrey Baratheon is neither a true king nor a true Baratheon. (Jaime focuses back on Robb). He's your bastard son.

name: robb
line: My father learned the truth. That's why you had him executed.

name: robb
line: Your son killed him so the world wouldn't learn who fathered him. And you... you pushed my brother from a window because he saw you with the queen.

name: robb
line: I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.

name: robb
line: No, but he's starting to know me.

name: robb
line: It's better than three defeats.

name: robb
line: You're Ser Alton Lannister?

name: robb
line: I offer your cousins peace if they meet my terms. First, your family must release my sisters. Second, my father's bones must be returned to us so he may rest beside his brother and sister in the crypts beneath Winterfell. And the remains of all those who died in his service must also be returned. Their families can honor them with proper funerals.

name: robb
line: Third... Joffrey and the Queen Regent must renounce all claim to dominion of the North. From this time, till the end of time, we are a free and independent kingdom.

name: robb
line: Neither Joffrey nor any of his men shall set foot in our lands again. If he disregards this command, he shall suffer the same fate as my father, only I don't need a servant to do my beheading for me.

name: robb
line: These are my terms. If the Queen Regent and her son meet them, I'll give them peace. If not, I will litter the south with Lannister dead.

name: robb
line: Oh, is he? You'll ride at daybreak, Ser Alton. That will be all for tonight.

name: robb
line: You don't have to call me ‘Your Grace’ when no one's around.

name: robb
line: I'm glad someone's gotten used to it.

name: robb
line: Of course they are.

name: robb
line: Men who fought my father.

name: robb
line: I need his ships. They say he has 200.

name: robb
line: I understand you don't trust Lord Greyjoy.

name: robb
line: Yes. And now I'm the one rebelling against the throne. Before me, it was father. You married one rebel and mothered another.

name: robb
line: If I trade the Kingslayer for two girls, my bannermen will string me up by my feet.

name: robb
line: It's more complicated than that! You know it is.

name: robb
line: You can't go to Winterfell.

name: robb
line: I'll send Rodrik to watch over the boys, ‘cause tomorrow, you'll ride south to the Stormlands.

name: robb
line: Because I need you to negotiate with Renly Baratheon. He's rallied an army of 100,000. You know him. You know his family.

name: robb
line: Which of these lords do I trust more than you? If Renly sides with us, we'll outnumber them two to one. When they feel the jaws beginning to shut, they'll sue for peace. We'll get the girls back. Then we'll all go home for good.

name: robb
line: We will all be together again soon, I promise.

name: robb
line: (Pauses) Give Lord Renly my regards.

name: robb
line: We're not executing prisoners, Lord Bolton.

name: robb
line: I doubt it.

name: robb
line: My father outlawed flaying in the North.

name: robb
line: We're not torturing them.

name: robb
line: The Lannisters hold prisoners of their own. I won't give them an excuse to abuse my sisters.

name: robb
line: You'll die if she doesn't.

name: robb
line: Put this in your mouth and lie down. You don't want to watch.

name: robb
line: Bite on it. It's better than biting your own tongue, believe me.

name: robb
line: What's your name?

name: robb
line: Your last name?

name: robb
line: You know my family name. You have me at a disadvantage.

name: robb
line: They killed my father.

name: robb
line: The family he fights for.

name: robb
line: I have no hatred for the lad.

name: robb
line: You'd have us surrender, end all this bloodshed. I understand. The country would be at peace and life would be just under the righteous hand of good King Joffrey.

name: robb
line: If the gods give me strength.

name: robb
line: I don't know. We'll go back to Winterfell. I have no desire to sit on the Iron Throne.

name: robb
line: I don't know.

name: robb
line: First we have to win the war.

name: robb
line: You never told me where you're from.

name: robb
line: Volantis? You're far from home. The boy was lucky you were here.

name: robb
line: Quent.

name: robb
line: Lady Talisa.

name: robb
line: I'm not sure I'm a lady.

name: robb
line: It's hard to keep all the rules straight. But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady. Unless she's a queen or a princess. I could find someone who knows.

name: robb
line: Because it's obvious.

name: robb
line: I'd call you a liar.

name: robb
line: (nods)

name: robb
line: Better at amputations, I'm afraid.

name: robb
line: Quite a pretty spot.

name: robb
line: I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.

name: robb
line: Of course, a spy would deny being a spy.

name: robb
line: Mother. Mother, this is Lady Talisa. She's been helping with the wounded. She's been very helpful.

name: robb
line: I've missed you.

name: robb
line: You surprised me, that's all. I didn't think I'd see you today.

name: robb
line: I know.

name: robb
line: I know.

name: robb
line: I haven't forgotten.

name: robb
line: This cannot be true.

name: robb
line: Why? Why would Theon

name: robb
line: My brothers?

name: robb
line: I must go north at once.

name: robb
line: How can I call myself king if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if I can't

name: robb
line: There will be no talk. He will die for this.

name: robb
line: Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon, I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him why. And then I'll take his head myself.

name: robb
line: And what did she say?

name: robb
line: And what then?

name: robb
line: If every man were held accountable for the actions of every distant relative, Ser Alton, we'd all hang.

name: robb
line: You've acted with honor. I thank you for it. Lord Karstark, see that Ser Alton's pen is clean, and give him a hot supper.

name: robb
line: Is there room for Ser Alton?

name: robb
line: Have the men build him a new pen. Put him in with the Kingslayer for now. Have your boy watch over them.

name: robb
line: That will be all.

name: robb
line: And my enemies, as some of my bannermen are fond of mentioning.

name: robb
line: That's what I tell my bannermen.

name: robb
line: If you need help finding these

name: robb
line: Continue, my lady.

name: robb
line: Yes.

name: robb
line: I expect he will.

name: robb
line: Come with me to the Crag.

name: robb
line: Let the maester show you his stores. I want the wounded men to be treated well, all the wounded men.

name: robb
line: You know very well.

name: robb
line: lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.

name: robb
line: He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?

name: robb
line: Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.

name: robb
line: Have my horse saddled and ready.

name: robb
line: My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.

name: robb
line: Well? What did he say?

name: robb
line: Huh.

name: robb
line: What does he want in return?

name: robb
line: Fine, fine. And?

name: robb
line: She won't be happy about that. And?

name: robb
line: l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?

name: robb
line: And?

name: robb
line: Can l refuse?

name: robb
line: Then l consent.

name: robb
line: By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.

name: robb
line: He's more use to us alive than dead.

name: robb
line: lf we do it your way, Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.

name: robb
line: l sent 2,000 men to their graves today.

name: robb
line: Aye. But the dead won't hear them. (making a speech to his bannermen) One victory does not make us conquerors. Did we free my father? Did we rescue my sisters from the queen? Did we free the North from those who want us on our knees? This war is far from over.

name: robb
line: Treason? Sansa wrote this?

name: robb
line: Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?

name: robb
line: I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.

name: robb
line: They've all sworn to defend my father, have they not?

name: robb
line: I must be.

name: robb
line: Why is that good?

name: robb
line: Galbart Glover will lead the Van.

name: robb
line: You are welcome to do so, Lord Umber.

name: robb
line: My Lord father taught me it was death to bare steel against your Liege Lord.

name: robb
line: Shh, it's all right.

name: robb
line: South. For father.

name: robb
line: The Lannisters have spies everywhere.

name: robb
line: Aye, they do.

name: robb
line: There must always be a Stark at Winterfell.

name: robb
line: I'll send letters whenever I can, but if you don't hear from me, don't be scared.

name: robb
line: The River Lords are falling back with Jaime Lannister at their heels.

name: robb
line: Mother!

name: robb
line: There was no one else.

name: robb
line: None of them are Starks.

name: robb
line: If you think you can send me back to Winterfell...

name: robb
line: There was a letter. From Sansa.

name: robb
line: No.

name: robb
line: 18,000. If I go to King's Landing and bend my knee to Joffrey...

name: robb
line: And if I lose?

name: robb
line: They were butchered in their sleep.

name: robb
line: Well, that makes it simple then.

name: robb
line: To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.

name: robb
line: Where did you find him?

name: robb
line: How high did you get?

name: robb
line: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.

name: robb
line: Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.

name: robb
line: You call me boy again.

name: robb
line: Go on.

name: robb
line: l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.

name: robb
line: Renly is not the king.

name: robb
line: That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.

name: robb
line: Now and always.

name: robb
line: What are you telling him now?

name: robb
line: Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.

name: robb
line: How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.

name: robb
line: Don't ever say that.

name: robb
line: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

name: robb
line: My mother?

name: robb
line: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

name: robb
line: Farewell, Snow.

name: robb
line: I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.

name: robb
line: When was the last time you left this room?

name: robb
line: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

name: robb
line: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

name: robb
line: Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.

name: robb
line: They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...

name: robb
line: I'll ride to King's Landing.

name: robb
line: Mother, you can't.

name: robb
line: What about Bran?

name: robb
line: Relax your bow arm.

name: robb
line: Lad, go run back and get the rest.

name: robb
line: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

name: robb
line: Put away your blade.

name: robb
line: What is it?

name: robb
line: I hear the prince is a right royal prick.

name: robb
line: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He’s never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.

name: robb
line: Uncle Benjen.

name: robb
line: I’m good.

name: robb
line: Time for bed.

name: robb
line: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

name: robb
line: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

name: robb
line: Why are you here?

name: robb
line: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

name: robb
line: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

name: robb
line: Not too fast.

name: robb
line: Not now.

name: robb
line: You’re talking about war.

name: robb
line: Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.

name: robb
line: You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!

name: robb
line: And it’s not your duty, because it’s not your House.

name: robb
line: Where’s Bran?

name: robb
line: Drop the knife. Let him go and I’ll let you live.

name: robb
line: Are you all right?

name: robb
line: Have you lost your mind? What if you’d missed?

name: robb
line: You don’t have the right -

name: robb
line: What about her?

name: robb
line: We’ll keep her alive.

name: stannis
line: Half Robert, half lowborn.

name: stannis
line: What do you mean to do with him?

name: stannis
line: Then why bathe him and dress him in fine clothes?  If it needs to be done, do it. Don't torture the boy.

name: stannis
line: No.

name: stannis
line: You've slaughtered many lambs?

name: stannis
line: They feeding you enough?

name: stannis
line: You don't belong in a place like this.

name: stannis
line: Yeah.

name: stannis
line: Melisandre's returned.

name: stannis
line: Came back with a bastard boy. Robert's bastard boy.

name: stannis
line: She says there's power in king's blood.

name: stannis
line: Sacrifice him.

name: stannis
line: What of it? We're at war. Why should I spare the son of some tavern slut Robert bedded one drunken night?

name: stannis
line: So did Renly.

name: stannis
line: How many boys live in Westeros? How many girls? How many men? How many women?The darkness will devour them all, she says. The night that never ends. Unless I triumph. I never asked for this. No more than I asked to be king. We do not choose our destiny, but we must do our duty, no?  Great or small, we must do our duty. What's one bastard boy against a kingdom?

name: stannis
line: I came to free you. If you swear never to raise your hand to the Lady Melisandre again.

name: stannis
line: You have little regard for your own life.

name: stannis
line: I saw a vision in the flames. A great battle in the snow. I saw it. And you saw whatever she gave birth to. I never believed, but when you see the truth, when it's right there in front of you as real as these iron bars, how can you deny her god is real?

name: stannis
line: The usurper Robb Stark. The usurper Balon Greyjoy. The usurper Joffrey Baratheon.

name: stannis
line: The usurper Robb Stark is dead. Betrayed by his bannerman.

name: stannis
line: Do you know who had this table carved and painted, Ser Davos?

name: stannis
line: And do you know how Aegon Targaryen conquered Westeros?

name: stannis
line: He had a smaller fleet than the kings he faced and a smaller army, but he had three dragons. Dragons are magic, Ser Davos. My enemies have made my kingdom bleed. I will not forget that. I will not forgive that. I will punish them with any arms at my disposal.

name: stannis
line: What is the life of one bastard boy against a kingdom?

name: stannis
line: The boy must die.

name: stannis
line: You don't deny it?

name: stannis
line: What other way?! Tell us about this other way.

name: stannis
line: Very well, Ser Davos Seaworth. I, Stannis of the House Baratheon, First of My Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, sentence you to die.

name: stannis
line: Why am I gonna need you?

name: stannis
line: When did you learn to read?

name: stannis
line: I've made my decision.

name: stannis
line: (chuckles) You see, Ser Davos? You've been saved by that fire god you like to mock. You're in his army now.

name: stannis
line: You refuse to tell me where you're going?

name: stannis
line: How long will you be gone?

name: stannis
line: You're abandoning me.

name: stannis
line: Then serve me.

name: stannis
line: My enemies think they've destroyed me. They're laughing at me the way Renly laughed at me. I want Joffrey dead. I want Robb Stark dead. Make me another son.

name: stannis
line: Why?

name: stannis
line: I'm not so easily killed. Men have been trying for years.

name: stannis
line: (whispering) I want you.

name: stannis
line: You told me your magic requires a king's blood.

name: stannis
line: I'm the one true king.

name: stannis
line: I heard you were dead.

name: stannis
line: I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.

name: stannis
line: We are alone.

name: stannis
line: I am fighting.

name: stannis
line: Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.

name: stannis
line: My lady.

name: stannis
line: I meant to come sooner. The battle--

name: stannis
line: Yes, of course.

name: stannis
line: I believed that once.

name: stannis
line: Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.

name: stannis
line: I've wronged you. I have shamed you.

name: stannis
line: That's not true.

name: stannis
line: She's my daughter. I want to see her.

name: stannis
line: Shireen.

name: stannis
line: You've grown since I last saw you.

name: stannis
line: No.

name: stannis
line: He did. He fought bravely.

name: stannis
line: He won't be visiting, child.

name: stannis
line: Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.

name: stannis
line: You're the king beyond the wall?

name: stannis
line: You know who I am?

name: stannis
line: It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.

name: stannis
line: I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

name: stannis
line: Take these men away.

name: stannis
line: Your father was an honorable man.

name: stannis
line: What do you think he'd have done with him?

name: stannis
line: Very well. *to Davos* Take him.

name: stannis
line: You're a literary man now. What do you make of that?

name: stannis
line: The usurper Joffrey Baratheon. I said those words when I tossed a leech into the fire. A leech filled with bastard blood. A bastard you set free. I am now faced with a great opportunity and I am powerless to take advantage of it.

name: stannis
line: What progress have you made?

name: stannis
line: House Peasebury.

name: stannis
line: House Musgood.

name: stannis
line: House Haigh. They don't have enough men between them to raid a pantry.

name: stannis
line: The Golden Company?

name: stannis
line: They're sellswords.

name: stannis
line: We don't have any gold.

name: stannis
line: If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten. I will not become a page in someone else's history book. I'm running out of time, Ser Davos. Which means you're running out of time. -

name: stannis
line: I ordered him to tear down his idols. He disobeyed.

name: stannis
line: A good deal more than you.

name: stannis
line: Meat's off.

name: stannis
line: Serve fish, then. We're on an island.

name: stannis
line: I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.

name: stannis
line: Of course I remember.

name: stannis
line: She's a child.

name: stannis
line: She's my daughter. You will not strike her.

name: stannis
line: Renly, you're no king.

name: stannis
line: Go on.

name: stannis
line: Not wildfire!

name: stannis
line: We've been here since midday.

name: stannis
line: He shares no blood with me. He is a bastard born of incest. As was his brother before him.

name: stannis
line: It's not a story. It's the truth.

name: stannis
line: Gold you loaned him.

name: stannis
line: More than any man living.

name: stannis
line: None.

name: stannis
line: 67. And when he dies, who's in command? A half-grown boy, the product of incest? Cersei Lannister, a queen whose people despise her? Jaime Lannister, a man best known for killing the king he was sworn to protect? When Tywin's gone, who do you back?

name: stannis
line: Horses?

name: stannis
line: 20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?

name: stannis
line: Put last night’s guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.

name: stannis
line: We’re not returning to Castle Black.

name: stannis
line: Have the dead horses butchered for meat.

name: stannis
line: Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I’m sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I’ll make sure the Night’s Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.

name: stannis
line: Yes.

name: stannis
line: You’re not abandoning me, you’re obeying a command.

name: stannis
line: And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn’t name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don’t come back empty handed.

name: stannis
line: My family stays with me.

name: stannis
line: My family stays with me.

name: stannis
line: No. What are you reading?

name: stannis
line: What’s it about?

name: stannis
line: “The dance of dragons”? Why is that a dance?

name: stannis
line: Doesn’t make much sense.

name: stannis
line: If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?

name: stannis
line: Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.

name: stannis
line: You don’t even know what I’m talking about.

name: stannis
line: Yes there is.

name: stannis
line: Forgive me.

name: stannis
line: There’s no other way. She has King’s blood.

name: stannis
line: We ride for Winterfell.

name: stannis
line: Prepare to form up.

name: stannis
line: Tell me.

name: stannis
line: How many?

name: stannis
line: Speak up. It can’t be worse than mutiny.

name: stannis
line: Cut her down.

name: stannis
line: Get the men into marching formation. On to Winterfell.

name: stannis
line: Trench here. Another one 300 yards from the castle wall. Hurry them along. And send out a foraging party immediately. The siege begins at sunrise.

name: stannis
line: Bolton has women fighting for him.

name: stannis
line: I did.

name: stannis
line: Go on, do your duty.

name: stannis
line: Lord Commander.

name: stannis
line: (To Olly as he closes the door). I'd like to speak alone.

name: stannis
line: Very well. (They all sit down). Have you considered my offer?

name: stannis
line: Say the word and you will be.

name: stannis
line: I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.

name: stannis
line: You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.

name: stannis
line: I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. (Stands up). But if your mind’s made up, I won't try to persuade you.

name: stannis
line: Are you bored of us already?

name: stannis
line: I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.

name: stannis
line: They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. (After a moment). Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.

name: stannis
line: You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.

name: stannis
line: You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of  Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

name: stannis
line: Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.

name: stannis
line: I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.

name: stannis
line: Who then? You?

name: stannis
line: Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?

name: stannis
line: Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.

name: stannis
line: That amuses you?

name: stannis
line: Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.

name: stannis
line: You can give me the North.

name: stannis
line: Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.

name: stannis
line: You know who rules at Winterfell now?

name: stannis
line: The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark’s heart. Don’t you want to avenge him?

name: stannis
line: No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can’t protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton’s head on a spike. But if I’m to take Winterfell I’ll need more men.

name: stannis
line: I’m not talking about the damn Night’s Watch. I’m talking about the wildlings.

name: stannis
line: If they swear to follow me, I’ll pardon them. We’ll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I’ll declare them citizens of the realm. I’ll give them land to live on.

name: stannis
line: I’ll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.

name: stannis
line: You admire him, don’t you?

name: stannis
line: He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...

name: stannis
line: ...or he burns.

name: stannis
line: Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.

name: stannis
line: Mance Rayder, you’ve been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.

name: stannis
line: Kneel and live.

name: stannis
line: Fewer.

name: stannis
line: Nothing.

name: stannis
line: You're Samwell Tarly?

name: stannis
line: Your father is Randyll Tarly. He defeated my brother at the Battle of Ashford. Only battle Robert ever lost. I told him he shouldn't go so far west so soon, but he never listened. Fine soldier, your father. You don't look like a soldier. But I'm told you killed a white walker.

name: stannis
line: How?

name: stannis
line: Dragonglass?

name: stannis
line: I know what it is. We have it in Dragonstone. Why would obsidian kill a walker?

name: stannis
line: The Lady Melisandre told me that death marches on the Wall.

name: stannis
line: Seen what?

name: stannis
line: We have to know how to fight them. (After a moment). Keep reading, Samwell Tarly.

name: stannis
line: It's time.

name: stannis
line: If Jon Snow returns with the wildlings. We can't wait that long. We have the advantage, more men, more horses, all fed and rested. But every day we wait, the odds shift in Bolton's favor. This could turn to winter at any moment. We have to act now. Give the order. We march at sunrise.

name: stannis
line: No need, they're coming with us.

name: stannis
line: Here? Half these watchmen are killers and rapists. No, they march with us.

name: stannis
line: I hope you know what you're doing with these wildlings. I need those ships.

name: stannis
line: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

name: stannis
line: Perhaps, but that wasn't Ned Stark's way.

name: stannis
line: Not your fault.

name: stannis
line: We must. To beat the snows.

name: stannis
line: I won't. I need you.

name: stannis
line: (Walking away). And you, my Lady, what do you need?

name: stannis
line: Are you lonely?

name: stannis
line: My father used to tell me that boredom indicates a lack of inner resources.

name: stannis
line: I know Castle Black is no place for a child, but I -

name: stannis
line: Why do you say that?

name: stannis
line: She shouldn't have said that.

name: stannis
line: When you were an infant, (Stands up and walks around his desk), the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, (Shireen smiles), and you pressed it to your cheek. (Looks down. Shireen’s smile drops). By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. (Walks to the table and adjusts the objects on it). I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. (Turns to her). Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. (Shireen smiles). I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. (Walks towards her). You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.

name: stannis
line: What else?

name: stannis
line: 500 men.

name: stannis
line: Sell swords, loyal to nothing but gold.

name: stannis
line: And?

name: stannis
line: I retreated from King’s Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”

name: stannis
line: Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it’s a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black. And who can say how many years this winter will last.

name: stannis
line: This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we’ve lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,

name: stannis
line: I’ve trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.

name: stannis
line: I don’t know what I saw.

name: stannis
line: And you, do you trust yourself?

name: stannis
line: Are you sure?

name: stannis
line: We don’t have Robert’s bastard here.

name: stannis
line: Have you lost your mind?

name: stannis
line: There must be another way. Leeches or something.

name: stannis
line: She’s my daughter.

name: stannis
line: Get out.

name: stannis
line: Prepare to land.

name: stannis
line: The dwarf has played his little trick.

name: stannis
line: He can only play it once.

name: stannis
line: Thousands.

name: stannis
line: Come with me and take this city!

name: stannis
line: To the Mud Gate, go now!

name: stannis
line: Get the ladders up!

name: stannis
line: Stand and fight! Stand and fight, damn you!

name: stannis
line: No!

name: stannis
line: Will it hold?

name: stannis
line: I admire you, Ser Davos.

name: stannis
line: Pleased to hear it. Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you. So you take the onion for your sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.

name: stannis
line: Do you? Why?

name: stannis
line: And?

name: stannis
line: And where were those lords when Storm's End starved?

name: stannis
line: You defend these men who insult you behind your back.

name: stannis
line: We were forgotten. Robert and Ned Stark, they were the heroes. The glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King, while I held Storm's End with 500 men.

name: stannis
line: No? Robert did. He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war. Renly never fought a day in his life.

name: stannis
line: Then why'd he give him Storm's End?

name: stannis
line: First, we ate the horses. We weren't riding anywhere, not with the castle surrounded. We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses. Then the cats. Never liked cats. So fine. I do like dogs. Good animals. Loyal. But we ate them. Then the rats. The night before you slipped through, I thought my wife was dying. She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail. And then you made it through the lines. Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.

name: stannis
line: Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.

name: stannis
line: Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it. Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up. Insult or no, I gave it up. Because Robert was my older brother, and he was the king and I've always done my duty. But now, I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros. And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.

name: stannis
line: I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.

name: stannis
line: You said you saw my victory in the flames.

name: stannis
line: The flames lied. And I'm no better than a savage trusting in a fire god. I fought for your god in Blackwater Bay. I led my men to the gates of the seventh hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what? Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells. If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?

name: stannis
line: You claimed to speak for a god.

name: stannis
line: You talk about war as if you understand it.

name: stannis
line: Have you? Show me how you fight.

name: stannis
line: Show me.

name: stannis
line: Where's your god now? Will he save you? Where is your god?

name: stannis
line: I murdered my brother.

name: stannis
line: He wasn't your brother.

name: stannis
line: You promise these things, but you don't know. None of us know.

name: stannis
line: I see fire.

name: stannis
line: Send copies of that letter to every corner of the realm.

name: stannis
line: How did it fare with your pirate?

name: stannis
line: In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.

name: stannis
line: It won't be a choice this time. Do you trust him?

name: stannis
line: Well if he does his job, he'll have his share. Leave us.

name: stannis
line: What did you say to him?

name: stannis
line: Why?

name: stannis
line: Yeah.

name: stannis
line: Tell your lord to burn them then.

name: stannis
line: My little brother has a hundred thousand men according to the scouts. Men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.

name: stannis
line: Faith? In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of ten.

name: stannis
line: I cannot defeat my brother in the field, and I can't take King's Landing without the men he stole.

name: stannis
line: I've said the words, damn you! I burnt the idols.

name: stannis
line: I have a wife. I took a vow.

name: stannis
line: (Gasps). A son?

name: stannis
line: For the night is dark and full of terror.

name: stannis
line: He wasn't my beloved brother. (Matthos looks up). I didn't love him, he didn't love me.

name: stannis
line: A lie. Take it out.

name: stannis
line: Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Call him what he is.

name: stannis
line: Make it Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Whatever else he is, the man's still a knight.

name: stannis
line: When Eddard Stark learned the truth, he told only me. I'll not make the same mistake. Send copies of that letter to every corner of the Realm, from the Arbor to the Wall. The time has come to choose. Let no man claim ignorance as an excuse.

name: stannis
line: I'll not make peace with Renly while he calls himself King.

name: stannis
line: Who would steal the northern half of my kingdom. I've always served thieves according to their desserts, as you well know, Ser Davos. Joffrey, Renly, Robb Stark, they're all thieves. They'll bend the knee or I'll destroy them.

name: stannis
line: What is it?

name: stannis
line: Fools love a fool. I grieve for him as well, for the boy he was, not the man he grew to be.

name: stannis
line: I thought I made it clear to you there'd be no need to speak to me on this matter.

name: stannis
line: I've never known you to need to hear a thing twice.

name: stannis
line: You've come to lecture me on truth?

name: stannis
line: All my brother's bannermen have come to my side. Except the Tyrells, who fled like cowards. They won't be able to resist us now. Soon I shall be sitting on the Iron Throne.

name: stannis
line: I'll hear no more about it.

name: stannis
line: As soon as I've consolidated my troops. We'll make short work of the Lannisters' fleet. Once Blackwater Bay is cleared, we'll deliver our troops to their doorstep and take the city.

name: stannis
line: That's not your concern.

name: stannis
line: I never thought I'd have reason to doubt your loyalty. Was I wrong?

name: stannis
line: Oh, truth again. All right, what's the truth? The hard truth?

name: stannis
line: What do you believe?

name: stannis
line: We set out for King's Landing without Lady Melisandre. And you lead the fleet into Blackwater Bay.

name: stannis
line: Most of those lords should consider themselves lucky I don't hang them for treason. Hard truths cut both ways, Ser Davos.

name: stannis
line: Lady Stark, I had not thought to find you in the Stormlands.

name: stannis
line: Who else might it be?

name: stannis
line: My own.

name: stannis
line: Watch yourself, Renly.

name: stannis
line: That's twice I've warned you.

name: stannis
line: It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark. Your husband was a supporter of my claim. Lord Eddard's integrity cost him his head. And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.

name: stannis
line: The Iron Throne is mine by right. All those that deny that are my foes.

name: stannis
line: For the sake of the mother who bore us, I will give you this one night to reconsider. Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the Council. I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me. Otherwise I shall destroy you.

name: stannis
line: You think a few bolts of cloth will make you king?

name: stannis
line: We shall see, Renly. Come the dawn, we shall see.

name: stannis
line: Do your knucklebones bring you luck?

name: stannis
line: Fewer.

name: stannis
line: Four fewer fingernails to clean. Never understood why you had to wear them.

name: stannis
line: You were a hero and a smuggler. A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.

name: stannis
line: Does he listen?

name: stannis
line: She has a name. I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.

name: stannis
line: I want you to be a smuggler this time.

name: stannis
line: The red woman. No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.

name: stannis
line: Cleaner ways don't win wars.

name: bran
line: The Gift, I think.  Brandon The Builder gave all this land south of the Wall to the Night’s Watch for their sustenance and support.  Maester Luwin taught me that.

name: bran
line: Wildlings.

name: bran
line: Sorry.  But they come over the Wall and raid, steal, carry off women.

name: bran
line: I don’t see any.

name: bran
line: How are we going to get past the Wall?  My uncle said it’s 700 feet high.

name: bran
line: How did you get past it?

name: bran
line: It would take us two months to get to the Bay of Seals.

name: bran
line: Even Hodor’s not strong enough to climb the Wall with me on his back.

name: bran
line: My uncle said the gates were sealed with ice and stone when the castles were deserted.

name: bran
line: Hunting.

name: bran
line: [To Hodor] Hush, Hodor.  No, no more Hodoring.

name: bran
line: Hodor, calm down.

name: bran
line: Hodor, be quiet.

name: bran
line: Hodor, calm down.  Hodor, be quiet!

name: bran
line: Nothing.  I don’t know.

name: bran
line: I can’t do it by choice.  I don’t know how.  It happens in my dreams.

name: bran
line: I can’t.

name: bran
line: [Looks at JOJEN] You were right.  I can get inside Summer’s mind whenever I want.

name: bran
line: They can’t do that north of the Wall?

name: bran
line: [Looks at RICKON]  When I was looking through Summer’s eyes, I saw Jon.

name: bran
line: He was with the wildlings.  They tried to kill him but he got away.

name: bran
line: For all we know, Castle Black’s already under attack.  If this many wildlings got through-

name: bran
line: Everything Jojen told me is true.  You saw what I did to Hodor.  I have to find the three-eyed raven.

name: bran
line: Don’t worry, I’m not asking you to come with me.  It won’t be safe for Rickon.

name: bran
line: No.  You and Osha and Shaggydog head for the Last Hearth.  The Umbers are our bannermen.  They’ll protect you.

name: bran
line: Right now, I have to protect you.

name: bran
line: Robb’s at war and I’m going beyond the Wall.  If something happens to us, you’re the heir to Winterfell.

name: bran
line: [Looks at OSHA]  Will you know how to find the last Hearth?

name: bran
line: You don’t have to do any of this.

name: bran
line: You’re leaving now?  It’s the middle of the night.

name: bran
line: Don't, Hodor.

name: bran
line: Maybe we shouldn't stay.

name: bran
line: There are a lot of stories about this place. Horrible stories.

name: bran
line: So did I. Once.

name: bran
line: You ever heard about the Rat Cook?

name: bran
line: Just a cook in the Night's Watch. He was angry at the king for something, I don't remember. When the king was visiting the Nightfort, the cook killed the king's son, cooked him into a big pie with onions, carrots, mushrooms and bacon. That night he served the pie to the king. He liked the taste of his son so much, he asked for a second slice. The gods turned the cook into a giant white rat who could only eat his own young. He's been roaming the Nightfort ever since, devouring his own babies. But no matter what he does, he's always hungry.

name: bran
line: It wasn't for murder the gods cursed the Rat Cook or for serving the king's son in a pie. He killed a guest beneath his roof. That's something the gods can't forgive.

name: bran
line: Hodor.

name: bran
line: My brother, he's in the Night's--

name: bran
line: No, I'm not.

name: bran
line: Take us north of the Wall.

name: bran
line: I don't want to. I have to.

name: bran
line: Please, Sam. I have to go north. I have to.

name: bran
line: What is it?

name: bran
line: Why? What are they for?

name: bran
line: Take it, Hodor.

name: bran
line: I wish I could. I really do.

name: bran
line: Father?

name: bran
line: Why not?

name: bran
line: It's all right, Hodor.

name: bran
line: No, it was the three-eyed raven.

name: bran
line: I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.

name: bran
line: But you asked.

name: bran
line: I didn't ask for black magic dreams.

name: bran
line: We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.

name: bran
line: No.

name: bran
line: Where's Rickon and Hodor?

name: bran
line: What's out there?

name: bran
line: It's all right. The wolves will protect him.

name: bran
line: Only when I'm asleep.

name: bran
line: It's not just wolves. Sometimes in my dreams there's a-

name: bran
line: You've seen it?

name: bran
line: Does it have anything to do with warging?

name: bran
line: Seeing things that haven't happened yet?

name: bran
line: When my father died, I dreamt it.

name: bran
line: You have the sight, too?

name: bran
line: Your father is Howland Reed? Yeah.

name: bran
line: He saved my father's life during the rebellion.

name: bran
line: What else have you seen?

name: bran
line: How?

name: bran
line: Mother.

name: bran
line: Mother, I need to find it. It's here. It's calling me.

name: bran
line: Mother! Mother!

name: bran
line: You're both very good at skinning rabbits.

name: bran
line: Stop it!

name: bran
line: You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.

name: bran
line: You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.

name: bran
line: First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.

name: bran
line: Osha!

name: bran
line: He's having one now?

name: bran
line: You saw him? At Castle Black?

name: bran
line: It's all right, Osha.

name: bran
line: The raven's been coming to me ever since I fell from that tower. He wants me to find him. I don't have my legs anymore. This is what I have now.

name: bran
line: What if I belong in the North? What if I fell from that tower for a reason?

name: bran
line: You don't understand. You don't know.

name: bran
line: Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.

name: bran
line: Help them! Now!

name: bran
line: Help them!

name: bran
line: Who are you?

name: bran
line: You’re the three-eyed raven.

name: bran
line: I didn’t want anyone to die for me.

name: bran
line: You’re going to help me walk again?

name: bran
line: Why did you wake me?

name: bran
line: I was hungry.

name: bran
line: I was just eating.

name: bran
line: Hodor, take me to the tree.

name: bran
line: I know where we have to go.

name: bran
line: They already have stopped me.

name: bran
line: You've seen it, too.

name: bran
line: We will.

name: bran
line: Stop.

name: bran
line: Stop. Stop!

name: bran
line: Stop! Please.

name: bran
line: Please, get off her!

name: bran
line: Please! Please, leave her alone!

name: bran
line: Please, stop. Stop.

name: bran
line: What are you doing? Leave her alone!

name: bran
line: No!

name: bran
line: Is Jon with you?

name: bran
line: Hodor. Hodor, get his knife. Cut me loose.

name: bran
line: Hodor, get his knife. Hodor. Cut me loose, Hodor.

name: bran
line: Jojen and Meera, free them. Go!

name: bran
line: Jon.

name: bran
line: Jon!

name: bran
line: He's my brother.

name: bran
line: Hodor.

name: bran
line: We need to free Summer. And we need to go.

name: bran
line: Do you hear that?

name: bran
line: I'm going out there.

name: bran
line: I'm going.

name: bran
line: Summer, he's hurt. They've caught him in a trap.

name: bran
line: I didn't see, but they have my brother's wolf. They have Ghost.

name: bran
line: They're Night's Watch. Look. Jon might be here.

name: bran
line: No.

name: bran
line: I'm not leaving without Summer.

name: bran
line: The east side of the keep.

name: bran
line: I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.

name: bran
line: Osha, what are you doing?

name: bran
line: Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.

name: bran
line: They burned it down. They burned everything.

name: bran
line: I don't want to leave you.

name: bran
line: Every night it's the same. I'm walking and running, but I'm not I'm not me. I'm running through the godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling. Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.

name: bran
line: So she was lying? They don't exist?

name: bran
line: No, my dreams are different. Mine are true. I dreamt of my father dying. And Rickon had the same dream.

name: bran
line: King Robb. And it's not his war. He didn't choose it.

name: bran
line: Joffrey killed my father, your liege lord. Do you remember your vows, Ser?

name: bran
line: I didn't like the way he was talking about Robb.

name: bran
line: Don't have any pain.

name: bran
line: That way.

name: bran
line: I don't dream.

name: bran
line: I don't. Heard some of the men talking about the comet. (Bran looks up at the comet). They say it's an omen. They say it means Robb will win a great victory in the South.

name: bran
line: The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.

name: bran
line: We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.

name: bran
line: (to RICKON) Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.

name: bran
line: Hodor.

name: bran
line: We have to help them.

name: bran
line: If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.

name: bran
line: So, what does it mean?

name: bran
line: I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.

name: bran
line: You're lying.

name: bran
line: You know what it means.

name: bran
line: You didn't give me an honest answer.

name: bran
line: Well, it's not far off.

name: bran
line: I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.

name: bran
line: I know. It's just a stupid dream.

name: bran
line: Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?

name: bran
line: Theon?

name: bran
line: Why?

name: bran
line: You went with Robb.

name: bran
line: I don't know.

name: bran
line: Why?

name: bran
line: I won't.

name: bran
line: I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.

name: bran
line: Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?

name: bran
line: I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.

name: bran
line: I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.

name: bran
line: Farlen, you be silent.

name: bran
line: All of you should do as he commands.

name: bran
line: Why?

name: bran
line: No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.

name: bran
line: No! No! Theon! Please. Ser Rodrik!

name: bran
line: I'm begging you.

name: bran
line: Stop. Stop! Stop right now!

name: bran
line: Please, stop this. Please stop him.

name: bran
line: You said no harm would come! You said no harm would come. Theon, please.

name: bran
line: Theon, please don't.

name: bran
line: I'll do anything, please! No, please stop it!

name: bran
line: We couldn't risk going to the kitchens.

name: bran
line: And if Theon found out, he'd hang them.

name: bran
line: Wait, I know that farm. I sent those two Winterfell orphans there.

name: bran
line: We can't risk it. If Theon tracks us here, he'll torture them until he finds out where we are.

name: bran
line: They'll be after us with hounds.

name: bran
line: Hello, Sansa.

name: bran
line: Yes.  I need to speak to him.

name: bran
line: I can never be the Lord of Winterfell.  I can never be lord of anything.  I'm the three-eyed raven.

name: bran
line: It's difficult to explain.

name: bran
line: It means I can see everything.  Everything that's ever happened to everyone.  Everything that's happening right now.  It's all pieces, fragments.  I need to learn to see better.  When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

name: bran
line: The three-eyed raven taught me.

name: bran
line: I told you it's difficult to explain.

name: bran
line: I'm sorry for all that's happened to you.  I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home.  It was so beautiful that night.  Snow falling just like now.  And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

name: bran
line: I'll stay a bit longer.

name: bran
line: You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

name: bran
line: Ravens.  We need to send ravens.

name: bran
line: Do you know who this belonged to?

name: bran
line: Chaos is a ladder.

name: bran
line: I'm not Lord Stark.

name: bran
line: Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

name: bran
line: You're leaving?

name: bran
line: No, I don't.

name: bran
line: Thank you.

name: bran
line: For helping me.

name: bran
line: I'm not really, not anymore.  I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

name: bran
line: You came home.

name: bran
line: I saw you at the crossroads.

name: bran
line: I see quite a lot now.

name: bran
line: I thought you might go to King's Landing.

name: bran
line: Cersei is on her list of names.

name: bran
line: Littlefinger gave it to me.

name: bran
line: He thought I'd want it.

name: bran
line: Because it was meant to kill me.

name: bran
line: Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

name: bran
line: It doesn't matter.

name: bran
line: I don't want it.

name: bran
line: It's wasted on a cripple.

name: bran
line: You held a knife to his throat.

name: bran
line: You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."

name: bran
line: Come in.

name: bran
line: Samwell Tarly.

name: bran
line: I remember everything.

name: bran
line: You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.

name: bran
line: I became the Three-Eyed Raven.

name: bran
line: I can see things that happened in the past. I can see things happening now all over the world. Why did you come to Winterfell?

name: bran
line: He's on his way back to Winterfell with Daenerys Targaryen. You you saw this  in a vision?

name: bran
line: He needs to know the truth.

name: bran
line: About himself. No one knows. No one but me. Jon isn't really my father's son He's the son of Rhaegar Targaryen and my aunt.

name: bran
line: Dornish bastards are named Sand.

name: bran
line: Are you certain?

name: bran
line: Robert's Rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar didn't kidnap my aunt.

name: bran
line: He loved her. And she loved him.

name: bran
line: He's never been a bastard.

name: bran
line: The things we do for love.

name: bran
line: You weren't sorry then. You were protecting your family.

name: bran
line: You still would be, if you hadn't pushed me out of that window. And I would still be Brandon Stark.

name: bran
line: No. I'm something else now.

name: bran
line: I'm not angry at anyone.

name: bran
line: You won't be able to help us in this fight if I let them murder you first.

name: bran
line: How do you know there is an afterwards?

name: bran
line: Yes, he will.

name: bran
line: He'll come for me. He's tried before, many times, with many Three-Eyed Ravens.

name: bran
line: An endless night. He wants to erase this world, and I am its memory.

name: bran
line: His mark is on me.

name: bran
line: He always knows where I am.

name: bran
line: No. We need to lure him into the open before his army destroys us all. I'll wait for him in the Godswood.

name: bran
line: I don't know. No one's ever tried.

name: bran
line: No.

name: bran
line: Stranger than most.

name: bran
line: It's a long story.

name: bran
line: Almost.

name: bran
line: We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon.

name: bran
line: He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen, the dead march south.

name: bran
line: Waiting, for an old friend. It's time to tell Jon the truth.

name: bran
line: I'm not his brother. He trusts you more than anyone. Now's the time.

name: bran
line: It's the same as the one Daeron Targaryen built for his crippled nephew 120 years ago. I liked that one.

name: bran
line: I'm not Lord of Winterfell.

name: bran
line: I don't really want anymore.

name: bran
line: You shouldn't envy me. Mostly I live in the past.

name: bran
line: It's your choice.

name: bran
line: Why do you think I came all this way?

name: bran
line: Lord Tyrion you will be my Hand.

name: bran
line: And I don't want to be king.

name: bran
line: I choose you.

name: bran
line: Yes, I can. I'm king.

name: bran
line: He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.

name: bran
line: You were exactly where you were supposed to be.

name: bran
line: We appear to be missing a Master of Whisperers. And a Master of Laws. And a Master of War.

name: bran
line: And Drogon? Any word?

name: bran
line: Perhaps I can find him. Do carry on with the rest.

name: bran
line: (smiling) I'm sure it will.

name: bran
line: lt had three eyes. lt told me to come with him, so l did. We went down into the crypts and my father was there.

name: bran
line: You're afraid. Just like Hodor.

name: bran
line: You've lived beyond the Wall. What are you scared of? l'm a crippled boy and l'm willing to go.

name: bran
line: That's my grandfather, Lord Rickard. He was burned alive by the Mad King, Aerys. That's Lyanna, my father's sister. King Robert was supposed to marry her, but Rhaegar Targaryen kidnapped her. Robert started a war to win her back. He killed Rhaegar, but she died anyway. That's where l saw Father.

name: bran
line: Rickon!

name: bran
line: What are you doing down here? Come back up with us.

name: bran
line: How many times have l told you? He's in King's Landing with Sansa and Arya.

name: bran
line: Saw him when?

name: bran
line: I hate your stories.

name: bran
line: Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.

name: bran
line: Maybe we do.

name: bran
line: I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.

name: bran
line: I'd rather be dead.

name: bran
line: Jon said he was a deserter.

name: bran
line: Our way is the old way?

name: bran
line: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?

name: bran
line: So he was lying?

name: bran
line: Where will they go? Their mother’s dead.

name: bran
line: NO!

name: bran
line: Please, father!

name: bran
line: What about you?

name: bran
line: I saw the king! He’s got hundreds of people!

name: bran
line: But he’s coming right now! Down our road!

name: bran
line: I promise.

name: bran
line: What?

name: bran
line: Come on, you.

name: bran
line: Ten

name: bran
line: The Greyjoys.

name: bran
line: I don't know them.

name: bran
line: "Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".

name: bran
line: "Righteous in wrath".

name: bran
line: "Family, duty, honor".

name: bran
line: "Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?

name: bran
line: Family comes first?

name: bran
line: How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?

name: bran
line: And then she left!

name: bran
line: Why did she leave?

name: bran
line: Do you know where she is now? Today?

name: bran
line: Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?

name: bran
line: I'll never shoot another arrow.

name: bran
line: You need legs to work a bow.

name: bran
line: Really?

name: bran
line: I don't want to see anyone.

name: bran
line: I don't want to go.

name: bran
line: Kneel, Hodor.

name: bran
line: Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.

name: bran
line: I'm not a cripple.

name: bran
line: Will I really be able to ride?

name: bran
line: Come on, Dancer. (to his horse)

name: bran
line: Robb?

name: bran
line: I’m not alone, my brother is with me.

name: bran
line: I can’t. The saddle, the straps.

name: bran
line: I’m Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don’t let me be, I’ll have you all killed!

name: bran
line: Robb!

name: bran
line: No, don’t.

name: bran
line: Yes, it doesn’t hurt.

name: bran
line: Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

name: bran
line: I’m the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

name: bran
line: That’s my father.

name: bran
line: Ser Arthur Dayne.

name: bran
line: Father said he was the best swordsman he ever saw.

name: bran
line: He’s better than my father.

name: bran
line: But Father beat him.

name: bran
line: I know he did. Heard the story a thousand times.

name: bran
line: He stabbed him in the back.

name: bran
line: What’s in the tower?

name: bran
line: I want to see where he’s going.

name: bran
line: Father!

name: bran
line: Why did you do that? Take me back there. I want to go back.

name: bran
line: He heard me.

name: bran
line: He heard me.

name: bran
line: What’s in that tower? I want to go back there.

name: bran
line: Why do I want to return? So I can be a cripple again? So I can talk to an old man in a tree?

name: bran
line: So why did you?

name: bran
line: I don’t want to be you.

name: bran
line: Learn what?

name: bran
line: That’s my father. And my Uncle Benjen.

name: bran
line: They were all so happy.

name: bran
line: My Aunt Lyanna. I’ve seen her statue in the crypt. My father never talked about her.

name: bran
line: Hodor?

name: bran
line: Hodor talks?

name: bran
line: Please, a little longer.

name: bran
line: You finally show me something I care about and then you drag me away.

name: bran
line: I wasn’t drowning. I was home.

name: bran
line: Wylis.

name: bran
line: I saw you as a boy. You could talk. What happened?

name: bran
line: Where’s Meera?

name: bran
line: You shouldn’t be here. It’s not safe outside the cave.

name: bran
line: I saw that Hodor wasn’t always Hodor.
