name: bran
line: What’s wrong?

name: bran
line: The Three-Eyed Raven says there’s a war coming.

name: bran
line: It was you. You made the White Walkers.

name: bran
line: From whom?

name: bran
line: What?

name: bran
line: He saw me, the Night King! He saw me!

name: bran
line: I don’t know. He was close, but --

name: bran
line: But he can’t get in.

name: bran
line: I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to.

name: bran
line: The time for what?

name: bran
line: But am I ready?

name: bran
line: Meera. They found us.

name: bran
line: Who are you?

name: bran
line: Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.

name: bran
line: How?

name: bran
line: Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.

name: bran
line: I didn’t have time to learn. I can’t control anything.

name: roose
line: Never do, my lady.  Dulls the senses.

name: roose
line: Aye.  Lord Walder let me choose any of his granddaughters and promised me the girl’s weight in silver as a dowry.  So I have a fat, young bride.

name: roose
line: Well, she’s made me very rich.

name: roose
line: Every bride suffers the same.  I’m sure you endured yours with grace.

name: roose
line: The Lannisters send their regards.

name: roose
line: The Blackfish escaped.

name: roose
line: As you say.

name: roose
line: You'll be needing a new young girl.

name: roose
line: (grunts)

name: roose
line: He ignored my advice at every turn. If he'd been a trifle less arrogant--

name: roose
line: (nods)

name: roose
line: Forever young.

name: roose
line: At some point perhaps. But Winterfell's in ruins.

name: roose
line: I sent my bastard Ramsay to root him out.  Robb Stark offered amnesty for the ironborn if they gave us Theon.

name: roose
line: We should set the siege lines 1,000 yards from Harrenhal.

name: roose
line: I imagine the Mountain will defend whatever Tywin Lannister tells him to defend.

name: roose
line: The debt will be repaid, my friend. For them and for your sons.

name: roose
line: The Kingslayer won't remain free for long. My best hunters are after him.

name: roose
line: Ser Jaime isn't well. Take him to Qyburn.

name: roose
line: I see my men have finally found you something appropriate to wear.

name: roose
line: I should send you back to Robb Stark.

name: roose
line: Wars cost money. Many people would pay a great deal for you.

name: roose
line: You're right. Perhaps the safest thing to do is to kill you both and burn your bodies.

name: roose
line: King Robb is keeping your father quite busy. He doesn't have time for anything else.

name: roose
line: As soon as you're well enough to travel, I will allow you to go to King's Landing as restitution for the mistakes my soldiers made. And you will swear to tell your father the truth, that I had nothing to do with your maiming.

name: roose
line: I don't partake.

name: roose
line: Oh, she won't be going with you.

name: roose
line: You are charged with abetting treason.

name: roose
line: You're in no place to insist on anything. I would have hoped you'd learned your lesson about overplaying your position.

name: roose
line: Not nothing. The North. Ride 700 miles that way, you're still in the North. 400 miles that way. 300 miles that way. The North is larger than the other six kingdoms combined. And I am the Warden of the North. The North is mine. Now tell me, what is your name?

name: roose
line: No, not Ramsay Snow. *hands Ramsay a scroll* Open it. From this day until your last day, you are Ramsay Bolton, son of Roose Bolton, Warden of the North.

name: roose
line: Walda, this is Ramsay Snow, my bastard.

name: roose
line: See that the horses are fed, watered, and rubbed down. And take Lady Walda to her chambers.

name: roose
line: Where is your prize?

name: roose
line: What did you do to him?

name: roose
line: You flayed him.

name: roose
line: This was Balon Greyjoy's son and heir.

name: roose
line: My banners, not yours. You're not a Bolton. You're a Snow. Tywin Lannister has given me the North. But he won't lift a finger to help me take it. As long as the ironborn hold Moat Cailin, our armies are trapped south of the Neck. Theon was a valuable hostage, not your plaything. I wanted to trade him for Moat Cailin.

name: roose
line: You sent terms to Balon Greyjoy without my consent?

name: roose
line: I had to smuggle myself into my own lands thanks to the Greyjoys. I needed Theon. I needed him whole.

name: roose
line: I placed far too much trust in you.

name: roose
line: You murdered them and displayed their corpses at Winterfell.

name: roose
line: You ready for a hunt?

name: roose
line: Their bastard brother. He could be sheltering them. He may know where they are.

name: roose
line: You want to prove yourself a Bolton? Gather whatever men you can and ride for Moat Cailin. Bring this creature of yours. Maybe he'll be of some use. Take the Moat for the family, for our family, and I'll reconsider your position.

name: roose
line: And how high can Stannis’ horses jump? Our walls have been full repaired our walls have been reinforced. We have enough food for six months. We are more prepared for a siege than they could have ever been. All we have to do is wait for them to freeze, starve, and mutiny.

name: roose
line: You disagree?

name: roose
line: And what do you recommend?

name: roose
line: A smart commander does not surrender a defensive advantage. As long as we stay behind these walls they can’t touch us. Not to mention that the snow is so deep that we couldn’t get an army through if we wanted to.

name: roose
line: We can't hold the North with terror alone.

name: roose
line: I sent you there to collect taxes, not bodies.

name: roose
line: He left you no choice.

name: roose
line: And?

name: roose
line: (After a moment). I have something important to tell you. Stop eating and listen.

name: roose
line: We don't have enough men to hold the North if the other Houses rise up against us. Do you understand that?

name: roose
line: I had a pact with Tywin Lannister, and Tywin Lannister is dead. The remaining Lannisters are a thousand miles away dealing with that fact. They've never once in the history of the Seven Kingdoms sent their army this far north. If you think they will for us, you're a fool. We become a great house by entering in alliances with other houses, and parleying those alliances into greater power. The best way to forge a lasting alliance isn't by peeling a man's skin off. The best way is marriage. (Stands up). Now that you're a Bolton by royal decree, it's time you married a suitable bride. And as it happens, I found the perfect girl to solidify our hold in the North.

name: roose
line: Lady Sansa, welcome.

name: roose
line: May I introduce my son, (Stands aside), Ramsay Bolton?

name: roose
line: (Approaching). And you're not anymore. Allow me a moment alone with Lord Baelish.

name: roose
line: Shouldn't he be?

name: roose
line: I leave that to the brothel keeper. It's her name I need, not her virtue.

name: roose
line: And you prepared for the consequences. When the Lannisters hear I've wed Sansa Stark to Ramsay.

name: roose
line: The Queen will be enraged.

name: roose
line: And yet she still has friends. Men in important places, whom she can ask for favours. (They stop, and Roose holds up a letter). A message for you, from Cersei Lannister. A rider arrived from Eyrie, shortly before dawn. Apparently, she thinks you're still in the Vale.

name: roose
line: I'm sure you understand my position, Lord Baelish. If you received word in the night from the Queen Mother, it does make me question our new alliance. The Lannisters made you one of the great lords of Westeros. Yet, here you are in the North, undermining them. Why gamble with your position?

name: roose
line: I had Tywin Lannister backing. Who supports me now? You?

name: roose
line: I'd like to read the reply.

name: roose
line: I trust you find your chamber suitable, my lady.

name: roose
line: (Raises his cup). To your wedding.

name: roose
line: Yes, yes, very good.

name: roose
line: Walda and I have some good news as well, since we're all together.

name: roose
line: From the way she's carrying, Maester Wolkan says it looks like a boy.

name: roose
line: Sure of what?

name: roose
line: Maester Wolkan has assured us beyond all doubt.

name: roose
line: Manage what?

name: roose
line: I imagine you're familiar with the procedure.

name: roose
line: You disgraced yourself at dinner, parading that creature before the Stark girl.

name: roose
line: You're worried about your position.

name: roose
line: You've never asked me about your mother.

name: roose
line: She was a peasant girl. Pretty in a common sort of way. She was the miller's wife. Apparently they had married without my knowledge or consent. So I had him hanged and I took her beneath the tree where he was swaying. She fought me the whole time. She was lucky I didn't hang her, too. A year later she came to my gates with a squalling baby in her arms. A baby she claimed was mine. I nearly had her whipped and the child thrown in the river. (Stands up). But then I looked at you and I saw then what I see now. You are my son. (After a moment). Stannis Baratheon has an army at Castle Black. But he won't stay for long. He wants the Iron Throne, and the road to King's Landing comes right through Winterfell. He means to take the North. But the North is ours. It's yours and mine. Will you help me defeat him?

name: roose
line: Who comes before the Old Gods this night?

name: roose
line: Lady Sansa, will you take this man?

name: roose
line: We've sent a dozen ravens. None have returned. My bastard is only a few days from Winterfell. Once he captures the castle

name: roose
line: He wouldn't dare hurt the boys. They're his only hope of escaping the North with his head.

name: roose
line: A touch of mercy is a virtue, Your Grace. Too much

name: roose
line: I expect his countrymen will turn on him the minute they hear the offer.

name: roose
line: My lady.

name: roose
line: Five Lannisters dead for every one of ours. They're dead. Take everything they've got. We've nowhere to keep all these prisoners. Barely enough food to feed our own.

name: roose
line: Of course, Your Grace. The officers will be useful. Some of them may be privy to Tywin Lannister's plans.

name: roose
line: Well, we'll learn soon enough. In my family, we say, "A naked man has few secrets. "A flayed man none."

name: roose
line: We're not in the North.

name: roose
line: The high road's very pretty, but you'll have a hard time marching your army down it.

name: roose
line: Surely one of our men needs your attention more than this cub.

name: roose
line: Your Grace. My lady. News from Winterfell.

name: roose
line: We've had ravens from White Harbor, Barrowton and the Dreadfort. I'm afraid it is true.

name: roose
line: Because the Greyjoys are treasonous whores.

name: roose
line: We've heard nothing of them. But Rodrik Cassel is dead.

name: roose
line: There's still a war to win, Your Grace.

name: roose
line: You are a king. And that means you don't have to do everything yourself.

name: roose
line: Theon holds the castle with a skeleton crew. Let me send word to my bastard at the Dreadfort. He can raise a few hundred men and retake Winterfell before the new moon. We have the Lannisters on the run. If you march all the way back north now, you'll lose what you gained. My boy would be honored to bring you Prince Theon's head.

name: roose
line: Too many prisoners.

name: roose
line: Half a dozen men? Your best hunters?

name: roose
line: I didn’t think lady Sansa killed them all by herself. Thank you for this report, Lord Kastark.

name: roose
line: Jon Snow is a bastard, not a Stark.

name: roose
line: Murder the Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch? You’d unite every house in the North against us.

name: roose
line: If you acquire a reputation as a mad dog, you’ll be treated as a mad dog. Taken out back and slaughtered for pig feed.

name: roose
line: You’ll always be my firstborn.

name: roose
line: Your command of the cavalry was impressive. Thanks to you, the false king Stannis Baratheon is dead. Do you know who struck the killing blow?

name: roose
line: A shame.  I’d reward the man.  Still, a great victory. Do you feel like a victor?

name: roose
line: I rebelled against the crown to arrange your marriage to Sansa Stark. Do you think that burning wagons in the night and mowing down tired, outnumbered Baratheons is the same as facing a prepared and provisioned Lannister army?

name: roose
line: A reckoning will come. We need the North to face it. The entire North. They won’t back us without Sansa Stark. We no longer have Sansa Stark. You played your games with her. You played your games with the heir to the Iron Islands and now they’re both gone.

name: roose
line: I’m glad to hear it. Without Sansa, you won’t be able to produce an heir. And without an heir, well…

name: roose
line: ...let’s hope the maesters are right and Lady Walder’s carrying a boy.

name: daario
line: There.

name: daario
line: There, it's a back gate.  My men use it when they visit Yunkai's bed slaves.

name: daario
line: I have no interest in slaves.  A man cannot make love to property.

name: daario
line: This is where we enter the city.  Very few guards, they know me.  They let me inside.

name: daario
line: I kill the guards.  I take your two best men and lead them through the back streets, which I know well, and open the front gates.

name: daario
line: Then comes the army.  Once the walls are breached, the city will fall in hours.

name: daario
line: You have a very suspicious mind.  In my experience, only dishonest people think this way.

name: daario
line: When you hear a songbird’s whistle, you come.  I’m a great whistler, the greatest in the land.

name: daario
line: Daario Naharis.

name: daario
line: That one was quick.

name: daario
line: I doubt it.  The Yunkish prefer to let their slaves do their fighting for them.

name: daario
line: The city is yours, my queen.

name: daario
line: Daario Naharis

name: daario
line: I hope the old man is better with a sword than he is with a lie. You have 8,000 Unsullied.

name: daario
line: You have no ships. You have no siege weapons. You have no cavalry.

name: daario
line: You talk too much.

name: daario
line: 8000 unsullied stand between her and your cock.

name: daario
line: She'll tell me whatever you pay her to tell me.

name: daario
line: I like them very much. I just refuse to pay them. And I'm no whore, my friend.

name: daario
line: I fight for beauty.

name: daario
line: Do you hear me?  Follow my voice. I'm right here.

name: daario
line: You have something for me?

name: daario
line: Valar morghulis.

name: daario
line: No screaming or she dies.

name: daario
line: You.

name: daario
line: Don't scream, lovely girl.

name: daario
line: (nods and chuckles)

name: daario
line: I don't want to.

name: daario
line: You should ask them.

name: daario
line: We had philosophical differences.

name: daario
line: Your beauty. It meant more to me than it did to them.

name: daario
line: I'm the simplest man you'll ever meet. I only do what I want to do.

name: daario
line: Yes.

name: daario
line: They ordered me to murder you. I told them I preferred not to. They told me I had no choice. I told them I am Daario Naharis. I always have a choice. They drew their swords and I drew mine.

name: daario
line: (nods)

name: daario
line: The Second Sons are yours and so is Daario Naharis. My sword is yours, my life is yours, my heart is yours.

name: daario
line: I was the last to join your army. I'm not your general or a member of your Queensguard or the commander of your Unsullied. My mother was a whore. I come from nothing. And before long, I will return to nothing. Let me kill this man for you.

name: daario
line: Why would I want a horse?

name: daario
line: Horses are dumber than men.

name: daario
line: Ser Worm is stronger than he looks. But I can see his arms beginning to shake.

name: daario
line: The honor of riding by your side on the road to Meereen.

name: daario
line: (in valerian) You like this girl? Must be frustrating.

name: daario
line: (in valerian) I'd rather have no brains and two balls.

name: daario
line: Yes, my queen. But I need to speak to you about something important. A matter of strategy.

name: daario
line: A dusk rose.

name: daario
line: And this one's called lady's lace.

name: daario
line: Harpy's Gold. No tea from this one. Beautiful but poisonous.

name: daario
line: Your Grace.

name: daario
line: The Second Sons took the Meereenese Navy.

name: daario
line: No one.

name: daario
line: I heard you liked ships.

name: daario
line: but your window is not.

name: daario
line: I swam to an island a mile offshore for these.

name: daario
line: Never met a woman who didn't like wildflowers.

name: daario
line: Forgive me, my queen. I live to serve you.

name: daario
line: You've ordered us to be night watchmen.

name: daario
line: There is only one, and she does not want me.

name: daario
line: My sword is yours till the day I die.

name: daario
line: I'll stay in Meereen and patrol the streets. Send me to kill your enemies. Any enemy anywhere. Let me do what I do best.

name: daario
line: Jorah the Andal. Are you here to see our queen? She's in a good mood.

name: daario
line: That one, the smaller man, no question, that’s where you should put your money.

name: daario
line: People used to bet against me when I fought in the pits. (looks at Hizdahr) He would have bet against me. Common novice mistake.

name: daario
line: Whenever I got into the pit against a beast like that one, the crowd saw me, all skin and bone back then, then they saw a pile of angry muscles ready to murder me. They couldn’t get their money out fast enough. But the pile of angry muscles never had any muscles here (he puts a dagger to his neck) or here (he puts the dagger to Hizdahr’s neck). And the big men were always too slow to stop my dagger from going where their muscles weren’t. Yes, whenever I saw a beast like that one, standing across from me making his beast faces, I knew I could rest easy.

name: daario
line: Shut your mouth.

name: daario
line: Protect your queen!

name: daario
line: The other side, follow me!

name: daario
line: Protect your queen!

name: daario
line: Does he always talk so much?

name: daario
line: No, but he is.

name: daario
line: Our queen would be dead if not for him.

name: daario
line: You missed a good scrap.

name: daario
line: (gestures to Tyrion) He’s right. The Queen exiled Jorah. (gestures to Jorah) And he’s right, Jorah saved her life. Perhaps she feels differently about him now. Perhaps not. The only way we’ll know is if we ask her.

name: daario
line: Forgive me, but why would we bring you?

name: daario
line: Have you ever tracked animals in the wilderness?

name: daario
line: Can you fight?

name: daario
line: Are you good on a horse?

name: daario
line: So mainly you talk?

name: daario
line: Which I respect. But you would not help us on this expedition. You would help us here in Meereen, though. (to Missandei, Grey Worm, and Jorah) None of us have any experience governing a city, except for him. You want to prove your value to the queen? Prove it right here in Meereen.

name: daario
line: They wouldn’t. They will listen to Grey Worm.

name: daario
line: He is, he’s the toughest man with no balls I’ve ever met. But you still can’t go. The people believe in you. They know you speak for the queen.

name: daario
line: And Missandei. Our queen trusts no one more than Missandei. Certainly not me. The queen’s closest confidant, the commander of the Unsullied, and the foreign dwarf with the scarred face. Good fortune, my friends, Meereen is ancient and glorious. (to Tyrion) Try not to ruin her. (to Jorah) Looks like it’s you and me, Jorah the Andal. Let’s find some good horses. We have so much to talk about.

name: daario
line: The Unsullied are too conspicuous.

name: daario
line: Anyone can see you coming from a mile off. Of course you haven't found any Sons of the Harpy. You haven't, have you?

name: daario
line: My Second Sons, on the other hand, they drink, they whore, fight in the streets--they blend in. They overhear things in taverns, follow people from the taverns to nice, quiet alleys, break a few fingers, overhear a few more things. Before you know it...

name: daario
line: In a hurry? You're afraid?

name: daario
line: Right. That's your problem. You understood fear once, long ago, but you've forgotten what it means. Someone who's forgotten fear has forgotten how to hide.

name: daario
line: Fear is useful that way.

name: daario
line: The Son of the Harpy has no more valuable information.

name: daario
line: Because I questioned him.

name: daario
line: Which is what I keep telling her to do to you.

name: daario
line: When did the Unsullied start patrolling the streets of Meereen? Looks like your friends haven’t been behaving themselves.

name: daario
line: You should reopen the fighting pits.

name: daario
line: My mother was a whore, I told you that. She liked to drink pear brandy. The older she got, the less she made selling her body, the more she wanted to drink. So one day when I was 12, she sold me to a slaver she fucked the night before.

name: daario
line: I was a bad child. I wasn’t big, but I was quick. And I loved to fight. So they sold me to a man in Tolos who trained fighters for the pits. I had my first match when I was 16.

name: daario
line: I’m only here because of those pits. I learned to fight like a Dothraki screamer, a Norvoshi priest, a Westerosi knight. Soon I was famous. 10,000 men and women screamed my name when I stepped into the pit. I made so much money for my master he set me free when I died. I joined the Second Sons, and then I met you.

name: daario
line: You’re the queen. Everyone’s too afraid of you to speak truth. Everyone but me. You’ve made thousands of enemies all across the world. As soon as they see weakness, they’ll attack. Show your strength here, now.

name: daario
line: Anyone with a chest full of gold can buy an army of Unsullied. You’re not the Mother of Unsullied. You’re the Mother of Dragons.

name: daario
line: A dragon queen with no dragons is not a queen.

name: daario
line: We could pull back to the pyramid district, secure it, and use it as a base from which to operate. Then we clean the city out, neighborhood by neighborhood, street by street, until the rats have nowhere left to hide.

name: daario
line: How long before the king of Mereen comes to claim my pillow?

name: daario
line: I think the Sons of the Harpy have stopped killing because their leader was made king.

name: daario
line: Do you think I’m petty enough to speak ill of a man just because he represents competition?

name: daario
line: You’re right. My motivations are entirely impure.

name: daario
line: Doesn’t make me wrong.

name: daario
line: Everyone has a choice. Even slaves have a choice. Death or slavery.

name: daario
line: Marry me instead.

name: daario
line: Why not? You’re our queen, you can do as you like.

name: daario
line: Then you are the only person in Mereen who’s not free.

name: daario
line: I know I’m here to serve my queen and not to give advice, but can I make one more suggestion?

name: daario
line: On the day of the Great Games, gather all the great masters, and wise masters, and worthy masters you can find, and slaughter them all.

name: daario
line: All rulers are either butchers or meat.

name: daario
line: Your ships are nearly ready. I saw them painting the sails.

name: daario
line: I’m curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water.

name: daario
line: New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King’s Landing.

name: daario
line: Fuck Meereen. Fuck the people. I’m here for you, not them.

name: daario
line: Who are you marrying this time?

name: daario
line: But you need to lure all the noble houses to the table? Are you a queen or fish bait?

name: daario
line: A king wouldn’t think twice about it.

name: daario
line: I’m not proud. I don’t care what perfumed aristocrat sits beside you in the throne room. I don’t want a crown. I want you.

name: daario
line: I love you. And I make you happy. You know I do. Bring me with you. Let me fight for you.

name: daario
line: The dwarf told you to do this.

name: daario
line: Clever fellow. Can’t argue with his logic. I’m no use to you over there.

name: daario
line: I’m not angry. I’m full of self-pity. Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons?

name: daario
line: Bay of Dragons?

name: daario
line: You’ll get that throne you want so badly, I’m sure of it. I hope it brings you happiness.

name: daario
line: I pity the lord of Westeros. They have no idea what’s coming for them.

name: daario
line: Goat?

name: daario
line: You think our friend got him?

name: daario
line: We’re on the right path, then.

name: daario
line: Perhaps she’s tired of being queen. I don’t think she likes it very much.

name: daario
line: Maybe she’s flown somewhere else, somewhere far away from men like us.

name: daario
line: There’s no escaping her, eh? You keep coming back. Why?

name: daario
line: isn’t it frustrating wanting someone who doesn’t want you back?

name: daario
line: You’re a romantic. I admire that. Sometimes I look at you and I think, “So that’s what I’ll be like when I grow old.”

name: daario
line: If I grow old. I hope I do. I want to see what the world looks like when she’s done conquering it.

name: daario
line: Huh, an army?

name: daario
line: Dothraki?

name: daario
line: You all right? Why don’t you sit and catch your breath?

name: daario
line: I don’t think you could ride the dragon. 20 years ago, maybe.

name: daario
line: Our queen. She’s wild, you know. Don’t let her size fool you. It’s hard enough for me and I’m a young man. You, I don’t think your heart could take it.

name: daario
line: Must make you angry that our queen chose me.

name: daario
line: We’ll all disappoint her before long.

name: daario
line: Oh, I don’t want to fight you, Jorah the Andal. What do I have to gain? If I win, I’m the shit who killed an old man. If I lose, I’m the shit who was killed by an old man.

name: daario
line: None.

name: daario
line: What are you doing?

name: daario
line: Isn’t it forbidden to sneak into their city and steal their khaleesi?

name: daario
line: You’re asking a dog to hand over his teeth.

name: daario
line: I’m very attached to this knife.

name: daario
line: You know what happens?

name: daario
line: I’ll do it myself.

name: daario
line: I should have been born a Dothraki.

name: daario
line: Told you, I’m very attached to this knife.

name: daario
line: You all right?

name: daario
line: Huh.

name: daario
line: She’ll give us away.

name: daario
line: Everything all right?

name: daario
line: A week at best.

name: daario
line: Nobody.

name: daario
line: So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros. What then?

name: daario
line: You weren’t made to sit on a chair in a palance.

name: daario
line: You’re a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.

name: daario
line: I’m going after her. Wait for me here.

name: ned
line: And which one of you was a marksman at 10?

name: ned
line: Varys.

name: ned
line: What about my daughters?

name: ned
line: And Sansa?

name: ned
line: You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.

name: ned
line: The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.

name: ned
line: The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.

name: ned
line: If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.

name: ned
line: Tell me something, Varys.

name: ned
line: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

name: ned
line: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

name: ned
line: He swore an oath, Cat.

name: ned
line: Tell Bran he’s coming, too.

name: ned
line: He won’t be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

name: ned
line: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

name: ned
line: King of the Andals and the First Men …

name: ned
line: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

name: ned
line: You understand why I did it?

name: ned
line: But do you understand why I had to kill him?

name: ned
line: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

name: ned
line: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.

name: ned
line: A madman sees what he sees.

name: ned
line: There are no mountain lions in these woods.

name: ned
line: It’s a direwolf.

name: ned
line: Tough old beast.

name: ned
line: Better a quick death. They won’t last without their mother.

name: ned
line: I’m sorry, Bran.

name: ned
line: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.

name: ned
line: You have five northern children. You’re not an outsider.

name: ned
line: It’s your gods with all the rules.

name: ned
line: Tell me.

name: ned
line: Your sister. The boy …

name: ned
line: He’s coming this far North, there’s only one thing he’s after.

name: ned
line: Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA’s helm]

name: ned
line: Your Grace.

name: ned
line: Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.

name: ned
line: My queen.

name: ned
line: Tell me about Jon Arryn.

name: ned
line: We both did.

name: ned
line: Aye.

name: ned
line: I’m not worthy of the honor.

name: ned
line: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.

name: ned
line: It’s done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.

name: ned
line: The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?

name: ned
line: He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.

name: ned
line: A wildling ambush.

name: ned
line: Winter is coming.

name: ned
line: Your pardon.

name: ned
line: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.

name: ned
line: I don’t fight in tournaments.

name: ned
line: I don’t fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don’t want him to know what I can do.

name: ned
line: I’m a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat’s nest they call a capital.

name: ned
line: The king takes what he wants. That’s why he’s king.

name: ned
line: How did he get so fat?

name: ned
line: Send him in.

name: ned
line: Stay.

name: ned
line: What news?

name: ned
line: She’s fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn’t know what she’s saying.

name: ned
line: No, but I’m still better than you.

name: ned
line: I hope I’ll serve you well.

name: ned
line: I've had worse, my lady.

name: ned
line: The South doesn't seem to agree with you.

name: ned
line: I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.

name: ned
line: Has he done this before?

name: ned
line: Your brother Or your lover?

name: ned
line: My son saw you with him.

name: ned
line: With all my heart.

name: ned
line: And they are all Jaime's.

name: ned
line: You've always hated him.

name: ned
line: When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.

name: ned
line: I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.

name: ned
line: You damned fool.

name: ned
line: I will.

name: ned
line: I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.

name: ned
line: Give him milk of the poppy.

name: ned
line: No man could have protected him from himself.

name: ned
line: His squire? The Lannister boy?

name: ned
line: His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.

name: ned
line: And what should I do with a hundred swords?

name: ned
line: What about Stannis?

name: ned
line: Stannis is your older brother.

name: ned
line: Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.

name: ned
line: I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.

name: ned
line: You will sail to dragonstone tonight.

name: ned
line: Now leave us.

name: ned
line: The King has no true born sons.

name: ned
line: The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.

name: ned
line: There is no "unless".

name: ned
line: Do you have a shred of honor?

name: ned
line: We?

name: ned
line: What you suggest is treason.

name: ned
line: Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy.

name: ned
line: No. I won't do it.

name: ned
line: There is no other choice. He is the heir.

name: ned
line: You promised Catelyn you would help me.

name: ned
line: No, all right.

name: ned
line: King Joffrey?

name: ned
line: Good. Is Lord Renly joining us?

name: ned
line: Ser Barristan, I believe no man here could ever question your honor.

name: ned
line: Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.

name: ned
line: Commander! Take the Queen and her children into custody.

name: ned
line: I want no bloodshed.

name: ned
line: Lyanna.

name: ned
line: No, I’m not a dream. I’m here. Right here.

name: ned
line: I’ve missed you, too.

name: ned
line: Shh. You are.

name: ned
line: You’re not going to die.

name: ned
line: Get her some water!

name: ned
line: Is there a maester?

name: ned
line: I looked for you on the Trident.

name: ned
line: The Mad King is dead. Rhaegar lies beneath the ground. Why weren’t you there to protect your prince?

name: ned
line: Where’s my sister?

name: ned
line: No. Now it ends.

name: joffrey
line: Your father's gone. As the father of the realm, it is my duty to give you away to your husband.

name: joffrey
line: I've got a lifetime for that.

name: joffrey
line: Congratulations, my lady.

name: joffrey
line: Well, you've done it. You've married a Lannister. Soon you'll have a Lannister baby. It's a dream come true for you, isn't it?  What a glorious day.

name: joffrey
line: I suppose it doesn't really matter which Lannister puts the baby into you. Maybe I'll pay you a visit tonight after my uncle passes out. How'd you like that?

name: joffrey
line: You wouldn't? That's all right. Ser Meryn and Ser Boros will hold you down.

name: joffrey
line: Time for the bedding ceremony.

name: joffrey
line: Where's your respect for tradition, Uncle? Come, everyone. Pick her up and carry her to her wedding bed. Get rid of her gown. She won't be needing it any longer. Ladies, attend to my uncle. He's not heavy.

name: joffrey
line: There will be if I command it.

name: joffrey
line: What did you say? What did you say?

name: joffrey
line: Show him. Come on, show him.

name: joffrey
line: Robb Stark is dead. And his bitch mother. (to Pycelle) Write back to Lord Frey. Thank him for his service and command him to send Robb Stark's head. I'm going to serve it to Sansa at my wedding feast.

name: joffrey
line: Yes, I did. I'm going to have it served to Sansa at my wedding feast.

name: joffrey
line: Everyone is mine to torment. You'd do well to remember that, you little monster.

name: joffrey
line: I could have your tongue out for saying that.

name: joffrey
line: I am the king! I will punish you.

name: joffrey
line: My father won the real war. He killed Prince Rhaegar. He took the crown while you hid under Casterly Rock!

name: joffrey
line: I'm not tired.

name: joffrey
line: I'm not tired!

name: joffrey
line: Make it tighter here.

name: joffrey
line: No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.

name: joffrey
line: Bloody flowers. On the king.

name: joffrey
line: Who?

name: joffrey
line: She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.

name: joffrey
line: Yes, she is.

name: joffrey
line: Not to me.

name: joffrey
line: This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.

name: joffrey
line: She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.

name: joffrey
line: I don't need to do anything.

name: joffrey
line: Better. Much better.

name: joffrey
line: Send her in.

name: joffrey
line: I'm leaving on a hunting trip. I just wanted to make sure you had everything you need before I left.

name: joffrey
line: Good. Good. How are you finding life in the capital? It must be quite a change after Renly's camp.

name: joffrey
line: And the bedside of a traitor? Is that a place for a lady?

name: joffrey
line: What was your duty to this traitor as you saw it?

name: joffrey
line: You failed to do this.

name: joffrey
line: You think one ought to speak kindly of a traitor merely because he's had a sword put through his heart?

name: joffrey
line: What makes you say this?

name: joffrey
line: No, he was a known degenerate.

name: joffrey
line: Mmm. I've considered making his perversion punishable by death.

name: joffrey
line: Yes. I am.

name: joffrey
line: Do you like it? I just had it made. Probably one of the finest weapons in the Seven Kingdoms.

name: joffrey
line: It's a new design. Much easier to load. There's no crank. You use this lever to draw the string.

name: joffrey
line: The bolt goes here.

name: joffrey
line: And then you just aim and

name: joffrey
line: It's not unheard of.

name: joffrey
line: Could you do it? Could you kill something?.

name: joffrey
line: Yes.

name: joffrey
line: Yes.

name: joffrey
line: Why have we stopped?

name: joffrey
line: No.

name: joffrey
line: Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?

name: joffrey
line: That's a lovely gown, my lady.

name: joffrey
line: Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?

name: joffrey
line: My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.

name: joffrey
line: Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.

name: joffrey
line: Rhaenyra Targaryen was murdered by her brother, or rather his dragon. It ate her while her son watched. What's left of her is buried in the crypts right down there.

name: joffrey
line: Over there in that urn, the ashes of Aerion Targaryen. Aerion Brightflame they called him. He thought drinking wildfire would turn him into a dragon.

name: joffrey
line: He was wrong. And, of course, there's the Mad King, killed by my uncle. Would you like to see where the last Targaryens are buried?

name: joffrey
line: The tomb's just up here.

name: joffrey
line: My father didn't want them here. He was going to have their bodies burned and thrown in the Blackwater, but the High Septon convinced him otherwise.

name: joffrey
line: I couldn't agree more.

name: joffrey
line: Open the doors.

name: joffrey
line: Grandfather.

name: joffrey
line: Yes. I'd like a report on the meetings of my small council.

name: joffrey
line: I've been very busy. Many important matters require a king's attention.

name: joffrey
line: You've been holding the council meetings in the Tower of the Hand instead of the small council chamber.

name: joffrey
line: May I ask why?

name: joffrey
line: So if I wanted to attend a council meeting, I would now have to climb all the stairs in the Tower of the Hand?

name: joffrey
line: Tell me about the Targaryen girl in the east and her dragons.

name: joffrey
line: Is it true?

name: joffrey
line: Don't you think we ought to do something about it?

name: joffrey
line: And the biggest was the size of a carriage.

name: joffrey
line: But how do we know these dragons are just curiosities and not the beasts that brought the whole world to heel?

name: joffrey
line: But I haven't been counseled.

name: joffrey
line: I should be consulted about such things.

name: joffrey
line: A handsome goblet, my lord. Or shall I call you Father?

name: joffrey
line: A book?

name: joffrey
line: Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom. Thank you, Uncle.

name: joffrey
line: So they say.

name: joffrey
line: Such a great sword should have a name. What shall I call her?

name: joffrey
line: Widow's Wail. I like that. Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off. Ned Stark's head all over again.

name: joffrey
line: With this kiss, I pledge my love.

name: joffrey
line: Very good. Very good. Off you go.

name: joffrey
line: Everyone. The queen would like to say a few words.

name: joffrey
line: You're the one who put a sword through Renly Baratheon.

name: joffrey
line: A shame. I'd knight the man that put an end to that deviant's life.

name: joffrey
line: Yes, yes.

name: joffrey
line: A gold dragon to whoever knocks my fool's hat off.

name: joffrey
line: Everyone, silence! Clear the floor. There's been too much amusement here today. A royal wedding is not an amusement. A royal wedding is history. The time has come for all of us to contemplate our history. My lords... my ladies...

name: joffrey
line: I give you. King Joffrey... Renly, Stannis, Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy. The War of the Five Kings.

name: joffrey
line: Yes!

name: joffrey
line: For the Seven Kingdoms!

name: joffrey
line: Let the war begin.

name: joffrey
line: Charge!

name: joffrey
line: Ready, again.

name: joffrey
line: Charge! Yes!

name: joffrey
line: Your head!

name: joffrey
line: Fine gentlemen.

name: joffrey
line: Well fought. Well fought. Here you are. Champion's purse. Though you're not the champion yet, are you? A true champion defeats all the challengers. Surely there are others out there who still dare to challenge my reign. Uncle How about you? I'm sure they have a spare costume.

name: joffrey
line: It did not spill.

name: joffrey
line: Well, how does he expect me to toast without wine? Uncle, you can be my cupbearer seeing as you're too cowardly to fight.

name: joffrey
line: It's not meant as an honor.

name: joffrey
line: Bring me my goblet.

name: joffrey
line: What good is an empty cup? Fill it.

name: joffrey
line: Kneel. Kneel before your king.

name: joffrey
line: Kneel. I said... kneel!

name: joffrey
line: My queen.

name: joffrey
line: Uncle. Where are you going? You're my cupbearer, remember?

name: joffrey
line: No, no, no. No, you're perfect the way you are. Serve me my wine.

name: joffrey
line: Well, hurry up. This pie is dry.

name: joffrey
line: Mm, good. Needs washing down.

name: joffrey
line: No. (coughing) No, you'll wait here... un...

name: joffrey
line: It's nothing.

name: joffrey
line: (gags)

name: joffrey
line: Yes, yes, one guard at the... the thing. Go on.

name: joffrey
line: By my leave. They know I saved the city. They know I won the war.

name: joffrey
line: I broke Stannis on the Blackwater. Pity you weren't there to help, Uncle.

name: joffrey
line: Busy getting captured.

name: joffrey
line: Ser Jaime Lannister. (Chuckles)

name: joffrey
line: Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.

name: joffrey
line: Is there? For a 40-year-old knight with one hand? How can you protect me with that?

line: I, Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of my Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, do hereby recuse myself from this trial. Tywin of the House Lannister, Hand of the King, Protector of the Realm, will sit as judge in my stead. And with him Prince Oberyn of the House Martell and Lord Mace of the House Tyrell. And if found guilty... may the gods punish the accused.

name: tommen
line: Lords and ladies, the Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. One collapses, so does the other. The Father judges us all. If you break his laws...you will be punished. After conferring with His Holiness the High Septon, we have determined that Loras Tyrell and Cersei lannister’s trial will be held in the Great Sept of Baelor on the first day of the Festival of the Mother.

name: tommen
line: Furthermore, after much prayer and reflection, the Crown has decided that from this day forward, trial by combat will be forbidden throughout the Seven Kingdoms. The tradition is a brutish one, a scheme devised by corrupt rulers in order to avoid true judgment from the gods. Cersei Lannister and Loras Tyrell will stand trial before seven septons as it was in the earliest days of the Faith. Seven blessings to all.

line: Yeah, I am too. I'm not Gendry Rivers anymore. I'm Gendry Baratheon, Lord of Storm's End. By order of the queen.

name: gendry
line: I don't know how to be lord of anything. I hardly know how to use a fork. All I know is that you're beautiful, and I love you, and none of it will be worth anything if you're not with me. So be with me.

name: gendry
line: Be my wife. Be the Lady of Storm's End.

name: gendry
line: Aye.

name: gendry
line: Your like picking on the little ones, do you? l've been hammering an anvil these past 10 years. When l hit that steel, it sings. Are you gonna sing when l hit you? (Hot Pie leaves, scared. Gendry talks to Arya alone) This is castle-forged steel. Where'd you steal it?

name: gendry
line: lt don't matter now. Where we're going, they don't care what you've done. They've got rapers, pickpockets, highwaymen, murderers.

name: gendry
line: Armourer's apprentice. But my master got sick of me, so here l am.

name: gendry
line: It's not for sale.

name: gendry
line: I made it for me.

name: gendry
line: He just asked me questions is all, my Lord.

name: gendry
line: About my work at first, if I was being treated well, if I liked it here. But then he started asking me about my mother.

name: gendry
line: Who she was, what she looked like.

name: gendry
line: She died when I was little. She had yellow hair. She'd sing to me sometimes.

name: theon
line: (cries)

name: theon
line: Kill me.

name: theon
line: Kill me.

name: theon
line: Kill me!

name: theon
line: (groans)

name: theon
line: Theon Greyjoy.

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: Reek. My name is Reek.

name: theon
line: I can ride.

name: theon
line: I'll make you a Lord of the Iron Islands for this.

name: theon
line: Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on.

name: theon
line: Come on! Come on! Come on! Come on.

name: theon
line: No! No! No, no, no!

name: theon
line: No, please! No, no, no! No, don't!

name: theon
line: No, please! No! No!

name: theon
line: Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?

name: theon
line: Stop! Stop!

name: theon
line: (screaming) About what?

name: theon
line: I don't know what you want.

name: theon
line: What truth?

name: theon
line: I took it to-I took it-

name: theon
line: No one. I took it on my own.

name: theon
line: To take the North while it was vulnerable.

name: theon
line: Hold it. Rule it.

name: theon
line: Why did you do that?

name: theon
line: I took it to bring glory to my house and my father.

name: theon
line: (panicking) Wait. Wait, wait, wait. I took it because I hated the Starks. I hated them for holding me prisoner. I wanted to hurt them.

name: theon
line: What are you doing?

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: I'll tell you anything. Just take it off. Please. Please, just take it off.

name: theon
line: Yara?

name: theon
line: No, don't go. Please, please. No, please don't leave me. Please, please. Please, please don't go! Please. Please. Don't leave me. Please don't go.

name: theon
line: How far is it to Deepwood Motte?

name: theon
line: She sent you to save me?

name: theon
line: Why would you risk your life for me?

name: theon
line: Those men, they said my father knew what they were doing to me. Did he?

name: theon
line: My sister's men are loyal to her. We don't need to hide from them.

name: theon
line: (chuckles)

name: theon
line: I was just thinking how jealous I was when my father told Yara to take this place.

name: theon
line: Raid fishing villages. He didn't trust me. Thought I was a Stark. Ha. I could never be a Stark. Robb Stark always reminded me of that.

name: theon
line: Didn't have to. All he had to do was be. Be who he was born to be. His life fit him better than his clothes. How could someone like that ever be a brother to me? He's the King in the North.

name: theon
line: And me my father gave me a choice and I made it. I could never be a Stark. But ironborn, that's what I was born to be. I paid the iron price for Winterfell. I murdered those boys.

name: theon
line: Never found them. Just some poor orphans living with a farmer. I let Dagmer slit their throats and I let him burn the bodies so I could keep Winterfell and make my father proud.

name: theon
line: It is. My real father lost his head at King's Landing. I made a choice and I chose wrong. And now I've burned everything down.

name: theon
line: Yara.

name: theon
line: What? No, I didn't.

name: theon
line: You can't! No, please stop! No!

name: theon
line: Wa--

name: theon
line: (whimpering)

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: I'll tell you everything, please.

name: theon
line: (groans)

name: theon
line: If I win, you'll let me go?

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: The North.

name: theon
line: Deepwood Motte.

name: theon
line: Last Hearth.

name: theon
line: Karhold!

name: theon
line: No. It was just a guess.

name: theon
line: Torrhen Karstark.

name: theon
line: He was your brother. Your father is Lord Rickard Karstark.

name: theon
line: You swore to tell me if I--

name: theon
line: Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.

name: theon
line: (screams louder than before)

name: theon
line: (screams in desperation)

name: theon
line: Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!

name: theon
line: (groans)

name: theon
line: (coughs)

name: theon
line: Where is he?

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: He sent you.

name: theon
line: Please.

name: theon
line: Help me. If he comes back

name: theon
line: (moaning)

name: theon
line: (cries)

name: theon
line: Please. No. No! Mercy, please! Please, mercy! Mercy!

name: theon
line: No! No! No! Please, no! No! No! No, please! Please!

name: theon
line: I'm Theon Greyjoy, son of Balon, heir to the Iron Islands.

name: theon
line: I'm Reek.

name: theon
line: I'm Reek.

name: theon
line: Always. Forever.

name: theon
line: Yes.

name: theon
line: I was born on Pike to Balon Greyjoy. His third and last-living son. I am your prince. I swear it by the drowned god. What is dead may never die.

name: theon
line: Lord Bolton took me captive after Winterfell. He sent me to treat with you in good faith as your fellow Ironborn.

name: theon
line: You are fading from sickness. You are badly outnumbered and you're hundreds of miles from the sea. Lord Bolton implores you to protect your men and abandon this fortress you can no longer hold. Do this and he will be just and fair with you as he is being with me. The Boltons will give you safe passage to the stony shore.

name: theon
line: My own father, your king, surrendered years ago to Robert Baratheon. I watched him bend the knee. There was no shame there. He fought with honor, as did you.

name: theon
line: I'm sorry, I didn't hear...

name: theon
line: *scared* You don't know.

name: theon
line: *whispering* Reek. Reek.

name: theon
line: Reek.

name: theon
line: Yes. Have your men raise the white flag and open the gates. You're going home.

name: theon
line: Yes m'lord. Will we go home now?

name: theon
line: A fine shot, master. My lady.

name: theon
line: I'm sorry, my lord.

name: theon
line: I don't know, my lord.

name: theon
line: No, my lord. Just two farm boys.

name: theon
line: Yes, my lord.

name: theon
line: Jon Snow is at Castle Black.

name: theon
line: No!

name: theon
line: You can't trick me. Tell him. Tell him you couldn't trick me.

name: theon
line: Not Theon! Reek! Reek! My name is Reek!

name: theon
line: No, you can't! You can't!

name: theon
line: No, I don't believe her! I know who I am! I'm Reek! Reek! Loyal Reek! Good Reek! I've always been Reek!

name: theon
line: I'm Reek! Loyal Reek!

name: theon
line: Reward?

name: theon
line: (gasps)

name: theon
line: Yes, of course, my lord.

name: theon
line: But how can--

name: theon
line: Pretend to be who?

name: theon
line: Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.

name: theon
line: I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.

name: theon
line: I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.

name: theon
line: They weren’t “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you’d know them since they were born.

name: theon
line: They weren’t. They were only--

name: theon
line: I can’t..

name: theon
line: I can’t, not unless the master says...

name: theon
line: They weren’t...

name: theon
line: They weren’t Bran and Rickon! I couldn’t find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.

name: theon
line: I can’t talk to you anymore.

name: theon
line: Not Theon, Reek!

name: theon
line: Go with her. Please.

name: theon
line: He’s coming back.

name: theon
line: You shouldn't be here.

name: theon
line: No, my lord.

name: theon
line: (Stuttering). She saw me.

name: theon
line: Sansa. Lady Sansa. She came to the kennels.

name: theon
line: Yes. I'm sorry, master. Forgive me. I didn't think -

name: theon
line: (Turns around). Yes, master.

name: theon
line: (After a moment, stuttering). I'm sorry.

name: theon
line: I'm sorry.

name: theon
line: For killing your brothers.

name: theon
line: I’ve come to escort you to the Godswood, my lady. If you please, my lady, will you take my arm?

name: theon
line: Lord Ramsay, he said I'm to take your arm.

name: theon
line: Please. He’ll punish me.

name: theon
line: Sansa of the House Stark comes here to be wed. A woman grown, trueborn and noble. She comes to beg the blessings of the gods. Who comes to claim her?

name: theon
line: Theon of House Greyjoy. Who was… who was her father’s ward.

name: theon
line: Not Theon, my lady. Reek.

name: theon
line: You’re his wife now.

name: theon
line: Do what he says. Do what he says or he’ll hurt you.

name: theon
line: It can. It can always be worse.

name: theon
line: Please…

name: theon
line: I’m sorry. I’m sorry!

name: theon
line: He’ll see us. You don’t know him.

name: theon
line: Reek, my lady, Reek!

name: theon
line: Envy isn't attractive.

name: theon
line: You should be proud of your brother's achievement. I took the great castle of Winterfell with 20 men.

name: theon
line: I treated the Stark boys with honor, and they repaid me with treachery.

name: theon
line: Exactly.

name: theon
line: They made me a promise

name: theon
line: Don't call me

name: theon
line: If I hadn't killed them, the Northerners would think me weak.

name: theon
line: I'm warning you.

name: theon
line: You haven't brought enough men. How am I supposed to defend Winterfell with just this lot?

name: theon
line: Is this a joke? Winterfell is the heart of the North.

name: theon
line: He won't find out. We've killed all the ravens. We have all the horses. I've taken Winterfell. And I will keep Winterfell.

name: theon
line: I don't intend to die.

name: theon
line: We should bury them.

name: theon
line: If they haven't got the damn message yet, a few more days won't help. As you say. But it don't hurt to let 'em rot a while longer.

name: theon
line: Gold for the farmer. For his trouble.

name: theon
line: I will kill that man. I don't care how many arrows they feather me with, how many spears they run through me, I will kill that horn-blowing cunt before I fall.

name: theon
line: I know I'm surrounded. I know that because I stood on the battlements and saw I was surrounded.

name: theon
line: Thank you, wise bald man. Thank you for explaining siege tactics to me.

name: theon
line: No word from my father?

name: theon
line: Send more ravens.

name: theon
line: The first time I saw Winterfell

name: theon
line: First time I saw Winterfell, it looked like something that had been here for thousands of years and would be here for thousands of years after I was dead. I saw it and I thought, "Of course, Ned Stark crushed our rebellion and killed my brothers. "We never stood a chance against the man who lives here."

name: theon
line: Yes, my captors were so very kind to me. You love reminding me of that. Everyone in this frozen pile of shit has always loved reminding me of that. You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner? To be told how much you owe them? And then to go back home to your real father

name: theon
line: I will kill that man. I swear to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every fucking god in every fucking heaven, I will kill that man.

name: theon
line: And what's your counsel, trusted friend?

name: theon
line: There's nowhere to run. I'd never make it back to the Iron Islands. And even if I did, even if by some miracle I slipped through the lines and made it home, I'd be a coward. The Greyjoy who ran. The shame of the family.

name: theon
line: I won't make it to the Wall. I won't make it 10 feet past the Winterfell gates.

name: theon
line: The opportunity for Jon Snow to cut my throat in my sleep.

name: theon
line: I've done a lot, haven't I? Things I never imagined myself doing.

name: theon
line: You may be right. But I've gone too far to pretend to be anything else.

name: theon
line: You hear that? That's the mating call of the Northmen. They want to fuck us. Well, I haven't had a good fuck in weeks. I'm ready for one.

name: theon
line: They say every ironborn man is worth a dozen from the mainland.

name: theon
line: You think they're right?

name: theon
line: We die today, brothers. We die bleeding from 100 wounds with arrows in our necks and spears in our guts, but our war cries will echo through eternity. They will sing about the battle of Winterfell until the Iron Islands have slipped beneath the waves. Every man, woman and child will know who we were and how long we stood. Aggar and Gelmarr, Wex and Urzen, Stygg and Black Lorren. Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.

name: theon
line: Mothers will name their sons for us.

name: theon
line: Girls will think of us with their lovers inside them.

name: theon
line: And whoever kills that fucking horn-blower will stand in bronze above the shores of Pyke!

name: theon
line: What is dead may never die!

name: theon
line: What are you doing here?

name: theon
line: You lying bitch.

name: theon
line: Recognize you? How could I? The last time I saw you you looked like a fat little boy.

name: theon
line: Why didn't you tell me?

name: theon
line: Father.

name: theon
line: And what's my role in all this?

name: theon
line: A ship? You give her 30 and I get one?

name: theon
line: I'm to fight fishermen?

name: theon
line: Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men. He won't give up the North so easily.

name: theon
line: What do you know of it, woman? I'm a proven warrior.

name: theon
line: I'm not protecting anyone. I just wonder if it's not wiser to wait. Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies? Rise up against them and they could destroy us. But if we pledge fealty to them, they'll give us Casterly Rock.

name: theon
line: We do not sow.

name: theon
line: You act as if I volunteered to go. You gave me away, if you remember. The day you bent the knee to Robert Baratheon. After he crushed you. Did you take what was yours then?

name: theon
line: You gave me away! Your boy! Your last boy! You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore. And now you curse me because I've come home.

name: theon
line: I have no other family.

name: theon
line: I would.

name: theon
line: What is dead may never die.

name: theon
line: We won’t beat them until we take King’s Landing, and we can’t take King’s Landing without ships. My father has ships, and men who know how to sail them.

name: theon
line: I’m his only living son. He’ll listen to me.

name: theon
line: (Removes his jacket). Looks smaller.

name: theon
line: (Removes more of his clothes). They'll be waiting for me on the docks.

name: theon
line: Anyone who matters, (Takes off his shirt), this is a big day for them. They haven't had much to get excited about since I left. It's a hard place the Iron Islands always has been. It's cold and it's wet.

name: theon
line: They say hard places breed hard men, (Unbuttons his pants), and hard men rule the world.

name: theon
line: (Kneels down). Try smiling with your lips closed. (She does). Hmm, better.

name: theon
line: (Taking off his pants). I don't blame him.

name: theon
line: Quit talking about your father. He's right about us. Our wives from the Iron Islands, they're for breeding. That's not enough for us. That's why we take saltwives, from the women we capture.

name: theon
line: Your place is on this ship.

name: theon
line: I haven't paid you.

name: theon
line: Pears and oranges. Wine from the Arbor. And the heir to Pyke of the Iron Islands. (The man makes no response). The only living son of Balon Greyjoy. (The man continues to make no response). Me.

name: theon
line: I need to get to Pyke.

name: theon
line: I bet you can.

name: theon
line: None like you.

name: theon
line: You don't know what you're like. You need someone to teach you. Know who I am?

name: theon
line: Have my things sent up to the castle.

name: theon
line: You should give me the reins, I'm a better rider than you. I've been on horseback for the last nine years.

name: theon
line: Don't you worry about my hands. (Theon begins fondling her). The sea's in my blood.

name: theon
line: I have a proposal for my father. One that will make him king again. And me after him. You may stay at the castle tonight, if you're lucky.

name: theon
line: An order, from your future king. You can tell your grandchildren about this night.

name: theon
line: Father.

name: theon
line: A man. Your blood and your heir.

name: theon
line: Lord Stark is gone.

name: theon
line: What's done is done. I've brought you a proposal from Robb Stark.

name: theon
line: If my clothes offend you, I will change them.

name: theon
line: Gold.

name: theon
line: (Steps forward). My blood is salt and iron.

name: theon
line: The offer he makes, is one I proposed.

name: theon
line: I've lived with him, hunted with him, fought at his side, he thinks of me as a brother.

name: theon
line: I forget nothing. I remember my brothers. And I remember when my father was a king.

name: theon
line: I will lead the attack myself.

name: theon
line: I'm your son. Your only living heir. Who else?

name: theon
line: I told you to wait outside. (The person who entered is revealed to be Yara). How did you get past the guards?

name: theon
line: Yara?

name: theon
line: She can't lead an attack!

name: theon
line: You're a woman!

name: theon
line: You won't stand a chance against the Lannisters on your own.

name: theon
line: A word, Your Grace?

name: theon
line: It's not so bad once you get used to it.

name: theon
line: The Lannisters are going to reject your terms, you know?

name: theon
line: We can fight them in the fields as long as you like, but we won't beat them until you take King's Landing. And we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships and men who know how to sail them.

name: theon
line: Men who fought King Robert to free themselves from the yoke of the South, just like you're doing now. I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me. I know he will. I'm not a Stark. I know that. But your father raised me to be an honorable man. We can avenge him together.

name: theon
line: You're the crew of the Sea Bitch? I'm your commander. Welcome.

name: theon
line: Stop. Stop! Your captain commands you to stop!

name: theon
line: The Stony Shore, to raid their villages. There'll be spoils in it for you, and women, if you do your jobs well.

name: theon
line: I do. Your captain.

name: theon
line: You could do that, take the ship, head out on your own. And I will hunt you down, drag you back here in chains and hang you for a traitor.

name: theon
line: Thank you. Kind of you to come see me off.

name: theon
line: You'd better get out there. Wouldn't want her to set sail without you.

name: theon
line: Who are you?

name: theon
line: Why aren't you with the rest of them? Or did they send you to row me out and dump me halfway in the sea? That would be good for a laugh.

name: theon
line: And how am I supposed to prove myself by pillaging piss-poor fishing villages?

name: theon
line: And yet that's the task my father has given me to prove that I'm a true Iron Islander.

name: theon
line: The Stony Shore's not far from Torrhen's Square.

name: theon
line: No, we could. We could never hold it for more than a few days. As soon as Winterfell got word that we'd taken Torrhen's Square, the Starks would send their men to take it back. And then

name: theon
line: Take me to my ship.

name: theon
line: I've taken your castle.

name: theon
line: It's Prince Theon now. Get up. You have to get dressed. I've taken Winterfell. I took it. I'm occupying it. I sent men over the walls with grappling claws and ropes.

name: theon
line: To take the castle.

name: theon
line: And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?

name: theon
line: Find the halfwit.

name: theon
line: My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.

name: theon
line: Yes, you will.

name: theon
line: The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.

name: theon
line: Louder. Say Prince Theon.

name: theon
line: Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.

name: theon
line: If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?

name: theon
line: I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.

name: theon
line: I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.

name: theon
line: I'm the one who took you. What of it?

name: theon
line: Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.

name: theon
line: So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.

name: theon
line: You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time

name: theon
line: Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.

name: theon
line: They are not my people.

name: theon
line: My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.

name: theon
line: Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.

name: theon
line: He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.

name: theon
line: You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll

name: theon
line: Take him to the cells. Lock him up

name: theon
line: I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.

name: theon
line: Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!

name: theon
line: The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.

name: theon
line: He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.

name: theon
line: You'll address me as Prince Theon or you'll be next.

name: theon
line: You don't give commands anymore, little lord.

name: theon
line: Any last words, old man?

name: theon
line: Why on earth would I trust the word of a lying little savage like you?

name: theon
line: All wildlings are liars and savages with no loyalty to anything or anyone.

name: theon
line: How? And don't tell me to put a spear in your hand.

name: theon
line: I'm a prince now, and you'd do well

name: theon
line: Like what?

name: theon
line: You know things? Like what? How to eat dirt?

name: theon
line: Wait outside.

name: theon
line: I always wondered what you had under there.

name: theon
line: I'm not killing you. That's your price.

name: theon
line: What do you want then, other than your miserable life?

name: theon
line: Well, you shall have it, then. But only if you serve me well.

name: theon
line: A cripple? You let a cripple escape? The boy can't walk, but somehow he slipped past you?

name: theon
line: The giant? Hodor? Oh, that's all right, then. You let a halfwit escape with a cripple. And Rickon, too? The little one?

name: theon
line: Right. Get the horses and the hounds.

name: theon
line: Enjoying your first hunt?

name: theon
line: With hunting, there's blood at the end.

name: theon
line: I was a little boy when I was torn away from my home and brought here. So I kept my word. I never ran away. If I find them soon enough, I won't hurt them. Well, I'll hurt them, but I won't kill them.

name: theon
line: They have no value to me missing.

name: theon
line: Robb's in the Riverlands. My sister's in Deepwood Motte. She'll get here long before they do. And Ned Stark always said 500 men could hold Winterfell again 10,000.

name: theon
line: The hounds have the scent. Come, Maester, don't look so grim. It's all just a game.

name: theon
line: Try again.

name: theon
line: I'm looking at spending the rest of my life being treated like a fool and a eunuch by my own people. Ask yourself, is there anything I wouldn't do to stop that from happening? The hounds will find the scent again. I'll beat them until they do. I'll whip every man here until I have both those boys in hand. And once I've got them, the pampered little shits It's better to be cruel than weak.

name: theon
line: Where are they?

name: theon
line: The Stark boys. Where are they?

name: theon
line: Think harder.

name: theon
line: (nods)

name: theon
line: Go back to Winterfell. Take him back.

name: theon
line: I told you what would happen. All of you. I told you what would happen if you served me loyally. And what would happen if you did not.

name: theon
line: If there are any who still question whether your new lord means what he says, here is the answer to your question.

name: theon
line: Euron has her.

name: theon
line: I couldn't save her.  I tried.

name: theon
line: It's fine.

name: theon
line: Whatever my queen demands.

name: theon
line: Jon.  I didn't know you were here.

name: theon
line: Sansa, is she all right?

name: theon
line: I should be.

name: theon
line: Euron has her.  I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

name: theon
line: Where did she go?

name: theon
line: Jon.

name: theon
line: Can I speak with you?

name: theon
line: What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You could've lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.

name: theon
line: You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.

name: theon
line: Not compared to me, you haven't.

name: theon
line: I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

name: theon
line: He was.

name: theon
line: I did.

name: theon
line: But the things I've done.

name: theon
line: When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. (SNIFFLES) She needs me now.

name: theon
line: All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.

name: theon
line: She's not dead.

name: theon
line: She's our queen

name: theon
line: I did. I ran from my uncle.

name: theon
line: We're done with all that.

name: theon
line: Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.

name: theon
line: Not for me. For Yara!

name: theon
line: My queen.

name: theon
line: She only has a few ships, and she couldn't sail them here. So, she's sailing to the Iron Islands instead, to take them back in your name.

name: theon
line: I want to fight for Winterfell, Lady Sansa, if you'll have me.

name: theon
line: He won't be. I'll stay with him. With the Ironborn. I took this castle from you. Let me defend you now.

name: theon
line: Daenerys went north.

name: theon
line: You're my queen. I go where you command.

name: theon
line: What is dead may never die.

name: theon
line: Or so Walder Frey would have you think.

name: theon
line: Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.

name: theon
line: Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.

name: theon
line: Kill him, Robb. Send his head to his father. He cut down ten of our men. You saw him.

name: theon
line: The bards will sing songs of their sacrifice.

name: theon
line: Are you afraid?

name: theon
line: Good.

name: theon
line: It means you're not stupid.

name: theon
line: We had not thought to meet you here, My Lady.

name: theon
line: Lord Frey controls that bridge.

name: theon
line: Robb's right.

name: theon
line: Am l your brother, now and always?

name: theon
line: (takes out his sword, bows to Robb) My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.

name: theon
line: Saw what, my lady?

name: theon
line: If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.

name: theon
line: Mountain lion?

name: theon
line: It’s a freak.

name: theon
line: Right. Give it here.

name: theon
line: I take orders from your father, not you.

name: theon
line: The runt of the litter. That one’s yours, Snow.

name: theon
line: It’s for the queen, I bet. I hear she’s [sleek as a mink?]

name: theon
line: Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.

name: theon
line: Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.

name: theon
line: Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.

name: theon
line: Important enough for the likes of you.

name: theon
line: Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.

name: theon
line: Why should I be jealous?

name: theon
line: Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.

name: theon
line: Hmm?

name: theon
line: Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.

name: theon
line: I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.

name: theon
line: I’ve been Lord Stark’s ward since I was eight years old.

name: theon
line: My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.

name: theon
line: I’m not a boy.

name: theon
line: I don’t want to pay for it.

name: theon
line: We have visitors.

name: theon
line: Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.

name: theon
line: Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! (Hodor enters, hoisting up Bran and carrying him away) Help Bran down the hall.

name: theon
line: Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.

name: theon
line: He's not my master.

name: theon
line: She wasn't feeling well.

name: theon
line: My lady's whereabouts...

name: theon
line: Must have been a pretty sight.

name: theon
line: We were outnumbered 10 to one.

name: theon
line: Careful, Imp.

name: theon
line: When are you gonna tell him?

name: theon
line: Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.

name: theon
line: I’m talking about justice.

name: theon
line: A Lannister put his spear through your father’s leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -

name: theon
line: You’re not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They’ve already started the war. It’s your duty to represent your House when your father can’t.

name: theon
line: I don’t know. It’s not my House.

name: theon
line: Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you’re not a man until you’ve killed your first enemy. Well done.

name: theon
line: He would have killed you and cut Bran’s throat.

name: theon
line: To what, to save your brother’s life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.

name: theon
line: Stop! Stop! What are you doing?!

name: theon
line: In a turnip cart?

name: theon
line: And you can afford that?

name: theon
line: There’s a thousand girls like you in King’s Landing.

name: theon
line: Yes, you’ll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can’t get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.

name: theon
line: Don’t be a fool.

name: theon
line: Let me see it one more time?

name: theon
line: I’m going to miss you!

name: theon
line: You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?

name: theon
line: The Iron Islands.

name: theon
line: You've never heard of the Iron Islands?

name: theon
line: Trust me, My Lord. You're not living in the wilderness anymore.

name: theon
line: Lord.

name: theon
line: Why? What do you mean why? My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.

name: theon
line: I will be lord after my father.

name: theon
line: No, you...You having a go at me? Is that it?

name: theon
line: I'm not a Southerner.

name: theon
line: You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?

name: theon
line: Impudent. It means rude. Disrespectful.

name: theon
line: I thought she was our prisoner.

name: theon
line: It was a long time ago.

name: theon
line: I didn’t murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

name: theon
line: Not my claim. Hers.

name: theon
line: I’m not fit to rule.

name: theon
line: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

name: theon
line: There are and Euron is building more. He’s going to offer them to you.

name: theon
line: The Iron Fleet isn’t all he’s bringing. He also wants to give you --

name: theon
line: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He’ll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

name: theon
line: All of them.

name: theon
line: Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

name: theon
line: We shouldn’t be lighting fires. It’s not safe. He won’t stop hunting us.

name: theon
line: Jon will have me killed the moment I step through the gate.

name: theon
line: And the truth about the farm boys I killed in their place? The truth about Ser Rodrik, who I beheaded?

name: theon
line: And the truth about Rob, who I betrayed?

name: theon
line: I don’t want to be forgiven. I can never make amends to your family for all the things that I’ve done. They’ll keep you safer than I ever could.

name: theon
line: I would have taken you all the way to the Wall. I would have died to get you there.

name: theon
line: May I take one of the horses?

name: theon
line: Home.

name: theon
