line: We can’t stop.

name: theon
line: We have to cross here.

name: theon
line: It’s the only way to throw off the hounds.

name: theon
line: I’ve seen what his hounds do to a person. This way is better.

name: theon
line: Over here. Come on.

name: theon
line: Sansa. Sansa.

name: theon
line: Stay here. I’ll lure them away.

name: theon
line: You will. Go north, only north. Jon is Lord Commander at Castle Black. He’ll help you.

name: theon
line: Dead.

name: theon
line: She broke her leg jumping from the ramparts. I left her to die in the snow.

name: theon
line: I am Theon Greyjoy...last living son of Balon Greyjoy.

name: theon
line: And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.

name: theon
line: She is a reaver!

name: theon
line: She is a warrior!

name: theon
line: She is ironborn!

name: theon
line: We will find no better leader. This is our queen.

name: theon
line: That would have been hard to do. You weren’t here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.

name: theon
line: You were gone. Yara was here. Being Ironborn. Leading Ironborn. Getting ready to bring us back to glory.

name: theon
line: I escaped.

name: theon
line: I escaped.

name: theon
line: I’m sorry.

name: theon
line: I know. I know and I’m sorry.

name: theon
line: He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.

name: theon
line: You don’t know.

name: theon
line: Where else could I go?

name: theon
line: No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.

name: theon
line: I didn’t know.

name: theon
line: I don’t want to be king.

name: theon
line: I should’ve listened to you. You’re the only one --

name: theon
line: You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.

name: theon
line: Why did we have to come here?

name: theon
line: I don’t want one.

name: theon
line: You think Uncle Euron’s hunting for us?

name: theon
line: He’ll find us.

name: theon
line: I don’t want any.

name: theon
line: Some bad years?

name: theon
line: If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.

name: jorah
line: Your men but not you?

name: jorah
line: Or perhaps you'll lead Grey Worm and me to the slaughter, cutting the head off our army.  The masters of Yunkai will pay you your fee and you won't have to split it three ways cause you've already slaughtered your partners.

name: jorah
line: You command the Unsullied.  What do you think?

name: jorah
line: Very good.  We'll prepare.

name: jorah
line: You're the Queensguard, Ser Barristan.  Your place is by the Queen.  If we are truly her loyal servants, we'll do whatever needs to be done.  No matter the cost, no matter our pride.

name: jorah
line: There may be others.

name: jorah
line: [Addressing DAARIO] That’s what you call a few guards?

name: jorah
line: [Looks at DAENERYS]  It was just as you said.  They did not believe until it was too late.  Their slave soldiers threw down their spears and surrendered.

name: jorah
line: They can be trusted to kill you if they're well paid. The Yunkish are paying them well.

name: jorah
line: Only by the broken swords on their banners. They're called the Second Sons. A company led by a Braavosi named Mero, "The Titan's Bastard."

name: jorah
line: He's a dangerous man, khaleesi. They all are.

name: jorah
line: I imagine you're right.

name: jorah
line: He may not agree to meet.

name: jorah
line: Mind your tongue.

name: jorah
line: The Second Sons have faced worse odds and run.

name: jorah
line: You didn't conquer them. You liberated them.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, this man has been sentenced to death.

name: jorah
line: And what is she to do for soldiers?

name: jorah
line: Is it 'we' already, Ser Barristan? If you want to sit on the throne your ancestors built, you must win it. That will mean blood on your hands before the thing is done.

name: jorah
line: How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?

name: jorah
line: Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?

name: jorah
line: I was in King's Landing after the sack, khaleesi. You know what I saw? Butchery. Babies, children, old men. More women raped than you can count. There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand. But the Unsullied are not men. They do not rape. They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so. If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.

name: jorah
line: Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, and Rhaegar died.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, please.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, a dragon is worth more than any army.

name: jorah
line: They're growing fast.

name: jorah
line: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.

name: jorah
line: Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?

name: jorah
line: You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.

name: jorah
line: The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.

name: jorah
line: Even the bravest men fear death.

name: jorah
line: The Unsullied are a means to an end.

name: jorah
line: They're not men. Not anymore.

name: jorah
line: Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?

name: jorah
line: You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.

name: jorah
line: You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.

name: jorah
line: (Nods.) I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.

name: jorah
line: It was a bitch of a siege.

name: jorah
line: The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.

name: jorah
line: Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.

name: jorah
line: In full plate metal for 16 hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.

name: jorah
line: You swore an oath.

name: jorah
line: With all my heart.

name: jorah
line: King Robert wanted her dead.

name: jorah
line: I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.

name: jorah
line: No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally--

name: jorah
line: Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jorah
line: Which men do you have in mind?

name: jorah
line: It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.

name: jorah
line: Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.

name: jorah
line: You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.

name: jorah
line: You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.

name: jorah
line: Yunkai. The Yellow City.

name: jorah
line: On the field, with ease. But they won't meet us on the field. They have provisions, patience, and strong walls. If they're wise, they'll hide behind those walls and chip away at us, man by man.

name: jorah
line: We don't need Yunkai, khaleesi. Taking this city will not bring you any closer to Westeros or the Iron Throne.

name: jorah
line: 200,000 if not more.

name: jorah
line: I don't know.

name: jorah
line: A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.

name: jorah
line: They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.

name: jorah
line: I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.

name: jorah
line: They're dragons, Khaleesi. They can never be tamed. Not even by their mother.

name: jorah
line: There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.

name: jorah
line: King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.

name: jorah
line: The Lannisters have more.

name: jorah
line: It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you queen of King's Landing. 10,000 men can't conquer Westeros.

name: jorah
line: The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.

name: jorah
line: There's other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They've reenslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who's declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."

name: jorah
line: You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.

name: jorah
line: (CHUCKLES)

name: jorah
line: You're a Targaryen. You're the Mother of Dragons.

name: jorah
line: What, then?

name: jorah
line: 163, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Later than some.

name: jorah
line: It's not a question of approval, it's a question of trust.

name: jorah
line: Why would I? The man's a sellsword.

name: jorah
line: I did.

name: jorah
line: Daario Naharis killed his captains and dumped their heads at your feet when he grew tired of their commands. How could you ever have faith in a man like that?

name: jorah
line: You have?

name: jorah
line: Without you there to rule, Khaleesi, I fear the masters will simply bide their time, wait for the invaders to leave and reassert control.

name: jorah
line: Herding the masters into pens and slaughtering them by the thousands is also treating men like beasts. The slaves you freed, brutality is all they've ever known. If you want them to know something else, you'll have to show it to them.

name: jorah
line: It's tempting to see your enemies as evil, all of them, but there's good and evil on both sides in every war ever fought.

name: jorah
line: I sold men into slavery, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: I wouldn't be here to help you if Ned Stark had done to me what you want to do to the masters of Yunkai.

name: jorah
line: Hizdahr zo Loraq?

name: jorah
line: (Nods.)

name: jorah
line: Yes, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.

name: jorah
line: This way!

name: jorah
line: Your Grace, I want to say--

name: jorah
line: You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

name: jorah
line: I’ve been flogged if it makes you happy. I’m the best you’ve got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

name: jorah
line: Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

name: jorah
line: Torgo Nudho.

name: jorah
line: None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.

name: jorah
line: We? You’re a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.

name: jorah
line: You’ve been here for how many days now? I’ve fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.

name: jorah
line: Careful now.

name: jorah
line: The second time thanks to you.

name: jorah
line: If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.

name: jorah
line: He’s a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?

name: jorah
line: I'm taking you to the Queen.

name: jorah
line: We are.

name: jorah
line: No wine.

name: jorah
line: I am.

name: jorah
line: No.

name: jorah
line: I think you'll be plenty.

name: jorah
line: No. But the pirates are.

name: jorah
line: And then they weren't.

name: jorah
line: "The city of a thousand years, and all that men had learned; The Doom consumed it all alike, and neither of them turned."

name: jorah
line: Stone Men! Don't let them touch you!

name: jorah
line: Get behind!

name: jorah
line: (Faintly). Tyrion? Tyrion. Tyrion. Tyrion. You're all right.

name: jorah
line: You're heavier than you look. Did any of them touch you?

name: jorah
line: I suppose that's why they send them there.

name: jorah
line: We walk, up the coast. With luck, we'll find a fishing village. Maybe another boat.

name: jorah
line: We've got a long walk ahead of us. I'll get some wood for a fire. Try to get some rest, huh?

name: jorah
line: Your captor.

name: jorah
line: No.

name: jorah
line: Then stay awake.

name: jorah
line: I'm not taking you to your sister.

name: jorah
line: I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.

name: jorah
line: What business would you have with the Queen?

name: jorah
line: I can.

name: jorah
line: Of course I’m hungry.

name: jorah
line: I am not your travelling companion.

name: jorah
line: Do you ever shut up?

name: jorah
line: Why?

name: jorah
line: I’m sure you’ve visited many brothels in many cities.

name: jorah
line: What do you know about my father?

name: jorah
line: How?

name: jorah
line: How?

name: jorah
line: We better keep moving.

name: jorah
line: Do you believe in anything?

name: jorah
line: In something greater than ourselves, I mean. The Gods. Destiny. Do you believe there's a plan for this world?

name: jorah
line: Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I’d find her blackened bones. Instead I found her. Daenerys. Alive and unhurt. Holding her baby dragons. Have you ever heard baby dragons singing?

name: jorah
line: It's hard to be a cynic after that.

name: jorah
line: No it doesn’t.

name: jorah
line: First we have to conquer the world.

name: jorah
line: Then she rules.

name: jorah
line: She is the rightful heir.

name: jorah
line: Shh! It’s a slave ship

name: jorah
line: They probably came ashore for--

name: jorah
line: Queen Daenerys has outlawed slavery.

name: jorah
line: I killed a Dothraki blood rider in single combat.

name: jorah
line: It’s no lie. His name was Qotho. He was bloodrider to Khal Drogo. Take me to Slaver’s Bay, put a sword in my hand, I’ll prove my worth.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.

name: jorah
line: Careful, Khaleesi. Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have a thousand eyes watching for you. I found one. A ship with a good captain. She leaves for Astapor tomorrow.

name: jorah
line: We cannot stay here.

name: jorah
line: They're not your children. I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb. They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi. And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.

name: jorah
line: You know I would die for you. I will never abandon you. I'm sworn to protect you, to serve.

name: jorah
line: That's what the warlock wants. He told you so himself. If you enter that place, you will never leave again. His magic is strong.

name: jorah
line: Until my last breath, I will remember. After I have forgotten my mother's face.

name: jorah
line: (nods)

name: jorah
line: No guards. The warlocks kill with sorcery, not steel.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi! Khaleesi!

name: jorah
line: It's all a lie.

name: jorah
line: Aye, a small ship.

name: jorah
line: (dothraki) Take all the gold and jewels.

name: jorah
line: Everything ends, even the red waste.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: You don't need to see this.

name: jorah
line: Khal Pono perhaps, Khal Jhaqo They don't like the idea of a woman leading a Khalasaar.

name: jorah
line: I remember.

name: jorah
line: A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.

name: jorah
line: This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.

name: jorah
line: If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.

name: jorah
line: They are too weak to fight, as are your people. You must be their strength.

name: jorah
line: (speakss Dothraki)

name: jorah
line: Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.

name: jorah
line: It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.

name: jorah
line: Do I know you?

name: jorah
line: Who are you?

name: jorah
line: If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it . . .

name: jorah
line: To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.

name: jorah
line: (laughs)

name: jorah
line: According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?

name: jorah
line: Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.

name: jorah
line: I only want

name: jorah
line: To see you on the Iron Throne.

name: jorah
line: You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.

name: jorah
line: Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.

name: jorah
line: I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Only that the desert around their walls is called the Garden of Bones. Every time the Qartheen shut their gates on a traveler, the garden grows.

name: jorah
line: If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city, you might do the same, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, please be careful.

name: jorah
line: As soon as I heard. Do you know anything?

name: jorah
line: I know. She was a good

name: jorah
line: Doreah?

name: jorah
line: I should have been here.

name: jorah
line: My place is by your side. I shouldn't have left you alone with these people.

name: jorah
line: They are not to be trusted.

name: jorah
line: Your people are in Westeros.

name: jorah
line: They will soon enough.

name: jorah
line: Trust me, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: You are too young to be so

name: jorah
line: Forgive me, Khaleesi. No one can survive in this world without help. No one. Let me help you, please. Tell me how.

name: jorah
line: I didn't come here for lessons.

name: jorah
line: You have them? Where are they?

name: jorah
line: Where are the dragons?

name: jorah
line: Never.

name: jorah
line: A bit.  Less than before.

name: jorah
line: I don't know anything about that.  I just started feeling better.  I assumed it was the rest that did it.

name: jorah
line: And the climate.

name: jorah
line: How bad is it?

name: jorah
line: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it.  I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could.  Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise.  The only place for me is with her.

name: jorah
line: I owe my life to her and you.

name: jorah
line: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

name: jorah
line: How long?

name: jorah
line: But how long 'till...

name: jorah
line: Jorah.  Jorah Mormont.

name: jorah
line: There's no need.  I've been dead to them for years.

name: jorah
line: What are you doing?

name: jorah
line: What is it?

name: jorah
line: Have you ever done this before?

name: jorah
line: Has she come yet?

name: jorah
line: The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

name: jorah
line: Your Grace.

name: jorah
line: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't.  I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

name: jorah
line: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

name: jorah
line: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you.  Allow me to serve you.

name: jorah
line: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

name: jorah
line: Your Grace, I --

name: jorah
line: We were hoping some of your men could help.

name: jorah
line: Thoros?

name: jorah
line: I hardly recognized you.

name: jorah
line: He was my father.

name: jorah
line: You returned the favor, as I recall.

name: jorah
line: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

name: jorah
line: He was a good man.  He deserved a better son.  Were you with him at the end?

name: jorah
line: I can't think of a worse way for him to go.  The Night's Watch was his life.  He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

name: jorah
line: Your father wanted to execute me.

name: jorah
line: He was in the right of course.  It didn't make me hate him any less.

name: jorah
line: Me too.

name: jorah
line: He gave it to you.

name: jorah
line: I brought shame to my house.  I broke my father's heart.

name: jorah
line: I forfeited the right to claim this sword.  It's yours.  May it serve you well and your children after you.

name: jorah
line: Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.

name: jorah
line: Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

name: jorah
line: Forgive me, khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Many things.

name: jorah
line: But you did forgive, despite my failures. When I heard you'd named Tyrion your Hand, it broke my heart.

name: jorah
line: You made the right choice.

name: jorah
line: I didn't. His mouth hardly stopped moving between Volantis and Meereen. It was all I could do not to throw him in the sea.

name: jorah
line: But the mind behind all those words-

name: jorah
line: As have we all. He owns his and learns from them.

name: jorah
line: I am. And one other suggestion, if you'll allow me.

name: jorah
line: We have all we need to win this war.

name: jorah
line: Please, listen to me. You're the future of our house.

name: jorah
line: You'll be safer in the crypt. These things we're fighting-

name: jorah
line: Thank you, my lady.

name: jorah
line: What have you got there?

name: jorah
line: You still have a family.

name: jorah
line: I'll wield it in his memory to guard the realms of men.

name: jorah
line: They could, they just wouldn't.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: He will die tonight, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Even a queen doesn't have that power. We must go quickly. l've heard there's a good port in Asshai.

name: jorah
line: He's already gone, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: This isn't Westeros, where men honor blood. Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies. Whoever wins that fight will be the new khal. He won't want any rivals. Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.

name: jorah
line: (in Dothraki) Rein in your tongue. She is still your Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: l think you're right.

name: jorah
line: (in Dothraki) No further, horselord.

name: jorah
line: Are you hurt?

name: jorah
line: Hmm?

name: jorah
line: Fetch the midwives.

name: jorah
line: They'll come or l'll have their heads.

name: jorah
line: Gold to hire ships, Princess. Ships to sail to Westeros.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi?

name: jorah
line: These men have shed blood for their Khal.

name: jorah
line: Princess, you have a gentle heart, but this is how it's always been.

name: jorah
line: Come.

name: jorah
line: What do you want done with them?

name: jorah
line: You cannot claim them all, Princess.

name: jorah
line: Gently, gently.

name: jorah
line: The boy did not live.

name: jorah
line: What is there to tell?

name: jorah
line: He never lived, my princess. The women say –

name: jorah
line: They say the child was –

name: jorah
line: Time enough for that later –

name: jorah
line: A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.

name: jorah
line: He seems to like the warmth, Princess.

name: jorah
line: l don't want you alone with this sorceress.

name: jorah
line: Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.

name: jorah
line: Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.

name: jorah
line: (bowing)  Blood of my blood.

name: jorah
line: The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

name: jorah
line: You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?

name: jorah
line: You're learning to talk like a Queen.

name: jorah
line: Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?

name: jorah
line: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.

name: jorah
line: Armor.

name: jorah
line: Slow.

name: jorah
line: It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.

name: jorah
line: I’ve heard that your father was a famous warrior.

name: jorah
line: He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.

name: jorah
line: I don't think she wants to eat dog.

name: jorah
line: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.

name: jorah
line: Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.

name: jorah
line: You need to drink, child... And eat.

name: jorah
line: We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.

name: jorah
line: As you wish, your Grace.

name: jorah
line: Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.

name: jorah
line: A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jorah
line: Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.

name: jorah
line: There is no word for ‘thank you’ in Dothraki.

name: jorah
line: Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.

name: jorah
line: The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.

name: jorah
line: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.

name: jorah
line: I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.

name: jorah
line: Aye.

name: jorah
line: I had no money and an expensive wife.

name: jorah
line: In another place, with another man.

name: jorah
line: Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

name: jorah
line: The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.

name: jorah
line: Home.

name: jorah
line: She’s doing well.

name: jorah
line: “The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”

name: jorah
line: She’s going to have a boy.

name: jorah
line: She truly is a queen today.

name: jorah
line: Don’t let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.

name: jorah
line: They don’t belong to you.

name: jorah
line: Once, perhaps.

name: jorah
line: And you have all three.

name: jorah
line: You can go, but you can’t have the eggs.

name: jorah
line: It means everything to me.

name: jorah
line: And here I stand.

name: jorah
line: Come.

name: jorah
line: Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.

name: jorah
line: Put the sword down. They’ll kill us all.

name: jorah
line: Look away Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: Khaleesi…

name: jorah
line: The Dothraki do things in their own time, for their own reasons.

name: jorah
line: Forgive me, Khaleesi, but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror didn't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right.

name: jorah
line: Ah well, having a few dragons makes things easier.

name: jorah
line: Have you ever seen a dragon, Khaleesi? I believe what my eyes and ears report.

name: jorah
line: No no, don't trouble yourself. Enjoy the market. I'll rejoin you soon enough.

name: jorah
line: Rakharo.

name: jorah
line: Put down that cask.

name: jorah
line: I have a thirst. Open it.

name: jorah
line: Open it.

name: jorah
line: Pour.

name: jorah
line: You first.

name: jorah
line: Come.

name: jorah
line: Ram.

name: jorah
line: Don’t know anything else that can melt a ram’s horn.

name: jorah
line: She’s too smart to like it.

name: jorah
line: I’ve been all over the world. There’s no escaping men like us.

name: jorah
line: You know why.

name: jorah
line: Of course it is.

name: jorah
line: If you grow old.

name: jorah
line: So do I.

name: jorah
line: Not an army. A horde.

name: jorah
line: They have her.

name: jorah
line: You must send me away.

name: jorah
line: I don’t know.

name: jorah
line: I don’t know that either. But I’ve seen what happens when it goes far enough. I’ll end things before that.

name: jorah
line: Don’t be. All I’ve ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I’ll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.

name: jorah
line: I’m fine.

name: jorah
line: What?

name: jorah
line: Makes me sad. You’ll disappoint her before long. She’ll move on.

name: jorah
line: We need each other right now. After we’re done needing each other --

name: jorah
line: You didn’t get much discipline as a child, did you?

name: jorah
line: The road running through the Horse Gate, they call that the godsway.

name: jorah
line: Eastern Market, Western Market. When Khal Drogo died, she was supposed to come here and join the Dosh Khaleen, the widows of the dead khals. That’s where they would have taken her, the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen.

name: jorah
line: It’s forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city.

name: jorah
line: If they spot us and we’re unarmed, we’ll say we’re traders heading for the Western Market. But if they see weapons…

name: jorah
line: There’s 100,000 of them down there. We can’t fight our way out. We wait till dark, and then we’ll find her.

name: jorah
line: Don’t worry. it didn’t touch you.

name: jorah
line: I know what happens.

name: jorah
line: Come on.

name: jorah
line: My friends...We wandered off from the Western Market and got lost. Could you show us the way back?

name: jorah
line: Wine. Come down to my stall tomorrow, I’ll give you a cask of the Arbor’s finest.

name: jorah
line: If they find a body with a stab wound, the whole city will be looking for us.

name: jorah
line: We have to go now.

name: jorah
line: All we can do is try.

name: king
line: You let my father die.

name: king
line: Come forward, My Lady.

name: king
line: Let her speak.

name: king
line: He said I wasn't the King. Why did he say that?

name: king
line: Anything else?

name: king
line: Your sweet words have moved me.

name: king
line: I command the council to make all necessary arrangements for my coronation.

name: king
line: Liar!

name: king
line: Kill him! Kill all of them, I command it!

name: ramsey
line: If you can't ride, we don't stand a chance.

name: ramsey
line: Congratulations, Father. I look forward to meeting my new brother.

name: ramsey
line: May I hold him?

name: ramsey
line: I prefer being an only child.

name: catelyn
line: Are you sure about this?

name: catelyn
line: It's dangerous.

name: catelyn
line: Why are you telling me?

name: catelyn
line: We have enough men?

name: catelyn
line: If Walder Frey cooperates.

name: catelyn
line: If reinforcements arrive from King's Landing, before we take the castle, we'll be caught between Tywin's army and the sea.

name: catelyn
line: Show them how it feels to lose what they love.

name: catelyn
line: [Looking at EDMURE and talking to BLACKFISH] He complained about this marriage the entire ride from Riverrun and now look at him.

name: catelyn
line: [Laughs] Uncle.

name: catelyn
line: Don’t you drink, Lord Bolton?

name: catelyn
line: I hope she makes you very happy.

name: catelyn
line: Poor girl.

name: catelyn
line: Oh, Ned forbade it.  He said it wouldn’t be right if he broke a man’s jaw on our wedding night.

name: catelyn
line: Robb!

name: catelyn
line: Lord Walder!  Lord Walder, enough!  Let it end!  Please!  He is my son! [ROBB is still cradling TALISA on the floor]  My first son!  Let him go and I swear that we will forget this!  I swear it by the Old Gods and New!  We will take no vengeance.

name: catelyn
line: Take me for a hostage but let Robb go!  Robb, get up! Get up and walk out!  Please!  Please!

name: catelyn
line: On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife’s throat!

name: catelyn
line: A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.

name: catelyn
line: I've missed you, Uncle. Father missed you, too, from the day you left. Maybe he never said it in so many words--

name: catelyn
line: I'm glad you were with him. I wish to the gods I had been. Did you make peace in the end?

name: catelyn
line: Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign, I'd see him off. 'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say. 'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.' And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting. I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return. I will never see them again.

name: catelyn
line: (Sighs.)

name: catelyn
line: I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.

name: catelyn
line: Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?

name: catelyn
line: Something else?

name: catelyn
line: Have you received any demands?

name: catelyn
line: Have you heard anything from Theon at all?

name: catelyn
line: You're afraid of her. And she knows it.

name: catelyn
line: No.

name: catelyn
line: You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them. Only a mother can make them.

name: catelyn
line: Twice.

name: catelyn
line: After a fashion. I prayed for my son  Bran to survive his fall.

name: catelyn
line: Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox. Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live. But it would be a very long night. So I sat with him all through the darkness. Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.

name: catelyn
line: Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

name: catelyn
line: And he lived. And I couldn't keep my promise. And everything that's happened since then all this horror that's come to my family it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.

name: catelyn
line: Ser Jeremy. My father's bannerman.

name: catelyn
line: The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.

name: catelyn
line: Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.

name: catelyn
line: Brandon.

name: catelyn
line: How many times have I told you? No climbing.

name: catelyn
line: I want you to promise me. No more climbing.

name: catelyn
line: Promise me. Promise me! Promise me!

name: catelyn
line: Promise me! Promise me, Bran! Promise me!

name: catelyn
line: You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?

name: catelyn
line: Lord Walder is prickly by nature.

name: catelyn
line: Yes, and that is why--

name: catelyn
line: Lord Frey will take this delay as a slight.

name: catelyn
line: He's getting a wedding. It was a king he wanted.

name: catelyn
line: For the girls.

name: catelyn
line: Robb

name: catelyn
line: Bran and Rickon are captives in Winterfell. Sansa and Arya are captives in King's Landing. I have five children, and only one of them is free.

name: catelyn
line: I grieve for your sons, my lord.

name: catelyn
line: Killing Jaime Lannister would not buy life for your children, but returning him to King's Landing may buy life for mine.

name: catelyn
line: Robb. How many men did we send in pursuit of the Kingslayer?

name: catelyn
line: Robb.

name: catelyn
line: Walder Frey is a dangerous man to cross.

name: catelyn
line: And you mean to do it anyway?

name: catelyn
line: I know that seems important to you.

name: catelyn
line: Your father didn't love me when we married. He hardly knew me or I him. Love didn't just happen to us. We built it slowly over the years, stone by stone, for you, for your brothers and sisters, for all of us. It's not as exciting as secret passion in the woods, but it is stronger. It lasts longer.

name: catelyn
line: Why not? Because she's not beautiful? Because she's not exotic and exciting?

name: catelyn
line: And you agreed to it. You gave him your word. Treat your oaths recklessly, and your people will do the same. If your father lived his life for one thing

name: catelyn
line: Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.

name: catelyn
line: You are most kind.

name: catelyn
line: It will be enough to know that justice was done, my lord. Your Grace.

name: catelyn
line: I do not sit on my son's war councils. And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.

name: catelyn
line: My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.

name: catelyn
line: And all of them young and bold like your Knight of Flowers? It's a game to you, isn't it?  I pity them.

name: catelyn
line: Because it won't last. Because they are the knights of summer and winter is coming.

name: catelyn
line: You fought bravely today, Lady Brienne.

name: catelyn
line: You don’t want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.

name: catelyn
line: He is not trustworthy!

name: catelyn
line: You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.

name: catelyn
line: They say a million rats live in the sewers of King's Landing. Shall we rally them to fight for us?

name: catelyn
line: I don't trust Lord Greyjoy because he is not trustworthy. Your father had to go to war to end his rebellion.

name: catelyn
line: I mothered more than just rebels, a fact you seem to have forgotten.

name: catelyn
line: You want to leave Sansa in the Queen's hands? And Arya, I haven't heard a word about Arya. What are we fighting for if not for them?

name: catelyn
line: It's time for me to go home. I haven't seen Bran or Rickon in months.

name: catelyn
line: I beg your pardon?

name: catelyn
line: Why in the name of all the Gods -

name: catelyn
line: I haven't seen Renly Baratheon since he was a boy. You have a hundred other lords -

name: catelyn
line: I will ride at first light.

name: catelyn
line: You've done so well. Your father would be proud.

name: catelyn
line: King Renly. There's a king in every corner now.

name: catelyn
line: By the mother. My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.

name: catelyn
line: And the wording of this oath?

name: catelyn
line: And in return for my son's loyalty?

name: catelyn
line: Our two houses have always been close, which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle. Negotiate a peace with your brother.

name: catelyn
line: No, wait, it wasn't her!

name: catelyn
line: We've got to leave. They'll hang you for this.

name: catelyn
line: You can't avenge him if you're dead.

name: catelyn
line: To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.

name: catelyn
line: We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.

name: catelyn
line: Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.

name: catelyn
line: I'm sorry.

name: catelyn
line: My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.

name: catelyn
line: What comes after is even harder.

name: catelyn
line: You mean to kill Stannis.

name: catelyn
line: But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.

name: catelyn
line: I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.

name: catelyn
line: Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.

name: catelyn
line: He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.

name: catelyn
line: When the time comes, I will not hold you back.

name: catelyn
line: I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

name: catelyn
line: How dare you?

name: catelyn
line: You betrayed Ned.

name: catelyn
line: I trusted you. My husband trusted you. And you repaid our faith with treachery.

name: catelyn
line: Get out!

name: catelyn
line: Have you lost your mind? Get out!

name: catelyn
line: You have Arya, too?

name: catelyn
line: What do you want?

name: catelyn
line: Of course they will. Jaime Lannister for two girls? Robb will never agree to those terms.

name: catelyn
line: You think I keep secrets from my son?

name: catelyn
line: I don't want your gifts. A token of Tyrion Lannister's goodwill. He wants you to understand that this exchange of prisoners is offered in good faith.

name: catelyn
line: Good faith?

name: catelyn
line: What's this?

name: catelyn
line: Get out.

name: catelyn
line: I had not thought to be here, Lord Stannis.

name: catelyn
line: Listen to yourselves. If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.

name: catelyn
line: We share a common enemy.

name: catelyn
line: Robb.

name: catelyn
line: Lady Talisa

name: catelyn
line: Maegyr? Forgive me, I do not know this name.

name: catelyn
line: Yes, you look positively forlorn.

name: catelyn
line: I wish that you were free to follow your heart.

name: catelyn
line: You have inherited your father's responsibilities. I'm afraid they come at a cost. You are promised to another.

name: catelyn
line: A debt that must be paid.

name: catelyn
line: I told you, never trust a Greyjoy!

name: catelyn
line: Let me go and talk to Theon.

name: catelyn
line: What is it?

name: catelyn
line: Lord Karstark, this man is our prisoner.

name: catelyn
line: And crippled mine. He will answer for his crimes, I promise you, but not here.

name: catelyn
line: You will strike me down? Have you forgotten me, ser? I am the widow of your liege, Lord Eddard Stark. I am the mother of your king!

name: catelyn
line: How dare you!

name: catelyn
line: I understand your grief, my lord, better than most, I understand it. But in the name of my son, the King in the North, stand down.

name: catelyn
line: Wise men do not make demands of kings.

name: catelyn
line: Take him to the stockades. Bind him with every chain you can find!

name: catelyn
line: And gag him!

name: catelyn
line: So they say.

name: catelyn
line: Come.

name: catelyn
line: I need to be alone with him.

name: catelyn
line: Your orders, which I just gave you, are to leave me alone with him.

name: catelyn
line: Do you hear them out there? They want your head.

name: catelyn
line: You strangled his son with your chains.

name: catelyn
line: You are no knight. You have forsaken every vow you ever took.

name: catelyn
line: She is a truer knight than you will ever be, Kingslayer.

name: catelyn
line: You are a man without honor.

name: catelyn
line: Brienne.

name: catelyn
line: (to BRIENNE) Your sword.

name: catelyn
line: Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.

name: catelyn
line: The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.

name: catelyn
line: l agree. l'll go.

name: catelyn
line: l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.

name: catelyn
line: lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.

name: catelyn
line: ls there somewhere we can talk?

name: catelyn
line: l'm sure she will give you many sons.

name: catelyn
line: He is quite ill, my lord.

name: catelyn
line: My lord, l –

name: catelyn
line: l'm sure there were reasons –

name: catelyn
line: To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.

name: catelyn
line: lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.

name: catelyn
line: You swore an oath to my father.

name: catelyn
line: Why don't you?

name: catelyn
line: Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.

name: catelyn
line: Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.

name: catelyn
line: You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.

name: catelyn
line: And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.

name: catelyn
line: And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.

name: catelyn
line: l did.

name: catelyn
line: One was – Do you consent?

name: catelyn
line: Not if you want to cross.

name: catelyn
line: No!

name: catelyn
line: lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.

name: catelyn
line: Take him away and put him in irons.

name: catelyn
line: You've had this since dawn?

name: catelyn
line: A courtesy?! My husband has been taken prisoner.

name: catelyn
line: Ned rots in a dungeon and you speak of patience? He is your brother by law!Does family mean nothing to you?

name: catelyn
line: You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?

name: catelyn
line: That is what I ask.

name: catelyn
line: If you fear for the safety of your son...

name: catelyn
line: And that is why we have to stop them.

name: catelyn
line: Robb's brought the North with him.

name: catelyn
line: You look well.

name: catelyn
line: I had not thought to be here.

name: catelyn
line: I remember the day you came into this world red-faced and squalling.

name: catelyn
line: No one? Who were those men I saw here?

name: catelyn
line: All of them are seasoned in battle.

name: catelyn
line: Oh, would that I could.

name: catelyn
line: From the Queen, you mean.

name: catelyn
line: How many men do you have?

name: catelyn
line: you would never be allowed to leave. No.

name: catelyn
line: Do you know what happened to the Targaryen children, when the Mad King fell?

name: catelyn
line: On the orders of Tywin Lannister. And the years have not made him kinder.

name: catelyn
line: I suppose it does.

name: catelyn
line: "The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.

name: catelyn
line: Robb.

name: catelyn
line: Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.

name: catelyn
line: Shh! Shh! Shh!

name: catelyn
line: My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.

name: catelyn
line: l want to see him. Now! Leave us.

name: catelyn
line: Leave us. (the guards leave)

name: catelyn
line: l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.

name: catelyn
line: That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.

name: catelyn
line: Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.

name: catelyn
line: Because of men like you.

name: catelyn
line: My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?

name: catelyn
line: Why?

name: catelyn
line: Why?

name: catelyn
line: It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

name: catelyn
line: I would. We've done nothing wrong.

name: catelyn
line: Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...

name: catelyn
line: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

name: catelyn
line: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

name: catelyn
line: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

name: catelyn
line: Lord Varys.

name: catelyn
line: How did you know I was coming?

name: catelyn
line: Do you know whose dagger this is?

name: catelyn
line: Yours?

name: catelyn
line: To whom?

name: catelyn
line: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

name: catelyn
line: We have proof. We have the blade.

name: catelyn
line: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

name: catelyn
line: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

name: catelyn
line: I wish I could see the girls.

name: catelyn
line: Just for a moment.

name: catelyn
line: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

name: catelyn
line: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

name: catelyn
line: Does he?

name: catelyn
line: I would have dressed, your Grace.

name: catelyn
line: I never knew.

name: catelyn
line: I am grateful..

name: catelyn
line: You've said it.

name: catelyn
line: I want you to leave.

name: catelyn
line: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

name: catelyn
line: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

name: catelyn
line: Talk to Poole about it.

name: catelyn
line: I don't care about appointments!

name: catelyn
line: I have to take care of him.

name: catelyn
line: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

name: catelyn
line: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop! (Wolf’s howling repeatedly)

name: catelyn
line: No!

name: catelyn
line: What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.

name: catelyn
line: Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.

name: catelyn
line: I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.

name: catelyn
line: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

name: catelyn
line: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

name: catelyn
line: I must.

name: catelyn
line: Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.

name: catelyn
line: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

name: catelyn
line: Do you have to?

name: catelyn
line: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

name: catelyn
line: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

name: catelyn
line: I wonder if the old gods agree.

name: catelyn
line: I am so sorry, my love.

name: catelyn
line: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

name: catelyn
line: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

name: catelyn
line: You can always say no, Ned.

name: catelyn
line: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion’s chamber. I’m told he reads all night.

name: catelyn
line: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.

name: catelyn
line: In any case, candles.

name: catelyn
line: Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!

name: catelyn
line: D’you know what?

name: catelyn
line: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.

name: catelyn
line: Where’s Arya? Sansa, where’s your sister?

name: catelyn
line: Your Grace.

name: catelyn
line: My queen.

name: catelyn
line: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.

name: catelyn
line: Hush now. Your father hasn’t even said yes.

name: catelyn
line: He’d have to leave home. He’d have to leave me. And so would you.

name: catelyn
line: Sansa…

name: catelyn
line: I’m sure it’s very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.

name: catelyn
line: I hear the same.

name: catelyn
line: I won’t let him take you.

name: catelyn
line: I’ll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.’

name: catelyn
line: He only stops eating when it’s time for a drink.

name: catelyn
line: This was sent from the Eyrie. What’s she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn’t been back there since her wedding.

name: catelyn
line: She’s fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.

name: catelyn
line: Lysa’s head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son’s life, if she wasn’t certain her husband was murdered?

name: catelyn
line: They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.

name: catelyn
line: He spent half his life fighting Robert’s wars. He owes him nothing. (To NED) Your father and brother rode south once on a king’s demand.

name: catelyn
line: Remove his hood.

name: catelyn
line: I did... often and loudly.

name: catelyn
line: And why would I do that?

name: catelyn
line: Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.

name: catelyn
line: Five years ago.

name: catelyn
line: I am not a murderer, Lannister.

name: catelyn
line: The dagger found

name: catelyn
line: Rodrik?

name: catelyn
line: To whom do I speak?

name: catelyn
line: There was no time to send word.

name: catelyn
line: That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.

name: catelyn
line: My sister will decide what he looks like.

name: catelyn
line: Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-

name: catelyn
line: This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.

name: catelyn
line: And to you.

name: catelyn
line: I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?

name: catelyn
line: And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?

name: catelyn
line: The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

name: catelyn
line: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

name: catelyn
line: Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister’s husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.

name: talisa
line: [Looking at the band and talking to LOTHAR] They’re good, aren’t they?

name: talisa
line: Your mother is less in need of rescue than any woman I’ve ever met.

name: talisa
line: And I like her.  But if she had her way, I would be back in Volantis, playing my harp and you would be sitting over there [Looks at EDMURE and ROSLIN], eating blackberries out of Roslin Frey’s hand.

name: talisa
line: No, don’t.  Don’t insult them.

name: talisa
line: That is a very strange custom.

name: talisa
line: It seems normal to you?

name: talisa
line: No, but there are other ways of providing proof.

name: talisa
line: I don’t know.  But if it’s a boy, I know what we should name him.

name: talisa
line: Eddard. [Catches ROBB by surprise] Don’t you want to teach little Ned Stark how to ride horses?

name: talisa
line: Hold still.

name: talisa
line: I don't know. What do they say about him?

name: talisa
line: True.

name: talisa
line: True. You're a Lannister, aren't you?

name: talisa
line: Martyn Lannister. You've nothing to fear. My husband doesn't eat children. Unless it's a full moon. It's not a full moon tonight, is it? See? Nothing to fear.

name: talisa
line: My mother always told me you Westerosi were a grim lot. Grim, bearded, stinking barbarians that would row across the Narrow Sea and steal us from our beds.

name: talisa
line: I never thought I'd marry anyone at all.

name: talisa
line: Not until I met the king of the grim, bearded, stinking barbarians.

name: talisa
line: Lord Bolton.

name: talisa
line: Whoa, whoa.

name: talisa
line: I'm not afraid of her. May I help you, Lady Stark?

name: talisa
line: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have-

name: talisa
line: You've made them before?

name: talisa
line: Did they work?

name: talisa
line: (Nods.)

name: talisa
line: Which boy?

name: talisa
line: And he lived.

name: talisa
line: This needs to be cleaned and closed.

name: talisa
line: You're lucky to be alive.

name: talisa
line: Your mother's right. If you do this, the Karstarks will abandon you.

name: talisa
line: And more boys will keep dying until this war is over. You need Karstark men to end it.

name: talisa
line: Come to bed.

name: talisa
line: Don't let him.

name: talisa
line: We could ride north. Take your land back from the Greyjoys. Wait out the winter.

name: talisa
line: Give them a new purpose.

name: talisa
line: Oh, I don't know. I don't even know where Winterfell is.

name: talisa
line: What is it?

name: talisa
line: Can you do it?

name: talisa
line: I've spent the last two years nursing wounded men, watching them bleed and die. I'm not afraid of wet shits.

name: talisa
line: Attack. Attack.

name: talisa
line: My mother.

name: talisa
line: Gaaa.

name: talisa
line: Rytsas.

name: talisa
line: That was close enough.

name: talisa
line: Not yet.

name: talisa
line: Many surprises for her.

name: talisa
line: Will you come with me one day to Volantis?  When all this is over?

name: talisa
line: I promise. I know she'd love to meet you. And her grandchild.

name: talisa
line: Are you angry with me?

name: talisa
line: And I have your little prince or princess inside me.

name: talisa
line: Don't get greedy.

name: talisa
line: Can you leave the war for one night?

name: talisa
line: Is she beautiful?

name: talisa
line: What's her name?

name: talisa
line: I'm sure you'll be very happy.

name: talisa
line: And you're marrying her for a bridge?

name: talisa
line: Ah.

name: talisa
line: When I speak to people from the North, they all loved your father.

name: talisa
line: Children do not always think that about their fathers, believe me.

name: talisa
line: I wish I could have met him.

name: talisa
line: (chuckles) Most lords worry more about their gold and their glory than the charwomen scrubbing their floors.

name: talisa
line: And you? You think I'm fighting this war so they'll sing songs about me? I want to go home. I want the men following me to go home.

name: talisa
line: Then why don't you?

name: talisa
line: Chopping off Joffrey's head, you mean.

name: talisa
line: Your pardon, my lord. Your Grace.

name: talisa
line: How are you?

name: talisa
line: I'm sorry. It was a stupid question. I'm sorry.

name: talisa
line: You have every right. You're a king.

name: talisa
line: What kind do you want to be?

name: talisa
line: I was raised to be a proper little lady, to play the harp and dance the latest steps and recite Valyrian poetry.

name: talisa
line: No. No, you would not.

name: talisa
line: When I was 12, my mother and father went to a wedding. Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know. And they left me with my little brother. The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the three-year summer. We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne. Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day. The rich, the poor, we were all there. Naked, screaming, racing to the little islands. Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank. I was treading water, talking to a friend, when I realized I hadn't seen my brother. I called his name. Then I started screaming his name. And then I saw him floating face down. My heart just stopped. I was I dragged him from the water. My friend helped me, I think. I don't even remember. He was so little. Then we pulled him onto the riverbank. And I screamed at him and I shook him. And he was dead. Just dead. A man ran over. He had a fish tattoo on his face. In Volantis, the slaves have tattoos. So you know what they are without having to talk to them. And this man worked on a fishing boat. And he pushed me out of the way. You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl, that's death for the man, a terrible death. But he pushed me out of the way, and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again, until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out. And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm. I decided two things that day. I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies. And when I came of age, I would never live in a slave city again. I'm sorry, Your Grace. You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

name: talisa
line: I don't want you to marry her.

name: talisa
line: Father, smith, warrior, mother ,maiden, crone, stranger.

name: talisa
line: I am his and he is mine from this day until the end of my days.

name: talisa
line: Shhh

name: talisa
line: The rot's set in.
