name: jaime
line: Lord Selwyn would pay his daughter's weight in sapphires if she's returned to him. But only if she's alive, her honor unbesmirched.

name: jaime
line: Not defiled.

name: jaime
line: I hated to read as a child, but my father forced me to study the books every morning before I could practice with sword or horse. Two hours every day holed up in the maester's chambers. I learned a lot of fancy words.

name: jaime
line: Fighting bravely for a losing cause is admirable. Fighting for a winning cause is far more rewarding.

name: jaime
line: Now that we're speaking together man to man, I wonder if you need to keep me chained to this tree. I'm not asking to be freed from my constraints, but if I could sleep lying down, my back would thank you for it. I'm not as young and resilient as I was once.

name: jaime
line: I'm famished, actually.

name: jaime
line: Well, I do like partridge.

name: jaime
line: My father--

name: jaime
line: Don't.

name: jaime
line: Do you know how long it's going to take us to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?

name: jaime
line: So how shall we pass the time?

name: jaime
line: It's going to be a very dull walk.

name: jaime
line: You know, it doesn't matter how loyal a servant you are, no one enjoys the company of a humorless mute. Trust me on this. People have been serving me since I was born. You think Lady Stark is going to want a giant towheaded plank following her around for the rest of her life? A week's journey with you and she'll order you to fall on your sword.

name: jaime
line: All the good it's done her.

name: jaime
line: How did you come into Lady Stark's service? There's something we can talk about.

name: jaime
line: It had to be recently. You weren't with her at Winterfell.

name: jaime
line: Because I visited Winterfell. I would have noticed your dour head smacking into the archways.

name: jaime
line: Were you pledged to Stannis?

name: jaime
line: Ah, Renly. Really? He wasn't fit to rule over anything more important than a 12-course meal.

name: jaime
line: Why? I lived with him at court since he was a boy, don't forget. Could hardly escape the little tulip. Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks. I knew him far better than you.

name: jaime
line: Sounds like you quite fancied him.

name: jaime
line: Oh, gods, you did.

name: jaime
line: Did you ever tell him? No, of course not. You weren't Renly's type, I'm afraid.

name: jaime
line: He preferred curly-haired little girls like Loras Tyrell. You're far too much man for him.

name: jaime
line: Unless they're about me. It's all true about Renly. His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court. It's a shame the throne isn't made out of cocks. They'd have never got him off it.

name: jaime
line: I don't blame him. And I don't blame you, either. We don't get to choose who we love.

name: jaime
line: No, you really can't.

name: jaime
line: He knows who I am.

name: jaime
line: Maybe you're right.  But what if you're not? What if he tells someone?

name: jaime
line: More innocent than Lady Stark's daughters?

name: jaime
line: It's a tough decision-take the bridge and risk being seen or cross the great water.

name: jaime
line: Anyone can see us on the bridge, but cross by water and the current could take us or I could escape down the river.

name: jaime
line: It's wonderful to watch you wrestle with these dilemmas. Which will she choose?

name: jaime
line: Gambler at heart. Wouldn't have guessed.

name: jaime
line: I need to rest.

name: jaime
line: I have these, you know, on your feet when you walk too far. What do you call them?

name: jaime
line: Corns. I never used to get corns. Of course I used to ride everywhere, not march around like a common foot soldier wearing the same shit boots for over a year.

name: jaime
line: This heel is ruined. There's no way-

name: jaime
line: I never understood why some knights felt the need to carry two swords.

name: jaime
line: Ooh. You move well for a great beast of a woman.

name: jaime
line: You shouldn't grimace before you lunge. It gives away the game.

name: jaime
line: Bit of a quandary for you. If you kill me, you fail Lady Stark. But if you don't kill me, I'm going to kill you.

name: jaime
line: You're good. Graceless, but good.

name: jaime
line: See? If you were willing to hurt me, you might have had me there.

name: jaime
line: We enjoy a good fight. Gets our juices flowing. The Flayed Man of House Bolton. A bit gruesome for my taste.

name: jaime
line: Let us go and my father will pay you whatever you want.

name: jaime
line: Lord Bolton.

name: jaime
line: Will I die?

name: jaime
line: Then you'll die. You're no maester. Where's your chain?

name: jaime
line: I don't need my right hand to kill you.

name: jaime
line: Mmm.

name: jaime
line: No milk of the poppy.

name: jaime
line: I'll scream.

name: jaime
line: I'll scream loudly.

name: jaime
line: Not so hard. You'll scrub the skin off.

name: jaime
line: I need a bath. Help me out of these rags.

name: jaime
line: Now get out.

name: jaime
line: This one suits me fine. Don't worry. I'm not interested. If I faint, pull me out. I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.

name: jaime
line: You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.

name: jaime
line: That was unworthy. Forgive me. You protected me better than most--

name: jaime
line: I'm apologizing. I'm sick of fighting. Let's call a truce.

name: jaime
line: I trust you.

name: jaime
line: There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for 17 years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?

name: jaime
line: Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?

name: jaime
line: Jaime. My name is Jaime.

name: jaime
line: (desperately) Water. Water. Please, water. Wa-water. Water, please. Please. Please.

name: jaime
line: If I die, you won't be getting--

name: jaime
line: I'm dying.

name: jaime
line: I don't care about revenge.

name: jaime
line: My sword hand. I was that hand.

name: jaime
line: You should. But instead, you're sitting here watching me fail at dinner. Why might that be?

name: jaime
line: We both know who would pay the most. Or make you pay the most if he found out you had captured me and sent me back up north for a summary execution.

name: jaime
line: It would be, if you honestly believed my father would never find out about it.

name: jaime
line: He'll make time for you.

name: jaime
line: Shall we drink on it?

name: jaime
line: You do understand how suspicious that is to ordinary people?

name: jaime
line: Very well. My lady, may our journey continue without further incident.

name: jaime
line: I'm afraid I must insist.

name: jaime
line: Tomorrow.

name: jaime
line: Lord Bolton's traveling tomorrow as well. He's going to the Twins for Edmure Tully's wedding. You're to remain here.

name: jaime
line: I owe you a debt.

name: jaime
line: (nods) I will return the Stark girls to their mother. I swear it.

name: jaime
line: (nods)

name: jaime
line: (nods)  Tell Robb Stark I'm sorry I couldn't make his uncle's wedding. The Lannisters send their regards.

name: jaime
line: What's the purpose of an arm with no hand?

name: jaime
line: Yes, we've stymied the corruption. You're a learned man.

name: jaime
line: You did well sewing up this mess. You're far better at this sort of work than Grand Maester Pycelle.

name: jaime
line: So why did the Citadel take your chain? Did you fondle one boy too many?

name: jaime
line: What is?

name: jaime
line: You performed experiments on living men.

name: jaime
line: With their permission?

name: jaime
line: Dying paupers, I assume. Men with no families to complain. You found them moaning in the poorhouse and had them carted back to your garret and opened up their bellies to see what was inside.

name: jaime
line: I don't know.

name: jaime
line: (shakes his head)

name: jaime
line: Countless has a nice ring to it.

name: jaime
line: A fair offer.

name: jaime
line: Why not?

name: jaime
line: (sighs)

name: jaime
line: They'd be fools to kill her.

name: jaime
line: We have to return to Harrenhal.

name: jaime
line: I've left something behind.

name: jaime
line: And what are those orders?

name: jaime
line: You think you'll get a reward.

name: jaime
line: You think you're getting a reward. Let me explain something to you. When my father sees me, the first thing he's going to ask is what happened to my hand. And I'm going to tell him this man chopped it off.

name: jaime
line: Or I could tell him this man saved my life. We return to Harrenhal now.

name: jaime
line: Whoa.

name: jaime
line: Be quiet.

name: jaime
line: A wooden sword?

name: jaime
line: You gave her a wooden sword.

name: jaime
line: I'll pay her bloody ransom. Gold, sapphires, whatever you want. Just get her out of there.

name: jaime
line: Get behind me.

name: jaime
line: Pull her up.

name: jaime
line: We're taking her to King's Landing. Unless you kill me.

name: jaime
line: What do you think is more important to Lord Bolton?  Getting his pet rat a reward or ensuring Tywin Lannister gets his son back alive?

name: jaime
line: Well, we must be on our way. Sorry about the sapphires.

name: jaime
line: Soon.

name: jaime
line: I've never seen him fight.

name: jaime
line: Oberyn believes in himself.

name: jaime
line: Beheading.

name: jaime
line: Cousins.

name: jaime
line: Of course. Wet-nurse dropped him on his head. Left him simple.

name: jaime
line: Nothing made you happier. You'd think being tormented from birth would have given you some affinity for the afflicted.

name: jaime
line: The joke wore thin, though.

name: jaime
line: I had other interests.

name: jaime
line: Why?

name: jaime
line: Volarik. Tried to touch me once.

name: jaime
line: Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?

name: jaime
line: He was twice your size.

name: jaime
line: I don't know.

name: jaime
line: Good luck today.

name: jaime
line: You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?

name: jaime
line: Tyrion is your family.

name: jaime
line: You don't get to choose.

name: jaime
line: Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.

name: jaime
line: The things I did to get back to you, to endure all that, only to find you-

name: jaime
line: Those are words.

name: jaime
line: Told him what?

name: jaime
line: You told him?

name: jaime
line: You think he'll just accept that?

name: jaime
line: What did you say?

name: jaime
line: Someone will walk in.

name: jaime
line: Is that any way to speak about our mother?

name: jaime
line: What do you think I’m doing? The galley’s waiting in the bay bound for the Free Cities.

name: jaime
line: Varys.

name: jaime
line: You have more friends than you thought.

name: jaime
line: There’s a locked door at the top of the stairs. Knock on it twice, and then twice again. Varys will open.

name: jaime
line: Farewell, little brother.

name: jaime
line: Quickly now.

name: jaime
line: How are you?

name: jaime
line: You are. You will be. I'll see to that.

name: jaime
line: Please give the queen a moment alone with her son.

name: jaime
line: I don't know what I saw.

name: jaime
line: Tyrion's my brother. Our brother. There'll be a trial. We'll get to the truth of what happened.

name: jaime
line: You're a hateful woman. Why have the gods made me love a hateful woman?

name: jaime
line: No.

name: jaime
line: (GRUNTS)

name: jaime
line: I don't care.

name: jaime
line: I don't care.

name: jaime
line: I don't care.

name: jaime
line: Gilded steel.

name: jaime
line: I'm not hungry.

name: jaime
line: Oh!

name: jaime
line: No, I'll do it. Leave us.

name: jaime
line: I can't fight anymore.

name: jaime
line: I can hold a sword, but all my instincts are wrong. How can I protect the king when I can hardly wipe my own ass?

name: jaime
line: I'm not Father. I'm the Kingslayer. When people find out I can't slay a pigeon...

name: jaime
line: With whom? You? Men talk. Soon as someone discovers I can't fight, he'll tell everyone.

name: jaime
line: My brother tells me you can keep your mouth shut. Unusual talent for a sellsword.

name: jaime
line: Is this place safe?

name: jaime
line: Uh-huh.

name: jaime
line: I haven't used a sparring sword since I was nine.

name: jaime
line: Ah! Bold warrior you are, attacking a man when his guard's down.

name: jaime
line: Come on, then.

name: jaime
line: Ser Loras, it's quite all right. Your sister looks very beautiful.

name: jaime
line: So, looking forward to your wedding?

name: jaime
line: Our fathers are both rather keen on the prospect.

name: jaime
line: Perhaps they should get married. If you were to marry Cersei, she'd murder you in your sleep. If you somehow managed to put a child in her first, she'd murder him, too, long before he drew his first breath. Luckily for you, none of this will happen because you'll never marry her.

name: jaime
line: Move away!

name: jaime
line: Joffrey! Joffrey!

name: jaime
line: Magnificent.

name: jaime
line: Looks fresh-forged.

name: jaime
line: No one's made a Valyrian steel sword since the Doom of Valyria.

name: jaime
line: Where did you get this much Valyrian steel?

name: jaime
line: You've wanted one of these in the family for a long time.

name: jaime
line: Two?

name: jaime
line: Well, thank you. It's glorious.

name: jaime
line: Any decent swordsman knows how to use both hands.

name: jaime
line: No. But as long as I'm better than everyone else, I suppose it doesn't matter.

name: jaime
line: Where's that written? I can and I will. The Kingsguard oath is for life.

name: jaime
line: How many people in this city alone would love to see his head on a pike?

name: jaime
line: Home?

name: jaime
line: You are the Lord of Casterly Rock.

name: jaime
line: You know what they call me? Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. Man without honor. Now you want me to break another sacred vow.

name: jaime
line: No.

name: jaime
line: No.

name: jaime
line: There's my answer.

name: jaime
line: My bloody honor is beyond repair, but my answer is still no. I don't want Casterly Rock. I don't want a wife. I don't want children.

name: jaime
line: Supper would be nice.

name: jaime
line: I suppose you want the sword back.

name: jaime
line: (Groans)

name: jaime
line: You like it so much, you're welcome to chop off your own hand and take it.

name: jaime
line: Days?

name: jaime
line: Uh... a hook would be more practical.

name: jaime
line: Odd little man.

name: jaime
line: What symptoms?

name: jaime
line: You let him touch you?

name: jaime
line: I'm surprised. You never let Pycelle near you.

name: jaime
line: I'm not sure I've ever smelled a dead cat.

name: jaime
line: You drink more than you used to.

name: jaime
line: Why?

name: jaime
line: It must have been traumatic for you.

name: jaime
line: A rather short siege.

name: jaime
line: Father disowned me today.

name: jaime
line: You're forgetting Tyrion.

name: jaime
line: Staying in the Kingsguard means I live right here in the Red Keep with you.

name: jaime
line: I want... Not now? When? I've been back for weeks.

name: jaime
line: Something's changed.

name: jaime
line: What do you want me to apologize for?

name: jaime
line: You think I wanted to be taken prisoner?

name: jaime
line: Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape. Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.

name: jaime
line: I... What are you saying?

name: jaime
line: Go away.

name: jaime
line: All the Kingsguard will be on duty, of course. Ser Boros will be stationed here. Ser Preston will be stationed here beside the primary entertainment. Your Grace?

name: jaime
line: Ser Meryn will guard Lady Margaery and Tommen.

name: jaime
line: And I thank you for it, Ser Meryn. All very good. I don't expect any trouble.

name: jaime
line: Margaery Tyrell, I've heard.

name: jaime
line: The war's not won. Not while Stannis lives.

name: jaime
line: My apologies, Your Grace. I was rather busy.

name: jaime
line: So this is the famous "Book of Brothers"? All the great deeds of all the great Kingsguard. Ser Arthur Dayne. The Sword of the Morning. (Chuckles) Led the attack on the Kingswood Brotherhood. Defeated the Smiling Knight in single combat. Ser Duncan the Tall. (Laughs) Four pages for Ser Duncan. He must have been quite a man.

name: jaime
line: So they say.

name: jaime
line: There's still time.

name: jaime
line: I use my left hand now, Your Grace. Makes for more of a contest.

name: jaime
line: Yes, there she is.

name: jaime
line: To return the Stark girls to their mother who is now dead.

name: jaime
line: Well, Arya Stark hasn't been seen since her father was killed. Where do you think she is? My money's on dead. There's a certain safety in death, wouldn't you say? And Sansa Stark is now Sansa Lannister. Bit of a complication.

name: jaime
line: What do you want me to do? Kidnap my sister-in-law? And take her where? Where would she be safer than here?

name: jaime
line: Are you sure we're not related? Ever since I've returned, every Lannister I've seen has been a miserable pain in my ass. Maybe you're a Lannister, too. You've got the hair for it if not the looks.

name: jaime
line: What the hell was that?

name: jaime
line: You're a rare talent. When you're fighting cripples, anyway.

name: jaime
line: You talk to my brother this way?

name: jaime
line: Do you think he did it?

name: jaime
line: We're done for today.

name: jaime
line: You stood for him in his trial by combat at the Eyrie.

name: jaime
line: To tell you the truth, this isn't so bad. Four walls. A pot to piss in. I was chained to a wooden post covered in my own shit for months.

name: jaime
line: Maybe a bit. I'm sorry I didn't come sooner.

name: jaime
line: How do you think? Her son died in her arms.

name: jaime
line: Don't. You know what's coming?

name: jaime
line: Now that you mention it, she did ask.

name: jaime
line: Depends. Did you do it?

name: jaime
line: Are you really asking if I'd kill my brother? How can I help you?

name: jaime
line: You know I can't.

name: jaime
line: What do you want me to do? Kill the guards? Sneak you out of the city in the back of a cart? I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

name: jaime
line: Inappropriate? You're accused of killing the king.Freeing you is treason.

name: jaime
line: Which is why we're having a trial. A trial. If the killer threw himself before the Iron Throne, confessed to his crimes, and gave irrefutable evidence of his guilt, it wouldn't matter to Cersei. She won't rest until my head's on a spike.

name: jaime
line: Not just yours. She's offering a knighthood to whomever finds Sansa Stark.

name: jaime
line: You sent for me, Your Grace?

name: jaime
line: Ser Boros is on duty tonight. Tomorrow I believe...

name: jaime
line: I promise you Tommen's safe. We're protecting him.

name: jaime
line: What?

name: jaime
line: You know why. She'd hoped I'd send her daughters back to her.

name: jaime
line: I swore by all the gods that if her daughters were alive, I'd return them to her.

name: jaime
line: I wanted to get back to you. Should I have told hert o fuck off?

name: jaime
line: Catelyn Stark's dead. So if I told you to leave the capital right now and find Sansa, if I told you to find that murderous little bitch and bring me her head, would you do it?

name: jaime
line: I had to see him. I had to know for myself.

name: jaime
line: He didn't do it, Cersei.

name: jaime
line: It's the duty of the Lord Commander to fill those pages. And there's still room left on mine.

name: jaime
line: Mmm. It's yours.

name: jaime
line: It was reforged from Ned Stark's sword. You'll use it to defend Ned Stark's daughter. You swore an oath to return the Stark girls to their mother. Lady Stark's dead. Arya's probably dead, too, but there's still a chance to find Sansa and get her somewhere safe. I've got something else for you.

name: jaime
line: I hope I got your measurements right.

name: jaime
line: I almost forgot. I have one more gift.

name: jaime
line: Of course you do.

name: jaime
line: My brother owes him a debt. He's not safe here. You're keeping him from harm. It's chivalry.

name: jaime
line: See? He's a good lad.You'll get along.

name: jaime
line: They say the best swords have names. Any ideas?

name: jaime
line: Good-bye, Brienne.

name: jaime
line: Father's orders.

name: jaime
line: You'd condemn your own son to death?

name: jaime
line: This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.

name: jaime
line: You've always hated Tyrion.

name: jaime
line: As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?

name: jaime
line: Justice?

name: jaime
line: He'll be executed.

name: jaime
line: Once you said family is what lives on. All that lives on. You told me about a dynasty that would last 1,000 years. What happens to your dynasty when Tyrion dies? I'm a Kingsguard, forbidden by oath to carry on the family line.

name: jaime
line: What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?

name: jaime
line: It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.

name: jaime
line: You have my word.

name: jaime
line: You're going to be found guilty.

name: jaime
line: When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.

name: jaime
line: Father is not Joffrey. He'll keep his word.

name: jaime
line: Do you trust me?

name: jaime
line: Keep your mouth shut. No more outbursts. This will all be over soon.

name: jaime
line: I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.

name: jaime
line: You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?

name: jaime
line: You fell in love with a whore.

name: jaime
line: Careful. I'm the last friend you've got.

name: jaime
line: Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.

name: jaime
line: I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.

name: jaime
line: (laughs)

name: jaime
line: It is tempting.

name: jaime
line: If he wins.

name: jaime
line: No. Not Ser Meryn.

name: jaime
line: Prince Doran. (bows)

name: jaime
line: Princess Myrcella.

name: jaime
line: What a lovely dress.

name: jaime
line: You must be cold.

name: jaime
line: Prince Trystane. How’s your jaw?

name: jaime
line: Looking out for the safety of my niece, the princess Myrcella.

name: jaime
line: We received a threatening message. The princess’s necklace in the jaws of a viper.

name: jaime
line: Ah. Excellent. The last meal before the beheading.

name: jaime
line: I’m afraid he does.

name: jaime
line: I accept.

name: jaime
line: You have my word.

name: jaime
line: May I inquire into the fate of my man?

name: jaime
line: He said it was just a fleabite. The fault is mine. Bronn is merely a soldier following my orders. If anyone should be punished it’s me.

name: jaime
line: You’re a good man.

name: jaime
line: Prince Doran, Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

name: jaime
line: I believe you’ve already met Prince Trystane.

name: jaime
line: Prince Trystane here is a man of mercy. He’s agreed to grant you your freedom.

name: jaime
line: There was one condition.

name: jaime
line: Your maester kindly agreed to copy it over for me.

name: jaime
line: She will.

name: jaime
line: Of course, she’s my niece.

name: jaime
line: Thank you.

name: jaime
line: Whenever you’re ready, My Lord.

name: jaime
line: Try not to lose it this time.

name: jaime
line: I know you didn’t want to leave Dorne. But I’m glad you’re coming home. Your mother’s desperate to see you. And I’m glad Trystane’s coming with us. He seems like a nice boy. You’re lucky. Arranged marriages are rarely so… so well arranged.

name: jaime
line: If she sees you’re happy, I’m sure she will.

name: jaime
line: Have you ever known your mother to like anyone aside from her children?

name: jaime
line: I’m not so sure about that. Listen. There’s something I’ve wanted to tell you. Something I should have told you long ago. So. Now that you’ve seen more of the world, you’ve learned how complicated things can be. People can be. The Lannisters and the Martells have hated each other for years, but you’ve fallen in love with Trystane. It was an accident, really, I mean what were the chances? You happen to fall in love with the man you were assigned to marry? (Myrcella laughs) My point is… we don’t choose whom we love. We just… It’s beyond our control. I sound like an idiot.

name: jaime
line: What I’m trying to say. What I’m trying and failing to say…

line: 'Cause you're going to come with me and help me with something important. And when we return, I'm going to give you a much better girl, and a much better castle.

name: jaime
line: What he built. The towers. He built it for us. He meant it for us. They’re going to try to take it away, all of it.

line: All of them out there are enemies. They’re waiting a night to make sure he’s really dead and as soon as they see the stones on his eyes they’ll set to work on tearing us apart.

line: We’re trying to blend in. We don’t want everyone in Dorne to hear your accent.

line: Your mother’s worried about you. Threats have been made. Dorne is too dangerous for you. I’ve come to take you home.

line: It's for your own good. These are complicated matters.

name: jaime
line: I don’t understand.

line: Damn.

name: jaime
line: You're much uglier in daylight. What's your name? I'm Jaime Lannister of Casterly Rock, son of Tywin.

name: jaime
line: A captive knight has a right to know his captor's identity.

name: jaime
line: Tarth, Tarth, Tarth. Crescent moons and starbursts. Lord Selwyn Tarth. Your father. Do you have any brothers and sisters, my lady? It's a long way to King's Landing. Might as well get to know one another.

name: jaime
line: Have you known many men? I suppose not. Women? Horses? Ah.

name: jaime
line: I didn't mean to give offense, my lady. Forgive me.

name: jaime
line: Why do you hate me so much? Have I ever harmed you?

name: jaime
line: Has anyone ever told you you're as boring as you are ugly?

name: jaime
line: I already have. Look at you. You're ready to chop my head off. Do you think you could? Do you think you could beat me in a fair fight?

name: jaime
line: The answer is no. There are three men in the kingdoms who might have a chance against me. You're not one of them.

name: jaime
line: If you're so confident, unlock my chains. Let's see what happens.

name: jaime
line: I took you for a fighter, a man Pardon. Woman of honor. Was I wrong? You're afraid.

name: jaime
line: You're a virgin, I take it?

name: jaime
line: Childhood must have been awful for you. Were you a foot taller than all the boys? They laughed at you, called you names? Some boys like a challenge. One or two must have tried to get inside Big Brienne.

name: jaime
line: Ah. But you fought them off. But maybe you wished one of them could overpower you, fling you down, tear off your clothes. But none of them were strong enough. I'm strong enough.

name: jaime
line: Of course you are. You'd love to know what it feels like to be a woman.

name: jaime
line: Ah. "They lay with lions." Tavern girls, I'd say. Probably served my father's soldiers. Maybe one of them gave up a kiss and a feel. That's how they earned this. The glorious work of the Northern freedom fighters. Must make you proud to serve the Starks.

name: jaime
line: Tell yourself that tonight when they swing in your dreams.

line: You think my father’s going to negotiate with you? You don’t know him very well.

name: jaime
line: King in the North. I keep expecting you to leave me in one castle or another for safekeeping, but you drag me along from camp to camp. Have you grown fond of me, Stark? Is that it? I've never seen you with a girl.

name: jaime

line: Smart boy. What's wrong? Don't like being called ‘boy’? Insulted?

line: If that's true, Stannis is the rightful king. How convenient for him.

name: jaime

line: No, no. There's only one fat Lannister. If she was your mother, you'd know it.

name: jaime
line: You knew when you were needed and when to go away. It's a rare talent. Most of my squires, they mean well, but young men with big jobs, they tend to overdo them.

name: jaime
line: He was A painter. A painter who only used red. I couldn't imagine being able to fight like that, not back then. And to help him do that, to be a part of something that perfect. I don't need to explain how that felt, not to you.

name: jaime
line: It's like stepping into a dream you've been dreaming for as long as you can remember, and finding out that the dream is more real than your life.

name: jaime
line: No. I didn't have your gift. He couldn't take a step without stepping on me. I was awful, a complete liability. Until one of the outlaws decided to take on a 16-year-old squire.

name: jaime
line: It's a good thing I am who I am. I'd have been useless at anything else. I'm not well-suited for imprisonment. Shocking, I know. Some men are. Ned Stark, I imagine he made an excellent prisoner right up until the end. Not me, though. My life has left me uniquely unfit for constraint.

name: jaime
line: Of course. Every day.

name: jaime
line: But there is a way, I think. It wasn't possible until now.

line: You'll only have to do one thing.

line: Thank you for fighting on my behalf, Lady Stark. I would have come to your defense, but

line: You've become a real she-wolf in your later years. There's not much fish left in you.

line: Come to say goodbye, Lady Stark? I believe it's my last night in this world. Is that a woman?

line: Old Lord Karstark doesn't seem to like me.

name: jaime
line: So many vows. They make you swear and swear. Defend the king, obey the king, obey your father, protect the innocent, defend the weak. But what if your father despises the king? What if the king massacres the innocent? It's too much. No matter what you do, you're forsaking one vow or another. Where did you find this beast?

name: jaime
line: Kingslayer. What a king he was. Here's to Aerys Targaryen, the Second of His Name, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, Protector of the Realm, and to the sword I shoved in his back.

name: jaime
line: Do you know, I've never been with any woman but Cersei. So in my own way, I have more honor than poor old dead Ned. What was the name of that bastard he fathered?

line: No, that wasn't it. Snow, a bastard from the North. Now, when When good old Ned came home with some whore's baby, did you pretend to love it? No. You're not very good at pretending. You're an honest woman. You hated that boy, didn't you? How could you not hate him? The walking, talking reminder that the honorable Lord Eddard Stark fucked another woman.

line: This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

name: jaime
line: For now.  They won't be able to hold it.  Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left.  Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

name: jaime
line: She was a great woman, once.  Now she's broken.  She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores.  The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history.  I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice.  Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

line: When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south.  I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

line: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

line: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

name: jaime

name: jaime

line: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

line: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

name: jaime
line: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

name: jaime
line: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

name: jaime
line: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

line: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

name: jaime
line: I just saw the Dothraki fight.  They'll beat any mercenary army.  They'll beat any army I've ever seen.  Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport.  Her dragon burned a thousand wagons.  Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you.  They couldn't stop it.  And she has three of them.  This isn't a war we can win.

line: If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen?  Which one would Margerey been better able to control?  Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms?  She was telling the truth.

name: jaime
line: She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house.  And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

name: jaime
line: We don't have time for this.  We should be preparing the city for a siege.  The Dothraki are coming.

line: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

line: I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

name: jaime
line: No, there isn't, is there?

line: That's a lot of money I just gave you.

line: You don't want Highgarden.

name: jaime
line: We're at war.  Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in.  Besides, think of the upkeep.  The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

name: jaime
line: They're not mine.  The gold belongs to the Iron Bank.  We pay our debts.

name: jaime
line: Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid.  When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

name: jaime
line: Stranger things have happened.

name: jaime
line: The current harvest?

line: Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

name: jaime
line: Come on, boy.  Come on!

name: jaime
line: Maybe it really is all cocks in the end.

name: jaime
line: Yes, he's always been a champion of the downtrodden.

line: Perhaps you ought to sit down.

line: It's been good to see you. I imagine the next time will be across a battlefield.

name: jaime
line: Yes, and I'm not looking forward to seeing more of them. But I'm loyal to the queen and you're loyal to Sansa and her dolt brother.

name: jaime
line: At her until she kicked me out. She thinks I was an idiot to trust you. A lot of people seem to think that, actually.

name: jaime
line: I suppose we should say goodbye, one idiot to another.

name: jaime
line: Our men in King's Landing will march north in three days' time.

name: jaime
line: We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.

name: jaime
line: Your Grace.

name: jaime
line: Preparing the expedition north.

name: jaime
line: You pledged our forces to fight our common enemy.

name: jaime
line: You saw it with your own eyes. You saw a dead man trying to kill us.

name: jaime
line: This isn't about noble houses, this is about the living and the dead!

name: jaime
line: I made a promise.

name: jaime
line: Our child will never be born if the dead come south.

name: jaime
line: And then what?

name: jaime
line: When the fighting in the North is over, someone wins. You understand that, don't you? If the dead win, they march south and kill us all. If the living win, and we've betrayed them, they march south and kill us all!

name: jaime
line: I faced them in the field. We can't beat them. We can't beat their dragons.

name: jaime

name: jaime
line: For all we know, it's guarding her fleet!

name: jaime
line: We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!

line: The Golden Company is not here. They're in Essos. How is a mercenary company in Essos going to help us?

line: You plotted with Euron Greyjoy without telling me, the commander.

name: jaime

name: jaime

name: jaime

name: jaime
line: I  don't believe you.
