line: She lied to me as well. She never had any intention of sending her army north.

name: jaime
line: She has Euron Greyjoy's fleet and 20,000 fresh troops. The Golden Company from Essos, bought and paid for. Even if we defeat the dead, she'll have more than enough to destroy the survivors.

name: jaime
line: I promised to fight for the living. I intend to keep that promise.

name: jaime
line: Do you want me to apologize? I won't. We were at war. Everything I did, I did for my house and my family. I'd do it all again.

name: jaime
line: Because this goes beyond loyalty.

name: jaime
line: This is about survival.

name: jaime
line: Thank you, Your Grace.

name: jaime
line: I'm sorry for what I did to you.

name: jaime
line: I'm not that person anymore.

name: jaime
line: You're not?

name: jaime
line: You're not angry at me.

name: jaime
line: Why didn't you tell them?

name: jaime
line: What about afterwards?

name: jaime
line: Yes, here we are.

name: jaime
line: How do they feel about their new queen?

name: jaime
line: And she is? Different?

name: jaime
line: You're sure about her?

name: jaime
line: She didn't seem sure about you.

name: jaime
line: Hmm.

name: jaime
line: No, that part is real.

name: jaime
line: She's always been good at using the truth to tell lies. I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. She's fooled me more than anybody.

name: jaime
line: What?

name: jaime
line: Your cock.

name: jaime
line: Lady Brienne.

name: jaime
line: He's come a long way.

name: jaime
line: I'm sure you'll teach him. I've been told you're commanding the left flank.

name: jaime
line: It is.

name: jaime
line: Yes, I think you're right.

name: jaime
line: What?

name: jaime
line: I truly don't.

name: jaime
line: You want me to insult you?

name: jaime
line: Good.

name: jaime
line: I came to Winterfell because-I'm not the fighter I used to be. But I'd be honored to serve under your command, if you'll have me.

name: jaime
line: So, what can we do?

name: jaime
line: If that's true, he'll never expose himself.

name: jaime
line: That would be something to see.

name: jaime
line: Mm.

name: jaime
line: It wasn't so simple. I was sleeping with my sister and you had one friend in the world who was sleeping with his sister.

name: jaime
line: Do you miss it?

name: jaime
line: Well, my golden-lion days are done, but whore-mongering is still an option for you.

name: jaime
line: Oh! My lady.

name: jaime
line: You really think any of us are going to sleep tonight? Join us.

name: jaime
line: I'm sure someone does.

name: jaime
line: Fabled loser of the Battle of Whispering Wood.

name: jaime
line: You don't need a king. Any knight can make another knight.

name: jaime
line: I'll prove it.

name: jaime
line: Kneel, Lady Brienne.

name: jaime
line: Do you want to be a knight or not? Kneel.

name: jaime
line: In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.

name: jaime
line: In the name of the Father, I charge you to be just.

name: jaime
line: In the name of the Mother, I charge you to defend the innocent.

name: jaime
line: Arise, Brienne of Tarth a knight of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jaime
line: We'd better get some rest.

name: jaime
line: We fought dead things and lived to talk about it. If this isn't the time to drink, when is?

name: jaime
line: (to BRIENNE) Um You are an only child.

name: jaime
line: You didn't.

name: jaime
line: I surmised it.

name: jaime
line: You have danced with Renly Baratheon.

name: jaime
line: Drink.

name: jaime
line: Drink.

name: jaime
line: That's a statement about the present.

name: jaime
line: You didn't drink.

name: jaime
line: In the game.

name: jaime
line: In the game. This is Dornish.

name: jaime
line: Suit yourself.

name: jaime
line: You keep it warm enough in here.

name: jaime
line: That's very diligent. Very responsible.

name: jaime
line: You know the first thing I learned in the North? I hate the fucking North.

name: jaime
line: I don't want things growing on me.

name: jaime
line: How about Tormund Giantsbane? Has he grown on you? He was very sad when you left.

name: jaime
line: (nods) I do, don't I? It's bloody hot in here.

name: jaime
line: I'm taking your shirt off.

name: jaime
line: I've never slept with a knight before.

name: jaime
line: Then you have to drink. Those are the rules.

name: jaime
line: She's sworn to protect the Stark girls, so... Say something snide.

name: jaime
line: To climbing mountains.

name: jaime
line: What? That's not your concern.

name: jaime
line: You're a dog.

name: jaime
line: What are you doing with that?

name: jaime
line: Power resides where men believe--

name: jaime
line: And you trust Cersei--

name: jaime
line: Highgarden? Are you mad?

name: jaime
line: He's not going to kill us. He wouldn't be talking to us if--

name: jaime
line: Highgarden will never belong to a cutthroat.

name: jaime
line: What happened?

name: jaime
line: Have you ever run away from a fight?

name: jaime
line: You think I'm a good man? I pushed a boy out a tower window, crippled him for life for Cersei. I strangled my cousin with my own hands just to get back to Cersei. I would have murdered every man, woman and child in Riverrun for Cersei.

name: jaime
line: She's hateful. And so am I.

name: jaime
line: Lady Stark. l'd offer you my sword, but l seem to have lost it.

name: jaime
line: l've lost them too, l'm afraid.

name: jaime
line: You look lovely tonight, Lady Stark. Widowhood becomes you. (Catelyn grabs a large rock from the ground)  Your bed must be lonely. ls that why you came? l'm not at my best, but l think l could be of service. You slip out of that gown and we'll see if l'm up to it. (She marches towards him and hits the rock against his forehead)   Oh, l do like a violent woman.

name: jaime
line: Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.

name: jaime
line: But l don't, my lady. The dark is coming for all of us. Why cry about it?

name: jaime
line: What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?

name: jaime
line: There are no men like me. Only me.

name: jaime
line: l pushed him out the window.

name: jaime
line: I hoped the fall would kill him.

name: jaime
line: You should get some sleep. lt's going to be a long war. (Catelyn drops the rock and goes away)

name: jaime
line: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

name: jaime
line: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

name: jaime
line: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

name: jaime
line: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.

name: jaime
line: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.

name: jaime
line: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

name: jaime
line: Calm down.

name: jaime
line: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

name: jaime
line: Then what are you raving about?

name: jaime
line: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

name: jaime
line: Never.

name: jaime
line: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

name: jaime
line: One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

name: jaime
line: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.

name: jaime
line: I cut his head off, so no.

name: jaime
line: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

name: jaime
line: Little brother.

name: jaime
line: Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

name: jaime
line: Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.

name: jaime
line: My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.

name: jaime
line: A sword for the wall?

name: jaime
line: Good man. Have you swung it yet?

name: jaime
line: At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.

name: jaime
line: Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?

name: jaime
line: Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.

name: jaime
line: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We’re Lannisters. Lannisters don’t act like fools.

name: jaime
line: But who would he tell?

name: jaime
line: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn’t know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he’s off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

name: jaime
line: That’s an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

name: jaime
line: Don’t get up.

name: jaime
line: You’ve much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.

name: jaime
line: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don’t leave me alone with these people.

name: jaime
line: I thought you might say that. But since we’re short on time, (he opens the door; a bevy of whores enter and descend on TYRION) Come on, girls. See you at sundown.

name: jaime
line: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it’s true.

name: jaime
line: I’m sure we’ll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.

name: jaime
line: No? Getting a little old for it?

name: jaime
line: Well said.

name: jaime
line: Are you completely mad?

name: jaime
line: It’s all right. It’s all right.

name: jaime
line: I heard you the first time. (To BRAN) Quite the little climber, aren’t you? How old are you, boy?

name: jaime
line: Ten.

name: jaime
line: The things I do for love.

name: jaime
line: Such a small pack of wolves.

name: jaime
line: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

name: jaime
line: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

name: jaime
line: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

name: jaime
line: Come, Stark. I'd rather you die sword in hand.

name: jaime
line: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

name: jaime
line: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

name: jaime
line: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

name: jaime
line: Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.

name: jaime
line: He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.

name: jaime
line: Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?

name: jaime
line: Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.

name: jaime
line: That's where you got your scar?

name: jaime
line: Vicious sons of whores.

name: jaime
line: They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?

name: jaime
line: I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.

name: jaime
line: I doubt it.

name: jaime
line: I don't serve Lord Stark.

name: jaime
line: "Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane, the Mountain"

name: jaime
line: Catelyn Stark took my brother.

name: jaime
line: Tyrion?

name: jaime
line: One of our men interfered, speared him through the leg before I could finish him.

name: jaime
line: It wouldn't have been clean.

name: jaime
line: I could care less what anyone thinks of me.

name: jaime
line: It's the truth.

name: jaime
line: Of course it bothers me.

name: jaime
line: I didn't realize you placed such a high value on my brother's life.

name: jaime
line: So the lion does concern himself with the opinions of..

name: jaime
line: I never thought you’d find her. I just assumed Sansa was dead.

name: jaime
line: In my experience, girls like her don’t live very long.

name: jaime
line: Well, I’m proud of you. I am. You fulfilled your oath to Catelyn Stark against all odds.

name: jaime
line: Of course my sister wants Sansa dead. The girl is still a suspect in Joffrey’s murder, so there is that complication. What the hell are you doing here?

name: jaime
line: You’re welcome to have him.

name: jaime
line: With what army does she plan on taking Winterfell?

name: jaime
line: They’re a bit occupied at the moment. I was sent here to reclaim Riverrun currently defended by the Tully rebels, so you can see the conundrum.

name: jaime
line: Riverrun was granted to the Freys by royal decree.

name: jaime
line: Exactly.

name: jaime
line: We shouldn’t argue about politics.

name: jaime
line: I’m a Lannister. Don’t ask me to betray my own house.

name: jaime
line: What do you propose?

name: jaime
line: Why would he abandon his ancestral home?

name: jaime
line: Have you ever met the Blackfish?

name: jaime
line: He’s even more stubborn than you are.

name: jaime
line: All right. Try to talk some sense into the old goat. He won’t listen, but his men might. Not everybody wants to die for someone else’s home.

name: jaime
line: You have my word. You have until nightfall.

name: jaime
line: It’s yours. It will always be yours.

name: jaime
line: Yes, Lady Brienne?

name: jaime
line: Of course it does.

name: jaime
line: Let’s hope it doesn’t come to that.

name: jaime
line: Lord Edmure.

name: jaime
line: I apologize for the way the Freys treated you. A man of your birth deserved better. You have my word you’ll be properly fed and clothes from now on.

name: jaime
line: The Blackfish is an old man. A good death is all he can hope for. But you, you have a child now, I’ve heard. A son you sired on your wedding night. You’re a potent man.

name: jaime
line: You should be with them both. I can arrange that, you realize? Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock. A tutor for your boy, knights to train him to fight and to ride. And when he comes of age, he’ll have a keep of his own.

name: jaime
line: I’ll remind you that our houses are at war. I’m sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.

name: jaime
line: Did I give you the impression that this was a negotiation? It’s not.

name: jaime
line: I’ll leave the judgments to the gods.

name: jaime
line: I was your sister’s prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.

name: jaime
line: Perhaps, but she didn’t. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn’t hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.

name: jaime
line: No, I don’t, but I’m telling you anyway because you’re my prisoner. You don’t have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.

name: jaime
line: I’ll talk about whomever I want.

name: jaime
line: She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there’s a fierceness you don’t often see.

name: jaime
line: They’d do anything to protect their babies.

name: jaime
line: Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.

name: jaime
line: That’s exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn’t matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I’ll send for your baby boy.

name: jaime
line: And I’ll launch him into Riverrun with a catapult. Because you don’t matter to me, Lord Edmure. Your son doesn’t matter to me. The people in the castle don’t matter to me. Only Cersei. And if I have to slaughter every Tully who ever lived to get back to her, that’s what I’ll do.

name: jaime
line: Good. Bring him to me.

name: jaime
line: You’re welcome to her.

name: jaime
line: Those two have their eyes on you.

name: jaime
line: Not my type.

name: jaime
line: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

name: jaime
line: There you go.

name: jaime
line: I’m sure he would be.

name: jaime
line: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

name: jaime
line: No, but back in your day.

name: jaime
line: Yes, you’re a great conqueror.

name: jaime
line: They don’t fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

name: jaime
line: Come on.

name: jaime
line: What did you do to him exactly? I haven't been able to get a clear answer.

name: jaime
line: Does he understand what we’re saying? I mean, to the extent that he ever understood complete sentences in the first place.

name: jaime
line: So tell him to march into the sept and crush the High Sparrow’s head like a melon.

name: jaime
line: Has the Faith leveled official charges yet?

name: jaime
line: That is one trial by combat I look forward to watching.

name: jaime
line: I’m Lord Commander of the Kingsguard. The Lord Commander of the Kingsguard does have a position on the Small Council.

name: jaime
line: The same women who murdered Myrcella have overthrown House Martell and taken control of Dorne. We've got a lot to discuss. All of us together.

name: jaime
line: Almost.

name: jaime
line: Your mother wouldn’t do that.

name: jaime
line: Are you angry with her?

name: jaime
line: Then why didn’t you let her come? She has every right to be here.

name: jaime
line: They’re not putting your mother in a cell ever again. Not while I’m here. Why haven’t you gone to see her? Everything she endured, she did it for you.

name: jaime
line: Why not?

name: jaime
line: We all fail sometimes.

name: jaime
line: Go and see your mother and ask her to forgive you.

name: jaime
line: Go and see your mother, Tommen.

name: jaime
line: You’re a bold man.

name: jaime
line: You must long for the next life.

name: jaime
line: You imprisoned and humiliated my sister.

name: jaime
line: What about my sins?

name: jaime
line: I broke a sacred oath and stabbed my king in the back. I killed my own cousin. When the gods judged my brother guilty, I helped him escape their justice. What atonement do I deserve?

name: jaime
line: Oh, the gods won’t mind. They’ve spilled more blood than the rest of us combined.

name: jaime
line: They should be closer if you mean for them to save you.

name: jaime
line: I’ve fought against worse odds.

name: jaime
line: Mother.

name: jaime
line: Shh, shh. Don’t think about it.

name: jaime
line: She’s not suffering. She’s gone. No one can hurt her anymore.

name: jaime
line: I know.

name: jaime
line: You don’t believe that.

name: jaime
line: Fuck prophecy. Fuck fate. Fuck everyone who isn’t us. We’re the only ones who matter, the only ones in this world. And everything they’ve taken from us, we’re going to take back and more.

name: jaime
line: We’re going to take everything there is.

name: jaime
line: Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king’s ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

name: jaime
line: You’ve got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery’s humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

name: jaime
line: You’ll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

name: jaime
line: The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything. When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen’s side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

name: jaime
line: My lord.

name: jaime
line: Sorry to interrupt. We’re here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we’ll be on our way.

name: jaime
line: I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

name: jaime
line: You already insulted one great house. It won’t happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.

name: jaime
line: I’ve been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don’t have to do this. You don’t have to do anything.

name: jaime
line: Not when you’re sitting in that chair.

name: jaime
line: Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods’ mercy?

name: jaime
line: I’m being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can’t manage it on his own because he’s 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

name: jaime
line: I’m not going to the Riverlands.

name: jaime
line: I’m going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone’s ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I’ll take them to the sept and I’ll remove the High Sparrow’s head and every other sparrow head I can find.

name: jaime
line: He has our son! He stole our son! He’s torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?

name: jaime
line: You’ll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.

name: jaime
line: Someone certainly does.

name: jaime
line: You’re an anointed knight. There’s quite a difference.

name: jaime
line: You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.

name: jaime
line: I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.

name: jaime
line: Lothar, is it?

name: jaime
line: ‘Cause you didn’t set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.

name: jaime
line: Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.

name: jaime
line: Only a fool makes threats he’s not prepared to carry out. Now let’s say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I’d do?

name: jaime
line: I’m here by the king’s command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you’d like to take his place.

name: jaime
line: The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he’ll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.

name: jaime
line: As I said, the siege is under my command. If that’s not to your liking, go home.

name: jaime
line: Get word to the Blackfish. I want a parley.

name: jaime
line: He’s an old man.

name: jaime
line: Blackfish.

name: jaime
line: I don’t have them.

name: jaime
line: It won’t stop with Edmure. You’ll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.

name: jaime
line: We’ll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I’ll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.

name: jaime
line: The war is over, ser. Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?

name: jaime
line: You clearly have no intention of saving your men’s lives. Why did you come to treat with me?

name: jaime
line: Well, now you have.

name: jaqen
line: And?

name: jaqen
line: Perhaps that’s why the man is thin.

name: jaqen
line: Tomorrow.

name: jaqen
line: A girl has work to do.

name: jaqen
line: Lana is very impressive. Very industrious. She will make a fine servant for the Many Faced God.

name: jaqen
line: She will no longer turn left onto Ragman Lane. She will turn right and go to Ragman Harbor.

name: jaqen
line: She will see.

name: jaqen
line: How can a man tell a girl this. If he knew what she would see, there would be no reason to send her.

name: jaqen
line: The man is a gambler. He wages that his sailor's ship will make it to its destination. It is a strange wager for the captain. He only wins if he loses his life.

name: jaqen
line: A girl tells a man that she has seen.

name: jaqen
line: But perhaps the gambler loses his bet and decides that he doesn’t have to pay after all. A destitute woman and her small child, what can they do to such a man if he keeps their money for himself? To whom can they turn for recourse?

name: jaqen
line: A man had no idea what she would see and what she would not. A girl named Lana will return to the docks. She will watch the gambler. She will come to know as much about him as she knows about herself.

name: jaqen
line: A gift for the Thin Man.

name: jaqen
line: Perhaps she is, perhaps she’s not.

name: jaqen
line: It is all the same to the Many Faced God.

name: jaqen
line: A girl has taken a life. The wrong life.

name: jaqen
line: You were.

name: jaqen
line: That man’s life wasn’t yours to take. A girl stole from the Many Faced God. Now a debt is owed.

name: jaqen
line: Only death can pay for life.

name: jaqen
line: He was no one.

name: jaqen
line: No one at all. Just as a girl should have been before she took a face from the hall.

name: jaqen
line: The faces are for no one.

name: jaqen
line: You are still someone.

name: jaqen
line: And to someone…

name: jaqen
line: ...the faces are as good as poison.

name: jaqen
line: Valar dohaeris.

name: jaqen
line: Good.

name: jaqen
line: No? Why come, then?

name: jaqen
line: A man teaches a girl. (Stands up). Valar dohaeris. All men must serve. Faceless men, most of all. (Walks away).

name: jaqen
line: A girl wants to serve herself. Here we serve the Many-Faced God, to serve well. A girl must become no-one.

name: jaqen
line: There is only one god. A girl knows his name. And all men know his gift.

name: jaqen
line: What are you doing?

name: jaqen
line: A girl is not ready.

name: jaqen
line: For what? For whatever you want. To be a Faceless Man. To be no one.

name: jaqen
line: Whose sword is that? It belongs to Arya Stark. Arya Stark's sword, Arya Stark's clothes, Arya Stark's stolen silver. A man wonders how is it that no one came to be surrounded by Arya Stark's things?

name: jaqen
line: There isn't. A man is not Jaqen H'ghar.

name: jaqen
line: No one. And that is who a girl must become.

name: jaqen
line: Who are you?

name: jaqen
line: Who are you?

name: jaqen
line: And where did you come from?

name: jaqen
line: A lie.

name: jaqen
line: A lie.

name: jaqen
line: A lie.

name: jaqen
line: The girl lies. To me. To the Many Faced God. To herself. Does she truly want to be no one?

name: jaqen
line: We never stop playing.

name: jaqen
line: Is the girl ready to give up her ears, her nose, her tongue, her hopes and dreams, her loves and hates, all that makes a girl who she is, forever?

name: jaqen
line: No. The girl is not ready to become no one. But she is ready to become someone else.

name: jaqen
line: A man has patrol duty.

name: jaqen
line: A girl owes one more name. The Red God demands it. Give the man a name.

name: jaqen
line: A minute, an hour, a month. Death is certain, the time is not.

name: jaqen
line: This a man cannot do.

name: jaqen
line: Help was not promised, lovely girl. Only death. There must be others. Give a name, any name.

name: jaqen
line: By the Seven New Gods and the Old Gods beyond counting, I swear it.

name: jaqen
line: A girl gives a man his own name?

name: jaqen
line: Gods are not mocked. This is no joking thing.

name: jaqen
line: Un-name me.

name: jaqen
line: Please?

name: jaqen
line: Thank you.

name: jaqen
line: This would require more than one life. This is not part of our bargain.

name: jaqen
line: A girl lacks honor. If I do this thing, a girl must obey.

name: jaqen
line: A girl and her friends will walk through the gate at midnight.

name: jaqen
line: Waiting for you.

name: jaqen
line: After all the things you have seen, this is your question?

name: jaqen
line: No harder than taking a new name, if you know the way. Show me how. I want to be able to do it, too.

name: jaqen
line: If you would learn, you must come with me.

name: jaqen
line: Far and away across the Narrow Sea to Braavos.

name: jaqen
line: To be a dancing master is a special thing, but to be a faceless man, that is something else entirely. The girl has many names on her lips. Joffrey, Cersei, Tywin Lannister, llyn Payne, the Hound. Names to offer up to the Red God. She could offer them all one by one.

name: jaqen
line: Then we must part. A man has duties as well. Here.

name: jaqen
line: A coin of great value.

name: jaqen
line: It is not meant for the buying of horses.

name: jaqen
line: If the day comes when you must find me again, just give that coin to any man from Braavos and say these words to him, "Valar Morghulis."

name: jaqen
line: Jaqen is dead. Say it again. Valar Morghulis.

name: jaqen
line: Good.

name: jaqen
line: Farewell, Arya Stark.

name: jaqen
line: Come back here! Help us, boy! A man can fight! Free us!

name: jaqen
line: Quick, give it to me. Give me the ax. Give me that.

name: jaqen
line: (Whispers) Boy.

name: jaqen
line: (Whispers) Lovely boy.

name: jaqen
line: A man has a thirst. The man does not drink for a day and a night. A boy could make a friend.

name: jaqen
line: A man does not choose his companions. These two, they have no courtesy. A man must ask forgiveness. (Pause). You're called Arry. (Arya nods).  This man has the honor to be Jaqen H'ghar. Once of the Free City of Lorath.

name: jaqen
line: (Quietly) The boy has more courage than sense.

name: jaqen
line: A girl says nothing.

name: jaqen
line: A girl keeps her mouth closed. No one hears, and friends may talk in secret, yes? A boy becomes a girl.

name: jaqen
line: And I was always aware. But the girl keeps secrets. It is not for a man to spoil them.

name: jaqen
line: And you fetch water for one of them now. Why is this right for you and wrong for me?

name: jaqen
line: You did. I did. And here we are.

name: jaqen
line: A man pays his debts. A man owes three.

name: jaqen
line: The Red God takes what is his, lovely girl. And only death may pay for life. You saved me and the two I was with. You stole three deaths from the Red God. We have to give them back. Speak three names and the man will do the rest. Three lives I will give you, no more, no less, and we're done.

name: jaqen
line: A man has said.

name: jaqen
line: A man needs a name.

name: jaqen
line: That is enough. Go now, girl. Your master is thirsty.

name: jaqen
line: A girl has named a second name. A man will do what must be done.

name: jaqen
line: A girl cannot tell a man when exactly he must do a thing. A man cannot make a thing happen before its time.

name: jaqen
line: (sighs)

name: jaqen
line: Yes. But here you are. And there she is.

name: jaqen
line: Finally a girl is no one.

name: jaqen
line: If a girl tells me her name, I will give her eyes back.

name: jaqen
line: Come.

name: jaqen
line: If a girl is truly no one, she has nothing to fear.

name: jaqen
line: Who are you?

name: jaqen
line: Who are you?

name: jaqen
line: If a girl says her name, a man will let her sleep under a roof tonight.

name: jaqen
line: If a girl says her name, a man will feed her tonight.

name: jaqen
line: If a girl says her name, a man will give her eyes back.

name: jaqen
line: Come.

name: jaqen
line: Leave it. A girl is not a beggar anymore.

name: jaqen
line: She has a point.

name: jaqen
line: None of the first Faceless Men were born to lords and ladies. They began as slaves in the mines of Valyria.

name: jaqen
line: He was no one. The Many-Faced God taught him how to shed his face and how to give the gift. The man taught others in exchange for their service. Many served, many more gifts were given. Soon all the masters and overseers were gone and the Faceless Men fled.

name: jaqen
line: Here. They founded the Free City of Braavos and built this house. These were the faces they wore in life when they were not wearing others. The first Faceless Men. And now a girl is one of them, if a girl desires.

name: jaqen
line: An actress who calls herself Lady Crane. She performs at the theater in Sheelba Square. A girl has been given a second chance. There will not be a third. One way or another, a face will be added to the hall.

name: jaqen
line: A girl is not ready.

name: jaqen
line: So a man has heard.

name: jaqen
line: Does death only come for the wicked and leave the decent behind?

name: jaqen
line: That does not matter. The price was paid.

name: jaqen
line: A girl must decide if she wants to serve the Many-Faced God.

name: jaqen
line: A servant does not ask questions.

name: jaqen
line: And?

name: jaqen
line: A shame. A girl had many gifts.

name: jaqen
line: Don’t let her suffer.

name: tywin
line: You seem rather drunk.

name: tywin
line: This isn't about your wedding. Renly Baratheon had a wedding. Your wife needs a child, a Lannister child, as soon as possible.

name: tywin
line: If you're going to give her one, you need to perform.

name: tywin
line: More than once.

name: tywin
line: You can drink, you can joke, you can engage in juvenile attempts to make your father uncomfortable, but you will do your duty.

name: tywin
line: I believe we can dispense with the bedding, Your Grace. I'm sure Tyrion did not mean to threaten the king.

name: tywin
line: Your uncle is clearly quite drunk, Your Grace.

name: tywin
line: Any man who must say, 'I am the king' is no true king. I'll make sure you understand that when I've won your war for you.

name: tywin
line: The king is tired. See him to his chambers.

name: tywin
line: Grand Maester, perhaps some essence of nightshade to help him sleep.

name: tywin
line: Not you.

name: tywin
line: You're a fool if you believe he's the most powerful man in Westeros.

name: tywin
line: You really think a crown gives you power?

name: tywin
line: Mm-hmm.

name: tywin
line: Mm-hmm.

name: tywin
line: Which he got from me. Do you disapprove?

name: tywin
line: But to slaughter them at a wedding. Explain to me why it is more noble to kill 10,000 men in battle than a dozen at dinner.

name: tywin
line: To end the war. To protect the family. Do you want to write a song for the dead Starks? Go ahead, write one. I'm in this world a little while longer to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.

name: tywin
line: Good. Let them remember what happens when they march on the south. All the Stark men are dead. Winterfell is a ruin. Roose Bolton will be named Warden of the North until your son by Sansa comes of age.

name: tywin
line: I believe you still have some work to do on that score.

name: tywin
line: One way or another, you will get that girl pregnant.

name: tywin
line: Shall I explain to you in one easy lesson how the world works?

name: tywin
line: The house that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of its sons and daughters first. A good man does everything in his power to better his family's position regardless of his own selfish desires.

name: tywin
line: Does that amuse you?

name: tywin
line: Easy for me, is it?

name: tywin
line: The day that you were born. I wanted to carry you into the sea and let the waves wash you away. Instead, I let you live. And I brought you as my son. Because you're a Lannister.

name: tywin
line: What news of Jaime?

name: tywin
line: 20,000 unwashed northerns have known about his escape for weeks. Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined. Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?

name: tywin
line: Try harder. What do we have, then?

name: tywin
line: Well, let him have it. The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble. The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.

name: tywin
line: You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold. Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.

name: tywin
line: Fully agreed. Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.

name: tywin
line: It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.

name: tywin
line: Am I enjoying it?

name: tywin
line: ( chuckles ) Yes. I heard how happy you were. ( blows ) You brought a whore into my bed.

name: tywin
line: I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.

name: tywin
line: What do you want, Tyrion?

name: tywin
line: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

name: tywin
line: Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.

name: tywin
line: You want Casterly Rock?

name: tywin
line: ( sighs ) We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

name: tywin
line: Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.

name: tywin
line: Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed I'll hang.

name: tywin
line: You're late.

name: tywin
line: Our business concerns her, too. Sit.

name: tywin
line: Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.

name: tywin
line: Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.

name: tywin
line: Your jokes are not appreciated.

name: tywin
line: I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.

name: tywin
line: The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.

name: tywin
line: There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.

name: tywin
line: We find Sansa Stark a different husband.

name: tywin
line: I can and I do.

name: tywin
line: There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.

name: tywin
line: You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.

name: tywin
line: Only too well.

name: tywin
line: Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.

name: tywin
line: You'll marry Ser Loras.

name: tywin
line: The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.

name: tywin
line: Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.

name: tywin
line: You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.

name: tywin
line: Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.

name: tywin
line: You wanted to speak to me?

name: tywin
line: What about him?

name: tywin
line: When Catelyn Stark took Tyrion prisoner what did I do in response?

name: tywin
line: And if I would start a war for that lecherous little stump, what do you think I am doing for my oldest son and heir?

name: tywin
line: Whatever I can.

name: tywin
line: You're still here.

name: tywin
line: Why?

name: tywin
line: All right. Contribute.

name: tywin
line: The Tyrells helped us defeat Stannis Baratheon. The Tyrells saved your life, your children's lives.

name: tywin
line: Good. I wish you knew how to manipulate him. I don't distrust you because you're a woman. I distrust you because you're not as smart as you think you are. You've allowed that boy to ride roughshod over you and everyone else in this city.

name: tywin
line: I will.

name: tywin
line: Why?

name: tywin
line: Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.

name: tywin
line: Old?

name: tywin
line: The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?

name: tywin
line: And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.

name: tywin
line: Of course.

name: tywin
line: No.

name: tywin
line: Never.

name: tywin
line: Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.

name: tywin
line: I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.

name: tywin
line: I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.

name: tywin
line: Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.

name: tywin
line: The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.

name: tywin
line: If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.

name: tywin
line: The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.

name: tywin
line: I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?

name: tywin
line: Your Grace.

name: tywin
line: You wanted to speak to me?

name: tywin
line: You're welcome to attend the meetings of your small council, Your Grace. Any or all of them.

name: tywin
line: Of course.

name: tywin
line: I have, yes.

name: tywin
line: The Tower of the Hand is where I work. To walk from there to here would take time, time I could otherwise spend productively.

name: tywin
line: We could arrange to have you carried.

name: tywin
line: Where did you hear about this?

name: tywin
line: Apparently so.

name: tywin
line: When I was Hand of the King under your father's predecessor, the skulls of all the Targaryen dragons were kept in this room. The skull of the last of them was right here. It was the size of an apple.

name: tywin
line: Yes, and the creature to whom it belonged died 300 years ago. Curiosities on the far side of the world are no threat to us.

name: tywin
line: Because we have been told as much by the many experts who serve the realm by counseling the king on matters about which he knows nothing.

name: tywin
line: You are being counseled at this very moment.

name: tywin
line: From now on, I will see to it that you are appropriately consulted on important matters whenever necessary. Your Grace.

name: tywin
line: Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.

name: tywin
line: You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.

name: tywin
line: Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.

name: tywin
line: When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-

name: tywin
line: Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?

name: tywin
line: No.

name: tywin
line: And how will you do that?

name: tywin
line: And what truth would that be?

name: tywin
line: Known what?

name: tywin
line: No, no, no, no, no.

name: tywin
line: I don't believe you.

name: tywin
line: Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we’ll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…

name: tywin
line: Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what’s yours. I’d never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I’d never let Illyn Payne take your head. You’re a Lannister. You’re my son.

name: tywin
line: Who?

name: tywin
line: Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

name: tywin
line: It doesn’t matter.

name: tywin
line: She was a whore!

name: tywin
line: And what? You’ll kill your own father in the privy? No. You’re my son. Enough of this nonsense…

name: tywin
line: Enough. We’ll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

name: tywin
line: What, are you afraid of a dead whore?

name: tywin
line: You shot me. You’re no son of mine.

name: tywin
line: Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.

name: tywin
line: No one leaves the capital! No one!

name: tywin
line: Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?

name: tywin
line: I'm not trying to trick you.

name: tywin
line: Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?

name: tywin
line: Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?

name: tywin
line: Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.

name: tywin
line: Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?

name: tywin
line: No.

name: tywin
line: Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?

name: tywin
line: Yes!

name: tywin
line: Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?

name: tywin
line: No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?

name: tywin
line: Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?

name: tywin
line: Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?

name: tywin
line: Prince Oberyn.

name: tywin
line: May we have the room?

name: tywin
line: No, thank you.

name: tywin
line: No, thank you.

name: tywin
line: Are you?

name: tywin
line: Which way is that?

name: tywin
line: Some believe the king choked.

name: tywin
line: I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.

name: tywin
line: Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.

name: tywin
line: You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?

name: tywin
line: What did you discuss?

name: tywin
line: For which you blame me.

name: tywin
line: Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?

name: tywin
line: Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.

name: tywin
line: Categorically.

name: tywin
line: I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.

name: tywin
line: I could arrange for this meeting.

name: tywin
line: There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.

name: tywin
line: Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.

name: tywin
line: I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.

name: tywin
line: We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.

name: tywin
line: We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.

name: tywin
line: Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.

name: tywin
line: One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital, Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.

name: tywin
line: Bit much, wouldn't you say?

name: tywin
line: Proportionate to what?

name: tywin
line: People who spend their money on this sort of nonsense tend not to have it for long.

name: tywin
line: Shall we stick golden roses in half the meat pies to commemorate your generosity?

name: tywin
line: I'm not worried about the Iron Bank.

name: tywin
line: You're in rather a good mood.

name: tywin
line: I won't ask why.

name: tywin
line: Prince Oberyn.

name: tywin
line: Charmed.

name: tywin
line: Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.

name: tywin
line: Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.

name: tywin
line: Mm-hmm.

name: tywin
line: It is.

name: tywin
line: There are three living smiths who know how to rework Valyrian steel. The finest of them was in Volantis. Came here to King's Landing at my invitation.

name: tywin
line: From someone who no longer had need of it.

name: tywin
line: And now we have two.

name: tywin
line: The original weapon was absurdly large. Plenty of steel for two swords.

name: tywin
line: You'll have to train your left hand.

name: tywin
line: You'll never be as good.

name: tywin
line: You can't serve in the Kingsguard with one hand.

name: tywin
line: The war is over. The king is safe. The king is never safe.

name: tywin
line: Other knights protected the king while you were a prisoner. They will continue to do so when you go home.

name: tywin
line: You'll return to Casterly Rock and rule in my stead.

name: tywin
line: I am the King's Hand. My place is here. I don't expect to see the Rock again before I die.

name: tywin
line: You won't be breaking anything. There is a precedent to relieve a Kingsguard of his duties. The king will exercise that prerogative.

name: tywin
line: No?

name: tywin
line: I don't believe I asked you a question.

name: tywin
line: If you think your bloody honor comes before...

name: tywin
line: What do you want?

name: tywin
line: For 40 years I've tried to teach you. If you haven't learned by now, you never will. Go. If serving as a glorified bodyguard is the sum of your ambition, go serve.

name: tywin
line: Keep it.

name: tywin
line: A one-handed man with no family needs all the help he can get.

name: tywin
line: When will the wedding take place in your mind?

name: tywin
line: A fortnight?

name: tywin
line: No jugglers, no jousting dwarves, no 77-course meals.

name: tywin
line: And your wedding to Loras?

name: tywin
line: Shortly?

name: tywin
line: I know you don't like them. I didn't like your husband. Used to pat me on the back a lot. I didn't trust him.

name: tywin
line: You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.

name: tywin
line: Ourselves alone.

name: tywin
line: The Tyrells are our only true rivals in terms of resources and we need them on our side.

name: tywin
line: Robert had me funding him. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.

name: tywin
line: Do you know how much gold was mined in the Westerlands this past year?

name: tywin
line: Go on, your best guess.

name: tywin
line: Doesn't matter. The answer is the same.

name: tywin
line: Our last working mine ran dry three years ago.

name: tywin
line: The crown owes the Iron Bank of Braavos a tremendous amount of money.

name: tywin
line: A tremendous amount.

name: tywin
line: The Iron Bank is the Iron Bank. There is no someone.

name: tywin
line: And a temple is comprised of stones. One stone crumbles and another takes its place. And the temple holds its form for 1,000 years or more. That's what the Iron Bank is... a temple. We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it. You can't run from them. You can't cheat them. You can't sway them with excuses. If you owe them money and you don't want to crumble yourself, you pay it back. Vesting the Tyrells in the crown will help a great deal in this respect.

name: tywin
line: I know you're building a strong case against Tyrion. And as a mother, that is your right. But as a judge, I cannot discuss the trial with you.

name: tywin
line: The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?

name: tywin
line: What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?

name: tywin
line: Make it 100. What else?

name: tywin
line: The Targaryen girl?

name: tywin
line: Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.

name: tywin
line: Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.

name: tywin
line: Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?

name: tywin
line: Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.

name: tywin
line: Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?

name: tywin
line: Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?

name: tywin
line: How would you say he died, then?

name: tywin
line: So you would blame the bakers?

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.

line: Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?

name: tywin
line: Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?

name: tywin
line: Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.

name: tywin
line: One.

name: tywin
line: We will adjourn for now.

name: tywin
line: Toll the bells in an hour's time.

name: tywin
line: I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.

name: tywin
line: I know nothing of the sort.

name: tywin
line: He killed his king.

name: tywin
line: It won't be murder. It'll be justice.

name: tywin
line: I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.

name: tywin
line: No, he'll be punished accordingly.

name: tywin
line: I'm well aware of your oath.

name: tywin
line: What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?

name: tywin
line: Done.

name: tywin
line: When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.

name: tywin
line: And you have mine.

name: tywin
line: The crown may call its next witness.

name: tywin
line: State your name.

name: tywin
line: Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?

name: tywin
line: Do you know this man?

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?

name: tywin
line: Silence! Continue.

name: tywin
line: How did you come to be in his service?

name: tywin
line: Silence. Silence!

name: tywin
line: You wish to confess?

name: tywin
line: Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?

name: tywin
line: You admit you poisoned the king?

name: tywin
line: You are not on trial for being a dwarf.

name: tywin
line: Have you nothing to say in your defense?

name: tywin
line: Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.

name: tywin
line: The battle is over. We have won.

name: tywin
line: Surrender the Iron Throne?

name: tywin
line: No, a king who runs will not be king for long. He's a Lannister. He'll stand and fight. Stannis, two days from the capital and the wolf at my doorstep.

name: tywin
line: Ha! The last time the scouts assured us of Stark's movement, he lured us into a trap. Which is why my son is his prisoner.

name: tywin
line: He's a boy and he's never lost a battle. He'll risk anything at any time because he doesn't know enough to be afraid.

name: tywin
line: We'll ride at nightfall. I want a full night's march before he knows we're on the move. Clegane, you'll maintain a garrison here at Harrenhal. Track down this brotherhood and destroy them. The girl has proven herself a good servant. She'll stay on with you. See that he doesn't get drunk in the evenings. He's poor company when he's sober, but he's better at his work.

name: tywin
line: Thank you, Your Grace.

name: tywin
line: The Starks understand winter better than we ever will. The cold won't beat them.

name: tywin
line: And I'm sure if those same spies snuck into our own encampments, they would report growing discontent amongst the Southern lords. This is war, no one's content. We've underestimated the Stark boy for too long. He has a good mind for warfare, his men worship him. And as long as he keeps winning battles, they'll keep believing he is King in the North. You've been waiting for him to fail. He is not going to fail, not without our help. So how do we stop him?

name: tywin
line: Yes, I think you would, Reginald. And because you're my cousin, I might even let you wake from that sleep. Go, I'm sure your wife must miss you.

name: tywin
line: Well, then you'd better start riding. Go, before I change my mind and send her your head.

name: tywin
line: If your name wasn't Lannister, you'd be scrubbing out pots in the cook's tent. Go!

name: tywin
line: Not wine, water. We'll be here for some time. Girl, where are you from?

line: And who are the Lords of Maidenpool? Remind me.

line: And what is their sigil?

name: tywin
line: A red salmon. I think a Maidenpool girl would remember that. You're a Northerner, aren't you?

line: Good. One more time, where are you from?

line: He'll do no such thing. This one's a girl, you idiot, dressed as a boy. Why?

name: tywin
line: To the Starks of Winterfell! Who have 20,000 men and my son! I judged you might be good for something more than brutalizing peasants. I see I overestimated you. If you ever put my son's life at risk again, I'll Leave us.

name: tywin
line: Put the book away, girl. Maybe you should devise our next battle plan while you're about it.

line: Here. Men love to blame demons when their grand plans unravel.

name: tywin
line: You say that as if you were the first man alive to think it. Yes, a crisis is an opportunity. What other brilliant insights have you brought me today?

name: tywin
line: Hmm. I taught my son Jaime to read. The maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning. He couldn't make sense of the letters. He reversed them in his head. The maester said he'd heard tell of this affliction and that we simply must accept it. Ha! After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned. He hated me for it, for a time. For a long time. But he learned. Hmm. Where is your father? Is he alive? Who was he?

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: I did. I grew up with him. I watched him grow old.

name: tywin
line: He loved us. He was a good man, but a weak man. A weak man who nearly destroyed our house and name. I'm cold.

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.

name: tywin
line: I don't care if you hanged 100. A man tried to kill me. I want his name and I want his head.

name: tywin
line: Pretentious name for a band of outlaws. We can't allow rebels behind our lines to harass us with impunity. We look like fools and they look like heroes. That's how kings fall. I want them dead, every one.

name: tywin
line: Mmm. Is that mutton?

line: It's bad manners to refuse a lord's offer. Sit. Eat.

line: You're small for your age. I suppose you've been underfed your whole life.

name: tywin
line: Mmm. This will be my last war. Win or lose.

line: Do you think I'd be in my position if I had lost a war?

name: tywin
line: But this is the one I'll be remembered for. The War of Five Kings, they're calling it. My legacy will be determined in the coming months.

name: tywin
line: Do you know what legacy means? It's what you pass down to your children and your children's children. It's what remains of you when you're gone. Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy. The greatest fortress ever built.

name: tywin
line: Yes. Dragons happened.

name: tywin
line: Harrenhal was built to withstand an attack from the land. A million men could have marched on these walls, and a million men would have been repelled. But an attack from the air with dragon fire Mmm-mmm. Harren and all his sons roasted alive within these walls. Aegon Targaryen changed the rules. That's why every child alive still knows his name

name: tywin
line: Mmm?

name: tywin
line: Correct. A student of history, are you?

name: tywin
line: He was a well-read stonemason. Can't say I've ever met a literate stonemason.

name: tywin
line: Careful now, girl. I enjoy you, but be careful. Take that back to the kitchen. Eat what you want.

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: " Lowborn girls say "m'lord," not "my lord. " If you're going to pose as a commoner, you should do it properly.

name: tywin
line: You're too smart for your own good. Has anyone told you that?

line: The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: Is our hostage.

line: Robert Baratheon is dead.

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.

name: tywin
line: It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.

name: tywin
line: They have my son.

name: tywin
line: (shouting)  They have my son! Get out, all of you. (to Tyrion) Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.

name: tywin
line: No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from God's Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.

name: tywin
line: Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…

name: tywin
line: You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?

line: Attacking him was stupid.

name: tywin
line: Lannisters don't act like fools.

name: tywin

name: tywin

name: tywin
line: Why is he still alive?

line: You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.

line: When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn't it bother you?

line: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

name: tywin
line: He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.

name: tywin

line: Hmm.

line: You're going to fight that?

name: ellaria

line: Call my name if you need me, lover.

line: We are everywhere in Dorne. I have 10,000 brothers and sisters.

name: ellaria
line: A lie anywhere. Why not use the right words? I'm a bastard. She is a whore. And you're what? A procurer.

name: ellaria

name: ellaria
line: No wonder you can’t stand. You have no spine.

name: ellaria

name: ellaria
line: He didn’t try to make you pay?

name: ellaria
line: Then maybe he’s changed. The Queen will be thrilled to know you’ll be bringing her daughter home

name: ellaria
line: You love her very much, don’t you?

name: ellaria
line: I wasn’t talking about her.

name: ellaria
line: You think I disapprove. Why? Because people disapprove of that sort of thing where you are from? They disapproved of Oberyn and me where you are from. Here, no one blinked an eye. 100 years ago, no one would have blinked an eye at you if you had been named Targaryen.  It’s always changing, who we’re supposed to love and who we’re not.The only thing that stays the same is that we want who we want.

name: ellaria
line: I know your daughter had no part in the terrible thing that happened to the man I loved. Perhaps even you were innocent of that.

name: ellaria
line: Forgive me child. I wish you all the happiness in the world.

name: ellaria
line: Remove myself from my path, or I'll take that long axe and shove it--

name: ellaria
line: Your brother was murdered, and you sit here at the Water Gardens, staring at the sky and doing nothing.

name: ellaria
line: Your brother--

name: ellaria
line: What will you do about his death.

name: ellaria
line: You would have me go to war?

name: ellaria
line: The whole country would have you go to war.

name: ellaria
line: The Sand Snakes are with me. They have the love of their people. They will avenge your father while you sit here in your chair doing nothing.

name: ellaria
line: Oberyn is dead. And this Lannister girl skips about the Water Gardens eating our food, breathing our air. How many of your brothers and sisters do they have to kill?

name: ellaria
line: And how long will that be?

name: ellaria
line: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken. For Oberyn.

name: ellaria
line: It's called war.  You don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

name: ellaria
line: She was a Lannister.  There are no innocent Lannisters.  My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

name: ellaria
line: How can you drink this piss?  When we reach Sunspear I'll treat you to a Dornish red, the best in the world.  Have you ever been to Dorne?

name: ellaria
line: A boy in every port?

name: ellaria
line: Could we get some more?

name: ellaria
line: I'm developing a taste for it.

name: ellaria
line: So, you're going to be Queen of the Iron Islands.

name: ellaria
line: And what will you be, handsome?

name: ellaria
line: Oh, I see.  Your protector.

name: ellaria
line: So if someone gets too close to you --

line: Why are you standing all the way over there then?  A foreign invasion is under way.  It seems like you don't need a protector.

name: ellaria
line: Kill us!  Get it over with!

name: ellaria
line: You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna.

name: ellaria
line: The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell. They have declared war on Dorne. We must be allies now if we wish to survive.

name: ellaria
line: You’re absolutely right. I chose the wrong words. It is not survival I offer. It is your heart’s desire.

name: ellaria
line: Vengeance. Justice.

name: ellaria

name: ellaria
line: The gods are not fools. You would have been a lousy adventurer. And Oberyn, pfft, he would have been a terrible ruler.

name: ellaria
line: When was the last time you left this palace? You don’t know your own people. Their disgust for you. Elia Martell raped and murdered, and you did nothing. Oberyn martell butchered, and you did nothing. You’re not a Dornishman. You’re not our prince.

name: ellaria
line: Your son is weak just like you. And weak men will never rule Dorne again.

line: That half-handed cunt killed friends of mine. Friends twice your size.

name: tormund
line: Plenty of little men tried to put their swords through my heart. And there's plenty of little skeletons buried in the woods. What's your name, boy?

name: tormund

line: Don't panic, boy. This isn't the damned Night's Watch where we make you swear off girls.

line: Orell says there are crows patrolling on the Wall. Tell me what you know.

line: (sighs)  There are 19 castles guarding the Wall. How many are manned?

name: tormund
line: I like you, boy. But if you lie to me, I'll pull your guts out through your throat.

name: tormund

name: tormund
line: Used to be you couldn't find a tree within a mile of the Wall. Crows would come out every morning with axes.

name: tormund

line: Fuck justice, then. We’ll get revenge. Drink.

name: yara
line: Listen to me. If you’re so broken that there’s no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists. End it. But if you’re staying, Theon, I need you. We’re gonna sail to Meereen. We’re gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen. And we’re gonna take back the Iron Islands.

name: yara
line: Are you with me? Are you really with me?

name: yara
line: Now, since it’s my last night ashore for a long while, I’m gonna go fuck the tits off this one.

name: jon
line: He breeds them for the Watch.

name: jon
line: The Watch protects him.

name: jon
line: We just take the horses and go.  The old man’s no threat.

name: jon
line: The Watch might send a few men looking for a horse thief.  They’ll send a lot more to hunt down murderers.

name: jon
line: Ygritte!

name: jon
line: You were right the whole time.

name: jon
line: Ygritte, you know I didn't have a choice. You always knew who I was, what I am.

name: jon
line: I have to go home now. I know you won't hurt me.

name: jon
line: I do know some things. I know I love you.

name: jon
line: I know you love me. But I have to go home now.

name: jon
line: Pyp? Sam?

name: jon
line: It's only horses. No men.

name: jon
line: About 300.

name: jon
line: (Nods)

name: jon
line: Do you think anyone got away?

name: jon
line: Don't think too much, Bran.

name: jon
line: Relax your bow arm.

name: jon
line: Yes.

name: jon
line: I understand.

name: jon
line: You want to protect your people.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: What's wrong with him?

name: jon
line: (Nods)

name: jon
line: Mance was a ranger.

name: jon
line: When I'm free, will I be free to go?

name: jon
line: What happened to their fathers?

name: jon
line: My father told me big men fall just as quick as little ones if you put a sword through their hearts.

name: jon
line: Jon Snow.

name: jon
line: Your Grace.

name: jon
line: The Lord Commander sent me to the Halfhand for seasoning.

name: jon
line: He wants me to lead one day.

name: jon
line: If I'm a traitor, then you are, too.

name: jon
line: (Hesitates.) I want to be free.

name: jon
line: We stopped at Craster's Keep on the way north. I saw...

name: jon
line: I saw Craster take his own baby boy and leave it in the woods. I saw what took it.

name: jon
line: Because when I told the Lord Commander, he already knew. Thousands of years ago, the First Men battled the White Walkers and defeated them. I want to fight for the side that fights for the living. Did I come to the right place?

name: jon
line: It varies. If I knew where on the Wall we were heading, I could tell you.

name: jon
line: Three.

name: jon
line: (nods)

name: jon
line: Castle Black.

name: jon
line: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea and the Shadow Tower.

name: jon
line: What happens to your eagle after I kill you? Does he drift away like a kite with his strings cut or does he just flop dead to the ground?

name: jon
line: 1000 men

name: jon
line: I don't need you to protect me.

name: jon
line: Give it back.

name: jon
line: Ygritte! Ygritte!

name: jon
line: Ygritte! Seven hells. Ygritte!

name: jon
line: Ygritte.

name: jon
line: We shouldn't.

name: jon
line: I don't know. I just wanted to kiss you there is all.

name: jon
line: You seemed to like it.

name: jon
line: There's been no one else. Only you.

name: jon
line: I was a man of the Night's Watch. How about you? Were you a maid?

name: jon
line: Who was he?

name: jon
line: Yeah, thanks. I think I've heard enough. We'd best get back. Tormund--

name: jon
line: You ever climbed it before?

name: jon
line: Aren't you?

name: jon
line: You kill someone for them?

name: jon
line: Can we not talk about that here?

name: jon
line: Did I seem scared the other day?

name: jon
line: Only in the beginning.

name: jon
line: What secret?

name: jon
line: I won't.

name: jon
line: (screams)

name: jon
line: (grunts)

name: jon
line: (grunts)

name: jon
line: Take my hand!

name: jon
line: About a week, I think.

name: jon
line: When we went to Castle Black, we took the kingsroad.

name: jon
line: Most of the time, yes.

name: jon
line: They don't, really. It's a great honor to carry your house sigil.

name: jon
line: Usually it's the young boys banging the drums.

name: jon
line: They help the men march.

name: jon
line: No. No, you're just gonna light the biggest fire the North has ever seen to let them know you're coming.

name: jon
line: I know you cut me loose on the Wall.

name: jon
line: And are you gonna share it with me? The deep wisdom you found inside the head of a bird?

name: jon
line: You're gonna scare it off.

name: jon
line: It's too far away.

name: jon
line: It's a windmill.

name: jon
line: Just the men who used to live here.

name: jon
line: Winterfell has towers three times that size.

name: jon
line: If you're impressed by a windmill, you'd be swooning if you saw the Great Keep at Winterfell.

name: jon
line: Fainting.

name: jon
line: When a girl sees blood and collapses.

name: jon
line: Well not all girls are like you.

name: jon
line: I'd like to see you in a silk dress.

name: jon
line: So I could tear it off you.

name: jon
line: Maybe one day I'll take you to Winterfell.

name: jon
line: Ygritte. You won't win. I know your people are brave, no one denies that.

name: jon
line: Six times in the last thousand years, a King has attacked the kingdoms. Six times they failed.

name: jon
line: Every boy in the North knows it. We grow up learning it. Where the battles were fought, the names of the heroes, who died where. Six times you've invaded and six times you've failed. The seventh will be the same.

name: jon
line: You don't have the discipline. You don't have the training. Your army is no army. You don't know how to fight together.

name: jon
line: I do. I know it. If you attack the Wall, you'll die. All of you.

name: jon
line: Yes, first we'll live.

name: jon
line: She...she had red hair.

name: jon
line: Well what do you want me to say?

name: jon
line: So you and Gilly never-

name: jon
line: But if she had, you would've? You'd have broken your vows?

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: I don't think Ser Alliser cares much for interpretation.

name: jon
line: It's...there's this person, this whole other person. And you're wrapped up in them and they're wrapped up in you and...you...for a little...for a little while you're more than just you, you're...well I don't know, I'm not a bleedin' poet!

name: jon
line: And what did I get for it? An arrow six inches from my heart.

name: jon
line: There will.

name: jon
line: Go get some sleep, Sam. I'll take this watch.

name: jon
line: There we go, boys. That's one. There's two. Come on, let's get the next lot. That's the last of the oil, Ser Alliser.

name: jon
line: Yes sir.

name: jon
line: It was a difficult decision either way, Ser.

name: jon
line: We can't just let them attack the gate!

name: jon
line: Those are giants riding mammoths down there. Do you think your cold, rolled steel's gonna stop them?

name: jon
line: Archers! Knock your arrows! Draw! Loose!

name: jon
line: They won't summit before dawn.

name: jon
line: Because I've made that claim.

name: jon
line: Knock! Draw! Loose!

name: jon
line: Now!

name: jon
line: *to Grenn* The outer gate won't hold. Take five men, hold the inner gate.

name: jon
line: *grabs Grenn's arm* Hold the gate. If they make it through...

name: jon
line: Oil!

name: jon
line: What are you doing up here?

name: jon
line: Ed. You have The Wall. If they try the mammoths again, drop fire on them. If the climbers get too high, drop the scythe on them.

name: jon
line: Two brothers now fight with me.

name: jon
line: *to Sam* I don't want you out there.

name: jon
line: I need him more than I need you.

name: jon
line: No, shh, don't talk.

name: jon
line: We'll go back there.

name: jon
line: Tormund. It's over, let it end.

name: jon
line: Put him in chains. We'll question him later.

name: jon
line: Aye, you should've.

name: jon
line: For one night.

name: jon
line: Great victory? Mance was testing our defenses. He almost made it through. And he has more giants, he has more mammoths. He has a thousand times as many men. They'll hit us again tonight. Maybe we can hold them off for a day or two, but we can never beat them.

name: jon
line: I'm going to find Mance.

name: jon
