line: Who's left to give orders? The Wildling army is only an army because of Mance. He united a hundred warring tribes. Without Mance they lose their leader. They lose their purpose, they go back to fighting each other, scatter back to their home.

name: jon
line: I'm going to try.

name: jon
line: He'll kill me. If I don't go he'll kill me anyway. They'll kill the rest of us too.

name: jon
line: You're right. It's a bad plan. What's your plan?

name: jon
line: They held the gate. Get some brothers down here to help you. You need to burn the bodies. Raise the outer gate, then lower it again as soon as I'm out.

name: jon
line: I promised Jeor I'd never lose it again. *he hands the sword to Sam* In case I don't come back.

name: jon
line: You couldn't have known.

name: jon
line: We can't go after them, you know that. That's what they want.

name: jon
line: If they hit Mole's Town, then we're next. Mance's army must be close.

name: jon
line: I've been sent to negotiate with you.

name: jon
line: The Halfhand ordered me to join your army and bring back whatever information I could to Castle Black. He made me kill him so you'd trust me. I was loyal, to him and to my Night's Watch vows.

name: jon
line: She put three arrows in me when I escaped.

name: jon
line: Yes.

name: jon
line: She's dead.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Ygritte.

name: jon
line: That's not wine.

name: jon
line: He's dead. He killed my friend Grenn.

name: jon
line: Grenn came from a farm.

name: jon
line: Grenn and Mag.

name: jon
line: Turn your army around and go home.

name: jon
line: I told Tormund and Orell. We have more than a thousand men.

name: jon
line: No, it's like you said, we don't have the men.

name: jon
line: I was sent to discuss terms with the king beyond the wall.

name: jon
line: I know he's the king. My father died for him. My name is Jon Snow, your grace. I'm Ned Stark's son.

name: jon
line: He was, your grace.

name: jon
line: I was this man's prisoner once. He could've tortured me, he could've killed me, but he spared my life. I think my father would've taken him prisoner, listened to what he had to say.

name: jon
line: Your grace. If my father'd seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall. All of them.

name: jon
line: He's sworn to treat all wounded men, friend or foe.

name: jon
line: No one's going to torture you.

name: jon
line: I don't know what happens to the prisoners.

name: jon
line: I suppose Stannis does.

name: jon
line: I don't have a king.

name: jon
line: We're gonna burn the bodies of your dead. Do you want to say any words over them?

name: jon
line: Funeral words. I don't know how the Free Folk do it.

name: jon
line: Say farewell.

name: jon
line: She told you?

name: jon
line: Mance Rayder is coming. If the wildlings breach the Wall, they'll roll over everything and everyone for 1,000 Miles before they reach an army that can stop them.

name: jon
line: Help him.

name: jon
line: And the mutineers stayed?

name: jon
line: We need to ride north and kill them all.

name: jon
line: It's not about justice. I told the wildlings we had over 1,000 men at Castle Black alone. Karl and the others know the truth as well as we do. How long do you think they'll keep that information to themselves when the wildlings are peeling their fingernails off? Mance has all he needs to crush us, he just doesn't know it yet. As soon as he gets his hands on them, he will. Then he'll throw his full strength at us. And even if every one of us kills 100 wildlings, there's still not a thing we can do to stop them.

name: jon
line: Last time I saw him, he was in the courtyard at Winterfell. "He said, " Next time I see you, you'll be all in black." I was jealous of Robb my whole life. (Winces) The way my father looked at him, I wanted that. He was better than me at everything... fighting and hunting and riding and girls. Gods, the girls loved him. I wanted to hate him, but I never could.

name: jon
line: (Chuckles)

name: jon
line: He's wanted to hang me for a while. Now's his chance.

name: jon
line: I've done plenty wrong.

name: jon
line: I didn't murder him.

name: jon
line: He wanted me to kill him.

name: jon
line: The Halfhand believed our only chance to stop Mance was to get a man inside his army.

name: jon
line: Then you'd know he'd do anything to defend the Wall. The free folk would have boiled him alive, but letting me kill him...

name: jon
line: Aye, I talk like a wildling. I ate with the wildlings. I climbed the Wall with the wildlings. I... I laid with a wildling girl.

name: jon
line: I do.

name: jon
line: While we sit here debating which rules I broke, Mance Rayder marches on the Wall with an army of 100,000.

name: jon
line: 100,000. He's united the Thenns, the Hornfoots, the ice-river clans. He has giants fighting for him.

name: jon
line: Have you ever been beyond the Wall, ser?

name: jon
line: And now you're here. You must not have been very good at your job.

name: jon
line: There's a band of wildlings south of the Wall already led by Tormund Giantsbane. I killed their warg and three others. They shot me full of arrows. Their orders are to attack Castle Black from the south when Mance hits it from the north. The signal for the attack will be a bonfire. Mance said it would be the greatest fire the North has ever seen. That's the truth. All the truth.

name: jon
line: Do you intend to execute me or am I free to go?

name: jon
line: How many?

name: jon
line: Why?

name: jon
line: (SIGHS) Get some rest. We move at sundown.

name: jon
line: Are you all right? Come with me. Come on.

name: jon
line: We lost four brothers?

name: jon
line: I count 10 dead mutineers.

name: jon
line: Where in seven hells? Come here.

name: jon
line: I missed you, boy.

name: jon
line: It's not safe for you here on your own. Mance Rayder has an army heading this way and there's worse out there than Mance. Come with us to Castle Black. We can find you work. Keep you safe.

name: jon
line: You want to stay here in Craster's Keep?

name: jon
line: Bring it through! And again.

name: jon
line: Very nice. Good.

name: jon
line: A lot of wildlings fight with a weapon in each hand. First thing you want to do is disarm them to try and even the odds.

name: jon
line: Let's see what you can do.

name: jon
line: Olly, you just watch for now.

name: jon
line: Have you ever held a sword before? OLLY I was the best archer in our hamlet.

name: jon
line: You two. Take it slow,  try and disarm each other.

name: jon
line: You know how to fight. You could have gone easier on him.

name: jon
line: Grenn and I were helping them.

name: jon
line: Someone has to train them.

name: jon
line: My father was highborn. My mother wasn't.

name: jon
line: Jon Snow.

name: jon
line: You fight well.

name: jon
line: She wasn't safe here.

name: jon
line: Castle Black could be next.

name: jon
line: We have orders. No one's to leave the castle.

name: jon
line: And I remember who came after me and brought me home. I know how hard it is, Sam, believe me. When you told me about Bran going beyond the Wall, all I could think about was getting my strength back so I could go and find him.

name: jon
line: How fast could they travel? A crippled boy being pulled on a sledge by a simpleton?

name: jon
line: The wildlings have joined up with Mance. Every village or sheltered place will be deserted. Except...

name: jon
line: Thank you, Ser Alliser.

name: jon
line: Ahem, brothers.

name: jon
line: I'm going beyond the Wallto Craster's Keep. I'm going to capture the mutineers holed up there or kill them. I'm asking for volunteers to come with me. There's 60 miles of wilderness between here and Craster's and Mance Rayder has an army bearing down on us, but we have to do this. Our survival may depend on us getting to these mutineers before Mance does. They know the Wall. They know our defenses. If Mance learns what they know, we're lost. But if that's not enough, then consider this. If the Night's Watch are truly brothers, then Lord Commander Mormont was our father. He lived and died for the Watch and he was betrayed by his own men. Stabbed in the back by cowards. He deserved far better. All we can give him now is justice. Who will join me?

name: jon
line: I can't let a recruit come north of the Wall.

name: jon
line: Thank you, brothers.

name: jon
line: Greetings.

name: jon
line: Come on, Ghost.

name: jon
line: Mance's army was closing in on Craster's Keep when we left. We saw their campfires from Osric's Hill. They'll reach the Wall before the next full moon.

name: jon
line: We need to prepare.

name: jon
line: We should seal the tunnel. Plug it with rocks and ice. Flood it and let it freeze.

name: jon
line: We wouldn't.

name: jon
line: Have you ever seen a giant, Ser Alliser? I have.

name: jon
line: They won't stop them.

name: jon
line: The stewards.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: The builders.

name: jon
line: It was a failure.

name: jon
line: I went to save them, I failed.

name: jon
line: I don’t think that fact’s lost on them.

name: jon
line: Does that make me a fool?

name: jon
line: He’s not my prisoner.

name: jon
line: We’re allies.

name: jon
line: We’re not here to fight. We’re here to talk.

name: jon
line: My name’s Jon Snow. I’m Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch. We’re not friends. We’ve never been friends. We won’t become friends today. This isn’t about friendship. This is about survival. This is about putting a 700 foot wall between you and what’s out there.

name: jon
line: In normal times we wouldn’t. But these aren’t normal times. The white walkers don’t care if a man’s Free Folk or Crow. We’re all the same to them. Meat to their army. But together we can beat them.

name: jon
line: It’s not a trick. It’s a gift for those who join us.

name: jon
line: Dragonglass. A man of the Night’s Watch used one of these daggers to kill a walker.

name: jon
line: No. But I trust the man.

name: jon
line: Come with me and I'll share these weapons.

name: jon
line: There are good lands south of the wall.  The Night's Watch will allow you through the tunnel and allow your people to farm those lands.

name: jon
line: I knew Mance Rayder. He never wanted a war with the Night’s Watch, he wanted a new life for his people. For you. We’re prepared to give you that new life.

name: jon
line: If you swear you join us when the real war begins.

name: jon
line: He died.

name: jon
line: I put an arrow through his heart.

name: jon
line: I’m not asking you to forget your dead. I’ll never forget mine. I lost 50 brothers the night that Mance attacked the wall. But I’m asking you to think about your children now. They’ll never have children of their own if we don’t band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can’t stop them. The Night’s Watch can’t stop them. And all the southern kings can’t stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we’ll give the fuckers a fight.

name: jon
line: How many are with us? 5000?

name: jon
line: We’re leaving too many behind.

name: jon
line: And he knew them better than I ever will.

name: jon
line: Get in line! Get in line!

name: jon
line: Hold the line! Hold the line!

name: jon
line: Get them to the ship and come back for me!

name: jon
line: Now!

name: jon
line: You should be on one of those boats.

name: jon
line: You have my word. I’ve given orders.

name: jon
line: Night’s Watch with me! Move! Move! Move!

name: jon
line: The Dragonglass!

name: jon
line: The Dragonglass!

name: jon
line: Go! Go! Go!

name: jon
line: Let’s go now! Now!

name: jon
line: He raised his hands. And they all stood up at once. Tens of thousands of them, the biggest army in the world.

name: jon
line: I’m gonna hope they don’t learn how to climb the wall.

name: jon
line: No one’s ever getting that back, now. It wouldn’t have mattered anyway, unless we had a mountain of it.

name: jon
line: With Longclaw. I saw them shatter steel axes like they were glass. But Longclaw…

name: jon
line: Not enough. (pause) The first Lord Commander in history to sacrifice the lives of sworn Brothers to save the lives of Wildlings. How’s it feel to be friends with the most hated man in Castle Black? (smiles)

name: jon
line: Here’s to us then. Long may they sneer.

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: I need you here, Sam. If you leave, who’s left to give me advice I trust?

name: jon
line: You know that The Citadel will make you swear off women, too.

name: jon
line: Sam?

name: jon
line: Sam…

name: jon
line: You’ve just been beaten half to death. How did you--

name: jon
line: I’m glad the end of the world’s working out for someone.

name: jon
line: To your return.

name: jon
line: We don’t have enough men to make any difference.

name: jon
line: The wildlings won’t ever fight for Stannis, I told you before--

name: jon
line: It’s not their fight!

name: jon
line: Stannis?

name: jon
line: Are you sure he’s talking about Benjen?

name: jon
line: He could be lying.

name: jon
line: Where is he?

name: jon
line: Olly…

name: jon
line: (Stands up). Your Grace.

name: jon
line: Olly is my steward now, as I was Lord Commander Mormont's. I want him to attend my meetings, to learn from men with experience. One day, he might command.

name: jon
line: I have. And I thank you for it. You do me great honor. All my life I wanted to be Jon Stark.

name: jon
line: But I have to refuse you. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. My place is here.

name: jon
line: I wish I could fight beside you. Believe me, I do. But I swore a sacred vow at the Godswood. I pledged my life to the Night's Watch.

name: jon
line: I can imagine no higher praise.

name: jon
line: May I ask, Your Grace, how long you plan to stay at Castle Black?

name: jon
line: You saved us from Mance Rayder's army. We will never forget that. But it's a question of survival. The Night's Watch can't continue to feed your men and the wildling prisoners indefinitely. Winter is coming.

name: jon
line: And the wildlings?

name: jon
line: Most of the brothers, yes. There's little love for the free folk here. (Olly stares at him).

name: jon
line: I heard it was best to keep your enemies close.

name: jon
line: I'm sorry I disappointed him.

name: jon
line: As long as he's ruling them.

name: jon
line: I’ve sworn to stay clear of the politics of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jon
line: And what needs to be done?

name: jon
line: Sam. (Sam looks up. Jon looks at Maester Aemon’s chair). Maester Aemon?

name: jon
line: Take good care of him. (To the group). Brothers. As you all know too well, it's long past time to dig a new latrine pit. (Laughter. Jon looks at Alliser). First Builder Yarwyck and I have decided to appoint a latrine captain to oversee this crucial task. (Laughter. After a moment, he continues). Brian. Seems like a good job for a ginger.

name: jon
line: Ser Alliser. (Silence). You have more experience than any other soldier at Castle Black. You proved your valour many times over, while defending the Wall from the wildling attack. I name you First Ranger.

name: jon
line: Lord Janos. I'm giving you command of Greyguard.

name: jon
line: Yes, the fort is in a sorry state. Restore it as best you can. First Builder Yarwyck can spare ten of his -

name: jon
line: You mistake me, my Lord. That was a command, not an offer. Pack your arms and armour, say your farewells, and ride for Greyguard.

name: jon
line: Are you refusing to obey my order?

name: jon
line: Take Lord Janos outside.

name: jon
line: Olly, bring me my sword.

name: jon
line: If you have any last words, my Lord, now is the time.

name: jon
line: With respect, Your Grace, the free folk will never follow you, no matter what you do. You're the man who burned their king alive.

name: jon
line: No. Only one of their own.

name: jon
line: The Lord Commander's niece.

name: jon
line: "Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is Stark." (Jon smiles)

name: jon
line: I apologize, Your Grace. Northerners can be a bit like the free folk. Loyal to their own.

name: jon
line: Most likely.

name: jon
line: Unpleasant, I expect.

name: jon
line: I don't doubt it, Your Grace. But I'm a brother of the Night's Watch. I've pledged them my life, my honor, my sword. I don't know what I have left to give you.

name: jon
line: I can't. Even if I wanted to, I'm a bastard. A Snow.

name: jon
line: It's the first thing I ever remember wanting. I'd daydream that my father would ask the king, and just like that I would never be the bastard of Winterfell again.

name: jon
line: I'm going to refuse him.

name: jon
line: I swore a vow to the Night's Watch. If I don't take my own word seriously, what sort of Lord of Winterfell would I be?

name: jon
line: Get your shield up.

name: jon
line: If it wasn’t heavy it wouldn’t stop a sword, now get it up.

name: jon
line: Come. Try it again. Drive at me. Keep your shield up. Or I’ll ring your head like a bell.

name: jon
line: Good, good, pivot! Don’t forget to pivot! Shield up!

name: jon
line: You’re not cold, my lady?

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Roose Bolton.

name: jon
line: I want a great many things, your grace. But I’m a sworn brother of the Night’s Watch now.

name: jon
line: They’re good men.

name: jon
line: It’s where she belonged.

name: jon
line: They were born on the wrong side of the wall. That doesn’t make them monsters.

name: jon
line: The men of the Night’s Watch are sworn to play no part--

name: jon
line: Your grace, you want the wildlings to march in your army?

name: jon
line: I don’t think that’s likely.

name: jon
line: I respect him.

name: jon
line: Your grace…

name: jon
line: How much time do I have?

name: jon
line: Here we are.

name: jon
line: This doesn’t have to be our last meeting.

name: jon
line: You know what Stannis wants?

name: jon
line: Shouldn’t a king be bold?

name: jon
line: You told me you weren’t here to conquer. You told me your people have bled enough.

name: jon
line: You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history. Thenns and Hornfoots, the ice-river clans, even the giants. A life’s work uniting them. You didn’t do it for power. You didn’t do it for glory. You brought them together to save them because none of them will survive the winter, not if they’re north of the wall. Isn’t their survival more important than your pride?

name: jon
line: Then bend the knee and save your people.

name: jon
line: And how many tens of thousands are out there right now? How many women? How many children? And you won’t go out and rescue them because why? You’re afraid of looking afraid.

name: jon
line: They’ll burn you alive.

name: jon
line: And what happens to your people? You preserve your dignity and die standing, and they’ll sing songs about you. “You’d rather burn than kneel. The great hero.” Until winter comes, and the white walkers come for us all, and there’s no one left to sing.

name: jon
line: I think you’re making a terrible mistake.

name: jon
line: Maester Aemon.

name: jon
line: Sam, I'd like to speak to the maester alone.

name: jon
line: How are you feeling?

name: jon
line: I need your advice. There's something I want to do, something I have to do. But it'll divide the Night's Watch. Bitterly. Half the men will hate me the moment I give the order.

name: jon
line: But you don't know what it is.

name: jon
line: Where are the rest of the free folk now? (Tormund scoffs). Where have they gone? (No response). Who leads them?

name: jon
line: What about you?

name: jon
line: What if I unchained you?

name: jon
line: Because you are not my enemy. And I'm not yours.

name: jon
line: For 8,000 years the Night's Watch have sworn an oath to be the shield that guards the realms of men. And for 8,000 years we've fallen short of that oath. You belong to the realms of men. All of you.

name: jon
line: It is.

name: jon
line: Because now, (Leans forward), I am Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

name: jon
line: (Stands up). I'd have you go north of the Wall. Gather the remaining free folk wherever they are and bring them back here. I'll open the gates for them and let them through. I'll find them lands to settle south of the Wall.

name: jon
line: I don't want them to kneel for me. I want them to fight with me when the time comes.

name: jon
line: And how many of your people can't fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You're condemning them to death. Worse than death because you're too proud to make peace. Or maybe you're not proud. Maybe you're just a coward.

name: jon
line: Your people need a leader. And they need to get south of the Wall before it's too late. We don't have much time and they have less. The walkers are coming and they'll hit your people first. I'm not asking you to make peace to save your skin. Make peace to save your people.

name: jon
line: Up on Storrold's Point. I can give you 10 horses and nine other men. You can get there in a week.

name: jon
line: I'll talk to King Stannis about lending you his fleet.

name: jon
line: Men, women, and children will die by the thousands if we do nothing.

name: jon
line: And we've slaughtered theirs.

name: jon
line: You were at the Fist of the First Men. If we abandon them, you know what they become. We can learn to live with the wildlings or we can add them to the army of the dead. Whatever they are now, they're better than that.

name: jon
line: Thank you. (Olly walks away). Olly. (He stops). If you have something you want to say to me, say it. It's all right.

name: jon
line: It's not a trick.

name: jon
line: I know what it's like to lose the people you love. I know this is hard for you. But winter is coming. We know what's coming with it. We can't face it alone.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: You'll get them back, I swear it. Have a safe journey, Your Grace. And thank you.

name: jon
line: (To some of the men sparring). Good.

name: jon
line: Never even heard of these people.

name: jon
line: And how many men does this Lord Mazin have to send us?

name: jon
line: Not him.

name: jon
line: He murdered my brother.

name: jon
line: How can I help you?

name: jon
line: Castle Black is my home now. Night's Watch takes no part in the wars of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jon
line: You're gonna show me some vision in the fire. Forgive me, my Lady. But I don't trust in visions.

name: jon
line: I don't think Stannis would like that very much.

name: jon
line: I can't.

name: jon
line: I swore a vow. (Melisandre looks at him incredulously). I loved another.

name: jon
line: I know. But I still love her.

name: jon
line: First Ranger, you have command of Castle Black.

name: jon
line: As always, thank you for your honesty.

name: jon
line: Thank you, Sam.

name: jon
line: Me too.

name: jon
line: I couldn't do it. I had the sword on her neck, I just couldn't

name: jon
line: The others?

name: jon
line: They died because of me.

name: jon
line: They'll never trust me.

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: I didn't.

name: jon
line: Careful with that. You might cut yourself.

name: jon
line: Never swung a sword before, have you? You look like a baby with a rattle.

name: jon
line: Stop!

name: jon
line: Lord Commander

name: jon
line: I followed him. He took the baby into the woods, the newborn.

name: jon
line: No, you don't understand. He's killing them, all the boys.

name: jon
line: You know.

name: jon
line: Offerings? He's murdering his own children. He's a monster.

name: jon
line: I saw it. I saw something take that child.

name: jon
line: What happens to the boys? What does he do with his sons?

name: jon
line: What’re you doing?

name: jon
line: Hello, Gilly. What’re you doing?

name: jon
line: I'm sorry, Sam knows we're not supposed to -

name: jon
line: What? (Stands up).

name: jon
line: No it doesn't sound a bit mad, it's impossible.

name: jon
line: Sam we can't take her -

name: jon
line: It's just not possible.

name: jon
line: If it's a boy what? (Gilly looks around and then down, not answering). You want us to risk our lives for you, and you won't even tell us why.

name: jon
line: Do what, ask her a question?

name: jon
line: Cruel! Sam are you in such a hurry to lose a hand?

name: jon
line: No you just want to steal her. What do you think Craster cuts off for that?

name: jon
line: We're heading deeper and deeper into wildling territory. We can't take a girl with us. Mormont wouldn't have it. And even if he would, what would we do with her? Who's gonna deliver her baby? You?

name: jon
line: I'm sorry Sam, we can't help her.

name: jon
line: Having a rough time of it?

name: jon
line: What happens to the boys?

name: jon
line: He marries his daughters. What does he do with his sons?

name: jon
line: (Standing off to the side of the room) We're not Southerners.

name: jon
line: Jon Snow.

name: jon
line: Lord commander.

name: jon
line: Jon Snow.

name: jon
line: Your steward.

name: jon
line: When will he come?

name: jon
line: My uncle told me stories about him.

name: jon
line: I heard the Halfhand spent half of last winter beyond the Wall.

name: jon
line: So it is possible for someone to survive out here on their own.

name: jon
line: I think they were afraid. I think they came here to get away from something. And I don't think it worked.

name: jon
line: One blast is for rangers returning. Wildlings is two blasts.

name: jon
line: Look. It's Qhorin Halfhand.

name: jon
line: A fire.

name: jon
line: Where?

name: jon
line: Lord Commander, I'd like to join Lord Qhorin.

name: jon
line: I've fought and killed a wight. How many rangers can say that?

name: jon
line: Ghost, stay with us. Ghost!

name: jon
line: He's not a pet.

name: jon
line: Ghost is different.

name: jon
line: I thought you said you couldn't know wild things.

name: jon
line: We could do the same.

name: jon
line: My father always said I'm of the North.

name: jon
line: I wasn't joking.

name: jon
line: (nods)

name: jon
line: I'll gladly give my life.

name: jon
line: I do.

name: jon
line: A girl.

name: jon
line: We could question her.

name: jon
line: What's your name?

name: jon
line: I'm Jon Snow.

name: jon
line: No. No, I'll do it.

name: jon
line: I'm as much a crow as they are.

name: jon
line: Can't. Someone might see the smoke.

name: jon
line: I'll find them.

name: jon
line: We'll stop here. Too dark to go any farther today.

name: jon
line: There's no shelter anywhere.

name: jon
line: No fire.

name: jon
line: No fire.

name: jon
line: Yes.

name: jon
line: Yes.

name: jon
line: We start again at first light. Get some sleep.

name: jon
line: Stop moving.

name: jon
line: Stop it!

name: jon
line: You're still moving.

name: jon
line: (sighs)

name: jon
line: Let's move.

name: jon
line: I'm a man of the Night's Watch.

name: jon
line: Don't call them that.

name: jon
line: Neither. Both.

name: jon
line: Move!

name: jon
line: There are no women of the Night's Watch, no.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Never. We swore an oath.

name: jon
line: Would you please shut up?

name: jon
line: You're a free woman? I might be your prisoner, but I'm a free woman.

name: jon
line: If you're my prisoner, you're not a free woman. That's what "prisoner" means.

name: jon
line: It was my choice to say the words.

name: jon
line: Of course I like girls. But you chose never to touch them.

name: jon
line: That's the price you pay if you want to be a man of the Night's Watch.

name: jon
line: Invade your lands? Wildlings raid our lands all the time. Some of them tried to kill my little brother, a crippled boy!

name: jon
line: My father was Ned Stark. I have the blood of the First Men. My ancestors lived here, same as yours.

name: jon
line: No. No, you serve Mance Rayder, the King beyond the Wall.

name: jon
line: Walk.

name: jon
line: I know how to do it.

name: jon
line: We're close.

name: jon
line: We're close.

name: jon
line: Nothing happened between you and me.

name: jon
line: Turn back around.

name: jon
line: That's enough.

name: jon
line: Enough!

name: jon
line: The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

name: jon
line: You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right.  You picked up some scars along the road.

name: jon
line: Of course.

name: jon
line: She is.

name: jon
line: I didn't ask --

name: jon
line: She's starting to let on.

name: jon
line: As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

name: jon
line: My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

name: jon
line: True.  But I'm not a Stark.

name: jon
line: The winds were kind, Your Grace.

name: jon
line: I am not.

name: jon
line: Break faith?  Your father burned my grandfather alive.  He burned my uncle alive.  He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jon
line: You're right.  You're not guilty of your father's crime.  And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

name: jon
line: Because I need your help and you need mine.

name: jon
line: I did.

name: jon
line: They're hard to miss.

name: jon
line: But you haven't stormed King's Landing.  Why not?  The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people.  It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it.  Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

name: jon
line: Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

name: jon
line: Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

name: jon
line: I am not your enemy.  The dead are the enemy.

name: jon
line: The Army of the Dead is on the march.

name: jon
line: You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

name: jon
line: The Army of the Dead is real.  The White Walkers are real.  The Knight King is real.  I've seen them.  If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

name: jon
line: You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

name: jon
line: There's no time for that.  There's no time for any of this.  While we stand here debating --

name: jon
line: And why would I do that?

name: jon
line: I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you.  As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name.  And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King.  The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them.  And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

name: jon
line: Am I your prisoner?

name: jon
line: I'm a prisoner on this island.

name: jon
line: Except to my ship.  They took my ship.

name: jon
line: I'm not playing word games with you.  The dead are coming for us all.

name: jon
line: It's hard for me to fathom.  It really is.  If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

name: jon
line: You probably don't believe me.

name: jon
line: You didn't before.  Grumpkins and snarks you called them.  Do you remember?  You said it was all nonsense.

name: jon
line: How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

name: jon
line: I know it's a good question.  I'm looking for an answer.

name: jon
line: I need to help prepare my people for what's coming.  I can't help them from here.  I'd like to leave.

name: jon
line: Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes.  Don't go south.  Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader.  And here I am.  A northern fool.

name: jon
line: What do you mean?

name: jon
line: Amazing thing to see.

name: jon
line: You've been talking to Tyrion?

name: jon
line: He enjoys talking.

name: jon
line: I don't.

name: jon
line: I never expected that you would.

name: jon
line: I haven't either.

name: jon
line: Thank you.

name: jon
line: So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

name: jon
line: Read the last bit.

name: jon
line: It's something he said to me the first night we met.  You know him better than any of us.  What do you think?

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: But?

name: jon
line: Come in.

name: jon
line: This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley.  He was my brother at the Night's Watch.  A man I trust as much as anyone in this world.  He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

name: jon
line: I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone.  It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

name: jon
line: He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen.  She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister.  She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

name: jon
line: Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

name: jon
line: We need this Dragonglass, My Lords.  We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army.  We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

name: jon
line: But more importantly, we need allies.  The Night King's army grows larger by the day.  We can't defeat them on our own.  We don't have the numbers.  Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire.  I need to try and persuade her to fight with us.  Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

name: jon
line: I know that.

name: jon
line: It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that.  You know him.  He's a good man.

name: jon
line: You all crowned me your king.  I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home.  It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds.  But the odds are against us.  None of you have seen the Army of the Dead.  None of you.  We can never hope to defeat them alone.  We need allies, powerful allies.  I know it's a risk.  But I have to take it.

name: jon
line: Daenerys is a queen.  Only a king can convince her to help us.  It has to be me.

name: jon
line: I'm leaving both in good hands.

name: jon
line: Yours.  You are my sister.  You are the only Stark in Winterfell.  Until I return, the north is yours.

name: jon
line: You don't belong down here.

name: jon
line: I have nothing to say to you.

name: jon
line: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

name: jon
line: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

name: jon
line: Not just the boys.

name: jon
line: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

name: jon
line: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

name: jon
line: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

name: jon
line: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

name: jon
line: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

name: jon
line: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

name: jon
line: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

name: jon
line: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

name: jon
line: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

name: jon
line: Ned Umber.

name: jon
line: Alys Karstark.

name: jon
line: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

name: jon
line: Stand.

name: jon
line: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

name: jon
line: You are my sister, but I am king now.

name: jon
line: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

name: jon
line: Of course you can, but--

name: jon
line: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

name: jon
line: Thank you.

name: jon
line: At what?

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

name: jon
line: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

name: jon
line: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

name: jon
line: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

name: jon
line: "Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--"

name: jon
line: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

name: jon
line: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

name: jon
line: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

name: jon
line: You almost sound as if you admire her.

name: jon
line: That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are.  Gorgeous beasts.

name: jon
line: You weren't gone long.

name: jon
line: And?

name: jon
line: No, I'm not.

name: jon
line: Thousands.

name: jon
line: Ser Davos gets carried away.

name: jon
line: I served with your father.  He was a great man.

name: jon
line: I thought Arya was dead.  I thought Bran was dead.

name: jon
line: Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch.  If they make it past the wall --

name: jon
line: I need to go home.

name: jon
line: We'll fight with the men we have.  Unless you'll join us.

name: jon
line: I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

name: jon
line: The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

name: jon
line: The free folk will help us.  They know the real north better than anyone.

name: jon
line: They won't have to.

name: jon
line: I'm the only one here whose fought them.  I'm the only one here who knows them.

name: jon
line: With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission.  I am a king.  And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive.  I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people.  Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

name: jon
line: You survived King's Landing.

name: jon
line: Your Grace, this is --

name: jon
line: I saw your father once at Winterfell.

name: jon
line: You're a lot leaner.

name: jon
line: I grew up on stories about them.

name: jon
line: Do you know how to use one?

name: jon
line: Well, that's a problem.

name: jon
line: We could use the help.

name: jon
line: If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

name: jon
line: I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

name: jon
line: Heave!

name: jon
line: Two.

name: jon
line: Both.

name: jon
line: Not enough.

name: jon
line: You're The Hound.  I saw you once at Winterfell.

name: jon
line: He's right.  We're all on the same side.

name: jon
line: We're all breathing.

name: jon
line: Your Grace.

name: jon
line: I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

name: jon
line: So this is it, all we'll ever need.

name: jon
line: There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

name: jon
line: The Children of the Forest made these.

name: jon
line: A very long time ago.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: They were here together the Children and the First Men.

name: jon
line: Because the enemy is real.  It's always been real.

name: jon
line: No, I don't think I can.

name: jon
line: My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

name: jon
line: I would never presume to --

name: jon
line: I never thought that dragons would exist again.  No one did.  The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen.  Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen.  Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

name: jon
line: But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different.  You're just more of the same.

name: jon
line: Who?

name: jon
line: I think she has a good heart.

name: jon
line: There's no time for that.  I saw the Night King, Davos.  I looked into his eyes.  How many men do we have in the north to fight him?  10,000?  Less?

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: It doesn't matter.

name: jon
line: Of course.

name: jon
line: I'm a bastard.  My mother and father weren't married.

name: jon
line: Why did you leave your homeland?

name: jon
line: I'm sorry.

name: jon
line: And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

name: jon
line: You believe that?

name: jon
line: Is that a Greyjoy ship?

name: jon
line: What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

name: jon
line: The queen is gone.

name: jon
line: Are you all right?

name: jon
line: Ever been north before?

name: jon
line: You've never been down south.

name: jon
line: That's the north.

name: jon
line: There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

name: jon
line: Davos says he is a strong fighter.

name: jon
line: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

name: jon
line: The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

name: jon
line: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings.  But we avenged him.  I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

name: jon
line: I hate that he died that way.  My father was the most honorable man I ever met.  He was good all the way through.  And he died on the executioner's block.

name: jon
line: I heard.

name: jon
line: I'm glad he didn't capture you.

name: jon
line: Your father gave me this sword.  He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.

name: jon
line: Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.

name: jon
line: But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries.  It's not right for me to have it.

name: jon
line: I'm not his son.

name: jon
line: Who's that?

name: jon
line: You knew him?

name: jon
line: I serve the north.

name: jon
line: The lord of light never spoke to me.  I don't know anything about him.  I don't know what he wants from me.

name: jon
line: Why?

name: jon
line: That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know.  So what's the point in serving a god that none of us knows what he wants.

name: jon
line: So what are you fighting for?

name: jon
line: But we all die.

name: jon
line: "I am the shield that guards the realms of men."

name: jon
line: Aye.  Maybe that's enough.

name: jon
line: How many people live here?

name: jon
line: That's more people than the entire North crammed into that. Why would anyone want to live that way?

name: jon
line: This isn't about living in harmony. It's just about living. The same thing is coming for all of us. A general you can't negotiate with. An army that doesn't leave corpses behind on the battlefield. Lord Tyrion tells me a million people live in this city. They're about to become a million more soldiers in the Army of the Dead.

name: jon
line: This is serious. I wouldn't be here if it weren't.

name: jon
line: We can destroy them by burning them.

name: jon
line: And we can destroy them with dragonglass. If we don't win this fight, then that is the fate of every person in the world.

name: jon
line: There is only one war that matters the Great War. And it is here.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: (SIGHS)

name: jon
line: I am true to my word. Or I try to be. That is why I cannot give you what you ask. I cannot serve two queens. And I have already pledged myself to Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen.

name: jon
line: I know!

name: jon
line: I'm not going to swear an oath I can't uphold. Talk about my father.

name: jon
line: I did this. I should go.

name: jon
line: No one is less happy about this than I am.

name: jon
line: You're not like everyone else. And your family hasn't seen its end. You're still here.

name: jon
line: Who told you that?

name: jon
line: Has it occurred to you she might not have been a reliable source of information?

name: jon
line: So, what now?

name: jon
line: It appears Tyrion's assessment was correct. We're fucked.

name: jon
line: If we have the Dothraki ride hard on the kingsroad, they'll arrive at Winterfell within the fortnight.

name: jon
line: It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.

name: jon
line: All right.

name: jon
line: We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.

name: jon
line: It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.

name: jon
line: No. Not compared to you.

name: jon
line: Our father was more of a father.

name: jon
line: And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.

name: jon
line: (SIGHS) But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.

name: jon
line: It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.

name: jon
line: So, why are you still talking to me?

name: jon
line: We need every man we can get.

name: jon
line: I thought we'd lost you.

name: jon
line: How did you find each other?

name: jon
line: The Umbers?

name: jon
line: How long do we have?

name: jon
line: They're coming.

name: jon
line: We have dragonglass and Valyrian steel.

name: jon
line: But there are too many of them.

name: jon
line: Far too many.

name: jon
line: Our enemy doesn't tire.

name: jon
line: Doesn't stop. Doesn't feel.

name: jon
line: We can't beat them in a straight fight.

name: jon
line: The Night King made them all. They follow his command. If he falls Getting to him may be our best chance.

name: jon
line: We'll put you in the crypt, where it's safest.

name: jon
line: If they're in the field, they're not protecting Bran. We need to be near him. Not too near, or the Night King won't come. But close enough to pursue him when he does.

name: jon
line: Let's get some rest.

name: jon
line: Your Grace.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Gilly? Little Sam?

name: jon
line: If you want to join them.

name: jon
line: To protect them.

name: jon
line: Now it's just us three.

name: jon
line: Lyanna Stark.

name: jon
line: He didn't. He loved her.

name: jon
line: They were married in secret. After Rhaegar fell on the Trident, she had a son. Robert would have murdered the baby if he ever found out, and Lyanna knew it. So the last thing she did, as she bled to death on her birthing bed, was give the boy to her brother, Ned Stark, to raise as his bastard.

name: jon
line: My name. My real name is Aegon Targaryen.

name: jon
line: I wish it were.

name: jon
line: Bran. He saw it.

name: jon
line: And Samwell confirmed it. He read about their marriage at the Citadel without even knowing what it meant.

name: jon
line: It's true, Dany. I know it is.

name: jon
line: I warned you. Northerners don't much trust outsiders.

name: jon
line: Look at you.

name: jon
line: You're a man.

name: jon
line: Where's Arya?

name: jon
line: Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen. My sister, Sansa Stark, the Lady of Winterfell.

name: jon
line: We need to send ravens to the Night's Watch as well. There's no sense in manning the castles anymore. We make our stand here.

name: jon
line: It's not important.

name: jon
line: You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I’ll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.

name: jon
line: How did you sneak up on me?

name: jon
line: I didn't.

name: jon
line: You still have it.

name: jon
line: Have you ever used it?

name: jon
line: Jealous?

name: jon
line: Where were you before? I could've used your help with Sansa.

name: jon
line: Sansa thinks she's smarter than everyone.

name: jon
line: Now you're defending her?

name: jon
line: You?

name: jon
line: Yeah. I'm her family too.

name: jon
line: She doesn't know you. If it makes you feel any better, she didn't like me either when we were growing up.

name: jon
line: What's the matter?

name: jon
line: What's wrong with them?

name: jon
line: I don't know how to ride a dragon.

name: jon
line: What if he doesn't want me to?

name: jon
line: What do I hold onto?

name: jon
line: You've completely ruined horses for me.

name: jon
line: We'd be pretty old.

name: jon
line: It's cold up here for a southern girl.

name: jon
line: "House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousand years." Isn't that what he said?

name: jon
line: I told you we needed allies.

name: jon
line: I never wanted a crown. All I wanted was to protect the North. I brought two armies home with me, two dragons.

name: jon
line: Do you think we can beat the Army of the Dead without her? I fought them, Sansa. Twice. You want to worry about who holds what title, I'm telling you it doesn't matter. Without her, we don't stand a chance.

name: jon
line: Do you have any faith in me at all?

name: jon
line: She'll be a good queen. For all of us. She's not her father.

name: jon
line: Sam?

name: jon
line: Were you hiding from me?

name: jon
line: What are you doing in Winterfell? Or did you read every book in the Citadel already?

name: jon
line: What's wrong? Gilly? Is she all right?

name: jon
line: Little Sam?

name: jon
line: Know what?

name: jon
line: I'm so sorry. We need to end this war.

name: jon
line: Well, I've executed men who disobeyed me.

name: jon
line: I wasn't a king.

name: jon
line: I gave up my crown, Sam.

name: jon
line: I bent the knee. I'm not King in the North anymore.

name: jon
line: What are you talking about?

name: jon
line: My father was the most honorable man I ever met. You're saying he lied to me all my life.

name: jon
line: Daenerys is our queen.

name: jon
line: That's treason.

name: jon
line: We're here to say goodbye to our  brothers and sisters. To our fathers and mothers. To our friends. Our fellow men and women who set aside their differences to fight together and die together so that others might live. Everyone in this world owes them a debt that can never be repaid. It is our duty and our honor to keep them alive in memory for those who come after us and those who come after them for as long as men draw breath. They were the shields that guarded the realms of men. And we shall never see their like again.

name: jon
line: No, not in one go.

name: jon
line: Vomiting is not celebrating.

name: jon
line: Yeah, I didn't have much say in that.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Only a little.

name: jon
line: I didn't know Ser Jorah well but I know this. If he could have chosen a way to die, it would have been protecting you.

name: jon
line: I told you I don't want it.

name: jon
line: I'll refuse. You are my queen. I don't know what else I can say.

name: jon
line: I have to tell Sansa and Arya.

name: jon
line: She won't.

name: jon
line: I owe them the truth.

name: jon
line: It won't.

name: jon
line: You are my queen. Nothing will change that. And they are my family. We can live together.

name: jon
line: The Northmen as well.

name: jon
line: We'll surround the city. If the Iron Fleet tries to ferry in more food, the dragons will destroy them. If the Lannisters and the Golden Company attack, we'll defeat them in the field.

name: jon
line: (to SANSA and ARYA) The Northern forces will honor their promises and their allegiance to the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: jon
line: What you command, we will obey.

name: jon
line: You understand we'd all be dead if not for her. We'd be corpses marching down to King's Landing.

name: jon
line: Her men gave their lives defending Winterfell--

name: jon
line: I swore myself and the North to her cause.

name: jon
line: You don't know her yet.

name: jon
line: If you only trust the people you grew up with, you won't make many allies.

name: jon
line: Arya -

name: jon
line: I've never been a Stark.

name: jon
line: I need to tell you something. But you have to swear you'll never tell another soul.

name: jon
line: You have to swear it, before I tell you.

name: jon
line: Because we're family. Swear it.

name: jon
line: (to BRAN) Tell them.

name: jon
line: Just a horse. Rhaegal needs to heal. He doesn't need me weighing him down.

name: jon
line: (laughs)

name: jon
line: This is the North, you know. And the Free Folk are welcome to stay.

name: jon
line: It's where he belongs too. A direwolf has no place in the south. Will you take him with you? He'll be happier up there.

name: jon
line: I wish I was going with you. This is farewell, then.

name: jon
line: I hope it's a girl.

name: jon
line: You too, Sam.

name: jon
line: It's not safe. Let me send some men with you.

name: jon
line: Grey Worm!

name: jon
line: It's over.

name: jon
line: And what are the queen's commands?

name: jon
line: What are you doing here?

name: jon
line: Hey, what happened?

name: jon
line: (sighs) She's everyone's queen now.

name: jon
line: Wait for me outside the city gates. I'll come find you.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: (sighs)

name: jon
line: Not that I've seen.

name: jon
line: You didn't.

name: jon
line: I can't justify what happened. I won't try. But the war is over now.

name: jon
line: And you've been by her side, counseling her. Until today.

name: jon
line: You think our house words are stamped on our bodies when we're born and that's who we are? Then I'd be fire and blood too. She's not her father, no more than you're Tywin Lannister.

name: jon
line: Cersei left her no choice.

name: jon
line: She saw her friend beheaded. She saw her dragon shot out of the sky.

name: jon
line: Ah, it's easy to judge when you're standing far from the battlefield.

name: jon
line: What?

name: jon
line: I don't know.

name: jon
line: What's it matter what I'd do?

name: jon
line: (sighs)

name: jon
line: "Love is the death of duty."

name: jon
line: Maester Aemon said it a long time ago.

name: jon
line: That's her decision. She is the queen.

name: jon
line: I'm sorry it came to this.

name: jon
line: My sisters will be loyal to the throne.

name: jon
line: She doesn't get to choose.

name: jon
line: I saw them executing Lannister prisoners in the street. They said they were acting on your orders.

name: jon
line: Necessary? Have you been down there? Have you seen? Children, little children, burned!

name: jon
line: And Tyrion?

name: jon
line: Forgive him.

name: jon
line: You can. You can forgive all of them, make them see they made a mistake. Make them understand.

name: jon
line: Please, Dany.

name: jon
line: The world we need is a world of mercy. It has to be.

name: jon
line: How do you know? How do you know it'll be good?

name: jon
line: I don't.

name: jon
line: What about everyone else? All the other people who think they know what's good.

name: jon
line: You are my queen. Now, and always.

name: jon
line: There's still a Night's Watch?

name: jon
line: (sighs)

name: jon
line: Was it right? What I did?

name: jon
line: It doesn't feel right.

name: jon
line: I don't expect we'll ever see each other again.

name: jon
line: (nods)

name: jon
line: The North is free, thanks to you.

name: jon
line: Ned Stark's daughter will speak for them. She's the best they could ask for.

name: jon
line: You can come see me, you know, at Castle Black.

name: jon
line: You think anyone will dare tell you women aren't allowed?

name: jon
line: (chuckles) I don't know.

name: jon
line: You have your Needle?

name: jon
line: Your Grace. I'm sorry I wasn't there when you needed me.

name: jon
line: Soon, he says.

name: jon
line: This is Valyrian steel.

name: jon
line: My lord, you honor me, but l can't –

name: jon
line: Yes, my lord.

name: jon
line: l'll apologize to Ser Alliser tonight.

name: jon
line: Yes, my lord.

name: jon
line: At what?

name: jon
line: What is it?

name: jon
line: You can't what?

name: jon
line: And yet you really want to say. You want to say that…

name: jon
line: What? What about him?

name: jon
line: l should be there. l should be with him.

name: jon
line: Sam said you wanted to see me?

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: He would do whatever was right, no matter what.

name: jon
line: Sam told you.

name: jon
line: And this is my day? ls that what you're saying?

name: jon
line: You do not know. No one knows. l may be a bastard, but he is my father and Robb is my brother.

name: jon
line: Who are you?

name: jon
line: You're Aemon Targaryen.

name: jon
line: Just these two, My Lord. Been dead awhile, I'd say.

name: jon
line: We should burn them.

name: jon
line: Is there any word of my father?

name: jon
line: My sisters were in King's Landing too.

name: jon
line: Ghost, what's wrong? Is something out there?

name: jon
line: Commander?

name: jon
line: Stay.

name: jon
line: Hello?

name: jon
line: Commander!Othor gets back on his feet, pulling out Jon's sword out of his chest. Outside of the room, Ghost goes beserk, trying to get in.

name: jon
line: Move move!

name: jon
line: How do you know that?

name: jon
line: What else did the book say?

name: jon
line: Get out of my way, Sam.

name: jon
line: Better than you do.

name: jon
line: l'm gonna find my brother and put a sword through King Joffrey's throat. (gets on horseback)

name: jon
line: Move.

name: jon
line: Move.

name: jon
line: Hyah!

name: jon
line: Ghost?

name: jon
line: l belong with my brother.

name: jon
line: They'll kill you if they know you came after me. Go back.

name: jon
line: l have to.

name: jon
line: I don't care about –

name: jon
line: To hell with all of you.

name: jon
line: My friends brought me back.

name: jon
line: They killed my father.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: No.

name: jon
line: Beyond the Wall?

name: jon
line: It's an improvement.

name: jon
line: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

name: jon
line: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

name: jon
line: You're leaving?

name: jon
line: What kind of reports?

name: jon
line: 'm ready. I won't let you down.

name: jon
line: But I'm better than every...

name: jon
line: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

name: jon
line: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

name: jon
line: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

name: jon
line: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

name: jon
line: He'll never walk again.

name: jon
line: Farewell, My Lord.

name: jon
line: I already have one.

name: jon
line: Of course I have.

name: jon
line: We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.

name: jon
line: Soon enough.

name: jon
line: It's good you've got help.

name: jon
line: Impressive.

name: jon
line: I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.

name: jon
line: Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.

name: jon
line: So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.

name: jon
line: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?

name: jon
line: I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.

name: jon
line: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

name: jon
line: I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.

name: jon
line: You Starks are hard to kill.

name: jon
line: She was very kind.

name: jon
line: It was always my color.

name: jon
line: And you, Stark.

name: jon
line: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

name: jon
line: Why do you read so much?

name: jon
line: Is this a trick?

name: jon
line: Until your brother killed that King.

name: jon
line: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

name: jon
line: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

name: jon
line: Go on. Father’s watching.

name: jon
line: And your mother.

name: jon
line: Don’t think too much, Bran.

name: jon
line: Quick, Bran, faster!

name: jon
line: Don’t look away.

name: jon
line: Father will know if you do.

name: jon
line: You did well.

name: jon
line: What is it?

name: jon
line: Now there are five.

name: jon
line: You want to hold it?

name: jon
line: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

name: jon
line: I’m not a Stark. Get on.

name: jon
line: Why’s your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?

name: jon
line: Uncle Benjen!

name: jon
line: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.

name: jon
line: So take me with you when you go back.

name: jon
line: Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.

name: jon
line: I’m ready to swear your oath.

name: jon
line: I don’t care about that.

name: jon
line: What’re you doing back there?

name: jon
line: You’re Tyrion Lannister. The queen’s brother?

name: jon
line: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.

name: jon
line: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?

name: jon
line: Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.

name: jon
line: Enough! He yielded.

name: jon
line: Are you sure you want to do this?

name: jon
line: I've had worse.

name: jon
line: It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.

name: jon
line: The Wall's no place for cowards.

name: jon
line: Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.

name: jon
line: You're not. You're freezing.

name: jon
line: You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?

name: jon
line: Yes, he is.

name: jon
line: Well… You can't get any worse.

name: jon
line: Watch duty. With Sam.

name: jon
line: He wasn't hungry.

name: jon
line: That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.

name: jon
line: No one touches Sam.

name: jon
line: I wouldn't doubt it.

name: jon
line: Sally on the side?

name: jon
line: I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.

name: jon
line: As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.

name: jon
line: I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...

name: jon
line: I know where to put it.

name: jon
line: Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.

name: jon
line: Red.

name: jon
line: You don't want to know.

name: jon
line: Better.

name: jon
line: What's my name?

name: jon
line: And why is my surname Snow?

name: jon
line: I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.

name: jon
line: I build my own fires.

name: jon
line: Why is he alone?

name: jon
line: There's no rider.

name: jon
line: That's my Uncle Benjen's horse.

name: jon
line: I want to find my Uncle.

name: jon
line: I do, my lord.

name: jon
line: Yes, my lord.

name: jon
line: Will I serve the Lord Commander's meals and fetch hot water for his bath.

name: jon
line: Do you take me for a servant?

name: jon
line: May I go?

name: jon
line: I see Ser Alliser's revenge, that's all.

name: jon
line: I just, I always wanted to be a Ranger.

name: jon
line: You don’t have to be here.

name: jon
line: You’re right. There’s no need for a battle. Thousands of men don’t need to die. Only one of us. Let’s end this the old way. You against me.

name: jon
line: Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn’t fight for them?

name: jon
line: If he was smart, he’d stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

name: jon
line: It’s his weakness, too. His mean don’t want to fight for him. They’re forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...

name: jon
line: We’re digging trenches all along our flanks. They won’t be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

name: jon
line: A pincer move.

name: jon
line: They won’t be able to hit us from the sides.

name: jon
line: No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

name: jon
line: Aye, for what they’re worth.

name: jon
line: You’re right.

name: jon
line: He’s overconfident.

name: jon
line: Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I’ve defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.

name: jon
line: All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

name: jon
line: We can’t give up on our brother.

name: jon
line: Of course he does. What should I do differently?

name: jon
line: Aye, that’s good advice.

name: jon
line: Well, it is a bit obvious.

name: jon
line: When will we have a larger force?! We’ve pleaded with every house that’ll have us! The Blackfish can’t help us! We’re lucky to have this many men!

name: jon
line: Now, it’s not enough! It’s what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

name: jon
line: My lady. You weren’t at the war council.

name: jon
line: Any advice?

name: jon
line: If I do, if I fall, don’t bring me back.

name: jon
line: I’m ordering you not to bring me back.

name: jon
line: You’re in my camp. I’m the commander.

name: jon
line: How do you know what he commands?

name: jon
line: Why?

name: jon
line: What kind of god would do something like that?

name: jon
line: Get word --

name: jon
line: We’re going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.

name: jon
line: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I’d sit down there.

name: jon
line: Aye, you’re right. I was luckier than most.

name: jon
line: What is that?

name: jon
line: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

name: jon
line: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I’ll have you hanged as a murderer.

name: jon
line: I’m having the lord’s chamber prepared for you.

name: jon
line: I’m not a Stark.

name: jon
line: You’re the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We’re standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

name: jon
line: And you trust him?

name: jon
line: We need to trust each other. We can’t fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

name: jon
line: Well, Father always promised, didn’t he?

name: jon
line: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

name: jon
line: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won’t wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

name: jon
line: There’s nothing to forgive, my lord.

name: jon
line: They stabbed me. Olly...he put a knife in my heart. I shouldn’t be here.

name: jon
line: Nothing. There was nothing at all.

name: jon
line: I did what I thought was right. And I got murdered for it. And now I’m back. Why?

name: jon
line: I don’t know how to do that. I thought I did, but...I failed.

name: jon
line: I’m not a god.

name: jon
line: I think so. Hold off on burning my body for now.

name: jon
line: If you have any last words, now is the time.

name: jon
line: Neither was killing me.

name: jon
line: I’m sure you would, Ser Alliser.

name: jon
line: You should.

name: jon
line: Wear it. Burn it. Whatever you want. You have Castle Black.

name: jon
line: My watch is ended.

name: jon
line: We can’t defend the north from the Walkers and the south from the Boltons. If we want to survive, we need Winterfell, and to take Winterfell, we need more men.

name: jon
line: How do you know that?

name: jon
line: New dress?

name: jon
line: Thank you, Sansa.

name: jon
line: Don’t knock it down while I’m gone.

name: jon
line: South.

name: jon
line: Get warm.

name: jon
line: I did everything I could. You know that.

name: jon
line: Aye, I pledged my life to the Night’s Watch. I gave my life.

name: jon
line: They killed me, Edd! My own brothers. You want me to stay here after that?

name: jon
line: With the peas and onions?

name: jon
line: We never should have left Winterfell.

name: jon
line: How could we know?

name: jon
line: We were children.

name: jon
line: You were occasionally awful. I’m sure I can’t have been great fun. Always sulking in the corner while the rest of you played.

name: jon
line: There’s nothing to forgive.

name: jon
line: All right. All right, I forgive you.

name: jon
line: You’d think after thousands of years, the Night’s Watch would have learned how to make a good ale.

name: jon
line: Where will we go? If I don’t watch over you, Father’s ghost will come back and murder me.

name: jon
line: I can’t stay here, not after what happened.

name: jon
line: Should we tell the Boltons to pack up and leave?

name: jon
line: I don’t have an army.

name: jon
line: They didn’t come here to serve me.

name: jon
line: Sansa.

name: jon
line: I’m tired of fighting.

name: jon
line: It’s all I’ve done since I left home. I’ve killed brothers of the Night’s Watch. I’ve killed wildlings. I’ve killed men that I admire. I hanged a boy younger than Bran. I fought and I lost.

name: jon
line: I’m not Lord Commander anymore.

name: jon
line: "To the traitor and bastard Jon Snow. You allowed thousands of wildlings past the Wall. You have betrayed your own kind. You have betrayed the North. Winterfell is mine, bastard. Come and see. Your brother Rickon is in my dungeon.

name: jon
line: His direwolf's skin is on my floor. Come and see. I want my bride back. Send her to me, bastard, and I will not trouble you or your wildling lovers. Keep her from me and I will ride north and slaughter every wildling man, woman, and babe living under your protection. You will watch as I skin them living. You --

name: jon
line: It's just more of the same.

name: jon
line: Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

name: jon
line: We don’t know that.

name: jon
line: How many do you have?

name: jon
line: That’s what’ll happen to you if we lose. The Boltons, the Karstarks, the Umbers, they know you’re here. They know that more than half of you are women and children. After they finish with me, they’ll come for you. You’re right. This isn’t your fight. You shouldn’t have to come to Winterfell with me. I shouldn’t be asking you. It’s not the deal we made. I need you with me if we’re gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you’re going to survive.

name: jon
line: Are you sure they’ll come?

name: jon
line: Lady Mormont.

name: jon
line: Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I’ve come with my sister to ask for House Mormont’s allegiance.

name: jon
line: Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.

name: jon
line: Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?

name: jon
line: Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.

name: jon
line: House Mormont.

name: jon
line: The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.

name: jon
line: Lord Glover.

name: jon
line: We’re not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..

name: jon
line: We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.

name: jon
line: Ser Davos is the reason I’m standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.

name: jon
line: There’s no time.

name: jon
line: We fight with the army we have.

name: euron
line: This is the life.  Look at them.  Cheering for a Greyjoy.

name: euron
line: I have to be honest, it's making me hard.  Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

name: euron
line: Oh no!

name: euron
line: What a twat.

name: euron
line: My queen.  Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

name: euron
line: I give you --

name: euron
line: A bit more than a true friend.

name: euron
line: There's only one reward I want.

name: euron
line: There's nothing quite like it, is there?  The love of the people.  I suppose you wouldn't know.

name: euron
line: Or yours.  They just like severed heads really.  Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

name: euron
line: Does she like it gentle or rough?  A finger in the bum?

name: euron
line: Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now.  We'll talk later.

name: euron
line: Give your uncle a kiss.

name: euron
line: Theon!

name: euron
line: Ah, come on your cockless hound.  I have her.  Come and get her.

name: euron
line: The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

name: euron
line: It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

name: euron
line: I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.

name: euron
line: The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

name: euron
line: A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

name: euron
line: You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

name: euron
line: Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

name: euron
line: Why?

name: euron
line: You should try it. Feels wonderful.

name: euron
line: I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

name: euron
line: Theon! I have your sister

name: euron
line: Then why are you talking? You're the smallest concern here.

name: euron
line: We don't even let your kind live in the Iron Islands, you know? We kill you at birth. An act of mercy for the parents.

name: euron
line: Why?

name: euron
line: Can they swim?

name: euron
line: Good. I'm taking the Iron Fleet back to the Iron Islands.

name: euron
line: I've been around the world. I've seen everything, things you couldn't imagine, and this this is the only thing I've ever seen that terrifies me.

name: euron
line: I'm going back to my island. You should go back to yours. When winter's over, we'll be the only ones left alive.

name: euron
line: But we're family. The last Greyjoys left in the world. The last ones with balls anyway.

name: euron
line: If I kill you who can I talk to? Hmm?

name: euron
line: I've got a crew full of mutes. It gets lonely at sea.

name: euron
line: Mm.

name: euron
line: Then I'll sail the Iron Fleet somewhere else.

name: euron
line: But first I'm gonna fuck the queen.

name: euron
line: They cheated at dice. Or maybe I cheated. Someone cheated. They weren't good fighters. You won't miss them.

name: euron
line: Am I most welcome here?

name: euron
line: Good. As a true friend and an honored guest

name: euron
line: I was hoping we could talk in private.

name: euron
line: Wars sometimes last years.

name: euron
line: How?

name: euron
line: I've given her justice, an army and the Iron Fleet, yet she gives me no sign of affection. My heart is nearly broken.

name: euron
line: They were lesser men.

name: euron
line: So, how do I compare to the fat king?

name: euron
line: Are you offended?

name: euron
line: And the Kingslayer?

name: euron
line: Life is boring.

name: euron
line: Do I please the queen?

name: euron
line: I'm going to put a prince in your belly.

name: euron
line: The glory is yours, my queen.

name: euron
line: She's coming for you.

name: euron
line: What is dead may never die.

name: euron
line: Has the custom changed since I’ve been gone? Aren’t you supposed to repeat the words?

name: euron
line: I don’t mock the Drowned God. I am the Drowned God. From Oldtown to Qarth, when men see my sails, they pray.

name: euron
line: You’re old, brother. You've had your time. Now let another rule.

name: euron
line: They did.

name: euron
line: I needed silence.

name: euron
line: I am the storm, brother. The first storm and the last. And you’re in my way.

name: euron
line: I’m Euron Greyjoy.

name: euron
line: I claim the Salt Throne.

name: euron
line: Niece.

name: euron
line: Nephew. Little Theon.

name: euron
line: Heard you managed to fuck things right into the ground. Captured a castle you couldn’t keep. Got yourself taken prisoner. Even heard you have no cock.

name: euron
line: Explains why you think a woman can be king.
