name: euron
line: A few days ago. I had some things to take care of. Long overdue.

name: euron
line: I did. I killed him. Threw him right over a rope bridge and watched him fall. He was leading us nowhere and we would still be heading there if it weren’t for me. No one loved him. No one wanted to follow him. He led ius into two wars we couldn’t win. I apologize to you all for not killing him years ago.

name: euron
line: Gallivanting? That the sort of thing you start to say once your dick gets chopped off?

name: euron
line: Did the great lord of Westeros teach you words like that?

name: euron
line: And how will she do that?

name: euron
line: Right idea, except I’m the one who’s going to build the Iron Fleet because I’m the one who knows how to use it. I’ve been all over the world. I’ve seen more of it than all of you combined. And across the sea there is a person who hates the great lords of Westeros just as much as we do. Someone with a large army, three large dragons, and no husband. I’m going to build that fleet and I’m going to gallivant right over and give it to Daenerys Targaryen along with my big cock.

name: euron
line: I’m not going to seduce her. The Iron Fleet will seduce her. And together we’re going to take the Seven Kingdoms. I wasn’t born to be king. I paid the iron price and here I stand.

name: euron
line: Where are my niece and nephew? Let’s go murder them.

name: euron
line: Won’t be enough to save them.

name: euron
line: Go back to your homes. Chop down every tree you can find. Quarter-saw the timber and start building. I want every man bending planks. I want every woman spinning flax for sails. Build me a thousand ships and I will give you this world.

name: margaery
line: You look radiant, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: It's the word that came to mind.

name: margaery
line: We're going to be sisters soon. We should be friends.

name: margaery
line: A better dancer than a singer, I'm afraid.

name: margaery
line: Of course. They play it so often here at court.

name: margaery
line: Not as well as you, I'm sure.

name: margaery
line: (nods)

name: margaery
line: Gone.

name: margaery
line: (to a maid)  It's more your color. You take it.

name: margaery
line: (to LORAS) You're such a dear.

name: margaery
line: Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.

name: margaery
line: Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.

name: margaery
line: Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?

name: margaery
line: I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.

name: margaery
line: She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.

name: margaery
line: You wanted to see me, Your Grace?

name: margaery
line: That's very thoughtful, Your Grace. I have everything I could want.

name: margaery
line: A welcome one. A military encampment is no place for a lady.

name: margaery
line: Your Grace, I tried to do my duty as a wife, that is all.

name: margaery
line: The duty of any wife to any husband-to provide him with children.

name: margaery
line: Why? I-I would not speak ill of the dead, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: No. I do beg your pardon. The subtleties of politics are often lost on me. Renly I don't believe he was interested in the company of women.

name: margaery
line: Whenever I wanted to make a child with him, he-he had so many excuses, so many late-night war councils. He never wanted to try. Except one evening, after he'd had far too much wine to drink, he suggested something-something that sounded very painful and couldn't possibly result in children. Maybe the fault was with me.

name: margaery
line: It's such a relief to hear you say so, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: As is your right. You must do whatever you need to do.

name: margaery
line: You are the king.

name: margaery
line: It's beautiful. Will you show me how it works?

name: margaery
line: Would you take me hunting sometime? Forgive me, Your Grace. I know a hunt is no place for a woman.

name: margaery
line: May I? Please.

name: margaery
line: I imagine it must be so exciting to squeeze your finger here and watch something die over there.

name: margaery
line: I don't know, Your Grace Do you think I could?

name: margaery
line: Would you like to watch me?

name: margaery
line: Why?

name: margaery
line: Pardon me.

name: margaery
line: I have others.

name: margaery
line: And your mother?

name: margaery
line: Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.

name: margaery
line: Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.

name: margaery
line: And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.

name: margaery
line: Was your father a soldier, too?

name: margaery
line: You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.

name: margaery
line: Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.

name: margaery
line: Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: ( laughs )

name: margaery
line: The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?

name: margaery
line: Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.

name: margaery
line: Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.

name: margaery
line: The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.

name: margaery
line: Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.

name: margaery
line: I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.

name: margaery
line: And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.

name: margaery
line: (laughs)

name: margaery
line: Oh, no, it's quite all right, Your Grace. I'd love to see their tombs, really. It's like taking a walk through history.

name: margaery
line: This is so exciting.

name: margaery
line: (laughs)

name: margaery
line: I'm glad he did. I'm sorry, Your Grace. I know they did terrible things at the end, but their ancestors built this. Sometimes severity is the price we pay for greatness.

name: margaery
line: Shall we go and see them? If you give them your love, they will return it a thousandfold. I've spoken with them. I know how they feel about you. You led the defense of King's Landing. They adore you.

name: margaery
line: Ahem. I didn't mean to disturb you.

name: margaery
line: We'd like some privacy, please. If you wouldn't mind waiting back inside the keep. Or if you'd be kind enough to give me your names, I'll ask the king to speak with you himself.

name: margaery
line: What did you pray for?

name: margaery
line: Why not? I'll tell you what I prayed for in the sept this morning. Let's see, for my family's health and happiness, for an end to the war, for a short winter. Boring and traditional, I'm afraid. And you?

name: margaery
line: My cousin Alanna was the most beautiful girl I'd ever seen. When I was 12, I was all elbows and knees and Alanna looked like a goddess sent to torture me. Pig-face, she called me.

name: margaery
line: I think it had something to do with my nose. Whenever she passed me in the halls, she'd oink.

name: margaery
line: So I prayed that she'd catch a horrible skin disease. A week after that, she came down with porridge plague.

name: margaery
line: You don't have it in the North? Your skin starts to look like boiled oats and eventually your face slides off and you die in agony.

name: margaery
line: (nods, laughs)

name: margaery
line: Don't say that. No, you're not.

name: margaery
line: Oh, she grew up to be the most beautiful woman and married a handsome lord and they have darling children and live in a castle by the sea. It's all terribly frustrating.

name: margaery
line: I want us to be friends, good friends.

name: margaery
line: You must see Highgarden. You'd love it there. I know you would. We have a great masquerade the night of the harvest moon. You should see the costumes. People work on them for months.

name: margaery
line: The Queen Regent, you mean. Once I marry Joffrey, I'll be queen. And if you were to marry Loras. . .  Oh, your place would be at Highgarden, wouldn't it? We would be sisters, you and I. Would you like that?

name: margaery
line: Come on. Come walk with me.

name: margaery
line: I remember the first time I saw you in the throne room. I'd never seen anyone who looked so unhappy. I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa, and so does my grandmother.

name: margaery
line: You would have been happy at Highgarden. But women in our position must make the best of our circumstances.

name: margaery
line: Has Lord Tyrion mistreated you?

name: margaery
line: Has he been kind to you?

name: margaery
line: You don't want him, though.

name: margaery
line: Far from the worst Lannister, wouldn't you say?

name: margaery
line: My son will be king Sons learn from their mothers. I plan to teach mine a great deal. And your son, if I'm not mistaken, your son might be the Lord of Casterly Rock and the North someday. What?

name: margaery
line: If it's the pain you're worried about--

name: margaery
line: What is it, then? He's rather good-looking even with the scar. Especially with the scar.

name: margaery
line: Some women like tall men. Some like short men. Some like hairy men. Some like bald men. Gentle men, rough men, ugly men, pretty men, pretty girls. Most women don't know what they like until they've tried it. And, sadly, so many of us get to try so little before we're old and gray. Tyrion may surprise you. From what I've heard, he's quite experienced.

name: margaery
line: It can be. We're very complicated, you know. Pleasing us takes practice.

name: margaery
line: Yes, sweet girl. My mother taught me.

name: margaery
line: So am I the queen?

name: margaery
line: Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.

name: margaery
line: What was it like?

name: margaery
line: One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.

name: margaery
line: But I would have been the queen.

name: margaery
line: We are so fortunate to enjoy this marvelous food and drink. Not all among us are so lucky. To thank the gods for bringing the recent war to a just end, King Joffrey has decreed that the leftovers from our feast be given to the poorest in his city.

name: margaery
line: Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.

name: margaery
line: That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.

name: margaery
line: Thank you. I hope we see more of you.

name: margaery
line: My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.

name: margaery
line: (Standing) Look, the pie.

name: margaery
line: Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.

name: margaery
line: He's choking!

name: margaery
line: The wedding is in a fortnight, Grandmother. You can't say no to everything.

name: margaery
line: Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.

name: margaery
line: A shadow?

name: margaery
line: Joffrey is our king now.

name: margaery
line: And you've given none.

name: margaery
line: Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: Long may he reign.

name: margaery
line: He sits the throne like he was born to it.

name: margaery
line: No, he wasn't.

name: margaery
line: He was my husband. My king.

name: margaery
line: Your Grace, I feel...

name: margaery
line: No.

name: margaery
line: It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.

name: margaery
line: He has you.

name: margaery
line: Oh. After all that's happened... it sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.

name: margaery
line: We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.

name: margaery
line: I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.

name: margaery
line: I can't believe you're going. Leaving me alone here with these people.

name: margaery
line: (laughs)

name: margaery
line: No. Have they even agreed to the match? No one tells me anything.

name: margaery
line: (laughs)

name: margaery
line: Mm-hmm.

name: margaery
line: (laughs)

name: margaery
line: Well, he could have done.

name: margaery
line: You don't know, Grandmother.

name: margaery
line: What? I don't understand.

name: margaery
line: Kingsguard.

name: margaery
line: I'm not a visitor, Your Grace. Word has itI'm to be your bride.

name: margaery
line: Did you know that people in arranged marriages often never meet until their wedding day? Before we decide to spend our lives together, we ought to get to know one another. Don't you think?

name: margaery
line: It can be our secret. Hmm? If we're going to be man and wife, we'll have a few secrets from her, I hope. So, Your Grace...

name: margaery
line: Hello. Aren't you a proper fellow?

name: margaery
line: Very handsome.

name: margaery
line: That's very cruel. You don't strike me as cruel.

name: margaery
line: That's a relief. Because you know what happens when we marry?

name: margaery
line: When we marry, I become yours. Forever. It's getting late. I should go. May I come and visit you again? All right, then.

name: margaery
line: Remember, our little secret.

name: margaery
line: No. You were lovely.

name: margaery
line: Yes. (Chuckles).

name: margaery
line: No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.

name: margaery
line: Wouldn't that be glorious? (They laugh. Tommen leans in to kiss her). Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?

name: margaery
line: No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.

name: margaery
line: So strange… Husband.

name: margaery
line: I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.

name: margaery
line: (Sits up). I love to sail.

name: margaery
line: I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.

name: margaery
line: Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?

name: margaery
line: It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. (Pours them some wine).

name: margaery
line: You are. And the king. (Hands him win). But you'll always be her baby-boy.

name: margaery
line: I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. (Sits down and begins to comb her hair). Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.

name: margaery
line: I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" (Laugher). And he said, "Well, what is the record? I'm sure we can break it."

name: margaery
line: Mother! (Gets up and hugs Cersei). Welcome.

name: margaery
line: Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.

name: margaery
line: You are very sweet.

name: margaery
line: I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.

name: margaery
line: Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. (Margaery’s friends laugh).

name: margaery
line: Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?

name: margaery
line: In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.

name: margaery
line: Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.

name: margaery
line: We’re late for dinner as it is.

name: margaery
line: I’m very hungry.

name: margaery
line: What’s your name?

name: margaery
line: I’m afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.

name: margaery
line: Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?

name: margaery
line: In any event… (throws Loras his clothes) you shouldn’t keep your intended waiting.

name: margaery
line: Lucky you.

name: margaery
line: You think I want that woman married to my brother?

name: margaery
line: Perhaps.

name: margaery
line: Perhaps?

name: margaery
line: Why is my brother in a cell?

name: margaery
line: We both know who did. (Walks away). You told me she was returning to Casterly Rock.

name: margaery
line: She's jealous you're not hers anymore. Arresting my brother is her revenge.

name: margaery
line: (Scoffs). Oh, my sweet, sweet King. (Sits down). Do you have any affection for me at all?

name: margaery
line: I can't bear to think of my brother locked away in some grimy cell.

name: margaery
line: Do you promise?

name: margaery
line: You're the King of the Andals, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, the Protector of the Realm. And you let a band of fanatics imprison your brother by law.

name: margaery
line: Are you? When?

name: margaery
line: You don't know?

name: margaery
line: (Walking out). I have to send word to Grandmother.

name: margaery
line: I need to be with my family, Your Grace. (Continues walking).

name: margaery
line: Everyone knew about him and Renly.

name: margaery
line: But he was the king’s brother.

name: margaery
line: Cersei is behind this.

name: margaery
line: You call me forward?

name: margaery
line: I am the queen.

name: margaery
line: They are lies.

name: margaery
line: All of them.

name: margaery
line: Yes, I swear it.

name: margaery
line: What?

name: margaery
line: Tommen! Tommen!

name: margaery
line: You can’t do this, I am the queen! Tommen, Tommen! I am your queen, how dare you!

name: margaery
line: I know you did this.

name: margaery
line: Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You’re not very good at those, I’m afraid. Perhaps that’s why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.

name: margaery
line: I don’t want to see you again.

name: margaery
line: Leave.

name: margaery
line: Get out you hateful bitch!

name: margaery
line: With all my heart, Your Grace. I have come to love you from afar. Tales of your courage and wisdom have never been far from my ears. And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.

name: margaery
line: Loras! Highgarden!

name: margaery
line: Now, now, my love. My brother fought valiantly for you.

name: margaery
line: You are very welcome here, Lady Stark. I'm so sorry for your loss.

name: margaery
line: As is your right. You are a king.

name: margaery
line: Thank you, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: You think so? I can't decide how I like it better. This way, or this way.

name: margaery
line: Here, let me.

name: margaery
line: Do you want my brother to come in and help?

name: margaery
line: He could get you started. I know he wouldn't mind. Or I can turn over and you can pretend I'm him.

name: margaery
line: There's no need for us to play games. Save your lies for court. You're going to need a lot of them.

name: margaery
line: Your enemies aren't happy about us. They want to tear us apart. And the best way to stop them is to put your baby in my belly. We can try again later. You decide how you want to do it, with me, with me and Loras, however else you like. Whatever you need to do. You are a king.

name: margaery
line: We need to go home. Loras.

name: margaery
line: There's no time for this.

name: margaery
line: Brienne of Tarth murdered Renly.

name: margaery
line: You can't stay here.

name: margaery
line: You can't avenge him from the grave. Bring the horses. Please.

name: margaery
line: He was very handsome.

name: margaery
line: "Your Grace." Calling yourself king doesn't make you one. And if Renly wasn't a king, I wasn't a queen.

name: margaery
line: No. I want to be the queen.

name: margaery
line: Lord Baelish.

name: margaery
line: It would be my pleasure. It took me weeks to learn my way around the camp. Twice I walked in on officers in stages of undress. And the moment I learn which tent is mine, we're on the move again.

name: margaery
line: I am not tutored in warfare, but basic arithmetic favors the side with the greater numbers.

name: margaery
line: The place of a Kingsguard is by the king's side.

name: margaery
line: You seem quite interested in our marriage.

name: margaery
line: You've never married, have you?

name: margaery
line: That is sad. Though perhaps it's for the best. The whole notion of marriage seems to confuse you, so allow me to explain. My husband is my king, and my king is my husband. Here is your tent, Lord Baelish. Good night.

name: margaery
line: Faith is the way, Father.

name: margaery
line: You mutilated him. You gave me your word.

name: margaery
line: And where is the queen mother?

name: margaery
line: There’s something wrong.

name: margaery
line: Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

name: margaery
line: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I’m telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

name: margaery
line: We all need to leave now!

name: margaery
line: Loras. Stay with me.

name: margaery
line: Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

name: margaery
line: Let us through!

name: margaery
line: I’d like to see my brother.

name: margaery
line: Please. How is he? At least tell me that.

name: margaery
line: I am the queen and I demand to see my brother.

name: margaery
line: My brother, can you tell me how he is?

name: margaery
line: I have nothing to confess.

name: margaery
line: None of us are.

name: margaery
line: I’d go to my brother, my husband, my family.

name: margaery
line: Quality takes time.

name: margaery
line: And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness. Book of the Stranger, verse 25.

name: margaery
line: Septa Unella reads it to me. At me.

name: margaery
line: So what did you do?

name: margaery
line: Who?

name: margaery
line: Loras. Loras.

name: margaery
line: Listen to me. You need to stay strong.

name: margaery
line: You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.

name: margaery
line: They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That’s why he’s letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.

name: margaery
line: All right.

name: margaery
line: No, Your Grace.

name: margaery
line: We’ll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.

name: margaery
line: Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?

name: margaery
line: Yes, I have. He’s not quite what we thought he was, is he?

name: margaery
line: You think I’m mad. I sound mad.

name: margaery
line: He is. There’s something about him. His way of looking at the world. It’s not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It’s taken me a while. He’s helped me.

name: margaery
line: Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I’ve had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.

name: margaery
line: It’s all right. It really is. It’s such a relief to let go of those lies.

name: margaery
line: I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don’t erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.

name: margaery
line: The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.

name: margaery
line: “Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman’s love calm a man’s brute nature. A wife salves her husband’s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”

name: margaery
line: For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.

name: margaery
line: Of course.

name: margaery
line: No.

name: margaery
line: It’s just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.

name: margaery
line: Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.

name: margaery
line: My grandmother?

name: margaery
line: Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.

name: margaery
line: Grandmother.

name: margaery
line: Grandmother, please.

name: margaery
line: You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.

name: margaery
line: The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn’t. They showed mercy.

name: margaery
line: Loras’s only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He’ll have to renounce his name and title...

name: margaery
line: ...and live his life as a penitent.

name: margaery
line: He can begin again.

name: margaery
line: As a free man.

name: margaery
line: I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.

name: margaery
line: But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.

name: margaery
line: You must.

name: margaery
line: Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.

name: margaery
line: The Mother watches over us all.

name: margaery
line: Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.

name: margaery
line: Shall we pray?

name: brienne
line: You were armed when we were taken.

name: brienne
line: All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman.' You were slower than I expected. And more predictable.

name: brienne
line: And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.

name: brienne
line: Maybe you were as good as people said once. Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.

name: brienne
line: Would I?

name: brienne
line: You think I care about my teeth?

name: brienne
line: What does it matter?

name: brienne
line: If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist? You'd let them do what they wanted?

name: brienne
line: My lord, I am Brienne of Tarth. Lady Catelyn Stark commanded me to deliver Ser Jaime to King's Landing.

name: brienne
line: (screams)

name: brienne
line: Yes.

name: brienne
line: By putting one foot in front of the other.

name: brienne
line: I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.

name: brienne
line: If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.

name: brienne
line: Not your concern, Kingslayer.

name: brienne
line: How would you know?

name: brienne
line: Move.

name: brienne
line: Gods, no.

name: brienne
line: Shut your mouth.

name: brienne
line: I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.

name: brienne
line: I did not fancy him.

name: brienne
line: I'm not interested in foul rumors.

name: brienne
line: Shut your mouth!

name: brienne
line: South. You?

name: brienne
line: And you.

name: brienne
line: He doesn't.

name: brienne
line: We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.

name: brienne
line: Silence, Kingslayer.

name: brienne
line: Good luck.

name: brienne
line: Be quick about it.

name: brienne
line: Get up.

name: brienne
line: Get up now.

name: brienne
line: What are you doing here?

name: brienne
line: There's another tub.

name: brienne
line: Why should I care how you die?

name: brienne
line: Don't you mock me.

name: brienne
line: You need trust to have a truce.

name: brienne
line: Of course.

name: brienne
line: If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?

name: brienne
line: Help! Help! The Kingslayer!

name: brienne
line: He's going to fall. He's going to fall off his horse. Someone help him.

name: brienne
line: Stop!

name: brienne
line: Eat. What are you doing?

name: brienne
line: You can't die. You need to live to take revenge.

name: brienne
line: You coward. A little misfortune and you're giving up.

name: brienne
line: You lost your hand.

name: brienne
line: I know what you did for me. You told them Tarth was full of sapphires. It's called the Sapphire Isle because of the blue of its water. You knew that. Why did you help me?

name: brienne
line: I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to--

name: brienne
line: I thought you were gone.

name: brienne
line: Have they told you what they plan to do with me?

name: brienne
line: With Locke?

name: brienne
line: When Catelyn Stark released you, we both made a promise to her. Now it's your promise. You gave your word. Keep it and consider the debt paid.

name: brienne
line: Good-bye, Ser Jaime.

name: brienne
line: Ah!

name: brienne
line: I will not.

name: brienne
line: Hold my legs.

name: brienne
line: Pull him up!

name: brienne
line: Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?

name: brienne
line: What sort of hobble?

name: brienne
line: If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.

name: brienne
line: It’s at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You’re carrying the saddle bags.

name: brienne
line: Morning!

name: brienne
line: I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?

name: brienne
line: Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.

name: brienne
line: No.

name: brienne
line: I do.

name: brienne
line: “Oathkeeper.”

name: brienne
line: Good name.

name: brienne
line: My father.

name: brienne
line: Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you’re going to do it, you might as well do it right.”

name: brienne
line: Seven blessings. I’m Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.

name: brienne
line: You’re Arya Stark.

name: brienne
line: I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.

name: brienne
line: I know. I wish I could’ve been there to protect her.

name: brienne
line: I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.

name: brienne
line: She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King’s Landing.

name: brienne
line: I’m not paid by the Lannisters.

name: brienne
line: Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.

name: brienne
line: I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -

name: brienne
line: Arya!

name: brienne
line: She is.

name: brienne
line: Come with me Arya. I’ll take you to safety.

name: brienne
line: And that’s what you’re doing? Watching over her?

name: brienne
line: I have no wish to kill you Ser.

name: brienne
line: Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?

name: brienne
line: Why weren’t you watching her?

name: brienne
line: Which way Pod? Which way did she go?

name: brienne
line: Arya!

name: brienne
line: I'm no lady, Your Grace.

name: brienne
line: Apologies, Your Grace. I never did master the curtsy.

name: brienne
line: I just wanted to congratulate you both and wish you good fortune. The country has been at war too long. I hope your reign is long and peaceful.

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: I don't serve your brother, Your Grace.

name: brienne
line: Your Grace.

name: brienne
line: My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.

name: brienne
line: My lady, I know this is a very busy time for you, but if I could just have a moment.

name: brienne
line: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.

name: brienne
line: I meant no offense.

name: brienne

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: Perhaps you should have stayed with him. It's not going to be a pleasant journey for you. It could take weeks to get to the Wall, depending on the weather.

name: brienne
line: Well, Lady Sansa's brother's at Castle Black. If I were her, that's where I'd go. Feel free to stop at any point.

name: brienne
line: I've made it this far in the world without a squire. I don't see why I need one now.

name: brienne
line: I'm not a knight. And I'm not a slaver, either. I don't own you.

name: brienne
line: "Ser Jaime Lannister. Knighted and named to the Kingsguard in his 16th year. At the sack of King's Landing, murdered his king Aerys II. Pardoned by Robert Baratheon. Thereafter known as the Kingslayer."

line: I pledged my life to their mother Catelyn Stark. I swore to her I'd bring her daughters home.

name: brienne
line: I do not fight for the Boltons. I’m Brienne of Tarth. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. I was there when he was murdered by a shadow with your face. You murdered him? With blood magic?

name: brienne
line: In the name of Renly of House Baratheon, First of his Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, and Protector of the Realm, I, Brienne of Tarth, sentence you to die. Do you have any last words?

line: (Walks away to get firewood). Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.

line: Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. (Sits down). And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.

name: brienne

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: (After a few moments). When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. (Pauses). And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. (Smiles). My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. (Her smile drops). Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty’, they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They’re nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.

name: brienne
line: Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.

name: brienne
line: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.

line: Lady Sansa, before your mother's death, I was her sworn sword. I gave my word I would find you and protect you. I will shield your back and keep your council, and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.

name: brienne
line: I was.

line: Us? The only reason you’re here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren’t safe in the capital. You’re hundreds of miles from King’s Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You’re safe.

line: I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.

name: brienne

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: Without him, my lady, you would not be alive. He armed me, armored me, and sent me to find you and bring you home because he'd sworn an oath to your mother.

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: It's the first thing I learnt when I came to the North. Keep your fire going. Every time you leave the room, put more wood on.

line: Euron Greyjoy ambushed Queen Daenerys and her fleet. One of the dragons was killed, several ships destroyed, Missandei captured.

name: brienne
line: They're going to destroy that city. You know they will.

name: brienne
line: You're not like your sister. You're not. You're better than she is. You're a good man and you can't save her. You don't need to die with her. Stay here. Stay with me. (voice breaking) Please. Stay.

name: brienne
line: Aye.

line: Ser Podrick.

line: I think we can all agree that ships take precedence over brothels.

name: brienne
line: My name is Brienne of Tarth. Please inform Ser Jaime Lannister I’ve come to speak with him. Tell him I have his sword.

name: brienne

line: I don’t think you know many girls like her.

name: brienne
line: You’re a knight, Ser Jaime. I know there is honor in you. I’ve seen it myself.

name: brienne
line: I do no such thing. Take Riverrun without bloodshed. Ride south with your mission complete and your army intact.

name: brienne

name: brienne

line: Should I fail to persuade the Blackfish to surrender, and if you attack the castle, honor compels me to fight for Sansa’s kin.

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: Ser Jaime kept his word to your niece Catelyn Stark. He sent me to find Sansa, to help her as Catelyn wanted. He gave me this sword to protect her. That is what I have done and I will continue to do until the day I die.

name: brienne
line: You have more than she does.

name: brienne
line: Find the maester. We need to get a raven north to Sansa.

name: brienne

name: brienne

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: I saw her with a man. I don’t think he hurt her. She didn’t want to leave him, he didn’t want to leave her.

name: brienne

name: brienne
line: It was a difficult choice, my lady.

name: brienne
line: Lady Sansa, I offer my services once again. I will shield your back and keep your council and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.

name: brienne
line: Lady Sansa asked you a question.

name: brienne
line: I’ve sworn to protect you, my lady.

name: brienne
line: We can send the Blackfish a raven.

name: brienne
line: I don’t like leaving you here alone.

name: brienne
line: Not him. He seems trustworthy. A bit brooding, perhaps. I suppose that’s understandable, considering. The others, though. Davos and the Red Woman helped a man murder his own brother with blood magic. And when Stannis paid for his crime, where were they? Already out looking for a leader with better prospects. And that wildling fellow with the beard --

name: brienne
line: Then why did you lie to him when he asked you how you learned about Riverrun?

name: brienne
line: I saw what happened. I saw Stannis’ forces defeated in the field.

name: brienne
line: We’ve met before. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. Before Renly was assassinated with bloodmagic.

name: brienne
line: Yes, it’s in the past. It doesn’t mean I forget. Or forgive. He admitted it, you know.

name: brienne
line: Stannis. Just before I executed him.

name: pycell
line: In the sight of gods and men, we gather to ascertain the guilt or innocence of this...man Tyrion Lannister. May the Mother grant them mercy. May the Father give them such justice as they deserve. And may the Warrior guide the hand of our champion...

name: tyrion
line: Lady Sansa.

line: Oh, yes. The husband of your dreams. But you do look glorious. Perhaps we could have a moment alone. Do you mind? Podrick, could you escort Lady Stark's handmaiden?

name: tyrion
line: Astoundingly long.

name: tyrion
line: Neck. You have one. How old are you exactly?

name: tyrion
line: Well, talk won't make you any older. My lord father has commanded me to consummate this marriage.

name: tyrion
line: Stop. I can't. I could, I won't.

name: tyrion
line: If my father wants someone to get fucked, I know where he can start. I won't share your bed. Not until you want me to.

name: tyrion
line: And so my watch begins.

name: tyrion
line: You really ought to knock.

name: tyrion
line: Hmm. Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall. Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall.

name: tyrion
line: I have a list.

name: tyrion
line: For laughing at me? Do I look like Joffrey to you? No, death seems a bit extreme. Fear of death, on the other hand--

name: tyrion
line: My lady, people have been laughing at me far longer than they've been laughing at you. I'm the Halfman, the Demon Monkey, the Imp.

name: tyrion
line: The disgraced daughter and the Demon Monkey. We're perfect for each other.

name: tyrion
line: Who? Whom?

name: tyrion
line: Ah. I could speak to Lord Varys and learn their perversions. Anyone named Desmond Crakehall must be a pervert.

name: tyrion
line: I am the Imp. I have certain standards to maintain.

name: tyrion
line: Lady Sansa!

name: tyrion
line: Why sheep shift?

name: tyrion
line: My lady--

name: tyrion
line: Killed a few puppies today?

name: tyrion
line: 'Roslin caught a fine fat trout. Her brothers gave her a pair of wolf pelts for her wedding. Signed Walder Frey.' Is that bad poetry or is it supposed to mean something?

name: tyrion
line: No. She is no longer yours to torment.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I'm a monster. Perhaps you should speak to me more softly, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies.

name: tyrion
line: You just sent the most powerful man in Westeros to bed without his supper.

name: tyrion
line: A treasonous statement. Joffrey is king.

name: tyrion
line: No. I think armies give you power.

name: tyrion
line: Robb Stark had one, never lost a battle, and you defeated him all the same.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I know. Walder Frey gets all the credit. Or the blame, I suppose, depending on your allegiance. Walder Frey is many things, but a brave man? No. He never would have risked such an action if he didn't have certain assurances.

name: tyrion
line: I'm all for cheating. This is war.

name: tyrion
line: So that's why you did it? To save lives?

name: tyrion
line: The northerners will never forget.

name: tyrion
line: Do you think she'll open her legs for me after I tell her how we murdered her mother and brother?

name: tyrion
line: I will not rape her.

name: tyrion
line: Use small words. I'm not as bright as you.

name: tyrion
line: (smirks)

name: tyrion
line: No, it's a very good lesson. Only it's easy for you to preach utter devotion to family when you're making all the decisions.

name: tyrion
line: When have you ever done something that wasn't in your interest but solely for the benefit of the family?

name: tyrion
line: Sansa.

name: tyrion
line: Keep up.

name: tyrion
line: It's not easy being drunk all the time. Everyone would do it if it were easy.

name: tyrion
line: She doesn't deserve this.

name: tyrion
line: There's nothing worse than a late-blooming philosopher.

name: tyrion
line: Will you be facing your marriage to Ser Loras with the same philosophical spirit?

name: tyrion
line: I seem to remember saying something similar about my own marriage.

name: tyrion
line: So you can tell Father it was you who finally talked me into it?

name: tyrion
line: You have children. How happy would you say you are?

name: tyrion
line: Even Joffrey?

name: tyrion
line: How long does it go on?

name: tyrion
line: Every time we deal with an enemy, we create two more.

name: tyrion
line: Intimate. Lovely table. Better chairs than the old small council chamber. Conveniently close to your own quarters. I like it.

name: tyrion
line: Far be it from me to hinder true love, but Lord Baelish's absence would present certain problems. The royal wedding may end up being the most expensive event in living memory. Summer has ended, hard days lie ahead. Not a good time to leave the crown's finances unattended.

name: tyrion
line: Master of Coin?

name: tyrion
line: I'm quite good at spending money, but a lifetime of outrageous wealth hasn't taught me much about managing it.

name: tyrion
line: A surprising place to keep the royal ledgers.

name: tyrion
line: Not for bastards.

name: tyrion
line: Pod. Pod. Take them outside. I'll be there in a moment.

name: tyrion
line: Only my life. Not all that significant, I'm afraid.

name: tyrion
line: If only the Master of Coin had such power.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, that. Of course. A simple misunderstanding.

name: tyrion
line: We don't. I did fuck her once.

name: tyrion
line: But we don't.

name: tyrion
line: Why don't you ask her? Any advice for me on my new position?

name: tyrion
line: If I had a gold dragon for every time I heard that joke, I'd be richer than you are.

name: tyrion
line: Good point.

name: tyrion
line: I've tried quite a few. Well, lots of work to do. Enjoy the Eyrie.

name: tyrion
line: You think all reading is dull reading.

name: tyrion
line: The secret history of the Seven Kingdoms is written in these pages.

name: tyrion
line: Unless he made it all up, yes.  Podrick, do keep up.

name: tyrion
line: Podrick.

name: tyrion
line: After a long consultation with my colleague Ser Bronn, I finally found a suitable reward for the services you've provided over and above what might be considered reasonable. Tell me, Pod, have you ever been with a woman?

name: tyrion
line: Wonderful. Genna specializes in first-timers.

name: tyrion
line: A fair enough repayment for putting your spear through my would-be killer's face, wouldn't you say?

name: tyrion
line: Now, as it happens, Marei is quite the spear handler herself. She's here to thank you for staying by my side as the battle raged all around me.

name: tyrion
line: Kayla is famous from here to Volantis in certain circles. One of four women in the world who can perform a proper Meereenese Knot.

name: tyrion
line: She's here to thank you for being a thoroughly respectful fellow who's never once failed to address me as 'my lord.

name: tyrion
line: Be back in time for my supper.

name: tyrion
line: For years I've heard that Littlefinger is a magician. Whenever the crown needs money, he rubs his hands together and, poof, mountains of gold.

name: tyrion
line: No.

name: tyrion
line: Worse, he's borrowing it.

name: tyrion
line: We can't afford to pay it back, that's what's wrong with it. The crown owes millions to my father.

name: tyrion
line: Forgive a debt, my father? For a man of the world, you're strangely naive.

name: tyrion
line: Well Ahem! The basic principle is I lend you money, and after an agreed upon period of time, you return it with interest.

name: tyrion
line: Well, you have to.

name: tyrion
line: This is why I don't lend you money. Anyway, it's not my father I'm worried about. It's the Iron Bank of Braavos. We owe them tens of millions. If we fail to repay these loans, the bank will fund our enemies. One way or another, they always get their gold back.

name: tyrion
line: Ah, the return of the conquering hero. Does he have a little jaunt in his step?

name: tyrion
line: You were gone a long time. I trust you got your money's worth. Or should I say my money's worth?

name: tyrion
line: Oh, it was a gift, Podrick. This is more than I give you in a year.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, then it's much more than I give you in a year.

name: tyrion
line: Have you ever known a whore to turn down gold? They were happy enough to take it when I gave it to them.

name: tyrion
line: What did you do to them?

name: tyrion
line: And they seemed to like these things?

name: tyrion
line: Only they weren't paid.

name: tyrion
line: Is that what you're telling us?  {PODRICK doesn't deny it.

name: tyrion
line: Sit down, Podrick.

name: tyrion
line: We're going to need details. Copious details.

name: tyrion
line: We've spoken of this. You cannot come here.

name: tyrion
line: Did anyone see you? No.

name: tyrion
line: You sure? My father does not make idle threats. Having you killed would be the high point of his week. You have to be absolutely certain.

name: tyrion
line: All right. What is this problem?

name: tyrion
line: Baelish doesn't have friends.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, Ros? The redhead?

name: tyrion
line: I try to know as many people as I can. You never know which one you'll need.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, well, we shouldn't be judgmental about these things.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, please. All right, yes, I fucked her once. Twice.

name: tyrion
line: But since I met you, my lady, I've been with no one else.

name: tyrion
line: Not as much as I like you, obviously, or she'd be the one torturing me right now. What did she say about Littlefinger?

name: tyrion
line: Is there an idiot in any village who trusts Littlefinger?

name: tyrion
line: We can't. Now that the Lannisters have discarded her, Sansa will have many suitors. A great beauty with a very old name.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, she is, objectively, very. Her face is quite pleasing-to other men and to women, people in general. But not to me, of course. I only have eyes for you.

name: tyrion
line: I don't even want to talk about her.

name: tyrion
line: Only because you're making me.

name: tyrion
line: This is cruel and unfair. Cruelly unfair.

name: tyrion
line: Hmm, yes.

name: tyrion
line: Only if you stop. But you mustn't come here again.

name: tyrion
line: Do you hear me? You've come to a dangerous place full of dangerous people. Dangerous people.

name: tyrion
line: Pod?

name: tyrion
line: What are they doing here?

name: tyrion
line: No, I don't think so.

name: tyrion
line: They stay outside.

name: tyrion
line: Why are you here?

name: tyrion
line: The man who cut me lost more than his nose.

name: tyrion
line: Thanks to Father. Of course, it wasn't a rebel who tried to kill me.

name: tyrion
line: Grand Maester Pycelle made the same joke. You must be proud to be as funny as a man whose balls brush his knees.

name: tyrion
line: How do you know that?

name: tyrion
line: What do I want from him? He's my father. Do I need to want something? I'm sure he loves me dearly, as any father loves his child, his baby boy. Yet he hasn't come to visit once since arriving in King's Landing. I lay here, my face split in half, but Father never came.

name: tyrion
line: Why do you care what I want from him?

name: tyrion
line: Slandered? When?

name: tyrion
line: You did have your guards beat her. A girl of nine, I believe.

name: tyrion
line: She lost an eye, if I remember correctly.

name: tyrion
line: It's not slander if it's true.

name: tyrion
line: Why are you so nervous about what I'm going to say to Father?

name: tyrion
line: Any lies in particular?

name: tyrion
line: Still makes me more clever than you.

name: tyrion
line: A number of people in this city want to kill me. You're here to protect me.

name: tyrion
line: Do you grow bored protecting me?

name: tyrion
line: Poor? Poor? Under my patronage you've become a knight, you've served as Commander of the City Watch.

name: tyrion
line: I'm sure you filled your pockets.

name: tyrion
line: I thought we were friends.

name: tyrion
line: How much?

name: tyrion
line: Double?

name: tyrion
line: I don't even know how much I'm paying you now.

name: tyrion
line: ( sighs ) The badge looks good on you. Almost as good as it looked on me. Are you enjoying your new position?

name: tyrion
line: I was very happy as Hand of the King.

name: tyrion
line: It wasn't your bed at the time.

name: tyrion
line: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

name: tyrion
line: Why does everyone assume I want something? Can't I simply visit with my beloved father? My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

name: tyrion
line: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal. I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls. I bled in the mud for our family. And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell. But what do I want? A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

name: tyrion
line: I want what is mine by right. Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles. But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance. The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock. I am your son and lawful heir.

name: tyrion
line: It is mine by right.

name: tyrion
line: Why?

name: tyrion
line: Thank you for seeing me, my lady. I had hoped we might discuss a few financial matters.

name: tyrion
line: It's the royal wedding. I'm told you had a hand in planning it.

name: tyrion
line: It's shaping up to be a very involved affair. The word extravagant has been used.

name: tyrion
line: I understand that.

name: tyrion
line: But, as Master of Coin, it falls upon me to calculate the cost for the crown. As of now, it's a huge expense.

name: tyrion
line: And we're at war, Lady Olenna.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, and maintaining supply lines--

name: tyrion
line: And we are so grateful for your contributions which are necessary for the preservation of the realm.

name: tyrion
line: I would.

name: tyrion
line: (nods)

name: tyrion
line: My lady--

name: tyrion
line: Quite sufficient. Thank you.

name: tyrion
line: Give me that.

name: tyrion
line: What's she doing here?

name: tyrion
line: You'll be pleased to learn that after one conversation with Olenna Tyrell, I've saved the crown hundreds of thousands on this wedding.

name: tyrion
line: I'm Master of Coin. Saving money is important.

name: tyrion
line: (to Cersei) Stop that. You're making me uncomfortable.

name: tyrion
line: Very well. She's a lovely girl. Missing some of Loras' favorite bits, but I'm sure they'll make do.

name: tyrion
line: It wasn't my best, but--

name: tyrion
line: Sansa is the key to the North? I seem to remember she has an older brother.

name: tyrion
line: The Tyrell army is helping us to win this war. Do you really think it's wise to refuse them?

name: tyrion
line: And how do we do that?

name: tyrion
line: Wonderful.

name: tyrion
line: You can't mean it.

name: tyrion
line: Joffrey has made this poor girl's life miserable since the day he took her father's head. Now she's finally free of him and you give her to me? That's cruel even for you.

name: tyrion
line: She's a child!

name: tyrion
line: And if I refuse?

name: tyrion
line: I was wed. Or don't you remember?

name: tyrion
line: I hope we might speak. In confidence.

name: tyrion
line: About the events of the Blackwater. Perhaps this is the wrong time?

name: tyrion
line: I thought one of your little birds might have knowledge of my sister's intentions to--

name: tyrion
line: I didn't inherit Littlefinger's spies along with his position, I'm afraid. Which is why I'm coming to you. I need proof.

name: tyrion
line: I need to know.

name: tyrion
line: I don't know. Do I?

name: tyrion
line: Yes, ahem. I feel the need for actual revenge against the actual person who tried to have me killed. Which will require a degree of influence, which--

name: tyrion
line: The sorcerer.

name: tyrion
line: I don't suppose there's anything we can do about this.

name: tyrion
line: It's hard to say which of the four of us is getting the worst of this arrangement. Probably Sansa. Though Loras will certainly come to know a deep and singular misery.

name: tyrion
line: On a boat you built.

name: tyrion
line: I'm your family. A member of your family who has actively contributed to that family's survival. Whether or not you or Father or anyone else wants to admit it.

name: tyrion
line: Trying to have me killed is an odd way of saying thank you. There are two people in King's Landing who can give an order to a Kingsguard. Did you or did you not order Ser Mandon to kill me during the Battle of the Blackwater?

name: tyrion
line: The impulse I understand. He hates me because I'm the only one who tells him what he really is. So, fair enough. He wants me dead. But his stupidity? He could have had me poisoned and no one would have known. But the king orders a Kingsguard to murder the Hand of the King in full view of his own army. The boy's an idiot.

name: tyrion
line: I want you to tell me if my life is still in danger.

name: tyrion
line: Seven kingdoms united in fear of Tywin Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: You may escape, at least. Once Jaime gets back, Ser Loras may come down with a terrible case of sword through bowels.

name: tyrion
line: Jaime or not, I'm truly fucked.

name: tyrion
line: I beg your pardon, my lady.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, it should be quite a wedding. I need to speak with you, Lady Sansa.

name: tyrion
line: Alone, if I may.

name: tyrion
line: Sometimes we think we want to hear something and it's only afterwards when it's too late that we realize we wished we'd heard it under entirely different circumstances.

name: tyrion
line: She's a child.

name: tyrion
line: A tall child.

name: tyrion
line: Not that young.

name: tyrion
line: Older.

name: tyrion
line: Shae isn't going to like it.

name: tyrion
line: I should never have told you about that.

name: tyrion
line: Two women to despise me and a whole kingdom to join them.

name: tyrion
line: I don't pay you to put evil notions in my head. The ones already there don't need company.

name: tyrion
line: Solid gold from the mines outside Lannisport. Smithed in Casterly Rock.

name: tyrion
line: You could buy a ship with these.

name: tyrion
line: What?

name: tyrion
line: Of course you're not going anywhere.

name: tyrion
line: I didn't ask for this marriage. I didn't want it.

name: tyrion
line: That doesn't mean that--this is duty, not desire.

name: tyrion
line: I don't have a choice. My father--

name: tyrion
line: What would I do there? Juggle? I am a Lannister of Casterly Rock.

name: tyrion
line: My feelings for you have not changed. I will marry Sansa Stark and do my duty by her.

name: tyrion
line: I swear to you it will not be like that.

name: tyrion
line: I will buy you a good home somewhere in the city. You will have fine clothes, guards to keep you safe, servants. Any children we might have will be well provided for.

name: tyrion
line: Listen. Listen to me, my lady.

name: tyrion
line: You are. You'll always be my lady.

name: tyrion
line: Wine always helps. I thank you for it. Trial by combat. Deciding a man's guilt or innocence in the eyes of the gods by having two other men hack each other to pieces. Tells you something about the gods. How much longer?

name: tyrion
line: Do you think Oberyn has a chance? The Red Viper of Dorne. You don't get a name like that unless you're deadly, right?

name: tyrion
line: Oh, he's going to die. I'm going to die.

name: tyrion
line: That's putting it mildly. What's the punishment for regicide? Drawing and quartering? Hanging? Breaking at the wheel?

name: tyrion
line: Seems rather ordinary. And he was my nephew as well, so what is that? Fratricide is brothers. Filicide is sons. Nepoticide. That's the one. Matricide, patricide, infanticide, suicide. There's no kind of killing that doesn't have its own word.

name: tyrion
line: Cousins, you're right. There is no word for cousin killing. Well done. Do you remember cousin Orson? Orson Lannister?

name: tyrion
line: Simple? Used to sit all day in the garden. Crushing beetles with a rock.

name: tyrion
line: Nothing made him happier.

name: tyrion
line: On the contrary. Laughing at another person's misery was the only thing that made me feel like everyone else.

name: tyrion
line: For you. You drifted away.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, other interests. But I stayed with Orson.

name: tyrion
line: I was curious. Why was he smashing all those beetles? What did he get out of it? First thing I did was ask him. "Orson, why are you smashing all those beetles?" He gave me an answer. "Smash the beetles. Smash 'em. Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!" I wasn't deterred. I was the smartest person I knew. Certainly I had the wherewithal to unravel the mysteries that lay at the heart of a moron. So I went to Maester Volarik's library.

name: tyrion
line: Turns out, far too much has been written about great men and not nearly enough about morons. Doesn't seem right. In any case, I found nothing that illuminated the nature of Orson's affliction or the reason behind his relentless beetle slaughter. So I went back to the source. I may not have been able to speak with Orson, but I could observe him, watch him the way men watch animals to come to a deeper understanding of their behavior. *picks up a beetle* And as I watched, I became more and more sure of it. There was something happening there. His face was like the page of a book written in a language I didn't understand. But he wasn't mindless. He had his reasons. And I became possessed with knowing what they were. I began to spend inordinate amounts of time watching him. I would eat my lunch in the garden, chewing my mutton to the music of "khuu, khuu, khuu". And when I wasn't watching him, I was thinking about him. Father droned on about the family legacy and I thought about Orson's beetles. I read the histories of Targaryen conquests. Did I hear dragon wings? No. I heard "khuu, khuu, khuu" and I still couldn't figure out why he was doing it. And I had to know, because it was horrible that all these beetles should be dying for no reason.

name: tyrion
line: I know, I know. But still, it filled me with dread. Piles and piles of them, years and years of them. How many countless living crawling things smashed and dried out and returned to the dirt? In my dreams I found myself standing on a beach made of beetle husks stretching as far as the eye could see. I woke up crying, weeping for their shattered little bodies. I tried to stop Orson once.

name: tyrion
line: He just pushed me aside with a "khuu" and kept on smashing. Every day until that mule kicked him in the chest and killed him. *puts the beetle back on the ground* So what do you think? Why did he do it? What was it all about?

name: tyrion
line: Looks like very light armor.

name: tyrion
line: You could at least wear a helmet. You shouldn't drink before a fight.

name: tyrion
line: It could get you killed. It could get me killed.

name: tyrion
line: Thank the gods.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, get on with it you son of a whore.

name: tyrion
line: What’re you doing?

name: tyrion
line: Who’s helping you?

name: tyrion
line: Varys?

name: tyrion
line: I suppose this is goodbye, then.

name: tyrion
line: Jaime, thank you. For my life.

name: tyrion
line: I’m sorry. I’m sorry.

name: tyrion
line: All my life, you’ve wanted me dead.

name: tyrion
line: I loved her.

name: tyrion
line: Shae.

name: tyrion
line: I murdered her. With my own hands.

name: tyrion
line: It doesn’t matter?

name: tyrion
line: Say that word again.

name: tyrion
line: I am your son, and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn’t poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

name: tyrion
line: I can’t go back there. She’s in there.

name: tyrion
line: I am your son. I have always been your son.

name: tyrion
line: Podrick. Apologies for the stench.

name: tyrion
line: A noble effort.

name: tyrion
line: You're a good lad. Any word of Shae?

name: tyrion
line: I suppose that's a good thing. What are they saying about me out there?

name: tyrion
line: Do you believe I murdered Joffrey?

name: tyrion
line: No. Gods, no. The world is a better place without him, but I had nothing to do with it. I would like to think if I were arranging a royal assassination, I'd plan it in such a way that I wouldn't be standing there gawking like a fool when the king died. Trial in a fortnight. Have they announced the judges yet?

name: tyrion
line: Of course.

name: tyrion
line: Who will vote exactly as my father tells him to vote.

name: tyrion
line: Oberyn? Give it to my father. He never fails to take advantage of a family tragedy.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I can call my own witnesses? How generous of them. Very well, my wife. Sansa.

name: tyrion
line: Gone?

name: tyrion
line: No one had more 'cause to kill Joffrey than Sansa, but the girl is no assassin. Whoever killed the king wanted me to lose my head for it. And with my wife's disappearance, it makes me seem that much more guilty. Podrick.

name: tyrion
line: They'll be following you now.

name: tyrion
line: I don't know. They. They. The ominous they. The man pulling the strings. Or woman. My father. Maybe Joffrey was too much work for him. Sweet Tommen will be so much easier to handle. Whenever something bad happens to me, I assume it's my sister that had a hand in it. But say what you will of Cersei, she loves her children. She is the only one I'm certain had nothing to do with this murder. Which makes it unique as King's Landing murders go.

name: tyrion
line: Varys could vouch for me if he dared.

name: tyrion
line: Of course. Fetch Bronn. I have a job for him.

name: tyrion
line: Why not?

name: tyrion
line: And my brother? Will they at least allow me to see Jaime?

name: tyrion
line: Ser Podrick Payne? Has a nice ring to it. What did you tell him?

name: tyrion
line: Are you going to accept their offer?

name: tyrion
line: Testifying against me wasn't a suggestion. If they can't tempt you with honey, they'll choose something less sweet.

name: tyrion
line: Pod, the trial's in a fortnight. They'll want an answer before that.

name: tyrion
line: I will not have you dying on my behalf. Do you hear me? If I have to take that long walk to the executioner's block, I don't want to see your head already mounted.

name: tyrion
line: Pod, I am giving you an order. Go and find my brother. Tell him I need him. And get yourself out of King's Landing before it's too late. Pod! This is farewell.

name: tyrion
line: Pod. There has never lived a more loyal squire.

name: tyrion
line: Your new hand, it's nicer than the old one. Wouldn't you agree, Pod?

name: tyrion
line: You're not eating. Why is no one eating? My wife wastes away and my brother starves himself.

name: tyrion
line: You lost a hand, not a stomach. Try the boar. Cersei can't get enough of it since one killed Robert for her.

name: tyrion
line: A toast. To the proud Lannister children. The dwarf, the cripple, and the mother of madness.

name: tyrion
line: It's only wine.

name: tyrion
line: What about your left?

name: tyrion
line: You're the Lord Commander now. Command. Let others do the fighting. When was the last time Father used a sword?

name: tyrion
line: Train, then. Learn to fight with your other hand.

name: tyrion
line: You need a proper, discreet swordsman. As it happens, I have just the one.

name: tyrion
line: Lord Varys. Breakfasting with the king?

name: tyrion
line: Oh, to be foreign.

name: tyrion
line: So I'm guilty of being seen with my own wife's handmaiden. My father will ask you if there's anything more and you'll tell him some clever lie.

name: tyrion
line: Forgive me if I don't weep for you.

name: tyrion
line: She won't leave. I've told her this is a dangerous place so many times, she no longer believes it.

name: tyrion
line: "The Lives of Four Kings." Grand Maester Kaeth's history of the reigns of Daeron the Young Dragon, Baelor the Blessed, Aegon the Unworthy, and Daeron the Good. A book every king should read.

name: tyrion
line: Don't.

name: tyrion
line: Don't call me that.

name: tyrion
line: I'm afraid our friendship can't continue.

name: tyrion
line: There's a ship waiting in the harbor bound for Pentos.

name: tyrion
line: I'm a married man. My wife has suffered a great deal, as you well know. I don't want her to suffer anymore on my account. I need to uphold my vows.

name: tyrion
line: I need to do right by her.

name: tyrion
line: By our children.

name: tyrion
line: I'm not afraid.

name: tyrion
line: Shae.

name: tyrion
line: You're a whore! Sansa is fit to bear my children and you are not. I can't be in love with a whore. I can't have children with a whore. How many men have you been with? 500? 5,000?

name: tyrion
line: I have enjoyed my time with all of them and I have enjoyed my time with you most of all. But now that time is over.

name: tyrion
line: You'll have a comfortable life in Pentos. Bronn will escort you to your ship.

name: tyrion
line: Better her than you.

name: tyrion
line: You saw her board the ship?

name: tyrion
line: You saw the ship sail away?

name: tyrion
line: How do you know?

name: tyrion
line: There's someone following you?

name: tyrion
line: Hello.

name: tyrion
line: My lady. My lady.

name: tyrion
line: We'll have to find another way to thank the king.

name: tyrion
line: One taste of combat was enough for me, Your Grace. I would like to keep what remains of my face. I think you should fight him. This was but a poor imitation of your own bravery on the field of battle. I speak as a firsthand witness. Climb down from the high table with your new Valyrian sword and show everyone how a true king wins his throne. Be careful, though. This one is clearly mad with lust. It would be a tragedy for the king to lose his virtue hours before his wedding night.

name: tyrion
line: A fine vintage. Shame that it spilled.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace does me a great honor.

name: tyrion
line: Let's find out.

name: tyrion
line: I thought I might change out of these wet clothes, Your Grace.

name: tyrion
line: If it please Your Grace, Lady Sansa is very tired.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace?

name: tyrion
line: Please don't.

name: tyrion
line: This is the Prince of Dorne we're waiting for, not one of your sellsword friends.

name: tyrion
line: There's bad blood between the Martells of Dorne and the Lannisters of Casterly Rock. Has been for years.

name: tyrion
line: No need for cynicism. I happen to be an accomplished diplomat.

name: tyrion
line: Ah, here we are.

name: tyrion
line: Can you read the sigils?

name: tyrion
line: Boy knows his Dornish Houses.

name: tyrion
line: And House Martell, a red sun pierced by a spear?

name: tyrion
line: Well met, my lords. His Grace King Joffrey welcomes you in his name. My lord father, the King's Hand, sends his greetings as well. I am Tyrion Lannister of Casterly Rock, Master of Coin. Forgive me. I don't see Prince Doran in your company.

name: tyrion
line: (Nods.) Yes, the king will be delighted to enjoy the company of a warrior as renowned as Prince Oberyn at his wedding feast.

name: tyrion
line: And where is Prince Oberyn?

name: tyrion
line: Very well. My lords, these fine men from the City Watch will escort you to your quarters in the Red Keep.

name: tyrion
line: You must be weary after such a long journey.

name: tyrion
line: We must find Prince Oberyn before he kills somebody or several somebodies.

name: tyrion
line: You're famous for fucking half of Westeros. You just arrived at the capital after two weeks of bad roads, where would you go?

name: tyrion
line: Prince Oberyn, forgive the intrusion. We heard there might be...

name: tyrion
line: trouble.

name: tyrion
line: I'm here to welcome you to the capital.

name: tyrion
line: If there's anything I can do to make your stay...

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I partook. Now I'm married.

name: tyrion
line: Prince Oberyn, if I may, a word in private?

name: tyrion
line: Oh, they take all kinds.

name: tyrion
line: The king is very grateful that you traveled all this way for his wedding.

name: tyrion
line: Well, speaking as a fellow second son, I have grown rather used to being the family insult.

name: tyrion
line: Why did you come to King's Landing, Prince Oberyn?

name: tyrion
line: I thought we were speaking truth.

name: tyrion
line: I wasn't actually present.

name: tyrion
line: I've heard rumors.

name: tyrion
line: I wasn't there. I don't know what happened.

name: tyrion
line: My lady, you do need to eat.

name: tyrion
line: If I could have a moment alone with my wife.

name: tyrion
line: I can't let you starve.

name: tyrion
line: I swore to protect you.

name: tyrion
line: My lady, I am your husband. Let me help you.

name: tyrion
line: I don't know, but I can try.

name: tyrion
line: I could get you essence of nightshade to help you sleep.

name: tyrion
line: What happened to your family was a terrible crime. I didn't know your brother. He seemed like a good man, but I didn't know him. Your mother, on the other hand, I admired her. She wanted to have me executed, but I admired her. She was a strong woman. And she was fierce when it came to protecting her children. Sansa. Your mother would want you to carry on. You know it's true.

name: tyrion
line: Of course. Of course. Prayer can be helpful, I hear.

name: tyrion
line: What are you doing?

name: tyrion
line: How many times have I told you? You can't visit me here.

name: tyrion
line: Of course I haven't forgotten.

name: tyrion
line: Things are a bit tense right now.

name: tyrion
line: My nephew the king wants to murder me. My wife hates me because my father murdered her family. Oberyn Martell wants to murder everyone whose last name is Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: I told you. It's not a good time.

name: tyrion
line: Shae.

name: tyrion
line: Love her? I barely know her. She's a child. She despises me.

name: tyrion
line: Of course I don't love her.

name: tyrion
line: Ship you away?

name: tyrion
line: What in the world are you talking about?

name: tyrion
line: Shh. I don't know what you're talking about.

name: tyrion
line: Is that supposed to make me feel better?

name: tyrion
line: It's complicated, yes. So how is our sister?

name: tyrion
line: Her son?

name: tyrion
line: My trial for regicide.Yes, I know. I know the whole bloody country thinks I'm guilty. I know that one of my three judges has wished me dead more times than I can count. And that judge is my father. As for Cersei, well, she's probably working on a way to avoid a trial altogether by having me killed.

name: tyrion
line: So, should I turn around and close my eyes?

name: tyrion
line: The Kingslayer brothers. You like it? I like it. You're really asking if I killed your son?

name: tyrion
line: Well, you could set me free.

name: tyrion
line: Then there's really nothing else to say.

name: tyrion
line: Sorry, I'd forgotten. I'd hate for you to do something inappropriate.

name: tyrion
line: Except I didn't do it.

name: tyrion
line: Sansa couldn't have done this. She had more reason than anyone in the Seven Kingdoms. Do you think it's a coincidence she disappeared the same night Joffrey died?

name: tyrion
line: No, but... Sansa's not a killer. Not yet, anyway.

name: tyrion
line: Let me guess, I've been pardoned.

name: tyrion
line: Really?

name: tyrion
line: Well, we mustn't disappoint Father.

name: tyrion
line: No.

name: tyrion
line: Not that I know of.

name: tyrion
line: Choked on his pigeon pie.

name: tyrion
line: Or the pigeons. Just leave me out of it.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, why don't you tell them what Joffrey was doing?

name: tyrion
line: Pointing a loaded crossbow at Sansa Stark while you tore at her clothes and beat her.

name: tyrion
line: (shakes his head)

name: tyrion
line: Father, may I ask the witness one question?

name: tyrion
line: You once said that without me, this city would have faced certain defeat. You said the histories would never mention me, but you would not forget. Have you forgotten, Lord Varys?

name: tyrion
line: Not going well, is it?

name: tyrion
line: Oh, you think so?

name: tyrion
line: (nods)

name: tyrion
line: Shae. Please don't.

name: tyrion
line: Father, I wish to confess. I wish... to confess.

name: tyrion
line: I saved you. I saved this city and all your worthless lives. I should have let Stannis kill you all.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, Father. I'm guilty. Guilty. Is that what you want to hear?

name: tyrion
line: No, of that I'm innocent. I'm guilty of a far more monstrous crime. I am guilty of being a dwarf.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, yes, I am. I've been on trial for that my entire life.

name: tyrion
line: (To Cersei) Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than 1,000 lying whores.

name: tyrion
line: (To the crowd) I wish I was the monster you think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.

name: tyrion
line: I will not give my life for Joffrey's murder. And I know I'll get no justice here. So I will let the gods decide my fate. I demand a trial by combat.

name: tyrion
line: I'm sorry, what am I grateful for? The opportunity to live and die at the Wall as punishment for a crime I did not commit?

name: tyrion
line: Yes, I fell in love with a whore. And I was stupid enough to think that she had fallen in love with me. That deal you made, it was everything Father wanted. You do see that? He gets you back as his heir. The future Lord of the Rock. And he ships me off to Castle Black, out of sight at last. All so perfect. It felt good to take that from him. He knows I'm innocent and he's willing to sacrifice me anyway. He's willing to sacrifice any of us. Not you. You're the golden son. You could kill a king, lose a hand, fuck your own sister, you'll always be the golden son.

name: tyrion
line: At least I got to tell them what they really are.

name: tyrion
line: Don't give up on me just yet. I survived one trial by combat, even though you weren't there to save me.

name: tyrion
line: Where's your sense of adventure? Even if you lose, imagine the look on Father's face when you fall.

name: tyrion
line: Our family name snuffed out with a single swing of the sword.

name: tyrion
line: Well... Bronn fought for me once, he'll do it again. If he wins, I expect I'll be in his debt for the rest of my life.

name: tyrion
line: Will you find him for me? Who does Cersei plan on naming as a champion? I hope it's Ser Meryn Trant. I'd enjoy watching Bronn disembowel that pompous child beater.

name: tyrion
line: You have new clothes.

name: tyrion
line: I sent for you days ago.

name: tyrion
line: Doing what?

name: tyrion
line: Lollys Stokeworth? She doesn't strike me as your sort of girl.

name: tyrion
line: She's dim-witted.

name: tyrion
line: When my sister arranged this love match, did she mention that Lollys has an older sister?

name: tyrion
line: And you understand the rules of inheritance?

name: tyrion
line: She still gets Castle Stokeworth when her father dies.

name: tyrion
line: (scoffs.)

name: tyrion
line: You and my sister deserve each other. Why did you bother to come here?

name: tyrion
line: Is it two wives you want or two castles?

name: tyrion
line: I'm a bit short on castles at the moment. But I can offer you gold and gratitude.

name: tyrion
line: You might be surprised. A Lannister always pays his debts.

name: tyrion
line: My wife is heir to Winterfell. If I emerge from this with my head still on my shoulders, I may one day rule the North in her name. I could carve you out a big piece of it.

name: tyrion
