line: Does he frighten you so much?

name: tyrion
line: Because you're my friend.

name: tyrion
line: I understand.

name: tyrion
line: Why are you sorry? Because you're an evil bastard with no conscience and no heart? That's what I liked about you in the first place.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, we did.

name: tyrion
line: I suppose I'll have to kill the Mountain myself. Won't that make for a great song?

name: tyrion
line: I imagined you'd be back at the brothel at this hour.

name: tyrion
line: Mm, do tell. I've got every kind of filth down here except the kind I like.

name: tyrion
line: Oh.

name: tyrion
line: Making honest feelings do dishonest work is one of her many gifts.

name: tyrion
line: She didn't need to bother you. It looks as though I've taken care of that myself. The joy she will feel when my head leaves my neck. She's wanted this for a long time.

name: tyrion
line: I think I would have remembered that.

name: tyrion
line: You and my family have more in common than you might admit.

name: tyrion
line: That would have made things so much easier.

name: tyrion
line: Well... sooner or later, Cersei always gets what she wants.

name: tyrion
line: If you want justice, you've come to the wrong place.

name: tyrion
line: The smaller man it is.

name: tyrion
line: There’s always been more than enough death in the world for my taste. I can do without it in my leisure time.

name: tyrion
line: It’s easy to confuse what is with what ought to be. Especially when what is has worked in your favor.

name: tyrion
line: My father would have liked you.

name: tyrion
line: Well said, you’re an eloquent man. Doesn’t mean you’re wrong. In my experience, eloquent men are right every bit as often as imbeciles.

name: tyrion
line: You can end this.

name: tyrion
line: You can!

name: tyrion
line: Stay close!

name: tyrion
line: If only I were otherwise.

name: tyrion
line: You want revenge against the Lannisters? I killed my mother Joanna Lannister the day I was born. I killed my father Tywin Lannister with a bow to the heart. I am the greatest Lannister killer of our time.

name: tyrion
line: Into your service? Your Grace we have only just met. It’s too soon to know if you deserve my service.

name: tyrion
line: When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She had no wealth, no lands, no army, only a name and a handful of supporters, most of whom probably thought they could use that name to benefit themselves. They kept her alive, moving her from place to place, often hours ahead of the men who had been sent to kill her. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. He thought she was our best, last chance to build a better world. I thought you were worth meeting at the very least.

name: tyrion
line: Because you can not build a better world on your own. You have no one at your side who understands that land you want to rule. The strengths and the weaknesses of the houses that will either support or oppose you.

name: tyrion
line: Killing and politics aren’t always the same thing. When I served as Hand of the King I did quite well with the latter considering the king in question preferred torturing animals to leading his people. I could do an even better job advising a ruler worth the name.

name: tyrion
line: I know.

name: tyrion
line: Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can’t remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

name: tyrion
line: Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

name: tyrion
line: And did he?

name: tyrion
line: A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you’re going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you’re ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

name: tyrion
line: Have you decided yet whether you’re going to have me killed?

name: tyrion
line: I can see why you would think so. It’s what your father would have done.

name: tyrion
line: My father? Who publicly sentenced me to death? I’d say his thoughts on having me killed were abundantly clear.

name: tyrion
line: Some day if you decide not to execute me, I’ll tell you all about why I killed my father. And on that day, should it ever come, we’ll need more wine than this.

name: tyrion
line: So here we sit, two terrible children of two terrible fathers.

name: tyrion
line: I’ve heard stories.

name: tyrion
line: To see if you were the right kind of terrible.

name: tyrion
line: The kind that prevents your people from being even more so.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, that was wise. And you agreed to marry someone you loathed for the greater good. Very impressive. My own sister married someone she loathed as well, though not by choice and certainly not for the greater good, Gods forbid. She ended up having him killed.

name: tyrion
line: It’s not impossible that Varys was right about you after all.

name: tyrion
line: Yes. He was the one who convinced me to come find you. He was my travelling companion before Ser Jorah seized that role for himself.

name: tyrion
line: He did what he had to do to survive. He did a lot of other things that he didn’t have to do. I suspect he’s the main reason you weren’t slaughtered in your crib.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, oddly. He might be the only person in the world that I trust. Besides my brother.

name: tyrion
line: That’s the one.

name: tyrion
line: Your queenly prerogative. I had given up on life until Varys convinced me you might be worth living for. You chop off my head? Well, my final days were interesting.

name: tyrion
line: No? Banish me?

name: tyrion
line: So if I’m not going to be murdered, and I’m not going to be banished...

name: tyrion
line: Advise you on what?

name: tyrion
line: The Iron Throne. Perhaps you should try wanting something else.

name: tyrion
line: I’m not entirely joking. There’s more to the world than Westeros after all. How many hundreds of thousands of lives have you changed for the better here? Perhaps this is where you belong. Where you can do the most good.

name: tyrion
line: And when you get back to your home, who supports you?

name: tyrion
line: Let’s be generous and assume that’s going to happen. Here in Slaver’s Bay you had the support of the common people and only the common people. What was that like, ruling without the rich? House Targaryen is gone, not a single person who shares your blood is alive to support you. The Starks are gone as well, our two terrible fathers saw to that. The remaining Lannisters won’t back you, not ever. Stannis Baratheon won’t back you either, his entire claim to the Throne depends on the illegitimacy of yours. That leaves the Tyrells. Not impossible, but not enough.

name: tyrion
line: It’s a beautiful dream. Stopping the wheel. You’re not the first person to have dreamt it.

name: tyrion
line: You love her, don’t you? How could you not. Of course, it’s hopeless for the both of you. Sellsword from the fighting pits, a disgraced knight. Neither one of you is fit consort for a queen. But, we always want the wrong woman.

name: tyrion
line: Dwarf. I believe that’s the word. Apologies. My Valyrian is a bit “nostril”.

name: tyrion
line: (Valyrian) “Rusty” (Common Tongue) Thank you.

name: tyrion
line: He’s right. The dragon headed north. If we’re going to find her, that’s where we’re to go.

name: tyrion
line: And I intend to help her do it.

name: tyrion
line: You betrayed her!

name: tyrion
line: And she exiled you, twice, I believe?

name: tyrion
line: Don’t blame me for your crimes, Mormont.

name: tyrion
line: Fine, fine, I suppose he can join us. Just as long as he promises not to kill me in my sleep.

name: tyrion
line: Pardon me?

name: tyrion
line: Not precisely, but I have other skills that’d be very useful--

name: tyrion
line: I have fought. I don’t claim to be a great warrior.

name: tyrion
line: Middling.

name: tyrion
line: And drink. I’ve survived so far.

name: tyrion
line: I suppose there’s no point in asking how you found me.

name: tyrion
line: Well, she didn’t execute me, so that’s a promising start. Now the heroes are off to find her, and I’m stuck here, trying to placate a city on the brink of civil war. Any advice for an old comrade?

name: tyrion
line: If only I knew someone with a vast network of spies.

name: tyrion
line: I did miss you.

name: tyrion
line: I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

name: tyrion
line: I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

name: tyrion
line: Mm, I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

name: tyrion
line: (Walks over to him). I will not be of any use to Daenerys Targaryen if I lose my mind. I can't remember the last face I saw that wasn't yours.

name: tyrion
line: I'm losing my mind.

name: tyrion
line: Look, we are thousands of miles from Westeros. (Pulls his hood up). What am I? (Varys shakes his head). One more drunk dwarf.

name: tyrion
line: Slaves.

name: tyrion
line: The only red priest we had in King's Landing was Thoros of Myr. This one's much better looking.

name: tyrion
line: Stone men. Good luck stopping this spread of grayscale with prayer. You'd have better luck dancing away the plague. (Varys shushes him worriedly).

name: tyrion
line: We're going to meet the Saviour! You should have told me. Who doesn't want to meet the Saviour?

name: tyrion
line: (Covering his face). Come on. Let's find a brothel.

name: tyrion
line: It's even better luck to suck a dwarf's cock.

name: tyrion
line: See? We blend right in. Just two more travellers, mad with lust.

name: tyrion
line: Curious... hair. (She looks at him).

name: tyrion
line: It appears you're not the only Targaryen supporter.

name: tyrion
line: Well, (Watches her kiss the man), she's taken.

name: tyrion
line: I need to speak to someone with hair.

name: tyrion
line: Hello?

name: tyrion
line: You've got no drink.

name: tyrion
line: Do I look like a man without money? (She looks at him incredulously). Never trust looks. Until quite recently, I was one of the richest men in the world. (She laughs). But who needs wealth when you can make a woman laugh? (Sits down). I always pay my debts, I'm well known for it.

name: tyrion
line: That’s because they’ve never met a queen.

name: tyrion
line: You know how to spot a liar. If I could pick any girl here, I would pick you.

name: tyrion
line: Because you have a skeptical mind.

name: tyrion
line: (After a moment). I'm, I'm sorry, I can't.

name: tyrion
line: I'm not.

name: tyrion
line: Gladly, but this, I can't do. Believe me, no one is more shocked than I am. I hope it passes. What will I do in my spare time? I’ll go for a piss, that’s a start.

name: tyrion
line: You made some kind of mistake. Why don't you tell me what you think you are doing and -

name: tyrion
line: There's a bug.

name: tyrion
line: When I agreed to come with you, did I misrepresent my intentions? (finishes his cup of wine) Besides, what is there for me to do inside this fucking box?

name: tyrion
line: I want to take a walk.

name: tyrion
line: She ought to offer her cunt. Best part of her for the best part of me. Well, I suppose a box is as good a place for me as anywhere.

name: tyrion
line: You're right. No point. (realizing) The road to Volantis? You said we were going to Meereen. What's in Volantis?

name: tyrion
line: And what do you hope to find at the end of the road to Meereen?

name: tyrion
line: We've already got a ruler. Everywhere has already got a ruler. Every pile of shit on the side of every road has someone's banner hanging from it.

name: tyrion
line: I didn't rule. I was a servant.

name: tyrion
line: Managed to kill a lot of people.

name: tyrion
line: She wanted me to leave King's Landing. She begged me. I wouldn't go.

name: tyrion
line: 'Cause I liked it. Power. Even as a servant. (takes a drink of wine)

name: tyrion
line: I find us repulsive.

name: tyrion
line: You're right. Let's go for a walk.

name: tyrion
line: How many dwarves are there in the world? Is Cersei going to kill them all?

name: tyrion
line: I still don’t see why I had to stay in this fucking crate once we set sail.

name: tyrion
line: Do you know what it’s like to stuff your shit through one of those air holes?

name: tyrion
line: Pentos?

name: tyrion
line: Much better.

name: tyrion
line: I don’t think I am anymore. A lord. Are you a lord if you kill your father? I don’t suppose they revoke your nobility for killing a whore. That has to be happen all the time.

name: tyrion
line: In a box. Why stop now?

name: tyrion
line: The future is shit. Just like the past.

name: tyrion
line: Eunuch, the spider, the master of whisperers.

name: tyrion
line: Not for a coward.

name: tyrion
line: You never told me why you set me free.

name: tyrion
line: You could have said no.

name: tyrion
line: Not as dangerous as releasing me. You risked your life, your position, everything. Why? You’re not family, you owe me nothing.

name: tyrion
line: A drunken dwarf will never be the savior of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: tyrion
line: You’re going to have to find another soldier. I’m done with Westeros and Westeros is done with me.

name: tyrion
line: I’m not well-suited for work.

name: tyrion
line: Compassion? Yes. I killed my lover with my bare hands. I shot my own father with a crossbow.

name: tyrion
line: What is it you want exactly?

name: tyrion
line: Where the castles are made of gingerbread and the moats are filled with blackberry wine. The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place.

name: tyrion
line: I will never sit on the Iron Throne.

name: tyrion
line: Good luck finding him.

name: tyrion
line: Can I drink myself to death on the road to Meereen?

name: tyrion
line: Don't worry. I'll be fine. Nothing broken, I don't think. Where are we now? Not the Rhoyne. (No response). Long, sullen silences and an occasional punch in the face. The Mormont way. Let's start over. I apologize for before. My mouth sometimes runs away from me. This doesn't have to be an unpleasant trip. We're going to be spending a lot of time together on the way to Meereen.

name: tyrion
line: What would make our time together truly enjoyable would be some wine.

name: tyrion
line: I am a person who drinks. People who drink need to keep drinking. Otherwise, they're not…

name: tyrion
line: I know where we are. You're taking us through Valyria.

name: tyrion
line: Have you sailed this route before?

name: tyrion
line: You're going to bring Daenerys a souvenir from her ancestral homeland in case I'm not enough?

name: tyrion
line: You know what they say. The Doom still rules Valyria. What about the demons and the flames? Aren't you afraid of the Doom?

name: tyrion
line: Oh.

name: tyrion
line: The Smoking Sea. How many centuries before we learn how to build cities like this again? Thousands of years the Valyrians were the best in the world at almost everything. And then -

name: tyrion
line: And then they weren't. "They held each other close and turned their backs upon the end. The hills that split asunder and the black that ate the skies; The flames that shot so high and hot that even dragons burned; Would never be the final sights that fell upon their eyes. A fly upon a wall, the waves the sea wind whipped and churned -"

name: tyrion
line: I would clap.

name: tyrion
line: I suppose this is it, then. This is what remains.

name: tyrion
line: What was that?

name: tyrion
line: Mormont, cut me free! (Jorah falls into the water). Mormont!

name: tyrion
line: Mormont! Mormont!

name: tyrion
line: (Shakes his head). You? (Jorah shakes his head). I've seen greyscale before, but nothing like that.

name: tyrion
line: It'd be kinder to put daggers in their hearts and be done with it. (Jorah spits). Thank you for saving me. Of course, I wouldn't have needed saving if you hadn't kidnapped me in the first place. (Jorah gets up). So what now?

name: tyrion
line: Without luck?

name: tyrion
line: That's the best idea you've had all day.

name: tyrion
line: Thank you. (After a long pause). Who are you?

name: tyrion
line: Do you have wine?

name: tyrion
line: I can't sleep without wine.

name: tyrion
line: You're going the wrong way. My sister's in Westeros. Westeros is west! We're heading east.

name: tyrion
line: You said you were taking me to the Queen.

name: tyrion
line: (Chuckles). What a waste of a good kidnapping. So happens I was heading there myself!

name: tyrion
line: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? (Holds out his hands expectantly. Jorah makes no move to respond). A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. (Jorah looks downtrodden). And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.

name: tyrion
line: So, those villages we were supposed to find. We can’t live on berries and roots.

name: tyrion
line: You’re not hungry?

name: tyrion
line: You’re an awful travelling companion, do you know that? Possibly the least charming man I have ever met.

name: tyrion
line: We are travelling together. In each other’s company. Therefore…

name: tyrion
line: I sailed from King’s Landing to Pentos in a crate. Without ever saying a word.

name: tyrion
line: Never occurred to you to ask why until now? You never wondered why Tyrion Lannister decided to visit a brothel in Volantis.

name: tyrion
line: I killed my father. He wanted to execute me for a crime I didn’t commit. And he was fucking the woman I loved.

name: tyrion
line: As miserable as you are, Mormont, at least your father was a good man.

name: tyrion
line: I met him. I visited the Wall. When I asked him about his men he knew all the stories, every one of them. He actually cared about the people in his command. How did they put it in the Watch? “We shall never see his like again.”

name: tyrion
line: You didn’t know. I’m sorry. I am.

name: tyrion
line: I only know what I heard

name: tyrion
line: He was leading an expedition beyond the wall. There was a mutiny. He was murdered by his own men.

name: tyrion
line: Why Daenerys? Why is she worth all this? As I recall, the Mormonts fought against the Targaryens during Robert’s Rebellion.

name: tyrion
line: I believe in many things.

name: tyrion
line: No.

name: tyrion
line: No.

name: tyrion
line: Doesn’t mean she’s going to be a great queen.

name: tyrion
line: The Targaryens are famously insane. What if she conquers the world? Then what? 1,000 years of peace and prosperity?

name: tyrion
line: We? Alright, let’s assume your dreams come true. She’s ecstatic when you bring her this enemy dwarf. She hacks off my head and restores your position. You command her army, sail to Westeros, defeat all your enemies, then watch as she climbs those steps and sits on the Iron Throne. Hurrah, long live the Queen. Then what?

name: tyrion
line: So a woman who has not spent a single day of her adult life in Westeros becomes the ruler of Westeros? That’s justice?

name: tyrion
line: Why, because her father who burned living men for amusement was the king?

name: tyrion
line: Why is it anchored?

name: tyrion
line: Wait, wait! Wait, wait, wait, let’s discuss this!

name: tyrion
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait! You can’t just hand a dried cock to a merchant and expect him to pay for it. He has to know it came from a dwarf. And how could he know unless he sees the dwarf?

name: tyrion
line: Guess again.

name: tyrion
line: The fighting puts in Mereen! You’re in luck then, you’re about to be rich. You are looking at one of the great warriors in the seven kingdoms.

name: tyrion
line: (looks at Jorah) Him.

name: tyrion
line: Sure, he’s a bit long in the tooth, a bit withered, been in the sun too long. We can all see that. But he is a veteran of 100 battles. They wrote songs about him!

name: tyrion
line: He won the tournament at Lannisport, unseating Ser Jaime Lannister himself.

name: tyrion
line: The Kingslayer!

name: tyrion
line: Wait! You have to buy me as well.

name: tyrion
line: We’re a team. I’m a great fighter, too.

name: tyrion
line: Thank you my Lord. Thank you.

name: tyrion
line: My Lord, if I may. I’ve heard Mereen’s become a free city. You might run into trouble if you try to fight slaves in the fighting pits. Now if you were to fight free men who were paid a wage…

name: tyrion
line: What are you doing?

name: tyrion
line: It’s true. He has.

name: tyrion
line: I am the gift. It’s a pleasure to meet you, Your Grace. My name is Tyrion Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: If the city falls, Stannis will burn every Lannister he can find. Of course I'm afraid.

name: tyrion
line: I'm a Lannister. I don't have a choice in all this. But it's not your war.

name: tyrion
line: You can't fuck your way out of everything.

name: tyrion
line: A wedding.

name: tyrion
line: "Is that it?" Nice touch. As if you don't know the name of every boy in town.

name: tyrion
line: I'm entirely sure you're entirely sure what I'm suggesting.

name: tyrion
line: Oddly enough, I do.

name: tyrion
line: There must be 20 miles of tunnels beneath the city.

name: tyrion
line: I'm not escaping. Strange as it sounds, I'm the captain of the ship, and if the ship goes down, I go with her.

name: tyrion
line: Well, I'm not.

name: tyrion
line: What of it?

name: tyrion
line: Blood spells, curses, shape-shifting. What do you think?

name: tyrion
line: Mmm, don't take it personally. I don't entirely trust myself.

name: tyrion
line: No, I don't believe you have.

name: tyrion
line: Remember, wait till the ships

name: tyrion
line: They must be far enough in

name: tyrion
line: I chopped wood once. No, I watched my brother chopping wood.

name: tyrion
line: Nor you, my friend.

name: tyrion
line: Of course we are. Just because I pay you for your services doesn't diminish our friendship.

name: tyrion
line: Oh! "Enhances." Fancy word for a sellsword.

name: tyrion
line: Lady Sansa and Sheila.

name: tyrion
line: Shae, yes. Surely my sister has asked you to join the other highborn ladies in Maegor's holdfast.

name: tyrion
line: Always been a great romantic, my nephew.

name: tyrion
line: Will you?

name: tyrion
line: Stay safe, my lady.

name: tyrion
line: On the way.

name: tyrion
line: That would make me the quarterman. It just doesn't have the same ring to it. Cut me in half and I won't be able to give the signal. No signal, no plan. No plan and Stannis Baratheon sacks this city, takes the Iron Throne, puts your pinched little head atop a gate somewhere. It might be quite amusing, except that my head would be up there, too. I've never much liked my head, but I don't want to see it removed just yet.

name: tyrion
line: Archers to their marks.

name: tyrion
line: Hold fast.

name: tyrion
line: Hold fast.

name: tyrion
line: He's a serious man, Stannis Baratheon.

name: tyrion
line: Rain fire on them.

name: tyrion
line: Hound, form a welcome party for any Baratheon troop that manages to touch solid ground. Pod, run to the King's Gate. Bring any men guarding it here, now.

name: tyrion
line: Can I get you some iced milk and a nice bowl of raspberries, too?

name: tyrion
line: You're on the wrong side of the wall.

name: tyrion
line: You're Kingsguard, Clegane. You must beat them back or they're going to take this city. Your king's city.

name: tyrion
line: If you won't defend your own city, why should they?

name: tyrion
line: Lead. Get down there and lead your people against the invaders who want to kill them.

name: tyrion
line: I'll lead the attack. I'll lead the attack!

name: tyrion
line: Pod, my helmet. Ser Mandon, you will bear the king's banner. Men, form up. Men Men! They say I'm half a man. But what does that make the lot of you?

name: tyrion
line: There's another way out. I'm going to show you. We'll come out behind them and fuck them in their arses.

name: tyrion
line: Don't fight for your king and don't fight for his kingdoms. Don't fight for honor. Don't fight for glory. Don't fight for riches, because you won't get any. This is your city Stannis means to sack. That's your gate he's ramming. If he gets in, it will be your houses he burns, your gold he steals, your women he will rape.

name: tyrion
line: Those are brave men knocking at our door. Let's go kill them.

name: tyrion
line: Attack!

name: tyrion
line: Oh, fuck me.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, but do you have to do it here?

name: tyrion
line: You should start wearing the gold cloak.

name: tyrion
line: You're commander of the City Watch. You shouldn't be dressed like a common

name: tyrion
line: Well, you're not sneaking through alleyways any longer. You're supposed to stand out.

name: tyrion
line: Fine, fine. No gold cloak.

name: tyrion
line: What?

name: tyrion
line: What? What? Why are you staring at me?

name: tyrion
line: To help me plan the defense of King's Landing.

name: tyrion
line: Stannis will be here any day.

name: tyrion
line: "An History of the Great Sieges of Westeros. " By Archmaester Shevelathin. Shevelatesh.

name: tyrion
line: I did not know. And how did you accomplish this marked drop in thievery?

name: tyrion
line: For questioning?

name: tyrion
line: We talked about this.

name: tyrion
line: Stannis knows King's Landing. He knows where the walls are strongest, and he knows which gates are weakest. The Mud Gate. A good ram will batter it down in minutes, and it's only 50 yards from the water. That's where he'll land.

name: tyrion
line: Pig shit.

name: tyrion
line: Thank you, Podrick.

name: tyrion
line: I have a certain sympathy for odd little boys.

name: tyrion
line: Excellent lamprey pie. Were you slaving away in the kitchen all day? I hear Joffrey plans on fighting. An inspiration for the troops. The young king in his shining armor fighting to defend the capital against the wicked old rebel.

name: tyrion
line: Younger boys are off fighting his war.

name: tyrion
line: What is he, 17? Remember Jaime at 17?

name: tyrion
line: It's not on the throne, either, sadly for all of us.

name: tyrion
line: No, I'd say you possess above-average intelligence.

name: tyrion
line: He'll have his Kingsguard protecting him. He has the finest armor gold can buy. He needs to be out there. The men will fight more fiercely seeing their king fighting beside them instead of hiding behind his mother's skirts. Any dessert?

name: tyrion
line: Because he has thousands of spies in his employ. Because he knows everything we do before we do it.

name: tyrion
line: Neither do you.

name: tyrion
line: It's not that little.

name: tyrion
line: Why are you smiling?

name: tyrion
line: And why are you happy?

name: tyrion
line: I thought you preferred blondes.

name: tyrion
line: Why do you care who I fuck?

name: tyrion
line: This is madness. Stannis will be here in days. You need me.

name: tyrion
line: Where did you find her?

name: tyrion
line: You've forgotten the most important thing about whores.

name: tyrion
line: You don't buy them, you only rent them.

name: tyrion
line: And how do I know you haven't killed her already?

name: tyrion
line: I'm sorry they hurt you. You must be brave.

name: tyrion
line: I promise I will free you.

name: tyrion
line: Never.

name: tyrion
line: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you're safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth. And you will know the debt is paid.

name: tyrion
line: Shae!

name: tyrion
line: We have to be more careful.

name: tyrion
line: There are people who want to hurt me.

name: tyrion
line: I would kill for you. Do you know that? I expect I'll have to before this is over. You're mine.

name: tyrion
line: Promise me.

name: tyrion
line: To strike? My dear nephew, you do see these men preparing the walls for siege? You do understand Stannis Baratheon sails this way?

name: tyrion
line: A brave choice, Your Grace. I'm sure your men will line up behind you.

name: tyrion
line: Imagine Stannis' terror.

name: tyrion
line: You're an intelligent man. I'd like to think I'm an intelligent man.

name: tyrion
line: I wish we could converse as two honest, intelligent men.

name: tyrion
line: What do you want? Tell me.

name: tyrion
line: My brother was the youngest Kingsguard in history. My sister became queen at the age of 19. When I reached manhood, my father put me in charge of all the drains and cisterns in Casterly Rock.

name: tyrion
line: The water never flowed better. And all the shit found its way to the sea. I never expected to have any real power. So when my father named me acting Hand

name: tyrion
line: I do. Last thing I expected.

name: tyrion
line: I'd like to keep playing it. If Stannis breaches the gates, the game is over.

name: tyrion
line: The Lord of Light wants his enemies burned, the Drowned God wants them drowned. Why are all the gods such vicious cunts? Where is the god of tits and wine?

name: tyrion
line: We should sail there immediately.

name: tyrion
line: A girl at the edge of the world is the least of our problems.

name: tyrion
line: One game at a time, my friend.

name: tyrion
line: Pod.

name: tyrion
line: Pod! Find Bronn or Varys. Tell them I am here with Maester Pycelle. Tell them I am very much alive.

name: tyrion
line: What happened?

name: tyrion
line: Where am I?

name: tyrion
line: Why should I believe you?

name: tyrion
line: To create strife between my sister and me.

name: tyrion
line: Pod.

name: tyrion
line: Would it be excessive of me to ask you to save my life twice in a week?

name: tyrion
line: You're a good lad. Get Bronn, tell him I want four of his most loyal gold cloaks outside my door at all times.

name: tyrion
line: Then my hill tribesmen.

name: tyrion
line: Don't want to swim too close to a drowning man? And I thought we were friends.

name: tyrion
line: It was good of you to come.

name: tyrion
line: Believe me, you don't.

name: tyrion
line: (shakes his head)

name: tyrion
line: Well?

name: tyrion
line: I'm a monster as well as a dwarf. You should charge me double.

name: tyrion
line: That was the arrangement we made. I pay you and you lie to me.

name: tyrion
line: Leave?

name: tyrion
line: What would we do in Pentos?

name: tyrion
line: I want to go with you.

name: tyrion
line: I can't. I do belong here. These bad people are what I'm good at. Outtalking them, outthinking them. It's what I am. And I like it. I like it more than anything I've ever done. Are you going to leave?

name: tyrion
line: Keep your voice down.

name: tyrion
line: I don't intend for you to stay here. I might be able to bring you into the castle kitchens. Again, only temporary.

name: tyrion
line: But you wouldn't be a cook. You'd pose as a scullion.

name: tyrion
line: Kitchen wench.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, but

name: tyrion
line: Your lion wants to see you alive. We've come to a dangerous place. My sister wants to hurt me. She'll look for any weakness she can find. She can't know about you.

name: tyrion
line: It's a compliment, my lady.

name: tyrion
line: Language can be a bit tricky here.

name: tyrion
line: Oh! Thank the gods. I haven't had a proper shit in six days.

name: tyrion
line: Right. I'm so grateful to have a man of your vast knowledge and wisdom on my side.

name: tyrion
line: I can trust you, Pycelle, can I not?

name: tyrion
line: These are perilous times. And the crown must forge new alliances. And these alliances must often be sealed in matrimony.

name: tyrion
line: I'm trusting the council with these plans, but the Queen mustn't know. We can't have her meddling in affairs that could determine the future of the realm. There's too much at stake.

name: tyrion
line: I'm brokering an alliance with House Martell of Dorne. Princess Myrcella will wed their youngest son when she comes of age, ensuring their loyalty and their army, should we need it.

name: tyrion
line: But remember, the Queen mustn't know.

name: tyrion
line: I plan to marry Princess Myrcella off to Theon Greyjoy.

name: tyrion
line: Precisely. Theon's father loathes the Starks and will convince the boy to come to our side. Greyjoy can destroy the Northern army from within and we can have his father's ships.

name: tyrion
line: But remember, you must tell no one.

name: tyrion
line: I plan to wed Princess Myrcella to Robin Arryn of the Vale. Lysa is not fond of me. But perhaps the promise of a royal match will convince her to let bygones be bygones.

name: tyrion
line: For men in our position, holding grudges can be an encumbrance, don't you think?

name: tyrion
line: Who better?

name: tyrion
line: The gratitude of the people of Westeros for helping to end this war, the adoration of the King for bringing the Vale back into the fold and Harrenhal.

name: tyrion
line: Never took you for a superstitious man. By all means, tear it down and rebuild. You'll be able to afford it. I plan to make you Lord of the Riverlands.

name: tyrion
line: You served my family well in the matter of the succession.

name: tyrion
line: I need you to deliver Lysa Arryn. I didn't need Janos Slynt. It's settled, then?

name: tyrion
line: Good. Oh. And remember

name: tyrion
line: Myrcella's a princess. Some would say she was born for this.

name: tyrion
line: Dorne is the safest place for her.

name: tyrion
line: That's why we need to seduce them. We're going to need their support in the war your son started.

name: tyrion
line: A guest.

name: tyrion
line: It's done, Cersei.

name: tyrion
line: You cannot stop it.

name: tyrion
line: Just how safe do you think Myrcella is if this city falls? Do you want to see her raped, butchered like the Targaryen children? Make no mistake. They'll mount her pretty little head on a spike right beside yours.

name: tyrion
line: No, afraid not. Sorry about that.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, I fear so. Sorry about that, too.

name: tyrion
line: That's a shame. You were to be the centerpiece of my next deception. My brother Jaime rots in a northern stockade. I would see him released. That's where you come in.

name: tyrion
line: No, he won't. But his mother might. How would you like to see your beloved Cat again?

name: tyrion
line: Find him?

name: tyrion
line: No, you don't.

name: tyrion
line: You disappoint me, Grand Maester.

name: tyrion
line: So loyal that you told the Queen about my plans to send Myrcella to Dorne.

name: tyrion
line: See, I told Varys that I was giving the Princess to the Greyjoys. I told Littlefinger that I planned to wed her to Robin Arryn. I told no one that I was offering her to the Dornish. No one but you.

name: tyrion
line: Cut off his manhood and feed it to the goats.

name: tyrion
line: Well, make do.

name: tyrion
line: How long have you been spying for my sister?

name: tyrion
line: I don't like his beard.

name: tyrion
line: How many Hands have you betrayed, Pycelle? Eddard Stark? Jon Arryn?

name: tyrion
line: So you poisoned him?

name: tyrion
line: But you let him die, made sure he succumbed.

name: tyrion
line: Get him out of my sight. Throw him in one of the black cells.

name: tyrion
line: For your trouble.

name: tyrion
line: Good. One of my better ideas.

name: tyrion
line: The Council has a reputation for serving past Hands poorly. I don't mean to follow Ned Stark to the grave.

name: tyrion
line: Why, am I about to hear one?

name: tyrion
line: Depends on the sellsword.

name: tyrion
line: He has a sword, the power of life and death.

name: tyrion
line: I've decided I don't like riddles.

name: tyrion
line: You brought this on yourself.

name: tyrion
line: Do you understand we’re losing the war?

name: tyrion
line: It was quite a battle.

name: tyrion
line: (Begins to pour wine). Strange things do happen. You should taste her fish pie.

name: tyrion
line: Men like Lord Varys and I can't let our disadvantages get the best of us. We'll make a fisherman of him yet. (Takes a sip).

name: tyrion
line: Your discretion is legendary, where your friends are concerned.

name: tyrion
line: I don't like threats.

name: tyrion
line: I'm not Ned Stark. I understand the way this game is played.

name: tyrion
line: And I am not. Threaten me again and I will have you thrown into the sea.

name: tyrion
line: You've perfected the art of tearing up papers. Give him his father's bones back, at least, as a gesture of good faith.

name: tyrion
line: Safe travels, cousin.

name: tyrion
line: You have a deft hand with diplomacy.

name: tyrion
line: Lord Commander asks that we send more men to man The Wall.

name: tyrion
line: Cold winds are rising, and the dead rise with them.

name: tyrion
line: According to the Commander, one of these dead men attacked him in his chambers. (The other stop leaving). Mormont doesn't lie.

name: tyrion
line: Apparently you burn him.

name: tyrion
line: I don't know what I believe, but here's a fact for you. The Night's Watch is the only thing that separates us from what lies beyond the Wall.

name: tyrion
line: Leave us, Podrick. I believe we know how to pour our own wine.

name: tyrion
line: Myself, I prefer the improper ones.

name: tyrion
line: You know your wines, my lord.

name: tyrion
line: Call me Tyrion, please. I'm sure you're getting used to fine dinners, now that you're a lord.

name: tyrion
line: Wars have been started for less.

name: tyrion
line: I heard there was some trouble in Littlefinger's brothel the other night.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, of course. City Watch must keep the peace. Only, I hadn't realized peace depended on killing babies.

name: tyrion
line: Quite right. Especially the queen's orders.

name: tyrion
line: No, but who else would want to murder King Robert's bastards? She's always been a jealous woman.

name: tyrion
line: You've heard the awful rumors about my brother and sister.

name: tyrion
line: That's good of you, but you have heard them. I suppose people who do believe that filth, consider Robert's bastards to be better claimants to the throne than Cersei's children.

name: tyrion
line: I appreciate your loyalty. Tell me.

name: tyrion
line: The fool! He had no idea you were already bought.

name: tyrion
line: I'm not questioning your honor, Lord Janos. I'm denying its existence.

name: tyrion
line: Dwarf? You should have stopped at imp. And yes, you will stand here and take it from me, unless you'd like to take it from my friend here.

name: tyrion
line: I intend to serve as Hand of the King until my father returns from the war, and seeing as you betrayed the last Hand of the King, well, I just wouldn't feel safe with you lurking about.

name: tyrion
line: The queen regent. And you're a fool to believe she's your friend.

name: tyrion
line: No, we shan't.

name: tyrion
line: There's a ship leaving for East Watch by the sea tonight. From there, I'm afraid it's rather a long walk to Castle Black. I hope you enjoy the Wall. I found it surprisingly beautiful, in a brutal, horribly uncomfortable sort of way.

name: tyrion
line: His name is Bronn... and he is the new commander of the City Watch.

name: tyrion
line: To the new Commander.

name: tyrion
line: If I told you to murder, an infant girl say, still at her mother's breast, would you do it without question?

name: tyrion
line: I have every right. I am the King's Hand.

name: tyrion
line: Listen to me, Queen Regent, you're losing the people. Do you hear me?

name: tyrion
line: You might find it difficult to rule over millions who want you dead. Half the city will starve when winter comes. The other half will plot to overthrow you. And your gold-plated thugs just gave them the rallying cry, “The Queen slaughters babies.” (Cersei says nothing). You don't even have the decency to deny it.

name: tyrion
line: It wasn't you who gave the order, was it? Joffrey didn't even tell you. Or did he tell you? I imagine that would be even worse.

name: tyrion
line: I'm no king, but I think there's more to ruling that that.

name: tyrion
line: (Tries not to laugh). As has Jaime repeatedly, according to Stannis Baratheon.

name: tyrion
line: She was my mother too.

name: tyrion
line: Beloved nephew.

name: tyrion
line: We looked for you on the battlefield. (Joffrey sits down). You were nowhere to be found.

name: tyrion
line: What a fine job you've done. (Turns to Myrcella). Look at you. (Kisses her). More beautiful than ever. (Turns to Tommen). And you! You, you're going to be bigger than the Hound, but much better looking. (Tyrion smiles. He and Myrcella laugh). This one doesn't like me.

name: tyrion
line: Me, too, dear. Death is so boring, especially now with so much excitement in the world. (Looks at Sansa). My Lady, I'm sorry for your loss.

name: tyrion
line: But still her father. Surely having so recently lost your own beloved father you can sympathize.

name: tyrion
line: Of course you are.

name: tyrion
line: Well, (Gulps down his wine), enjoy your name day, Your Grace. Wish I could stay and celebrate, but there is work to be done.

name: tyrion
line: Don't get up. More ravishing than ever, big sister. (Kisses Cersei on the cheek). War agrees with you. Forgive the interruption, carry on.

name: tyrion
line: (Sits down) It's been a remarkable journey. I, (grabs a glass), pissed off the edge of the Wall, I slept in a sky cell. (Pours himself wine). I fought with the hill tribes. So many adventures, so much to be thankful for.

name: tyrion
line: Yes., well, I, do believe the Hand of the King is welcome at all small council meetings.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, but in his absence…

name: tyrion
line: If I were capable of tricking father, I'd be emperor of the world by now. You brought this on yourself. (Cersei sits down).

name: tyrion
line: Quite right. You did nothing when your son called for Ned Stark's head. Now the entire North has risen up against us.

name: tyrion
line: Did you? You failed. That bit of theater will haunt our family for a generation.

name: tyrion
line: Who's won every battle he's fought. Do you understand we're losing the war?

name: tyrion
line: Nothing. But I know people. And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.

name: tyrion
line: Joffrey is King.

name: tyrion
line: I'm only here to advise him. And if the King listens to what I say, the King might just get his Uncle Jaime back.

name: tyrion
line: You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones. The Starks love their children as well. And we have two of them.

name: tyrion
line: One?

name: tyrion
line: Disappeared? What, in a puff of smoke? We had three Starks to trade. You chopped one's head off and let another escape. Father will be furious. It must be odd for you to be the disappointing child.

name: tyrion
line: A bit corpsey, yes.

name: tyrion
line: I thought you wanted to come here.

name: tyrion
line: You love the smell of dead bodies and shit?

name: tyrion
line: You can smell cum from the balcony?

name: tyrion
line: And so did the country.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, well, you need to be careful. No one can know you're here.

name: tyrion
line: You can't trust anyone in King's Landing. They're all liars; good liars, bad liars, one or two great liars.

name: tyrion
line: Me? I'm not from here. I'm a slave to the truth.

name: tyrion
line: Why do you think I am so little? I'm being, (Lays down on the bed with Shae), crushed beneath the weight of all that truth.

name: tyrion
line: Ned Stark actually slept on this, as if the poor man didn't suffer enough. One of the many changes we'll have to make around here.

name: tyrion
line: Accounts differ. Most seem to implicate Catelyn Stark in some way.

name: tyrion
line: Some say it was one of his own Kingsguard, while still others say it was Stannis himself who did it after negotiations went sour.

name: tyrion
line: It's not what Varys says. He says Renly's army is flocking to support Stannis, which would give Stannis superiority over us on both land and sea.

name: tyrion
line: And I say Father raised you to have too much respect for money. Stannis Baratheon is coming for us, sooner rather than later.

name: tyrion
line: She'll be safer in Dorne.

name: tyrion
line: It so happens that I am. Myrcella is a sweet, innocent girl and I don't blame her at all for you.

name: tyrion
line: Schemes and plots are the same thing. They are going to attack us. We need to be ready.

name: tyrion
line: May I ask specifically what the king has in mind?

name: tyrion
line: It's important that we talk about this.

name: tyrion
line: Wildfire? You wouldn't lie to me, would you, cousin?

name: tyrion
line: That's a lie right there.

name: tyrion
line: Tell me, if the vile allegations against my brother and sister are true, do you think it will make Jaime more likely to kill you or less likely? When I tell him you're fucking her, I mean.

name: tyrion
line: The smart money would be on more likely.

name: tyrion
line: But then perhaps his own unnatural urges will give him sympathy for yours.

name: tyrion
line: I suppose there's only one way to find out.

name: tyrion
line: When did she tell you this?

name: tyrion
line: Swear to me on what?

name: tyrion
line: But I don't care about your life.

name: tyrion
line: All right, all right. Enough. Even torturing you is boring. Just get out.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, Lancel, tell my friend Bronn to please kill you if anything should happen to me.

name: tyrion
line: Stannis has more infantry, more ships, more horses. What do we have?

name: tyrion
line: Well, I've never actually been able to kill people with it.

name: tyrion
line: He hasn't sent a raven in weeks. He's very busy. Being repeatedly humiliated by Robb Stark is time-consuming. We won't be able to hold the city against Stannis, not the way Joffrey's planning on holding it.

name: tyrion
line: It's hard to argue with his assessment.

name: tyrion
line: The king is a lost cause. It's the rest of us I'm worried about now.

name: tyrion
line: You have to admire his imagination.

name: tyrion
line: What? Demon monkey?

name: tyrion
line: Blame me? I'm trying to save them.

name: tyrion
line: Demon monkey.

name: tyrion
line: I remember reading an old sailors' proverb, "Piss on wildfire and your cock burns off. "

name: tyrion
line: My companion takes issue.

name: tyrion
line: How much do you have?

name: tyrion
line: My friend remains unconvinced.

name: tyrion
line: I'm afraid I have to concur with my advisor, Wisdom Haylene. The contents of this room could lay King's Landing low. You won't be making wildfire for my sister any longer. You'll be making it for me.

name: tyrion
line: What is the meaning of this?

name: tyrion
line: What kind of knight beats a helpless girl?

name: tyrion
line: Someone get the girl something to cover herself with. She is to be your queen. Have you no regard for her honor?

name: tyrion
line: For what crimes? She did not fight her brother's battle, you half-wit.

name: tyrion
line: The Mad King did as he liked. Has your Uncle Jaime ever told you what happened to him?

name: tyrion
line: I'm not threatening the king, ser. I am educating my nephew. Bronn, the next time Ser Meryn speaks, kill him. That was a threat. See the difference?

name: tyrion
line: I apologize for my nephew's behavior. Tell me the truth. Do you want an end to this engagement?

name: tyrion
line: Lady Stark, you may survive us yet.

name: tyrion
line: You think dipping his wick will cure what ails him?

name: tyrion
line: Your visits are too few, cousin.

name: tyrion
line: So it is. Will you take a cup with me? I find that mulled wine helps me sleep.

name: tyrion
line: If my sister was so concerned for Pycelle, I would have thought she'd come herself.

name: tyrion
line: And you've received these instructions directly from Cersei?

name: tyrion
line: And you've waited this long to deliver the information?

name: tyrion
line: Cersei must have great trust in you, allowing you into her chamber during the hour of the wolf.

name: tyrion
line: She must be very glad to have you helping her from dusk till dawn.

name: tyrion
line: Ah. Lavender oil. She always loved lavender oil, even as a girl.

name: tyrion
line: An anointed knight, yes. Tell me, did Cersei have you knighted before or after she took you into her bed? What? Nothing to say? No more warnings for me, ser?

name: tyrion
line: Have you ever given any thought to what King Joffrey will have to say when he finds out you've been bedding his mother?

name: tyrion
line: Did she take you against your will? Can you not defend yourself, knight?

name: tyrion
line: Did he tell you to fuck her, too?

name: tyrion
line: Hated every moment of it, is that what you'll have me believe? A high place in court, a knighthood, my sister's legs spreading open for you at night. Oh, yes, it must have been terrible. Wait here. His Grace will want to hear this.

name: tyrion
line: Save it for Joffrey. He loves a good grovel.

name: tyrion
line: No, I think not.

name: tyrion
line: You heard me. My father told you to obey my sister. Obey her. Stay close to her side. Keep her trust. Pleasure her whenever she requires. No one ever need know, as long as you keep faith with me. I want to know what Cersei is doing, where she goes, who she sees, what they talk of, everything. And you will tell me.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, rise, rise. Let us drink to our understanding. Oh, you don't have a cup. Oh, well. Smile, cousin. My sister is a beautiful woman, and it's all for the good of the realm. Go back and tell her that I beg her forgiveness, that I want no more conflict between us and that, henceforth, I shall do nothing without her consent.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I'll give her Pycelle.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, I'll release him in the morning. Cersei can keep him as a pet, if she wants, but I will not have him on the Council. I could swear that I had not harmed a single hair on his head, but that would not, strictly speaking, be true. Stay within one table length.

name: tyrion
line: Get the Prince back to the Keep now.

name: tyrion
line: Move. Move!

name: tyrion
line: Where's Sansa?

name: tyrion
line: You blind, bloody fool.

name: tyrion
line: We've had vicious kings and we've had idiot kings, but I don't know if we've ever been cursed with a vicious idiot for a king.

name: tyrion
line: I can, I am.

name: tyrion
line: They threw a cow pie at you, so you decided to kill them all? They're starving, you fool. All because of a war you started.

name: tyrion
line: And now I've struck a king. Did my hand fall from my wrist? Where is the Stark girl?

name: tyrion
line: If she dies, you'll never get your Uncle Jaime back. You owe him quite a bit, you know.

name: tyrion
line: Take some men and go and find the Stark girl.

name: tyrion
line: Are you hurt, my lady?

name: tyrion
line: Well done, Clegane.

name: tyrion
line: Since when do you light your own candles?

name: tyrion
line: Stannis Baratheon's fleet has been spotted sailing north past Tarth, 200 ships.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, that's more than we have. He'll be at our gates within five days, four if he has the wind.

name: tyrion
line: "Rain fire on them from above." You're quoting Father, aren't you?

name: tyrion
line: Call it tactics, not strategy. But, yes, he does have a good mind for it. The best mind, some would say. Sadly, he's not here. It's just you, me and Joffrey, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

name: tyrion
line: He needs to start acting like a king. This war you started is coming to our doorstep. And if the entire city wants Joffrey dead

name: tyrion
line: I thought the girls might help him.

name: tyrion
line: I was wrong. If we can't control him

name: tyrion
line: It's hard to put a leash on a dog once you've put a crown on its head.

name: tyrion
line: The boy is more Robert than Jaime.

name: tyrion
line: Sins?

name: tyrion
line: You've beaten the odds. Tommen and Myrcella are good, decent children, both of them.

name: tyrion
line: The bastard of Winterfell.

name: tyrion
line: I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

name: tyrion
line: It's been a long road.  But we're both still here.

name: tyrion
line: I'm Tyrion Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: Ah, the Onion Knight.  We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

name: tyrion
line: Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

name: tyrion
line: And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

name: tyrion
line: Does she miss me terribly?

name: tyrion
line: A sham marriage and unconsummated.

name: tyrion
line: Well, it was.  It wasn't.  Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

name: tyrion
line: Good.  At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

name: tyrion
line: A long and bloody tale.  To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

name: tyrion
line: Of course they do.  If I was your hand I would have advised against it.  General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

name: tyrion
line: I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

name: tyrion
line: Come.  Their mother is waiting for you.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

name: tyrion
line: Forever.

name: tyrion
line: Almost.

name: tyrion
line: I do.

name: tyrion
line: I believe he's calling all of us children.  Figure of speech.

name: tyrion
line: The Army of the Dead?

name: tyrion
line: No, I don't think you're either of those things.

name: tyrion
line: The war against my sister has already begun.  You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

name: tyrion
line: If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

name: tyrion
line: Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys.  Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

name: tyrion
line: It takes no time to bend the knee.  Pledge your sword to her cause.

name: tyrion
line: I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack.  You're making it difficult.  You look a lot better brooding than I do.  You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

name: tyrion
line: I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island.  You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

name: tyrion
line: I wouldn't say we took your ship.

name: tyrion
line: Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

name: tyrion
line: I do actually.

name: tyrion
line: It was all nonsense.  Everybody knew it.  But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

name: tyrion
line: Good question.

name: tyrion
line: People's minds aren't made for problems that large.  White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

name: tyrion
line: It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

name: tyrion
line: Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us.  And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye.  Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't.  Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now.  While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter.  She protects people from monsters, just as you do.  That's why she came here.  And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting.  That's not a reasonable thing to ask.

name: tyrion
line: So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

name: tyrion
line: Maybe you are a northern fool.  I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

name: tyrion
line: Yes.  Volcanic glass, obsidian.  He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

name: tyrion
line: Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

name: tyrion
line: Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them.  I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

name: tyrion
line: I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

name: tyrion
line: I don't remember.

name: tyrion
line: I would never do that...to you.  The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here.  All of his advisors would have told him not to come.  I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway.  You don't have to believe him.  Let him mine the Dragonglass.  If he's wrong it's worthless.  You didn't even know it was here.  It's nothing to you.  Give him something by giving him nothing.  Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally.  Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand.  Casterly Rock.

name: tyrion
line: You must allow them their flights of fancy.  It's dreary in the north.

name: tyrion
line: But you'll have to go yourself.  Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place.  You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

name: tyrion
line: It's too great a risk.  You're too important.

name: tyrion
line: Yes.  Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister.  She will be ready.

name: tyrion
line: No one has ever taken the rock.

name: tyrion
line: The Lannister army is still the army my father built.  Well trained and well provisioned.  10,000 men at least.  They will see us coming.

name: tyrion
line: They will be ready.

name: tyrion
line: The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

name: tyrion
line: The fight up the walls will be hard.  We'll be at a disadvantage.  Many men will die.

name: tyrion
line: Interesting thing about my father.  He built our house up from near ruin.  He built our army.  He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers.  That was beneath him.  So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find.  Me.  He was right.  I was low.  The company I kept low, women mostly.  They weren't welcome at the Rock.  Father disapproved of that sort of behavior.  I couldn't walk them through the front gates.  I couldn't have them in my chambers.  So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.

name: tyrion
line: It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

name: tyrion
line: No better place for low pursuits.  Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

name: tyrion
line: As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

name: tyrion
line: And so it begins.  They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces.  They will be outnumbered.  They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

name: tyrion
line: But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater.  They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them.  They will be fighting for you.  And that is why they will triump.

name: tyrion
line: On a night like this, you came into the world.

name: tyrion
line: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

name: tyrion
line: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

name: tyrion
line: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

name: tyrion
line: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

name: tyrion
line: Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

name: tyrion
line: Jon Snow?  Ned Stark's bastard?

name: tyrion
line: I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

name: tyrion
line: I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

name: tyrion
line: If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally.  The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother.  Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

name: tyrion
line: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

name: tyrion
line: I know how you wage war.  We don't poison little girls here.  Myrcella was innocent.

name: tyrion
line: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

name: tyrion
line: Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country.  If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point.  Our army should be Westerosi.

name: tyrion
line: You are.

name: tyrion
line: Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

name: tyrion
line: The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army.  Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

name: tyrion
line: The unsullied will have another objective.  For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros.  And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock.  Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

name: tyrion
line: My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time.  So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

name: tyrion
line: Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace.  Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier.  He would be invaluable at the Wall.

name: tyrion
line: You are the future of your house.  This war has already wiped one great house from the world.  Don't let it happen again.  Bend the knee.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace --

name: tyrion
line: All rulers demand that people bend the knee.  It's why they're rulers.  She gave Tarley a choice.  A man who had taken up arms against her.  What else could she do?

name: tyrion
line: I am her hand, not her head.  I can't make her decisions for her.

name: tyrion
line: Daenerys is not her father.

name: tyrion
line: Who is that for?

name: tyrion
line: Did you read it?

name: tyrion
line: What's it say?

name: tyrion
line: Perhaps not.  Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children.  What if we prove her wrong?

name: tyrion
line: So bring the dead to her.

name: tyrion
line: We don't have to bring the whole army.  Only one soldier.

name: tyrion
line: Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

name: tyrion
line: The only person she listens to is Jaime.  He may listen to me.

name: tyrion
line: Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

name: tyrion
line: You're not staying here?

name: tyrion
line: What if someone takes the boat?

name: tyrion
line: I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

name: tyrion
line: You made me look like a complete fool.  I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me.  You abandoned the family home.  Completely unsentimental.  Father would have been proud.

name: tyrion
line: Listen to me --

name: tyrion
line: It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

name: tyrion
line: He was going to execute me.  He knew I was innocent.  He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am.  The little monster sent to punish him.  Do you think I wanted to be born this way?  Did he think I chose --

name: tyrion
line: Daenerys will win this war.  You're a military man.  You must know there is no way around it.  Daenerys is not her father.  She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

name: tyrion
line: Fish hook.  Some men you just can't teach.

name: tyrion
line: He'll do.

name: tyrion
line: You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont.  Nobody glowers quite like you.  Not even Grey Worm.

name: tyrion
line: This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us.  Remember?

name: tyrion
line: Take it with you.  You'll bring it back.  Our queen needs you.

name: tyrion
line: We took Casterly Rock.

name: tyrion
line: We still have the largest army.

name: tyrion
line: Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back.  We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland.  Commit to the blockade of King's Landing.  We have a plan.  It's still the right plan.

name: tyrion
line: If I've underestimated our enemies --

name: tyrion
line: We've discussed this.

name: tyrion
line: A smart one.

name: tyrion
line: Flee, you idiot!

name: tyrion
line: You fucking idiot.

name: tyrion
line: I honestly don't.

name: tyrion
line: Oh.  I've been heroic on occasion.

name: tyrion
line: I once charged through the mud gate of King's Landing.

name: tyrion
line: It's interesting these heroes you name.  Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all fell in love with you.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, my mistake.  I suppose he stares at you longingly because he's hopeful for a successful military alliance.

name: tyrion
line: A million, give or take.

name: tyrion
line: There's more work in the city. And the brothels are far superior.

name: tyrion
line: I imagine it was a sad joke at the end. An entire arena for a few sickly creatures smaller than dogs. But in the beginning, when it was home to Balerion the Dread, it must have been the most dangerous place in the world.

name: tyrion
line: A pleasant surprise in an unpleasant situation.

name: tyrion
line: Supporting the enemy, no less.

name: tyrion
line: Cersei will anyway.

name: tyrion
line: (Shakes his head.)

name: tyrion
line: Here we are the heroes of Blackwater Bay. Strange place for a reunion.

name: tyrion
line: I don't think I'm anyone's lord anymore, Podrick. Save the titles for Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

name: tyrion
line: You've been thinking about our new queen.

name: tyrion
line: Are you? Helping me to arrange this meeting wasn't exactly looking after yourself, was it? You put yourself at risk.

name: tyrion
line: It's good to see you again.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: We are a group of people who do not like one another, as this recent demonstration has shown. We have suffered at each other's hands. We have lost people we love at each other's hands. If all we wanted was more of the same, there would be no need for this gathering. We are entirely capable of waging war against each other without meeting face-to-face.

name: tyrion
line: We all know that will never happen.

name: tyrion
line: There is no conversation that will erase the last 50 years. We have something to show you.

name: tyrion
line: I'm pleased you bent the knee to our queen

name: tyrion
line: That is indeed a problem. The more immediate problem is that we're fucked.

name: tyrion
line: Only one. Everyone stays here, and I go and talk to my sister.

name: tyrion
line: I don't want Cersei to murder me either. I could have stayed in my cell and saved a great deal of trouble.

name: tyrion
line: She'll definitely murder you. I go see my sister.

name: tyrion
line: You spoke with her?

name: tyrion
line: I'm about to step into a room with the most murderous woman in the world who's already tried to kill me twice, that I know of. Who's an idiot?

name: tyrion
line: A foreign whore you can't abduct, beat, or intimidate. That must be difficult for you.

name: tyrion
line: I didn't know about that.

name: tyrion
line: Cersei, I didn't know.

name: tyrion
line: I am the one preventing that from happening. Daenerys didn't want to debate and negotiate. She didn't want to bring you words. She wanted to bring you fire and blood until I advised her otherwise. I don't want to destroy our family. I never have.

name: tyrion
line: After he sentenced me to death for a crime I didn't commit, yes, I killed him. Hate me for it if you want. I hate myself for it in spite of what he was, in spite of what he did to me.

name: tyrion
line: I have never been more sorry about anything.

name: tyrion
line: (starts)

name: tyrion
line: All right. You love your family, and I have destroyed it. I will always be a threat. So put an end to me.

name: tyrion
line: If it weren't for me, you'd have a motherIf it weren't for me, you'd have a father.

name: tyrion
line: I am more sorry about the children than you could ever know.

name: tyrion
line: I don't care. I loved them. You know I did. You know it in your heart if there's anything left of it.

name: tyrion
line: If there's no future, then why are we here? Why did you allow me to come?

name: tyrion
line: Yes, no, not what you hoped for, but you must have hoped for something.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: She knows herself. She chose an advisor who would check her worst impulses instead of feeding them.

name: tyrion
line: You're pregnant.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, I know my brother-

name: tyrion
line: He came here alone, knowing full well how he'd be received. Why would he do that if he weren't telling the truth?

name: tyrion
line: I was a fool.

name: tyrion
line: I suspect one of you will be wearing this before it's all over.

name: tyrion
line: Well, here we are.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: And the masses rejoice.

name: tyrion
line: She's your new queen too.

name: tyrion
line: They remember what happened the last time Targaryens brought dragons north. They'll come around once they see Daenerys is different.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: I am.

name: tyrion
line: It's hard to blame her. I made a mistake common to clever people. I underestimated my opponents.

name: tyrion
line: Cersei told me the pregnancy had changed her. A chance for you both to start again. And I believed her.

name: tyrion
line: Was she lying about the baby too?

name: tyrion
line: She never fooled you. You always knew exactly what she was, and you loved her anyway.

name: tyrion
line: So we're going to die at Winterfell. Not the death I would've chosen. I always pictured myself dying in my own bed, the age of 80, with a belly full of wine and-

name: tyrion
line: My cock.

name: tyrion
line: At least Cersei won't get to murder me. I'm sure I'll feel some satisfaction denying her that pleasure while I'm being ripped apart by dead men.

name: tyrion
line: Maybe after I'm dead I'll march down to King's Landing and rip her apart.

name: tyrion
line: How will he find you?

name: tyrion
line: When the time comes, Ser Davos and I will be on the walls, to give you the signal to light the trench.

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace, I have fought before, I can do it again. Alongside the men and women risking their lives.

name: tyrion
line: Do you need help?

name: tyrion
line: You've had a strange journey.

name: tyrion
line: I'd like to hear about it.

name: tyrion
line: If only we were trapped in a castle in the middle of winter, with nowhere to go.

name: tyrion
line: I wish Father were here.

name: tyrion
line: I would love to see the look on his face when he realizes his two sons are about to die defending Winterfell.

name: tyrion
line: I remember the first time we were here, the first time I saw this hall.

name: tyrion
line: You were a golden lion. I was a drunken whore-monger. It was all so simple.

name: tyrion
line: I was speaking in relative terms.

name: tyrion
line: Of course I miss it.

name: tyrion
line: It's not. Things would be easier if it were.

name: tyrion
line: The perils of self-betterment.

name: tyrion
line: To contemplate your imminent death. You've come to the right place. You want some of this piss? It's not bad. It's not good either.

name: tyrion
line: And you?

name: tyrion
line: Ser Davos, join us.

name: tyrion
line: Would you like a drink?

name: tyrion
line: It's strange, isn't it? Almost everyone here's fought the Starks at one time or another. And here we are in their castle, ready to defend it. Together.

name: tyrion
line: I think we might live.

name: tyrion
line: I-I do. How many battles have we survived between us? Ser Davos Seaworth. Survivor of both the Blackwater and the Battle of the Bastards.

name: tyrion
line: Mm. Ser Jaime Lannister, fabled hero of the Siege of Pyke.

name: tyrion
line: Hear, hear! Ser Brienne of Tarth. Defeated the Hound in-Pardon me, Lady Brienne.

name: tyrion
line: Ser Brienne of Tarth! Knight of the Seven Kingdoms!

line: No, let's stay a bit longer.

name: tyrion
line: How about a song? One of you must know one. Ser Davos?

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: Mmm.

name: tyrion
line: You should consider yourself lucky. At least your balls won’t freeze off.

name: tyrion
line: Because I have balls, and you don't.

name: tyrion
line: If anyone survives the war to come, we'll have Jon Snow to thank. He risked his life to show us the threat is real. Thanks to his courage, we have brought with us the greatest army the world has ever seen. We have brought two full-grown dragons. And soon, the Lannister army will ride north to join our cause.

name: tyrion
line: I know, I know, our people haven't been friends in the past. But we must fight together now or die.

name: tyrion
line: My lord. My lady.

name: tyrion
line: The Lady of Winterfell. Has a nice ring to it.

name: tyrion
line: Last time we spoke was at Joffrey's wedding. Miserable affair.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, it was a bit hard to explain why my wife fled moments after the king's murder.

name: tyrion
line: Many underestimated you. Most of them are dead now.

name: tyrion
line: I'm sure you weren't thrilled to hear the Lannister army's marching north. You have every right to be fearful of my sister. No one fears her more than I do. But I promise, you'll be safe-

name: tyrion
line: She did.

name: tyrion
line: She has something to live for now. I believe she wants to survive.

name: tyrion
line: One of the better sigils. Beats an onion, anyway.

name: tyrion
line: They do make a handsome couple.

line: I'm not that old.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: The objective here is to remove Cersei without destroying King's Landing.

name: tyrion
line: I watched the people of King's Landing rebel against their king when they were hungry, and that was before winter began. Give them the opportunity and they will cast Cersei aside.

name: tyrion
line: Once the people see that Cersei is our only enemy, her reign is over.

name: tyrion
line: So if all are in agreement Jon and Ser Davos will ride down the Kingsroad with the Northern troops and the bulk of the remaining Dothraki and Unsullied.

name: tyrion
line: A smaller group of us will ride to White Harbor, and sail from there to Dragonstone with our queen and her dragons accompanying us from above.

name: tyrion
line: Ser Jaime has chosen to remain here, as a guest of the Lady of Winterfell.

line: So she's going to stay here with you?

name: tyrion
line: I'm happy. I'm happy that you're happy. I'm happy that you'll finally have to climb for it.

name: tyrion
line: Do you know how long I've waited to tell tall-person jokes? To climbing mountains.

name: tyrion

name: tyrion
line: You have my word. None of this means a thing until we take King's Landing. We ride south in the morning. We could use an officer with knowledge of the city's defenses.  BRONN; (chuckles)  Oh, no. No, my fighting days are done. But I still got a few killing days left, you hear me? I'll come find you when the war is done. Till then, don't die.

name: tyrion
line: My lady.

name: tyrion
line: "My lord" is the standard response.

name: tyrion
line: You know she loves your brother.

name: tyrion
line: You seem determined to dislike her. A good relationship between the Iron Throne and the North has been the core of every peaceful, prosperous reign we've ever known.

name: tyrion
line: I don't expect him to spend much time here going forward.

name: tyrion
line: Sansa, look at me.

name: tyrion
line: With Jon in the capital, you'll be the true power in the North. I'd feel much better about the future if I left here today believing that you and Daenerys were allies.

name: tyrion
line: She's your queen too.

name: tyrion
line: Every good ruler needs to inspire a bit of fear.

name: tyrion
line: No, but as your brother once told me, he's not a Stark.

name: tyrion
line: Are you all right?

name: tyrion
line: Her people love her, you've seen that. You've seen how they fight for her. She wants to make the world a better place. I believe in her.

name: tyrion
line: Think of the past 20 years. The war, the murder, the misery. All of it because Robert Baratheon loved someone who didn't love him back.

name: tyrion
line: Including us? Eight.

name: tyrion
line: She loses the North. She loses the Vale, Sansa will make sure of that.

name: tyrion
line: He doesn't want the throne.

name: tyrion
line: He loves our queen. And she loves him. If we marry them, they could rule together.

name: tyrion
line: That never stopped a Targaryen before.

name: tyrion
line: Something she has in common with every monarch who ever lived.

name: tyrion
line: We are advisors to the queen. Worrying about her state of mind is our job. We still have to take King's Landing. Maybe Cersei will win and kill us all. That would solve our problems.

name: tyrion
line: It could be a fortnight before Jon and the allied armies make it to King's Landing. In the meantime, demand Cersei surrender. Offer her her life in exchange for the throne. If there's a chance to avoid the coming slaughter, we should make the effort.

name: tyrion
line: She's a girl who walked into a fire with three stones and walked out with three dragons. How could she not believe in destiny?

name: tyrion
line: And how do you know she wasn't?

name: tyrion
line: He doesn't want the throne. That's why he bent the knee.

name: tyrion
