name: tyrion
line: Of course I've thought about it. Thoughts aren't treason.

name: tyrion
line: Joffrey was a man. I don't think a cock is a true qualification, as I'm sure you'd agree.

name: tyrion
line: What about my earlier proposal? They could rule together as king and queen.

name: tyrion
line: He could temper her worst impulses.

name: tyrion
line: How many kings and queens have you served? Five? Six? I've lost count.

name: tyrion
line: At a certain point, you choose a person you believe in, and you fight for that person.

name: tyrion
line: I believe in our queen. She'll make the right choice. With the help of her loyal advisors.

name: tyrion
line: What is the realm? A vast continent, home to millions of people, most of whom don't care who sits on the Iron Throne.

name: tyrion
line: So, what happens to her?

name: tyrion
line: Please. Don't.

name: tyrion
line: Queen Daenerys demands Cersei's unconditional surrender and the immediate release of Missandei of Naath.

name: tyrion
line: Qyburn, you're a rational man.

name: tyrion
line: We have a chance here, perhaps our last chance, to avoid carnage.

name: tyrion
line: Help me. I don't want to see this city burn. I don't want to hear the screams of children burning alive.

name: tyrion
line: Your queen.

name: tyrion
line: Her reign is over. You understand this. Help her understand it.

name: tyrion
line: I know you don't care about your people. Why should you? They hate you and you hate them. But you're not a monster. I know this. I know this because I've seen it. You've always loved your children. More than yourself, more than Jaime more than anything. I beg you. If not for yourself, then for your child. Your reign is over, but that doesn't mean your life has to end. It doesn't mean your baby has to die.

name: tyrion
line: I'll find you later.

name: tyrion
line: I'm going alone.

name: tyrion
line: I freed my brother. And you slaughtered a city.

name: tyrion
line: Did you bring any wine?

name: tyrion
line: So is there life after death?

name: tyrion
line: I should be thankful. Oblivion is the best I could hope for. I strangled my lover. I shot my own father with a crossbow. I betrayed my queen.

name: tyrion
line: I did. And I'd do it again, now that I've seen what I've seen. I chose my fate. The people of King's Landing did not.

name: tyrion
line: Is it? When you heard her talking to her soldiers, did she sound like someone who's done fighting?

name: tyrion
line: She liberated the people of Slaver's Bay. She liberated the people of King's Landing. And she'll go on liberating until the people of the world are free and she rules them all.

name: tyrion
line: Until today. Varys was right. I was wrong. It was vanity to think I could guide her. Our queen's nature is fire and blood.

name: tyrion
line: My father was an evil man. My sister was an evil woman. Pile up all the bodies of all the people they ever killed, there still won't be half as many as our beautiful queen slaughtered in a single day.

name: tyrion
line: The moment the gates fell, the battle was over.

name: tyrion
line: And she burned down a city for it.

name: tyrion
line: Would you have done it?

name: tyrion
line: You've been up there, on a dragon's back. You've had that power. Would you have burned the city down?

name: tyrion
line: (scoffs) Yes, you do. You won't say because you don't want to betray her but you know.

name: tyrion
line: It matters more than anything. When she murdered the slavers of Astapor, I'm sure no one but the slavers complained. After all, they were evil men.

name: tyrion
line: When she crucified hundreds of Meereenese nobles, who could argue? They were evil men. The Dothraki khals she burned alive? They would have done worse to her. Everywhere she goes, evil men die and we cheer her for it. And she grows more powerful and more sure that she is good and right. She believes her destiny is to build a better world for everyone. If you believed that if you truly believed it, wouldn't you kill whoever stood between you and paradise?

name: tyrion
line: I know you love her. I love her too. Not as successfully as you. But I believed in her with all my heart. Love is more powerful than reason. We all know that. Look at my brother.

name: tyrion
line: You just came up with that?

name: tyrion
line: Sometimes duty is the death of love. You are the shield that guards the realms of men. And you've always tried to do the right thing. No matter the cost, you've tried to protect people. Who is the greatest threat to the people now?

name: tyrion
line: It's a terrible thing I'm asking. It's also the right thing. Do you think I'm the last man she'll execute? Who is more dangerous than the rightful heir to the Iron Throne?

name: tyrion
line: And your sisters? Do you see them bending the knee?

name: tyrion
line: Why do you think Sansa told me the truth about you? Because she doesn't want Dany to be queen.

name: tyrion
line: No. But you do. And you have to choose now.

name: tyrion
line: It's not for you to decide.

name: tyrion
line: (nods) You're right. And no one's any better for it. But it's not for you to decide. Jon committed his crime here. His fate is for our king to decide. Or our queen.

name: tyrion
line: You're the most powerful people in Westeros. Choose one.

name: tyrion
line: Me? The Imp? Half the people hate me for serving Daenerys, the other half hate me for betraying her.  Can't think of a worse choice.

name: tyrion
line: I've had nothing to do but think these past few weeks. About our bloody history. About the mistakes we've made.

name: tyrion
line: What unites people? Armies? Gold? Flags? Stories. There's nothing in the world more powerful than a good story. Nothing can stop it. No enemy can defeat it. And who has a better story than Bran the Broken? The boy who fell from a high tower and lived. He knew he'd never walk again, so he learned to fly. He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines. Our triumphs, mm, our defeats, our past. Who better to lead us into the future?

name: tyrion
line: Good. Sons of kings can be cruel and stupid, as you well know. His will never torment us. That is the wheel our queen wanted to break.

name: tyrion
line: From now on, rulers will not be born. They will be chosen on this spot by the lords and ladies of Westeros to serve the realm.

name: tyrion
line: I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?

name: tyrion
line: To Brandon of House Stark I say aye.

name: tyrion
line: All hail Bran the Broken, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

name: tyrion
line: I don't deserve it. I thought I was wise, but I wasn't. I thought I knew what was right, but I didn't. Choose Ser Davos. Choose anyone else.

name: tyrion
line: Giving you to the Unsullied would start a war. Letting you walk free would start a war. So our new king has chosen to send you to the Night's Watch.

name: tyrion
line: The world will always need a home for bastards and broken men.

name: tyrion
line: You shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. The Unsullied wanted your head of course, but Grey Worm has accepted the justice of a life sentence. Sansa and Arya wanted you freed, but they understand our new king needs to make peace. No one is very happy. Which means it's a good compromise, I suppose.

name: tyrion
line: What we did.

name: tyrion
line: Ask me again in 10 years.

name: tyrion
line: I wouldn't be so sure. A few years as Hand of the King would make anyone want to piss off the edge of the world.

name: tyrion
line: What's this?

name: tyrion
line: I suppose I come in for some heavy criticism.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, he's kind to me. Never would've guessed.

name: tyrion
line: He's not kind?

name: tyrion
line: He what? What does he say about me?

name: tyrion
line: Your Grace.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, Your Grace. Suitable prospects will be brought to you for an audience in the coming weeks.

name: tyrion
line: As you wish, Your Grace.

name: tyrion
line: (clearing his throat) We serve at your pleasure, King Bran the Broken, ruler of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm. Long may he reign.

name: tyrion
line: That will improve.

name: tyrion
line: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, Lord of Highgarden, Lord Paramount of the Reach and Master of Coin, would you say the crown's debt to you has been paid?

name: tyrion
line: Good. Time to start incurring a new one. We have hungry people to feed. Can we expect some assistance in this regard?

name: tyrion
line: Lord Davos, we have an armada to rebuild and ports to repair.

name: tyrion
line: Find the best builders and set them to the task.

name: tyrion
line: I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.

name: tyrion
line: Shagga likes axes.

name: tyrion
line: The vanguard? Me and the tribesmen on the front lines?

name: tyrion
line: Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still, Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.

name: tyrion
line: Surely there are ways to have me killed that would be less detrimental to the war effort.

name: tyrion
line: lt appears l'm not hungry after all. Excuse me, my lords.

name: tyrion
line: Where did you find one so pretty at this hour?

name: tyrion
line: Took her? From whom?

name: tyrion
line: And he didn't have anything to say about it?

name: tyrion
line: Well, the odds of me living long enough for him to retaliate have just dropped drastically. We'll be at the vanguard tomorrow.

name: tyrion
line: Who are you?

name: tyrion
line: What did your mother call you?

name: tyrion
line: My mother died giving birth to me.

name: tyrion
line: What sort of accent is that?

name: tyrion
line: For-

name: tyrion
line: What do l want from you? l want you to share my tent. l want you to pour my wine, laugh at my jokes, rub my legs when they're sore after a day's ride. l want you to take no other man to bed for as long as we're together. And l want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world. Which it may well be.

name: tyrion
line: No.

name: tyrion
line: Ah! Damn you, woman. Are you immune to pain?

name: tyrion
line: Let's play a new game.

name: tyrion
line: Does it involve the potential for losing fingers?

name: tyrion
line: No! No fire games, no knife games. Let's do something l'm good at.

name: tyrion
line: l happen to be a great judge of character.

name: tyrion
line: Fine. Bronn first. Your father beat you.

name: tyrion
line: You killed your first man before you were 12.

name: tyrion
line: You've been north of the Wall.

name: tyrion
line: And you once loved a woman many years ago, but it turned out badly so you've never let yourself love again. Oh, wait, that's me. (Tyrion drinks) Your turn, my mysterious foreign beauty.

name: tyrion
line: lt's fun! Look at the fun we're having. Your mother was a whore.

name: tyrion
line: All right. Your father left the family when you were very young, never to return.

name: tyrion
line: And we've established the rules about lying?

name: tyrion
line: You wanted a different life. You came from somewhere and you wanted to be elsewhere.

name: tyrion
line: So, specifics… You wanted to be elsewhere, but how would you get there? l don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you. So, what's a lowborn girl to do?

name: tyrion
line: Are you sure –

name: tyrion
line: My dear lady, if l have offended you, l apologize.

name: tyrion
line: Fine, fine. Ask away. Try to penetrate the enigma that is me.

name: tyrion
line: That's not how the game works.

name: tyrion
line: How did you hear that?

name: tyrion
line: Another night, perhaps.

name: tyrion
line: lt's not a pleasant story.

name: tyrion
line: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.

name: tyrion
line: Really? l was 16, drunk and in love.

name: tyrion
line: As l said, l was young and stupid.

name: tyrion
line: What is it? What do you want?

name: tyrion
line: What?

name: tyrion
line: Get my squire!

name: tyrion
line: lf l die, weep for me.

name: tyrion
line: l'll know.

name: tyrion
line: Stay low?

name: tyrion
line: l was born lucky. Tribesmen of the Vale, gather round! Stone Crows! Black Ears! Burned Men! Moon Brothers! And Painted Dogs! Your dominion over the Vale begins now! Onward, to claim what is yours!

name: tyrion
line: To battle!

name: tyrion
line: l'm alive?

name: tyrion
line: Did we win?

name: tyrion
line: How did our tribesmen do?

name: tyrion
line: lt's nice to see them getting along.

name: tyrion
line: Good of you to notice. l hear we won.

name: tyrion
line: Did we get the Stark boy, at least?

name: tyrion
line: Where was he?

name: tyrion
line: And where are they?

name: tyrion
line: If I'm going to die, it may as well be with a song in my heart.

name: tyrion
line: Starve, most likely.

name: tyrion
line: What do you want, Bronn? Gold? Women? Golden women?

name: tyrion
line: Though I would treasure your friendship.

name: tyrion
line: Come, share our fire.

name: tyrion
line: I am Tyrion son of Tywin of Clan Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: In my own bed, at the age of 80 with a bellyful of wine and a girl's mouth around my cock.

name: tyrion
line: No no no no no! My, my House is rich and powerful.

name: tyrion
line: Half a man maybe, but at least I have the courage to face my enemies.

name: tyrion
line: That trinket is worth more than everything your tribe owns.

name: tyrion
line: The Vale of Arryn.

name: tyrion
line: From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.

name: tyrion
line: And feed it to the goats, yes.

name: tyrion
line: Uncle. Father.

name: tyrion
line: Sorry to disappoint you.

name: tyrion
line: May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: We have our differences, Jaime and I.

name: tyrion
line: And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

name: tyrion
line: How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?

name: tyrion
line: My sister rules, you mean.

name: tyrion
line: Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.

name: tyrion
line: The Stark boy appears to be less green than we'd hoped.

name: tyrion
line: There's your peace. Joffrey saw to that when he decided to remove Ned Stark's head. You'll have an easier time drinking from that cup than you will bringing Robb Stark to the table now. He's winning – in case you hadn't noticed.

name: tyrion
line: Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.

name: tyrion
line: And do what?

name: tyrion
line: Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?

name: tyrion
line: So it would seem.

name: tyrion
line: No, he said l couldn't take  you with me to King's Landing. He was very specific on that point.

name: tyrion
line: What?

name: tyrion
line: l believe he used the word "whore".

name: tyrion
line: My father's probably the most powerful man in the country. Certainly the richest. He has all Seven Kingdoms in his pockets. Everyone everywhere always has to do exactly what my father says. He's always been a cunt. l believe the ladies of the court could learn a great deal from a girl like you. Why don't you come with me, be the Hand's lady? Because the King needs a Hand and the Hand – (Shae kisses Tyrion)

name: tyrion
line: A charming man.

name: tyrion
line: And how's that going, Commander Mormont?

name: tyrion
line: Good news or bad?

name: tyrion
line: I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.

name: tyrion
line: It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

name: tyrion
line: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

name: tyrion
line: You're joking?

name: tyrion
line: And how do a bear's balls taste?

name: tyrion
line: Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

name: tyrion
line: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

name: tyrion
line: You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

name: tyrion
line: Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?

name: tyrion
line: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

name: tyrion
line: But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

name: tyrion
line: I think he's starting to like me. "Going below"?

name: tyrion
line: So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

name: tyrion
line: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.

name: tyrion
line: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: Eight... no, nine.

name: tyrion
line: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

name: tyrion
line: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

name: tyrion
line: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

name: tyrion
line: Of course.

name: tyrion
line: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

name: tyrion
line: Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

name: tyrion
line: None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.

name: tyrion
line: One word and I'll hit you again.

name: tyrion
line: Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

name: tyrion
line: Do you understand?

name: tyrion
line: I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...

name: tyrion
line: Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burnt black.

name: tyrion
line: Beloved siblings.

name: tyrion
line: Apparently not.

name: tyrion
line: The Maester says the boy may live.

name: tyrion
line: Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.

name: tyrion
line: Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

name: tyrion
line: And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.

name: tyrion
line: Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.

name: tyrion
line: My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.

name: tyrion
line: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

name: tyrion
line: Look at me and tell me what you see.

name: tyrion
line: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?

name: tyrion
line: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

name: tyrion
line: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

name: tyrion
line: Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.

name: tyrion
line: I did hear something about that.

name: tyrion
line: And the other brother?

name: tyrion
line: There’s the pretty one. And there’s the clever one.

name: tyrion
line: I hear he hates that nickname.

name: tyrion
line: Clever girl.

name: tyrion
line: Have you?

name: tyrion
line: The gods gave me one blessing.

name: tyrion
line: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?

name: tyrion
line: She has odd cravings, our sister.

name: tyrion
line: I’m sorry, I’ve begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.

name: tyrion
line: Close the door!

name: tyrion
line: Your uncle’s in the Night’s Watch.

name: tyrion
line: Preparing for a night with your family. I’ve always wanted to see the Wall.

name: tyrion
line: My greatest accomplishment. You – you’re Ned Stark’s bastard, aren’t you?

name: tyrion
line: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.

name: tyrion
line: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.

name: tyrion
line: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers’ eyes.

name: tyrion
line: If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.

name: tyrion
line: The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.

name: tyrion
line: This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.

name: tyrion
line: Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Word's probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?

name: tyrion
line: Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.

name: tyrion
line: Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?

name: tyrion
line: She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.

name: tyrion
line: Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!

name: tyrion
line: What sort of imbecile arms an assassin with his own blade?

name: tyrion
line: Why? Am I starting to make sense?

name: tyrion
line: Untie me. If I die, what's the point?

name: tyrion
line: Well, I'm willing if she is.

name: tyrion
line: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

name: tyrion
line: I like you.

name: tyrion
line: Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.

name: tyrion
line: If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.

name: tyrion
line: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

name: tyrion
line: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

name: tyrion
line: Then you might learn a lord's courtesy.

name: tyrion
line: So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?

name: tyrion
line: Curious.

name: tyrion
line: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.

name: tyrion
line: Do you like to ride, Bran?

name: tyrion
line: What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.

name: tyrion
line: Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.

name: tyrion
line: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

name: tyrion
line: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

name: tyrion
line: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.

name: tyrion
line: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.

name: tyrion
line: No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?

name: tyrion
line: She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?

name: tyrion
line: My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?

name: tyrion
line: Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.

name: tyrion
line: A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.

name: tyrion
line: I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.

name: tyrion
line: My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.

name: tyrion
line: Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?

name: tyrion
line: There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.

name: tyrion
line: Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.

name: tyrion
line: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

name: tyrion
line: Mord! Turnkey! Mord! Mord!

name: tyrion
line: How would you like to be rich?

name: tyrion
line: My family is rich. We have gold, lots of gold. I’m prepared to give you lots of gold.

name: tyrion
line: Well, I don’t have it here.

name: tyrion
line: Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord!

name: tyrion
line: About the gold -

name: tyrion
line: Listen to me! Listen to me! Sometimes possession… is an abstract concept. When they captured me they took my purse, but the gold is still mine.

name: tyrion
line: Where? I don’t know where, but when they free me -

name: tyrion
line: Have you ever heard the phrase “Rich as a Lannister”? Of course you have. You’re a smart man. You know who the Lannisters are. I am a Lannister. Tyrion, son of Tywin! And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.

name: tyrion
line: Tell her I wish to confess my crimes.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, my lady. I do, my lady.

name: tyrion
line: Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I’m a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I’m not particularly good at violence, but I’m good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle’s boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -

name: tyrion
line: Confessing my crimes.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, I’m very sorry. I don’t know anything about all that.

name: tyrion
line: Is this how justice is done in the Vale? you accuse me of crimes, I deny them, so you throw me in a cell to freeze and starve? Where is the King’s Justice? I’m accused and demand a trial.

name: tyrion
line: I understand the law.

name: tyrion
line: No need to bother Lord Robin. I demand a trial by combat.

name: tyrion
line: Agreed.

name: tyrion
line: Now I demand a champion. I have that right, same as you.

name: tyrion
line: I wouldn’t be too glad, ser. I name my brother, Jaime Lannister.

name: tyrion
line: Send a raven for him, I’m happy to wait.

name: tyrion
line: Do I have a volunteer?

name: tyrion
line: Anyone?... Anyone?

name: tyrion
line: Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.

name: tyrion
line: A Lannister always pays his debts.

name: tyrion
line: Despite appearances, I think you’ll find the city’s on the rise.

name: tyrion
line: Perhaps we should take shelter.

name: tyrion
line: Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

name: tyrion
line: Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

name: tyrion
line: ...it proves that no one needs a Master.

name: tyrion
line: Do we have a plan?

name: tyrion
line: You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King’s Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

name: tyrion
line: Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That’s why Jaime killed him.

name: tyrion
line: You’re talking about destroying cities. It’s not entirely different. I’d like to suggest an alternate approach.

name: tyrion
line: We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

name: tyrion
line: Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

name: tyrion
line: It always seems a bit abstract, doesn’t it, other people dying?

name: tyrion
line: Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

name: tyrion
line: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf’s height thinks he’s the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf’s height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You’re all making the same five or six jokes.

name: tyrion
line: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can’t imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

name: tyrion
line: Doesn’t seem like it. He’s still alive. It was complicated for you, I’m sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don’t we?

name: tyrion
line: We can agree upon that at least.

name: tyrion
line: With the former Masters’ fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

name: tyrion
line: The Seven Kingdoms.

name: tyrion
line: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

name: tyrion
line: I’d call that a successful gambit.

name: tyrion
line: Look around. The city has come back to life.

name: tyrion
line: I did and it worked.

name: tyrion
line: Spoken like a man who has never had to shave.

name: tyrion
line: I’m going to miss you.

name: tyrion
line: I hope you’re right about this expedition of yours.

name: tyrion
line: Most of all, we need our queen.

name: tyrion
line: Varys.

name: tyrion
line: The most famous dwarf in the world.

name: tyrion
line: I am happy. You should both be as well. Not so long ago, this city was ready to devour itself.

name: tyrion
line: Now it’s like a man reborn.

name: tyrion
line: Why don’t you drink? Why don’t either of you ever drink?

name: tyrion
line: Why not?

name: tyrion
line: And who made these rules? Your former masters?

name: tyrion
line: Those miserable old shits didn’t want you to be human. Have a drink with me.

name: tyrion
line: And you? What’s your excuse?

name: tyrion
line: That’s how you know it’s working.

name: tyrion
line: Here’s to our queen. Anyone not drinking is disrespecting our queen.

name: tyrion
line: To Daenerys Stormborn, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, long may she reign.

name: tyrion
line: Do you like it?

name: tyrion
line: Yes, yes. Fermentation. One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms...I’d like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp’s Delight. Only my close friends could drink it.

name: tyrion
line: Tell me a joke, Missandei of Naath.

name: tyrion
line: Grey worm?

name: tyrion
line: ...but when the barkeep brings them over, each of them finds a fly in his cup. The Lannister, outraged, shoves the cup aside and demands another. The Martell plucks the fly out and swallows it whole. The Stark reaches into his cup, pulls out the fly and shouts, “Spit it out, you see shit. Spit it out.”

name: tyrion
line: It’s funnier in Westeros.

name: tyrion
line: Yes.

name: tyrion
line: A story that’s supposed to make you laugh, ideally. Not at the moment, perhaps.

name: tyrion
line: Missandei, do you like the wine?

name: tyrion
line: Tell a joke.

name: tyrion
line: You lied to us.

name: tyrion
line: I was wrong. I admit it.

name: tyrion
line: All right, what should the army do?

name: tyrion
line: And then?

name: tyrion
line: How did he take it?

name: tyrion
line: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That’s the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it’s any consolation.

name: tyrion
line: No, I suppose not. I’m terrible at consoling.

name: tyrion
line: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you’ve ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It’s all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

name: tyrion
line: Good. You’re in the great game now. And the great game’s terrifying. The only people who aren’t afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

name: tyrion
line: He wasn’t the first to love you and he won’t be the last.

name: tyrion
line: I believe in you. It’s embarrassing, really. I’d swear you my sword, but I don’t actually own a sword.

name: tyrion
line: It’s yours. Now and always.

name: tyrion
line: What should we do while we wait? To pass the time, what should we do? What should we talk about?

name: tyrion
line: You speak 19 languages. You must occasionally use some of them to talk about things.

name: tyrion
line: You two, you spend a great deal of time together. What would you be talking about if I weren’t here?

name: tyrion
line: That’s good. That’s very good.

name: tyrion
line: But that’s a report. I was thinking more of a conversation. A wise man once said the truth history of the world is the history of great conversation in elegant rooms.

name: tyrion
line: Me. Just now. All right, no conversations. Let’s play a game.

name: tyrion
line: You don’t play games, either one of you, ever?

name: tyrion
line: There, that’s a start.

name: tyrion
line: Oh no, no, no. Not that, of course not that. Innocent games, fun games, drinking games.

name: tyrion
line: Until you do.

name: tyrion
line: Oh, you took your time.

name: tyrion
line: You see? You don’t even have to worry about the local rebellion. We only have to worry about the three rich foreign cities paying for it.

name: tyrion
line: If the Unsullied march off to reconquer Asatapor and Yunkai, who remain to defend the free people of Meereen?

name: tyrion
line: You may be right.

name: tyrion
line: Possibly.

name: tyrion
line: It’s a conversation.

name: tyrion
line: Tell me, can the little birds get a message to the good Masters of Astapor, the wise Masters of Yunkai, the benevolent enslavers of Volantis?

name: tyrion
line: If I lost my cock, I’d drink all the time.

name: tyrion
line: Meaning no offense. He makes dwarf jokes, I make eunuch jokes.

name: tyrion
line: You think them.

name: tyrion
line: Surely there’s some good news lurking somewhere.

name: tyrion
line: Perhaps they can tell us their secret.

name: tyrion
line: What about the dragons? We have two of them here beneath the pyramid.

name: tyrion
line: Daenerys is the dragon queen. Can’t very well let the dragons starve, that’s obvious.

name: tyrion
line: Dragons do not do well in captivity.

name: tyrion
line: That’s what I do. I drink and I know things.

name: tyrion
line: The dragons Aegon used to conquer Westeros ranged over hundreds of miles. Then Daenerys’s ancestors started chaining them up in pens. A few generations later, the last dragons were no larger than cats. They must be unchained or they’ll waste away. Missandei, how many times were you in the company of these dragons?

name: tyrion
line: And did they ever harm you?

name: tyrion
line: Dragons are intelligent. More intelligent than men according to some maesters. They have affection for their friends and fury for their enemies. I am their friend.

name: tyrion
line: They will. It’s time they had their supper.

name: tyrion
line: I’m friends with your mother. I’m here to help. Don’t eat the help.

name: tyrion
line: When I was a child an uncle asked what gift I wanted for my name day. I begged him for one of you. “It wouldn’t even have to be a big dragon,” I told him. “It could be little, like me.”

name: tyrion
line: Everyone laughed like it was the funniest thing they had ever heard. Then my father told me the last dragon had died a century ago. I cried myself to sleep that night.

name: tyrion
line: But here you are.

name: tyrion
line: Next time I have an idea like that, punch me in the face.

name: tyrion
line: We’re never going to fix what’s wrong with this city from the top of an 800-foot pyramid.

name: tyrion
line: We’ll be fine. We’re dressed like common merchants.

name: tyrion
line: You’ve spent a lot of time studying the way rich people walk?

name: tyrion
line: It’s a good thing you’re not a boy anymore...because you have no cock.

name: tyrion
line: For your baby. To eat.

name: tyrion
line: I know what mhysa means.

name: tyrion
line: Hard to know. Our queen is not as popular in Meereen as she used to be.

name: tyrion
line: Very possibly. Daenerys Targaryen took away their most valuable property, told them human beings weren’t even property to begin with. You can see why they’re unhappy. Of course, it could also be the freed men.

name: tyrion
line: Many of the former slaves feel that Daenerys has abandoned them.

name: tyrion
line: It’s a problem.

name: tyrion
line: Fear has brought Meereen to a standstill. Whoever you are, wherever you go, someone in this city wants to murder you. We can’t fight an enemy we don’t know.

name: tyrion
line: And have you started looking for that someone?

name: tyrion
line: Well, we won’t be sailing to Westeros anytime soon.

name: tyrion
line: It’s not enough.

name: tyrion
line: It’s not enough for Meereen to have peace. They need to know Daenerys is responsible for it. The Sons of the Harpy have a good story. Resist the foreign invaders. Our queen has an even better story. Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains and...all that.

name: tyrion
line: Yes, but do they know who brought them security? Who brought about an end to the violence? We need someone the people trust, someone they know who cannot be bought or influenced.

name: tyrion
line: Who said anything about “him”?

name: tyrion
line: Welcome to Meereen.

name: tyrion
line: That’s about the extent of my Valyrian.

name: tyrion
line: Thank you for travelling all this way. I know from personal experience how uncomfortable the journey can be.

name: tyrion
line: The truth is we need your help. We had hoped that we could somehow persuade you to --

name: tyrion
line: Yes.

name: tyrion
line: She did indeed.

name: tyrion
line: Ideally we’d avoid purifying too many nonbelievers. The Mother of Dragons has followers of many different faiths.

name: tyrion
line: I’d settle for obeyed.

name: tyrion
line: That sounds most excellent --

name: tyrion
line: We’d be most grateful for any support you could provide the queen.

name: tyrion
line: My friend has a healthy skepticism of religion, but we are all loyal supporters of the queen.

name: tyrion
line: I did. As a clever man once told me, “We make peace with our enemies, not our friends.”

name: tyrion
line: Yes, that’s the military approach. And how has that worked here in Meereen? I represent the diplomatic approach.

name: tyrion
line: Long enough to know.

name: tyrion
line: And now you speak for the Good Masters of Astapor.Here’s to reversals of fortune.

name: tyrion
line: Let’s make this simple, shall we? Tell me what you want.

name: tyrion
line: Queen Daenerys won’t stay in Meereen forever. Her path takes her westward.

name: tyrion
line: Friends, friends, friends, please.

name: tyrion
line: There have always been those with wealth and power and those with nothing. That is the way of the world. I’m not here to change the way of the world.

name: tyrion
line: You don’t need slaves to make money. There haven’t been slaves in Westeros for hundreds of years and I grew up richer than any of you. But our queen recognizes that she erred by abolishing slavery without providing a new system to replace it. So here is the queen’s proposal. Slavery will never return to Meereen but she will give the other cities of Slaver’s Bay time to adjust to the new order.

name: tyrion
line: Instead of abolishing slavery overnight, we will give you seven years to end the practice.

name: tyrion
line: Slaveholders will be compensated for their losses, of course, at fair prices. In exchange, you will cut off your support for the Sons of the Harpy.

name: tyrion
line: Fine, fine, but you will cut it off all the same. I do hope you accept, my friends. You will not receive a better offer.

name: tyrion
line: Let us sail on the tide of freedom instead of being drowned by it. And as a parting gift to our honored guests…

name: tyrion
line: Give freedom a chance. See if it doesn’t taste every bit as good as what came before.

name: tyrion
line: My friends! Large sorry...you wait so fat time.

name: tyrion
line: Excellent.

name: tyrion
line: I did.

name: tyrion
line: I imagine this room was built so the rulers could intimidate the ruled.

name: tyrion
line: But I am not your ruler. I’m not the Breaker of Chains. I’m not the Unburnt. And I am certainly not the Mother of Dragons.

name: tyrion
line: Because our queen chose me as her advisor. Until she returns from her travels --

name: tyrion
line: Soon. You have my word.

name: tyrion
line: And that is exactly why Grey Worm took part in these negotiations. As commander of the Unsullied, he knows hot to defeat the slavers and he knows when it is time to make peace.

name: tyrion
line: We offered terms.

name: tyrion
line: Those men respect you.

name: tyrion
line: As do I.

name: tyrion
line: I am not betraying her work. I am trying to save her city.

name: tyrion
line: For a short time.

name: tyrion
line: You’re right. Slavery is a horror that should be ended at once. War is a horror that should be ended at once. I can’t do both today.

name: tyrion
line: I don’t trust the Masters. I trust their self-interest. They’re trustworthy if they’re convinced that working with me is in their self-interest.

name: tyrion
line: They look at me and they see a misshapen little beast. Their contempt is their weakness. They’ll underestimate us every time and we will use that to our advantage.

name: varys
line: Your Grace, Lady Sansa is your aunt by marriage.

name: varys
line: When did you come to this strange country?

name: varys
line: You were only a child.

name: varys
line: You've been a good influence on our mutual friend, you know. He used to drink from sundown to sunup, visit three brothels a night, gamble away his father's money. Now it's just the drinking.

name: varys
line: She is a sweet young thing. None of this is her fault.

name: varys
line: No, I expect not.

name: varys
line: We break bread with them, but that doesn't make us family. We've learned their language, but we'll never be their countrymen. If you let yourself believe that a foreign girl with no name could spend her life with the son of Tywin Lannister--

name: varys
line: You have one name. As do I. Here only the family name matters.

name: varys
line: Diamonds. I'd tell you to beware carrying so much wealth, but you know how to protect yourself. Get on one of those ships. Sail to Pentos or Lys or Myr. You can buy a house with these diamonds, a very large house. Hire servants. Start a new life, a good life, far from here. The mysterious foreign beauty. You'll have suitors lining up.

name: varys
line: We are trying, my lord.

name: varys
line: Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully. In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.

name: varys
line: Oh, Lord Tyrion. Come in, come in.

name: varys
line: Oh, always in confidence.

name: varys
line: Oh, no. It's a wonderful time.

name: varys
line: End your life?

name: varys
line: Proof? Will there be a trial?

name: varys
line: I have no proof, only whispers. Before all this nastiness, I was going to tell you the story of how I was cut. Do you want to hear it still?

name: varys
line: As a boy, I travelled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjuror's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.

name: varys
line: You do not possess at the moment.

name: varys
line: But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.

name: varys
line: Hello, my old friend. It's been a long time. I have no doubt the revenge you want will be yours in time if you have the stomach for it.

line: I could not help Lord Stark. Perhaps I can help his daughter.

line: Littlefinger is not long for the capital. A confidant of mine has told me that when he goes, Sansa Stark goes with him.

line: Littlefinger was born with no lands, no wealth, no armies. He has acquired the first two. How long before he has the army?

name: varys
line: Perhaps you'll laugh, but I know him better than most and this is the truth. Littlefinger is one of the most dangerous men in Westeros. If Robb Stark falls, Sansa Stark is the key to the North.

name: varys
line: Which seems such a shame. Why should a man with such a low reputation steal away such a lovely bride?

name: varys
line: Actually, I rather enjoy him. But he would see this country burn if he could be king of the ashes.

name: varys
line: You are too kind. I believe I have a possible solution.

name: varys
line: Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.

name: varys
line: No, I will not. How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying? I have no pet sellsword to protect me. No legendary brother to avenge me. Only little birds who whisper in my ear.

line: My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.

line: I told you. A ruler.

line: People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.

name: varys
line: And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.

line: I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.

name: varys
line: The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.

name: varys
line: No, you won’t. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.

name: varys
line: Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio’s palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.

line: I've always hated the bells. They ring for horror. A dead king, a city under siege.

line: For all our sakes, I hope you are wrong. My little birds tell me that Stannis Baratheon has taken up with a red priestess from Asshai.

name: varys
line: One day, I will. The dark arts have provided Lord Stannis with his armies and paved his path to our door. For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse. And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.

name: varys
line: My Lord Hand. Commander. I must compliment you on the gold cloaks' performance these last few weeks. Did you know there has been a marked drop in thievery?

line: Power is a curious thing, my lord. Are you fond of riddles?

line: Three great men sit in a room. A king, a priest and a rich man. Between them stands a common sellsword. Each great man bids the sellsword kill the other two. Who lives, who dies?

line: Does it? He has neither crown nor gold nor favor with the gods.

name: varys
line: But if it's swordsmen who rule, why do we pretend kings hold all the power? When Ned Stark lost his head, who was truly responsible? Joffrey? The executioner? Or something else?

name: varys
line: Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.

name: varys
line: Your father has named Lord Tyrion to (Cersei scoffs) serve as hand in his stead.

name: varys
line: My lord.

name: varys
line: We were just speaking of your bravery in the victory against the Stark auxiliary forces.

name: varys
line: I heard you suffered a terrible head wound. The northerners are such fearsome warriors.

name: varys
line: To find so lovely creature working in your father's kitchen. It almost beggars belief.

name: varys
line: How can you tell?

name: varys
line: I am glad your new friend was able to accompany you to the capital. Friends are such an important part of life. Unfortunate that your father didn't want her to come. But rest easy my lord, I am very good at keeping secrets for my good friends.

name: varys
line: How unspeakable of me to go on and on, when all you want to do is rest. I will leave you. (Kisses Shae’s hand). Welcome to Kings Landing, my dear. The city is made brighter by your presence. We have a council meeting, my lord.

name: varys
line: Who threatened you?

name: varys
line: Ned Stark was a man of honor.

name: varys
line: You might be disappointed in the results. The storms come and go. The big fish eat the little fish. And I keep on paddling. Come, my lord. We shouldn't keep the queen waiting.

name: varys
line: Trouble with the wildlings?

name: varys
line: Somewhat less wild these days. It seems they've stopped killing each other and started following this King-Beyond-the-Wall.

name: varys
line: How do you kill a dead man?

name: varys
line: The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.

name: varys
line: Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights -

name: varys
line: I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests.  You begged us to summon the King in the North.  Don't you want to see him again?

name: varys
line: Strange.  You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff.  I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

name: varys
line: Oh, I doubt that.  Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man.  Nothing is ever so sweet again.

name: varys
line: Why?

name: varys
line: So where will you go?

name: varys
line: Good.  If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros.  I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

name: varys
line: My Lady --

name: varys
line: Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

name: varys
line: Two or three ships escaped.  The rest sunk our captured.  Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured.  The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

name: varys
line: Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet.  To send our remaining ships after him --

name: varys
line: The Unsullied will be there soon.

name: varys
line: A difficult situation.  They know we're coming.

name: varys
line: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

name: varys
line: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

name: varys
line: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

name: varys
line: I did.

name: varys
line: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

name: varys
line: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

name: varys
line: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

name: varys
line: Which you turned to your advantage.

name: varys
line: King Robert.

name: varys
line: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

name: varys
line: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

name: varys
line: I swear it, my queen.

name: varys
line: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

name: varys
line: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne.  It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

name: varys
line: And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

name: varys
line: Not burn him alive alongside his son.

name: varys
line: That's what I used to tell myself about her father.  I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive.  I was only a purveyor of information.

name: varys
line: It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it."  As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it."  When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

name: varys
line: And she never will be... with the right counsel.  You need to find a way to make her listen.

name: varys
line: Jon Snow.

name: varys
line: It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

name: varys
line: Nothing good.

name: varys
line: The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years.  Presumably --

name: varys
line: Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

name: varys
line: Fair point.  How do you propose to find one?

name: varys
line: And that would be double what now, exactly?

name: varys
line: You take great offense at dwarf jokes, but love telling eunuch jokes. Why is that?

name: varys
line: The Karstarks.

name: varys
line: You overestimate our influence. Jon and Daenerys don't want to listen to lonely old men.

name: varys
line: Of course she does. Respect is how the young keep us at a distance, so we don't remind them of an unpleasant truth.

name: varys
line: Nothing lasts.

name: varys
line: And the Golden Company has arrived in King's Landing, courtesy of the Greyjoy fleet. The balance has grown distressingly even.

name: varys
line: Thankfully, she's losing allies by the day. Yara Greyjoy has retaken the Iron Islands in her queen's name. The new Prince of Dorne pledges his support.

name: varys
line: How many others know?

name: varys
line: Well, then it's not a secret anymore. It's information. If a handful of people know now, hundreds will know soon. Then what happens?

name: varys
line: No, it's worse than that. He has the better claim to the throne.

name: varys
line: I'm not sure it matters what he wants. The fact is, people are drawn to him. Wildlings, Northmen. He's a war hero.

name: varys
line: She's his aunt.

name: varys
line: No, but Jon grew up in Winterfell. Is marrying your aunt common in the North? You know our queen better than I do. Do you think she wants to share the throne? She does not like to have her authority questioned.

name: varys
line: I worry about her state of mind.

name: varys
line: Your Grace. I promised you I would look you in the eye and speak directly if I ever thought you were making a mistake. This is a mistake.

name: varys
line: (nods)

name: varys
line: Cersei needs to be destroyed, but if we attack King's Landing with Drogon and the Unsullied and the Dothraki, tens of thousands of innocents will die. That is why Cersei is bringing them into the Red Keep. These are the people you came here to protect. I beg you, Your Grace. Do not destroy the city you came to save. Do not become what you have always struggled to defeat.

name: varys
line: I've served tyrants most of my life. They all talk about destiny.

name: varys
line: Perhaps that's the problem. Her life has convinced her that she was sent here to save us all.

name: varys
line: Then there's the problem of Jon Snow. Perhaps it's actually a solution. You know them both. Tell me, who do you think would make a better ruler?

name: varys
line: Have you considered the best ruler might be someone who doesn't want to rule?

name: varys
line: Don't pretend you haven't thought about it.

name: varys
line: He's temperate and measured. He's a man, which makes him more appealing to the lords of Westeros, whose support we are going to need.

name: varys
line: And he's the heir to the throne. Yes, because he's a man. Cocks are important, I'm afraid.

name: varys
line: She's too strong for him. She'd bend him to her will, as she already has.

name: varys
line: As you have? You're drinking quite a lot. A Targaryen father and a Stark mother. Jon's the one man alive who might actually be able to keep the North in the Seven Kingdoms.

name: varys
line: You've always known my reasons.

name: varys
line: Even if you know it's a mistake?

name: varys
line: You know where my loyalty stands. You know I will never betray the realm.

name: varys
line: Millions of people, many of whom will die if the wrong person sits on that throne. We don't know their names, but they're just as real as you and I. They deserve to live. They deserve food for their children. I will act in their interest, no matter the personal cost.

name: varys
line: I've spoken as honestly as I can. Each of us has a choice to make. I pray we choose wisely.

name: varys
line: You've seen better days, my lord.

name: varys
line: No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.

name: varys
line: You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.

name: varys
line: l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.

name: varys
line: Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.

name: varys
line: Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.

name: varys
line: Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

name: varys
line: l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

name: varys
line: Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?

name: varys
line: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

name: varys
line: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

name: varys
line: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

name: varys
line: Oh, you can do better than that.

name: varys
line: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

name: varys
line: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

name: varys
line: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

name: varys
line: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

name: varys
line: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

name: varys
line: (Joffrey arrives, Varys bows)  Serving a new King.

name: varys
line: My king.

name: varys
line: Lord Stark.

name: varys
line: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

name: varys
line: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

name: varys
line: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

name: varys
line: Lady Stark.

name: varys
line: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

name: varys
line: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

name: varys
line: I must admit I do not.

name: varys
line: How is your son, my Lord?

name: varys
line: But his mind is sound?

name: varys
line: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

name: varys
line: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

name: varys
line: I didn't trust you.

name: varys
line: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

name: varys
line: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

name: varys
line: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

name: varys
line: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

name: varys
line: Someone who could afford it.

name: varys
line: He started asking questions.

name: varys
line: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

name: varys
line: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

name: varys
line: This Hand is not the other.

name: varys
line: "Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

name: varys
line: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

name: varys
line: We all have our qualities.

name: varys
line: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

name: varys
line: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

name: varys
line: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

name: varys
line: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

name: varys
line: Strictly speaking.

name: varys
line: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

name: varys
line: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

name: varys
line: Eyes I own.

name: varys
line: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

name: varys
line: Oh.

name: varys
line: Have you?

name: varys
line: Was that you under the bed?

name: varys
line: Oh, please.

name: varys
line: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

name: varys
line: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

name: varys
line: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

name: varys
line: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

name: varys
line: Dreadful.

name: varys
line: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

name: varys
line: Would you?

name: varys
line: You made a pact with fanatics.

name: varys
line: If you shaved your beard with a straight razor, you’d say the razor worked. That doesn’t mean it won’t cut your throat.

name: varys
line: I know.

name: varys
line: If I don’t return, you’ll know I was wrong.

name: varys
line: We need friends in Westeros. And we need ships.

name: varys
line: She’ll come back. She has to. My heart’s been broken too many times already.

name: varys
line: I’ll walk the rest of the way myself. I can’t go off on a secret mission in the company of the most famous dwarf in the city.

name: varys
line: Fire and blood.

name: varys
line: I don’t know how you stand it in all that leather.

name: varys
line: If we could have the room.

name: varys
line: You look lovely today, my dear. You really do. How you climbed all those steps without breaking a sweat.

name: varys
line: I am not a torturer.

name: varys
line: Though it so often is what people deserve.

name: varys
line: And it does provide answers. But they’re usually the wrong answers. My job is to find the right answers. Do you know how I do that? I do it by making people happy. I’d like to make you happy, Vala. That’s your name, isn’t it, Vala?

name: varys
line: That’s all right. I know who you are and what you’ve done. You’ve done a lot. You’ve sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do. And you’ve helped the Sons of the Harpy murder the Unsullied and the Second Sons.

name: varys
line: Children are blameless. I have never hurt them. Your boy is in no immediate danger, this I swear to you. But between us, dear, you did conspire to kill the queen’s soldiers. We both know the penalty for that crime. How will poor Dom get on without his mother? And with his breathing problem.

name: varys
line: Yes, from your perspective, this is a problem. There is a third option, though. A ship leaving tomorrow for Pentos. I’ve already booked passage for a woman and her young son. I’ll even throw in a bag of silver to help you start again.

name: varys
line: Though I’m afraid we’ll have to ask one of our leather-clad friends back in to carry it. Far too heavy for me. The boat sails at dawn. You need to decide now. A new life for you and Dom or…

name: varys
line: Sorry. I was busy learning who funds the Sons of the Harpy. Some things you can’t rush.

name: varys
line: The good masters of Astapor. And the wise masters of Yunkai. With help from their friends in Volantis.

name: varys
line: Of course. Man can be fickle, but birds always trust.

name: varys
line: I do not make dwarf jokes.

name: varys
line: So, the fleet. It’s been burned.

name: varys
line: Astapor and Yunkai have stopped asking us for aid.

name: varys
line: The Masters have retaken both cities. Outside of Meereen, the whole of Slaver’s Bay has returned to the slavers.

name: varys
line: Do they know that?

name: varys
line: You walk like a rich person.

name: varys
line: You walk as though the paving stones were your personal property. I used to steal from people like you when I was a boy.

name: varys
line: She thinks you want to eat her baby.

name: varys
line: His Valyrian is terrible. He only wants to give you money, so your baby can eat.

name: varys
line: Mhysa means mother in Valyrian.

name: varys
line: Who wrote it?

name: varys
line: The Sons of the Harpy?

name: varys
line: She did fly away on a dragon and not come back.

name: varys
line: The Sons of the Harpy planned their attack in the fighting pits very carefully, which means they take orders from someone.

name: varys
line: My little birds have already taken wing. Soon they’ll return, singing songs of men in gold masks.

name: varys
line: In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?

name: varys
line: And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.

name: varys
line: So it’s safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.

name: varys
line: For now is the best we get in our profession.

name: varys
line: Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I’d say it’s a good start.

name: varys
line: Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?

name: varys
line: A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King’s Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he’d been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.

name: varys
line: I suppose it’s hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn’t that the whole point of being a fanatic? You’re always right. Everything is the Lord’s will.

name: varys
line: And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?

name: melisandre
line: Show the boy to his chambers. Have the maids draw him a bath and find him some decent clothes. I'll come visit you soon.

name: melisandre
line: You know what I mean to do with him.

name: melisandre
line: Have you ever slaughtered a lamb, my king?

name: melisandre
line: If the lamb sees the knife, she panics. Her panic seeps into her meat, darkens it, fouls the flavor.

name: melisandre
line: And none have seen the blade.

name: melisandre
line: Have you ever seen one like it?

name: melisandre
line: It's shocking, isn't it, the first time you encounter real wealth?  When I was your age, I lived on one bowl of stew a day. And stew is a kind word for it.

name: melisandre
line: Here, taste this.

name: melisandre
line: You think I'm trying to poison you?

name: melisandre
line: Where do you think it's from?

name: melisandre
line: Doesn't matter, does it?  It's the real thing or it's not. You only need a tongue to tell the difference. Go on, have some more. You still don't trust it. You think this is all a mistake and that you'll have to pay somehow for every bite you take.

name: melisandre
line: There are no mistakes. Not for us.

name: melisandre
line: Your father chose your mother because the Lord of Light willed it. He willed it so you could be here right now with a power inside you you can't even begin to understand. And He brought me here to draw it from you and birth it into the world. We're both a part of His plan. He wants this for us. No, He demands this of us.

name: melisandre
line: According to whom?  The Silent Sisters? With their stern looks, muzzled mouths, and dried-up cunts? What have their gods done for you?  Hmm?  When you pray to them, what's their answer?  A god is real or he's not. You only need eyes to see.

name: melisandre
line: Death is coming for everyone and everything. A darkness that will swallow the dawn. And we can stop it, you and I.

name: melisandre
line: Let me show you what you have inside you. Come fight death with me.

name: melisandre
line: You have to trust me.

name: melisandre
line: Don't fight, don't fight. They won't take much.

name: melisandre
line: I told you there's power in the blood of kings. And you have so much blood.

name: melisandre
line: You can blame Ser Davos. He didn't believe in the power of king's blood. He wanted a demonstration.

name: melisandre
line: I take no credit. I have faith and my faith has been rewarded.

name: melisandre
line: And our king is still no closer to the Iron Throne. A great gift requires a great sacrifice.

name: melisandre
line: Your mercy saved the boy's life. You feel good about that?

name: melisandre
line: You saved one innocent. How many tens of thousands have you doomed?

name: melisandre
line: Take him away.

name: melisandre
line: My king.

name: melisandre
line: This War of Five Kings means nothing. The true war lies to the north, my king. Death marches on the Wall. Only you can stop him.

name: melisandre
line: He's right. You need him. He has a part to play in the war to come.

name: melisandre
line: I don't know yet. The fires will show me.

name: melisandre
line: I don't know.

name: melisandre
line: I will never abandon you. You are the Son of Fire.  I am sworn to serve you.

name: melisandre
line: When I return, you will understand.

name: melisandre
line: I cannot.

name: melisandre
line: You don't have the strength. It would kill you.

name: melisandre
line: Your fires burn low, my king.

name: melisandre
line: There is another way. A better way.

name: melisandre
line: Yes.

name: melisandre
line: You are. But there are others with your blood in their veins. You will sit on the Iron Throne, but first there must be sacrifices. The Lord of Light demands it.

name: melisandre
line: How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?

name: melisandre
line: I'm not your enemy.

name: melisandre
line: Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men.
