You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.

name: melisandre
line: Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.

name: melisandre
line: Death by fire is the purest death.

name: melisandre
line: You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.

name: melisandre
line: I will pray for you.

name: melisandre
line: We come as friends.

name: melisandre
line: Valar morghulis.

name: melisandre
line: (speaks Valyrian) You are Thoros of Myr.

name: melisandre
line: (speaks Valyrian) The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?

name: melisandre
line: (speaks Valyrian) You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.

name: melisandre
line: How many times has the Lord brought him back?

name: melisandre
line: (speaks Valerian) That's not possible.

name: melisandre
line: (speaks Valerian) You should not have this power.

name: melisandre
line: You've been to the other side.

name: melisandre
line: You have someone He needs.

name: melisandre
line: You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.

name: melisandre
line: Wildfire. I should have been here.

name: melisandre
line: Do you miss it?

name: melisandre
line: Your father's house.

name: melisandre
line: Haven't you ever wondered where your strength came from? Your talent for fighting?

name: melisandre
line: Mine was a slave. So was I. Bought and sold, scourged and branded, until the Lord of Light reached down, took me in his hand and raised me up.

name: melisandre
line: Your blood is noble.

name: melisandre
line: There. Your father's house.

name: melisandre
line: The bastard of Robert of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men. Why do you think the gold cloaks wanted you? There is power in a king's blood.

name: melisandre
line: Hear us now. Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.

name: melisandre
line: Lord of Light, show us the way...

name: melisandre
line: Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.

name: melisandre
line: It's all I knew when I was a child.

name: melisandre
line: Until he found me.

name: melisandre
line: Every mother should fear for her child's soul.

name: melisandre
line: Were you sleeping, Princess?

name: melisandre
line: Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?

name: melisandre
line: And it frightened you?

name: melisandre
line: They're in a better place now, Princess. The fire cleansed them of the sins of the world.

name: melisandre
line: Women scream when they give birth. Afterward they are filled with joy.

name: melisandre
line: You have so many questions, don't you? So did I when I was a child. I was much like you. Only I wasn't a princess.

name: melisandre
line: No. But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me. What do you know of the gods?

name: melisandre
line: Lies and fables. Septons speak of seven gods. There are but two... a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear. Eternally at war.

name: melisandre
line: There's only one hell, Princess. The one we live in now.

name: melisandre
line: Come in, my queen. Please.

name: melisandre
line: You could never disturb me.

name: melisandre
line: Could you bring me that vial over there? The blue one.

name: melisandre
line: No, no, no. Not that one. You don't even want to touch that one. Next to it. That's the one.

name: melisandre
line: When I looked into the flames this morning, the Lord spoke to me. He said, "Tonight, you will have your last good bath in a long while. Make it count." A joke. Not a very good one, I'm afraid.

name: melisandre
line: That's because most jokes are lies and you're devoted to the truth.

name: melisandre
line: Not always.

name: melisandre
line: No. Don't be upset. Men never crave what they already have.

name: melisandre
line: It's only flesh. It needs what it needs.

name: melisandre
line: I understand how you feel.

name: melisandre
line: But that is impossible.

name: melisandre
line: You don't need powders and potions, my queen. You don't need lies. You are strong enough to look into the Lord's light and see his truth for yourself.

name: melisandre
line: However harsh it is. However hard for us to understand. You don't need my help, but I will need yours soon. When we set sail, your daughter must be with us. The Lord needs her.

name: melisandre
line: It will all be over soon, Princess.

name: melisandre
line: The year is now, my Lord. For you we offer up this girl, that you may cleanse her with your fire and that its light may lead our way.

name: melisandre
line: Accept this token of our faith, my lord and lead us from the darkness. Lord of Light show us the way!

name: melisandre
line: Lord of Light protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors!

name: melisandre
line: The Lord of Light has made good on his promise, my king. His fires have melted the snows away. The way ahead is clear.

name: melisandre
line: And you will take it. The Lord has shown me Bolton banners burning. You will receive what is yours by right.

name: melisandre
line: The king wants a word.

name: melisandre
line: Never. The Lord’s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.

name: melisandre
line: Feel.

name: melisandre
line: Are you a virgin?

name: melisandre
line: Good.

name: melisandre
line: Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.

name: melisandre
line: Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.

name: melisandre
line: Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.

name: melisandre
line: (Walking towards them). Those scars mean nothing to the Lord of Light.

name: melisandre
line: Her father is the Lord's chosen King. And her father's blood runs through her veins.

name: melisandre
line: You march on Winterfell soon?

name: melisandre
line: Once before you put your faith in Ser Davos and left me behind. I hope you won't make that mistake again.

name: melisandre
line: You only need faith, my King.

name: melisandre
line: To serve my Lord.

name: melisandre
line: Lord Commander.

name: melisandre
line: Come with us when we ride south. (Walks forwards). None of us know the castle as well as you do. Its hidden tunnels, its weaknesses, its people. Winterfell was your home once. Don't you want to chase the rats out of it? (Turns to Jon).

name: melisandre
line: There's only one war. Life against death. Come. Let me show what you're fighting for. (Walks in front of Jon).

name: melisandre
line: No visions. No magic. Just life.

name: melisandre
line: Do you feel my heart beating? This power in you, you resist it, and that's your mistake. Embrace it.

name: melisandre
line: The Lord of Light made us male and female. Two parts of a greater whole. We are joining this power. Power to make life, power to make light, and power to cast shadows.

name: melisandre
line: Then we shouldn't tell him. (Starts unbuttoning Jon’s coat).

name: melisandre
line: Why?

name: melisandre
line: The dead don't need lovers. Only the living.

name: melisandre
line: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

name: melisandre
line: You saw it yourself, my king, when you stared into the flames. A great battle in the snow.

name: melisandre
line: You do know. Trust yourself.

name: melisandre
line: I trust in the Lord.

name: melisandre
line: I have seen myself walk along the battlements of Wintefell. I have seen the flayed men banners lowered to the ground.

name: melisandre
line: But sometimes sacrifices must be made to ensure victory. I have shown you the power of king's blood. The Usurper Robb Stark. The Usurper Joffrey Baratheon.

name: melisandre
line: No, we have someone better, and your blood runs through her veins.

name: melisandre
line: Do you doubt me still? After all that you’ve seen?

name: melisandre
line: There is only one way. You must become king before the Long Night begins. Only you can lead the living against the dead. All your life has led us to this moment. To this decision.

name: melisandre
line: l I did. I still see it.

name: melisandre
line: The Lord of Light only allows me glimpses.

name: melisandre
line: Will you quit the war just because you've lost a battle?

name: melisandre
line: I've been fighting far longer than you.

name: melisandre
line: Inside you.

name: melisandre
line: We murdered him. Share the weight with me.

name: melisandre
line: This war has just begun. It will last for years. Thousands will die at your command. You will betray the men serving you. You will betray your family. You will betray everything you once held dear. And it will all be worth it because you are the Son of Fire. You are the Warrior of Light. You will sweep aside this pretender and that one. You will be king.

name: melisandre
line: Let me show you.

name: melisandre
line: Look into the fire, my king. Look.

name: melisandre
line: Keep looking. Do you see? Do you see, my king?

name: melisandre
line: The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.

name: melisandre
line: I told him death by fire is the purest death.

name: melisandre
line: Because it is true. You're troubled my king.

name: melisandre
line: These armies are but toys for the Lord of Light.

name: melisandre
line: I tell him nothing! I pray for his commands and I obey.

name: melisandre
line: You must have faith.

name: melisandre
line: Then we must be the ten.

name: melisandre
line: I have seen the path to victory in the flames. At first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.

name: melisandre
line: You must give... all of yourself.

name: melisandre
line: She's sick. Weak. Shut away in the tower. And she disgusts you. And she's given you nothing. No sons. Only stillborns. Only death. (Whispers in his ear). I will give you a son, my King.

name: melisandre
line: Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.

name: melisandre
line: Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

name: melisandre
line: After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.

name: melisandre
line: The cold breath of winter will freeze the seas.

name: melisandre
line: And the dead shall rise in the North.

name: melisandre
line: You smell of fear, fear and piss and old bones. Do you want to stop me? Stop me.

name: melisandre
line: In the ancient books, it's written that a warrior will draw a burning sword from the fire. And that sword shall be Lightbringer. Stannis Baratheon, warrior of light, your sword awaits you.

name: melisandre
line: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

name: melisandre
line: Stannis does not need to beg this lord or that lord for support. The Lord of Light stands behind him.

name: melisandre
line: He has no need for ships.

name: melisandre
line: The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away. Your Grace.

name: melisandre
line: The king has taken for his sigil the fiery heart of the Lord of Light.

name: melisandre
line: You should kneel before your brother. He's the Lord's chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.

name: melisandre
line: Look to your sins, Lord Renly. The night is dark and full of terrors.

name: melisandre
line: Are you afraid, Onion Knight?

name: melisandre
line: You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time. Are you a good man, Ser Davos Seaworth?

name: melisandre
line: If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion. A man is good or he is evil.

name: melisandre
line: Oh, good. I'm a knight myself, of sorts, a champion of light and life.

name: melisandre
line: Do you love your wife?

name: melisandre
line: Yet you have known other women.

name: melisandre
line: I'm not. I'm talking about other women. Like me, Ser Davos. You want me. You want to see what's beneath this robe.

name: melisandre
line: And you will.

name: melisandre
line: Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos. They are servants of light, the children of fire. And the brighter the flame, the darker they are.

name: melisandre
line: They can't bar our passage.

name: melisandre
line: There's only one god, Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.

name: melisandre
line: I've done my part.  I've brought ice and fire together.

name: melisandre
line: My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

name: melisandre
line: Neither of us is common folk anymore.  I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

name: melisandre
line: Because of mistakes I made.  Terrible mistakes.  I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

name: melisandre
line: Volantis.

name: melisandre
line: I will return, dear spider.  One last time.

name: melisandre
line: I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

name: melisandre
line: Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded.  It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

name: melisandre
line: I am called Melisandre.

name: melisandre
line: No, it didn't.

name: melisandre
line: The Long Night is coming.  Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

name: melisandre
line: Prophecies are dangerous things.  I believe you have a role to play, as does another.  The King in the North, Jon Snow.

name: melisandre
line: As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger.  As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

name: melisandre
line: Summon Jon Snow.  Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

name: melisandre
line: I’m not a soldier.

name: melisandre
line: Don’t lose.

name: melisandre
line: I’ll have to try.

name: melisandre
line: I am not your servant, Jon Snow.

name: melisandre
line: I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

name: melisandre
line: I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn’t want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

name: melisandre
line: I don’t know. Maybe you’re only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

name: melisandre
line: The one we’ve got.

name: melisandre
line: Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

name: melisandre
line: The Princess Shireen.

name: melisandre
line: We burned her at the stake.

name: melisandre
line: The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

name: melisandre
line: I only do what my Lord commands!

name: melisandre
line: We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

name: melisandre
line: So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

name: melisandre
line: I didn’t lie. I was wrong.

name: melisandre
line: I’ve been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he’s not. You’ve seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

name: melisandre
line: Afterwards, after they stabbed you, after you died, where did you go? What did you see?

name: melisandre
line: The Lord let you come back for a reason. Stannis was not the prince who was promised, but someone has to be.

name: melisandre
line: Come in.

name: melisandre
line: You interrupt nothing.

name: melisandre
line: I will after you tell me.

name: melisandre
line: The former Lord Commander.

name: melisandre
line: What are you asking?

name: melisandre
line: If you want to help him, leave him be.

name: melisandre
line: There are some with his power.

name: melisandre
line: I don’t know.

name: melisandre
line: Not for me.

name: melisandre
line: Everything I believed, the great victory I saw in the flames, all of it was a lie.

name: melisandre
line: You were right all along. The Lord never spoke to me.

name: melisandre
line: I never had this gift.

name: melisandre
line: Please.

name: melisandre
line: Ser Davos.

name: melisandre
line: I saw him in the flames, fighting at Winterfell.

name: melisandre
line: Ser Davos.

name: melisandre
line: I will do as Jon Snow commands.

name: melisandre
line: He’s the prince that was promised.

name: melisandre
line: There was a battle. Stannis was defeated.

name: missandei
line: Yes, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: It only took Your Grace a year to learn Dothraki reasonably well.

name: missandei
line: Dothraki is difficult for the mouth to master. So guttural and harsh.

name: missandei
line: Athjahakar.

name: missandei
line: Ath-ja-hakar.

name: missandei
line: (nods)

name: missandei
line: Your High Valyrian is very good, Your Grace. The gods could not devise a more perfect tongue. It is the only proper language for poetry.

name: missandei
line: (gasps)

name: missandei
line: (speaking Valyrian) This is Daenerys Targaryen, the Stormborn, the Unburnt, the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, Mother of Dragons. It is to her you owe your freedom

name: missandei
line: It is old Ghiscari, khaleesi. It means 'mother'.

name: missandei
line: All? Did this one's ears mishear, Your Grace?

name: missandei
line: (speaking Valerian) She wants to buy them all.

name: missandei
line: There are 8,000 Unsullied in Astapor. Is this what you mean by all?

name: missandei
line: Master Greizhen says they cannot sell half-trained boys. If they fail on the battlefield, they will bring shame upon all of Astapor.

name: missandei
line: Master Kraznys says you cannot afford this.

name: missandei
line: Your ship will buy you Because Master Kraznys is generous.

name: missandei
line: The gold you have left is worth 10.

name: missandei
line: But good Master Kraznys will give you 20.

name: missandei
line: The Dothraki you have with you--

name: missandei
line: The Dothraki you have are not worth what they cost to feed, but Master Kraznys will give you three Unsullied for all of them.

name: missandei
line: Master Kraznys asks how you propose to pay for the remaining 7,877 unsullied.

name: missandei
line: (speaking Valerian)

name: missandei
line: They want the biggest one.

name: missandei
line: (speaking Valerian) She asks that you give me to her, as a present. She asks that you do this now.

name: missandei
line: This one's name is Missandei, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: No, Your Grace. No family living.

name: missandei
line: Yes, Your Grace. Lying is a great offense. Many of those on the Walk of Punishment were taken there for less.

name: missandei
line: There are no masters in the grave, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: All questions have been taken from them. They obey, that is all. Once they are yours, they are yours. They will fall on their swords if you command it.

name: missandei
line: Valar morghulis.

name: missandei
line: The Unsullied have stood here for a day and a night with no food or water.

name: missandei
line: They will stand until they drop.

name: missandei
line: Such is their obedience.

name: missandei
line: (speaking Valeryan) The Westrosi woman is pleased with them, but speaks no praise to keep the price down. She wished to know how they are trained.

name: missandei
line: They begin their training at five. Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the shortsword, the shield, and the three spears. Only one boy in four survives this rigorous training.

name: missandei
line: Their discipline and loyalty are absolute. They fear nothing.

name: missandei
line: ( speaking Valyrian )

name: missandei
line: ( speaking Valyrian ) The knight says even brave men fear death.

name: missandei
line: ( speaking Valyrian ) Truly, master?

name: missandei
line: He begs you attend to this carefully, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: My master points out that men don't need nipples.

name: missandei
line: To win his shield, an Unsullied must go to the slave marts with a silver mark, find a newborn and kill it before its mother's eyes. This way, my master says, we make certain there is no weakness left in them.

name: missandei
line: ( speaking Valyrian ) She is offended. She asks if you pay a sliver coin to the mother for her dead baby.

name: missandei
line: My master would like you to know that the silver is paid to the baby's owner, not the mother.

name: missandei
line: ( Missandei speaking Valyrian )

name: missandei
line: Master Kraznys asks that you please hurry. Many other buyers are interested.

name: missandei
line: Yes, khaleesi. The officers.

name: missandei
line: The master says they are untested. He says you would be wise to blood them early. There are many small cities between here and there, cities ripe for sacking. Should you take captives, the masters will buy the healthy ones and for a good price.

name: missandei
line: And who knows? In 10 years, some of the boys you send them may be Unsullied in their turn. Thus all shall prosper.

name: missandei
line: (speaks Valyrian)

name: missandei
line: It is done.

name: missandei
line: You hold the whip.

name: missandei
line: Now comes the noble Razdal mo Eraz of that ancient and honorable house, master of men and speaker to savages, to offer terms of peace.

name: missandei
line: Noble lord, you are in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains, and Mother of Dragons.

name: missandei
line: Will the noble lord take refreshment?

name: missandei
line: No, not spying.

name: missandei
line: Yes your grace.

name: missandei
line: No.

name: missandei
line: He was interested.

name: missandei
line: I believe he was interested.

name: missandei
line: All of it?

name: missandei
line: I don't know, your grace.

name: missandei
line: Yes, your grace.

name: missandei
line: *in Valyrian* You don't need to apologize.

name: missandei
line: *in Valyrian* No.

name: missandei
line: To me.

name: missandei
line: I don't remember teaching you the word precious.

name: missandei
line: Do you remember the name you were given at birth?

name: missandei
line: When they cut you, do you remember that?

name: missandei
line: I'm sorry. I'm sorry they did that to you.

name: missandei
line: It's a terrible thing to do to a boy.

name: missandei
line: *in Valyrian* Grey Worm.

name: missandei
line: *in Valyrian* I'm glad you saw me.

name: missandei
line: *in Valyrian* You stand before Daenerys Stormborn, the Unburnt, Queen of Mereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men. Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons.

name: missandei
line: *in Low Valyrian* The Queen says you may approach.

name: missandei
line: *translating* I have brought you. He came from the sky. The black one. The winged shadow. He came from the sky and...

name: missandei
line: *translating* My girl. My little girl.

name: missandei
line: Zala, your grace.

name: missandei
line: Three.

name: missandei
line: He says that we're an army of men without man parts. He claims you are no woman at all, but a man who... hides his cock in his own asshole.

name: missandei
line: He is very brave, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: Since midnight, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: Several times, Your Grace, with Master Kraznys.

name: missandei
line: They say 1,000 slaves died building the Great Pyramid of Meereen.

name: missandei
line: If they're smart, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: Isles. Summer Isles.

name: missandei
line: (speaks Valyrian) I am from an island called Naath.

name: missandei
line: "When did they take me?" I was five years old.

name: missandei
line: I remember when they rowed us away from shore. How white the beaches were. How tall the trees. And I remember my village burning. Smoke rising into the sky. Do you remember your home?

name: missandei
line: That's not true. Perhaps one day you will return to the Summer Isles.

name: missandei
line: Kill the masters.

name: missandei
line: Very well, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: The Queen says you may approach and speak.

name: missandei
line: He is a goatherd. He says he prayed for your victory against the slave masters.

name: missandei
line: (speaks Valyrian)

name: missandei
line: It was your dragons, he says. They came this morning for his flock.

name: missandei
line: He hopes he has not offended Your Grace, but now he has nothing.

name: missandei
line: (translates)

name: missandei
line: There are 212 supplicants waiting, Your Grace.

name: missandei
line: It’s true. And I would be dead if not for the… (look at Tyrion) little man.

name: missandei
line: (Valyrian) A bit “rusty”.

name: missandei
line: You are not strong enough to go anywhere.

name: missandei
line: It’s true. Only the Unsullied can keep the peace in Meereen. If you leave, half the city will consume the other half.

name: missandei
line: Torgo Nudho.

name: missandei
line: I wanted to speak with you.

name: missandei
line: White Rat, the Unsullied who… I have heard they found his body in a brothel. I have heard that more than one Unsullied has been known to visit Meereen’s brothels. May I ask you why? Why would an Unsullied go to a brothel?

name: missandei
line: You're still too weak. (He lays back down).

name: missandei
line: (Valyrian) Three days.

name: missandei
line: (Valyrian) You failed no one. You fought bravely. You’ll fight again. (In Common Tongue) Are you ashamed? You were ambushed, outnumbered. There was no way you could have known.

name: missandei
line: All men fear death.

name: missandei
line: Now you have given the Masters what they deserve.

name: missandei
line: Your Grace, I think that I am not fit to have an opinion on these matters.

name: missandei
line: I can only tell you what I have seen, Your Grace. (Sitting down). I have seen you listen to your counselors. I have seen you lean on their experience when your own was lacking and weigh the choices they put before you. And I have seen you ignore your counselors, because there was a better choice. One that only you could see.

name: missandei
line: Glory?

name: missandei
line: Welcome to Dragonstone.  Our queen knows this is a long journey.  She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf.  If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

name: missandei
line: Please, this way.

name: missandei
line: I was born on the Island of Naarth.

name: missandei
line: You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

name: missandei
line: They can still do something to you.  It only takes one arrow.

name: missandei
line: And what will they face?

name: missandei
line: Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate.  That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

name: missandei
line: You leave tomorrow.  Were you going to say goodbye?

name: missandei
line: But you don't know when that will be.

name: missandei
line: I wish you good fortune.

name: missandei
line: Why?

name: missandei
line: I don't.

name: missandei
line: That's what I am?  Your weakness?

name: missandei
line: I believe it.

name: missandei
line: I do too.

name: missandei
line: I want to see you.  Please.

name: missandei
line: Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

name: missandei
line: He better.

name: missandei
line: Many things.

name: missandei
line: Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

name: missandei
line: Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

name: missandei
line: Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

name: missandei
line: We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

name: missandei
line: I was stolen away by slavers.

name: missandei
line: She bought me from my master and set me free.

name: missandei
line: I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen.  Because I believe in her.

name: missandei
line: Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

name: missandei
line: I know it.  All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her.  She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew.  She's the queen we chose.

name: missandei
line: Why did they build it?

name: missandei
line: Hello.

name: missandei
line: Naath. I'd like to see the beaches again.

name: missandei
line: My people are peaceful. We cannot protect ourselves.

name: missandei
line: When the people find out what we have done for them, that we saved them--

name: missandei
line: No!

name: missandei
line: Dracarys.

name: missandei
line: Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

name: missandei
line: You seem happy.

name: missandei
line: I will be happy when our queen returns.

name: missandei
line: I have tried wine before. It made me feel funny.

name: missandei
line: I do not know any jokes.

name: missandei
line: A joke is like a story, Torgo Nudho. Not a true story, necessarily.

name: missandei
line: I do.

name: missandei
line: Two translators are on a sinking ship.

name: missandei
line: The first says, “Do you know how to swim?” The second says, “No, but I can shout for help in 19 languages.”

name: missandei
line: You don’t even know what a joke is.

name: missandei
line: More jokes.

name: missandei
line: The Masters have come for their property.

name: missandei
line: That changes nothing.

name: missandei
line: Who said this?

name: missandei
line: My master Kraznys would sometimes make us play games.

name: missandei
line: Only the girls.

name: missandei
line: We do not drink.

name: missandei
line: You found out?

name: missandei
line: We cannot. The Masters only speak one language. They spoke it to me for many years. I know it better than my mother tongue. If we want them to hear us, we must speak it back to them. May it be the last thing they ever hear.

name: missandei
line: Possibly?

name: missandei
line: They are not eating. They haven’t touched any food since Queen Daenerys left.

name: missandei
line: How do you know this?

name: missandei
line: Many times.

name: missandei
line: Never.

name: missandei
line: The people know who brought them freedom.

name: missandei
line: Our queen tried to make peace with the Masters and they tried to murder her.

name: missandei
line: How many days were you a slave?

name: missandei
line: Not long enough to understand.

name: missandei
line: She refused them because hundreds of thousands of men, women, and children still lived in chains.

name: missandei
line: Perhaps I should translate for you.

name: missandei
line: I do not trust them. I will never trust them.

name: missandei
line: But as a wise man once said, “We make peace with our enemies, not our friends.”

name: missandei
line: You promised the slavers they could keep slavery.

name: missandei
line: Seven years is not a short time for a slave.

name: davos
line: ' Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Two meals a day. Cold for breakfast, hot for supper. I cannot complain.

name: davos
line: Well, it's sad to say, but I've seen worse.

name: davos
line: I'm sorry about your son. Didn't get the chance to tell you before. Good lad. Loyal lad.

name: davos
line: (nods)

name: davos
line: I didn't know she'd been gone.

name: davos
line: Why?

name: davos
line: She's going to kill him.

name: davos
line: Forgive me, Your Grace, I'm not a learned man, but is there a difference between kill and sacrifice?  The boy is your nephew.

name: davos
line: Because he has your blood in his veins.

name: davos
line: Renly wronged you. Renly declared himself king when the throne belonged to you. He raised an army, stole your bannermen. This boy has done you no harm. He's an innocent.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, why did you come to see me today?

name: davos
line: I swear it. I can't swear never to speak against her.

name: davos
line: Quite little, Your Grace. Verging on none. You could have freed me yesterday or tomorrow, but you came to me now before this boy is put to the knife because you knew I'd counsel restraint. You came to hear me say it because you believe it yourself. You're not a man who slaughters innocents for gain or glory. When my son was five he said to me, 'I don't ever want to die. ' I wanted to say to him, 'You won't, child. You won't ever.' I hated the idea of him lying awake in the dark, afraid. I think mothers and fathers made up the gods because they wanted their children to sleep through the night.

name: davos
line: How are you keeping?

name: davos
line: It was just a bit of blood.

name: davos
line: I'm not a highborn.

name: davos
line: A recent state of affairs. I was born in Flea Bottom just like you.

name: davos
line: I lived below the Street of Flour.

name: davos
line: The shit that poured from their privy pipes flowed down the side of Aegon's Hill along Tanner's Row and right in front of my front door on Gin Alley.

name: davos
line: The Street of Steel, with your armor and your knights? Pfft. You lived in the fancy part of town. And here we are now. Two boys from Flea Bottom in the castle of a king.

name: davos
line: If you mistrust fancy people so much, why were you in such a hurry to trust her?

name: davos
line: She does know her way around a man's head, I'll give her that.

name: davos
line: Oh, that's a long story.

name: davos
line: Many years ago I helped King Stannis out of a difficult situation. He rewarded me with a lordship. And this.

name: davos
line: I didn't want to be a lord. I nearly didn't accept.

name: davos
line: I did it for my son. I didn't want him to step over a river of shit every time he stepped through his front door. I wanted him to have a better life.

name: davos
line: He's dead.

name: davos
line: Following me.

name: davos
line: 'First night of the full moon.' Why is there a G in night?

name: davos
line: Well, your father's not going to go to that.

name: davos
line: I've been trying to stay out of those dungeons my whole life.

name: davos
line: Aye, old Balerion's definitely better than anything your cousin Rylene's got on offer. But now that I'm your father's Hand again, I have to keep him informed. The king does not have time for this drudgery. 'To all the lords and knobble men of Westeros.'

name: davos
line: Stay here. Bar the door.

name: davos
line: And you take credit because you dropped a leech into the fire?

name: davos
line: Your Grace, the world has got so far bent. I've seen things crawl out of nightmares, but my eyes were open. I don't know if Robb Stark died because of the Red Woman's sorcery or because at war men die all the time, but I do know that uniting the Seven Kingdoms with blood magic is wrong. It is evil. And you are not an evil man.

name: davos
line: Aegon Targaryen.

name: davos
line: On the back of his dragon Balerion the Dread.

name: davos
line: You do not need to burn the boy. If what you say is true, a drop of his blood killed Robb Stark--

name: davos
line: His name is Gendry. He's a good lad. A poor lad from Flea Bottom who happens to be your nephew.

name: davos
line: Everything.

name: davos
line: You're leaving.

name: davos
line: Yes, but not on you.

name: davos
line: Aim for that star. Don't stop. There's bread and water. Go slow with it. If you finish it off, no matter how thirsty you get, don't drink seawater.

name: davos
line: Row for a full day and night and you'll reach Rook's Rest. You'll want to stop there. Don't. She'll find you.

name: davos
line: You must keep the coast on your left side until you reach King's Landing.

name: davos
line: They were looking for me for 20 years. Do they know your face?

name: davos
line: I'd worry more about the Red Woman.

name: davos
line: The other way.

name: davos
line: You ever been in a boat before?

name: davos
line: Don't fall out. Go on.

name: davos
line: Because it's right. And because I'm a slow learner.

name: davos
line: When you get to Flea Bottom, have a bowl of brown for me.

name: davos
line: No. I let him go.

name: davos
line: Aye, I do.

name: davos
line: There has got to be another way.

name: davos
line: I don't know, Your Grace. I can't see the future in the fire.

name: davos
line: I understand. But since you haven't yet unnamed me Hand of the King, it is my duty to advise you against it. You're gonna need me.

name: davos
line: Matthos taught me before he died so I could be of better service to you.

name: davos
line: You can't stop him alone. You need someone to rebuild your army for you, someone to convince this lord and that lord to fight for you, to bring sellswords and pirates to your side.

name: davos
line: Here. Here! Help me!

name: davos
line: I was in the battle at Blackwater. I was a captain and a knight.

name: davos
line: The one true king of Westeros ...  Stannis Baratheon.

name: davos
line: (Nods)

name: davos
line: No, the wildfire took him. I saw it.

name: davos
line: If I was a good father, he'd still be here. Stannis lives?

name: davos
line: Will you take me there?

name: davos
line: This war is not over.

name: davos
line: We're both sworn to King Stannis.

name: davos
line: Stannis never gives up. Never. Now he will regroup ...

name: davos
line: What?

name: davos
line: You're a smuggler.

name: davos
line: Take me back there, please.

name: davos
line: Maybe not, but I could carve her heart out.

name: davos
line: You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.

name: davos
line: I have to stop her. Please, do this for me.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Not yet.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, you are the rightful king. Not only by blood. You're an honorable man, a just man. And there is still a war to fight.

name: davos
line: By burning prisoners alive?

name: davos
line: I do not judge people for the gods they worship. If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.

name: davos
line: You are my enemy.

name: davos
line: ( gasps )

name: davos
line: ( growls ) This woman is evil! She's the mother of demons.

name: davos
line: Your Grace!

name: davos
line: She will destroy us all!

name: davos
line: Your Grace!

name: davos
line: Princess? Gods, what are you doing here?

name: davos
line: Bert?

name: davos
line: Go back to your room. You're not supposed to be here. If your father knew--

name: davos
line: I am, child. I disobeyed my king, your father, and now I'm paying the price.

name: davos
line: Aye. So they did.

name: davos
line: Thank you, my lady. I'm sure it's a fine book, but it's wasted on me.

name: davos
line: My lady, I can't read the words.

name: davos
line: No. No. No.

name: davos
line: Go. We can't.

name: davos
line: (laughs) I wouldn't know where to start.

name: davos
line: This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the seven kingdoms.

name: davos
line: What are men of the Night's Watch doing in a Wildling camp?

name: davos
line: You're speaking to the one true king boy. You'll address him as your grace.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Joffrey?

name: davos
line: I will find you an army, Your Grace. I've been working day and night...

name: davos
line: I've rallied House Peasebury to your 'cause.

name: davos
line: House Musgood.

name: davos
line: And House Haigh.

name: davos
line: Westeros is not the world, Your Grace. We need to look east for ships and men. 10,000 skilled soldiers fight for the Golden Company.

name: davos
line: They've never broken a contract.

name: davos
line: We're willing to use blood magic to put you on the throne, but we're not willing to pay men to fight? Now the Red Woman's magic is real. Her visions and prophecies may be, too, but I've never heard of visions and prophecies winning a war. Soldiers win wars. Soldiers on the ground. It's dirty on the ground.

name: davos
line: Not yet.

name: davos
line: I'm sorry, Princess.

name: davos
line: The Hand of the King doesn't have much leisure time.

name: davos
line: That happened once, weeks ago. You're your father's daughter, no mistake. Bloody relentless, the both of you.

name: davos
line: "The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas. First Sword of Braavos."

name: davos
line: Thank you very much.

name: davos
line: No, I was never a pirate. I was a smuggler.

name: davos
line: Well, if you're a famous smuggler, you're not doing it right.

name: davos
line: Your father lacks an appreciation of the finer points of bad behavior. So do the Braavosi.

name: davos
line: Of course. Almost got beheaded by a First Sword of Braavos. I tried to explain to him the difference between pirates and smugglers, but he didn't seem any more interested in the distinction than your father. I suppose if you work for the Iron Bank of Braavos and each one of your gold barges is worth half a kingdom, you tend not to be overly concerned with the kind of distinction...

name: davos
line: I need you to write a message.

name: davos
line: It's too important for me. I need a smart person to do it. Go on.

name: davos
line: To the offices of the Iron Bank of Braavos from Stannis Baratheon the one true king of Westeros.

name: davos
line: I need to get their attention. Go on. Write.

name: davos
line: Lord Florent was your brother by law. STANNIS; He was an infidel.

name: davos
line: He worshipped the gods of his fathers and their fathers before him. They were the gods of your fathers, too.

name: davos
line: How many ships did he bring to your 'cause? How many men?

name: davos
line: I'm sure they're more than grateful, my queen.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, if you'd like to sit, I'm sure that--

name: davos
line: Easterners have a difference sense of time, I've often found. Once I was waiting for Salladhor Saan here in Braavos. Together, we were going to run three shiploads of the finest--

name: davos
line: This is Stannis of the House Baratheon, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

name: davos
line: My lord.

name: davos
line: Well, strictly speaking, I didn't do the thieving. That would be the pirates. I just moved what they stole from one place to another.  {DAVOS removes his right glove to show the stubs of his fingers.

name: davos
line: This is the payment that was demanded by King Stannis for my crimes. I consider it an honest accounting. He's an honest man and he's your best chance to get back the money you've sunk into Westeros. Which is a lot, I imagine. Wars are expensive.

name: davos
line: As long as Stannis lives, the war is not over. Who's the real power in King's Landing?

name: davos
line: Humor me.

name: davos
line: Begging your pardon, I think it's a problem for now. There's only one reliable leader left in Westeros. Stannis. He's got the birthright. He's in his prime. He's a tried and tested battle commander. And he doesn't just talk about paying people back, he does it.

name: davos
line: You think they ever met a pirate who didn't tell them that joke?

name: davos
line: Only half rotted.

name: davos
line: No time, I'm afraid. We sail at sunrise.

name: davos
line: You won't be alone. And you won't be poor.

name: davos
line: There's a chest of the good stuff left back at your house. I gave it to your wife.

name: davos
line: (laughs) I'll see you at sunrise.

name: davos
line: A band of 20 men, maybe less. They were in and out before anyone spotted them, burnt our food stores to the ground, all our siege weapons were destroyed, dozens of tents were--

name: davos
line: We’re still getting a count, but hundreds are dead.

name: davos
line: The northerners know more about their land than we ever will.

name: davos
line: Unless there’s a thaw, we can’t press forward to Winterfell, and we don’t have enough food to get us back to Castle Black.

name: davos
line: Forgive me, Your Grace, I never claimed to be an expert in military matters. But if we can’t march forward, and we won’t march back…

name: davos
line: You sent for me, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, you’ve named me your Hand.

name: davos
line: The King’s Hand should never abandon the King, especially in a time of war.

name: davos
line: A boy with a scroll could deliver this message.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, perhaps Queen and Princess Shireen could accompany me.

name: davos
line: At least let me take Shireen. A siege is no place for a little girl.

name: davos
line: What’s this one now?

name: davos
line: Well that sounds like a proper story.

name: davos
line: But the dragon only saw a dumb man, holding a mirrored shield.

name: davos
line: Thus ending the dragonslaying career of Ser Byron Swann. I made you something, Princess.

name: davos
line: Do you like it?

name: davos
line: You’re very welcome.

name: davos
line: Of course I will.

name: davos
line: Because you deserve it. My son was always on me trying to teach me to read. Gods, I was stubborn about it. Made it this far without reading, seemed to me I could make it to the grave. I wish I had listened to them. This is my own poor way of saying thank you for teaching me to be a grown up. (beat) I’ll be gone for a few days, Princess. I’ll want to hear all about the dance of dragons when I’m back.

name: davos
line: He came to your aid. Stannis. Now he needs you!

name: davos
line: The wildlings will make a difference!

name: davos
line: You saved their bloody lives. If they’re going to live in the Seven Kingdoms, safe behind our wall, they ought to fight for the damn place.

name: davos
line: Shireen? The princess?

name: davos
line: He sees something in you. (Jon looks up). Might not be apparent from his tone, but it's the truth. He believes in you.

name: davos
line: The king is a complicated man. But he wants what's right for the Seven Kingdoms.

name: davos
line: He's the one true king. He has the blood right to that throne.

name: davos
line: Have you now? (Turning to Olly). How does the Night's Watch vow go again? I bet you've got it memorized since you got here.

name: davos
line: Not that bit, the bit at the end.

name: davos
line: Wait, that's enough. “The shield that guards the realm of men.” That's what you swore to be. Now I'm not a learned man, but the best way of helping the most people might not be sitting in a frozen castle at the edge of the world. It just might mean wading in the muck, getting your boots dirty, and doing what needs to be doing.

name: davos
line: As long as the Boltons rule the North, (Stands up), the North will suffer. Just one man's opinion.

name: davos
line: Tonight, the Night's Watch elect a new Lord Commander. Ser Alliser Thorne is going to win.

name: davos
line: Unpleasant man. He thinks you're a traitor. What's your life going to be like on the Wall with Thorne in command?

name: davos
line: I’ve been talking to your sworn brothers. Many of them love you.

name: davos
line: Many don’t. You were seen taking the body of a wildling girl north of the Wall. Why?

name: davos
line: Some of the Night’s Watch feel you have too much affection for the wildlings.

name: davos
line: It’s a fair offer. More than fair.

name: davos
line: What?

name: davos
line: Uh, Your Grace. Wouldn't it be better to wait? When Jon Snow returns with the wildlings, we could have thousands more men.

name: davos
line: I'll choose a dozen men to stay and guard the queen and the princess.

name: davos
line: It's a tough road ahead, Your Grace. Won't they be safer -

name: davos
line: As you wish, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Beg your pardon?

name: davos
line: First things first. It's a long march ahead. And then we have to take the castle.

name: davos
line: Aye, princess, but you won't be anywhere near -

name: davos
line: Yes, my queen.

name: davos
line: Well, I am. When the battle comes, promise you'll protect me.

name: davos
line: 40 horses died in the night. We’ll lose more come sunset. We’re running out of food. We can’t open the supply line until the snow clears.

name: davos
line: The Stormcrows rode off last night.

name: davos
line: We still have a hard march to Wintefell and we won’t be marching anywhere in this weather.

name: davos
line: This isn’t our time, we should head back to Castle Black when the snow clears.

name: davos
line: Your Grace..

name: davos
line: It’s better to wait for the right time than to risk everything.

name: davos
line: Your Grace. (leaves)

name: davos
line: Aye, but we have the wind. She'll blow us straight to the gates.

name: davos
line: King's Landing hasn't been home for 20 years. I spent most of my life dodging the royal fleet. And now I'm sailing right at them.

name: davos
line: Of course, there are several royal fleets at the moment.

name: davos
line: Gods be good.

name: davos
line: But not over them?

name: davos
line: Well, first, we have to put it there.

name: davos
line: Our army outnumber theirs 5-to-1. Those walls have never been breached, and the men guarding the walls, when they see you, they don't see a liberator, they see a stranger come to set their city on fire.

name: davos
line: I've never known bells to mean surrender. They want to play music with us? Let's play. Drums.

name: davos
line: Where are their ships?

name: davos
line: Lord Varys knows what you had for breakfast three days ago. There are no surprises here.

name: davos
line: Maybe.

name: davos
line: Draw! Hold.

name: davos
line: (confused) There's no one on board.

name: davos
line: Wildfire. Steer clear! Steer clear!

name: davos
line: Matthos! Get down!

name: davos
line: If the wind holds, we'll reach King's Landing in a day.

name: davos
line: Can't make promises for the wind, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: I thank you, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: My son wishes me to change it. Three mermen with tridents, something like that. I understand why the older families look down at me.

name: davos
line: My father was a crabber.

name: davos
line: Well, sons of lords don't like to break bread with sons of crabbers. Our hands stink.

name: davos
line: Many fought bravely for your brother. Many fought for the Mad King.

name: davos
line: Some are happy to do it to my face.

name: davos
line: No one has forgotten, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: He was only a boy.

name: davos
line: (exhales)

name: davos
line: And potatoes. Some salted beef, I believe.

name: davos
line: I was relieved they did not.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, I pray I serve you well.

name: davos
line: You'll have your gold when we take the treasury at King's Landing.

name: davos
line: Because you're a smart gambler. Stannis has proved himself in war. Twice. His baby brother has never set foot on a battlefield. Neither has the false king, Joffrey.

name: davos
line: Stannis has just begun the fight. His bannermen will rally to his cause. There's no man in the Seven Kingdoms more honorable than Stannis Baratheon. Or more worthy of loyalty.

name: davos
line: Matthos.

name: davos
line: Of course you do. Every time you leave harbor, you're leaving on a promise. A promise that somewhere on the seas, somebody's got some gold and you can take it from them.

name: davos
line: You want to spend your last few years on the sea, stealing from Pentoshi cheesemongers and Midanese silk merchants, then go. They're out there waiting for you. That's easy. What I'm offering you is hard. Come with me and plunder the greatest city in Westeros. You'll be the richest man in Lysene. And the most famous. They'll be singing songs about you as long as men have voices to sing.

name: davos
line: It is. (Matthos rolls his eyes).

name: davos
line: The queen?

name: davos
line: He's young yet. I promise you the gold. I promise you the glory. I cannot promise you the queen.

name: davos
line: He is the one true king.

name: davos
line: Get me to the gates of King's Landing and I will.

name: davos
line: As soon as his God wills it.

name: davos
line: Oh you and your mother.

name: davos
line: I wish I had a God, truly! I'm not mocking you, but I've seen men pray to every God there is. Pray for wind, pray for rain, pray for home. None of it works!

name: davos
line: I wasn't praying.

name: davos
line: You want me to have a god, fine. King Stannis is my god. He raised me up and blessed me with his trust. He gave you a future I could never have imagined. You know how to read, you'll be a knight someday. You think your fire god commanded all that? It was Stannis. Only Stannis.

name: davos
line: Don't tell him that.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Salladhor Saan will join our fleet. 30 ships. His men know how to fight.

name: davos
line: Does seem the wiser choice.

name: davos
line: Salladhor Saan is an old friend, I've known him 30 years. I've never trusted him.

name: davos
line: At once, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Come.

name: davos
line: (Looks to Stannis) Not now.

name: davos
line: Stannis is our king. We follow where he leads, even if we don't like the path.

name: davos
line: I don't serve the others. I serve Stannis.

name: davos
line: What's the truth?

name: davos
line: A harmless courtesy, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, the Lannisters are the true enemy. If, for the time being, you could make peace with your brother -

name: davos
line: Well, many have already declared for him; Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly.

name: davos
line: And how many ships has the Lord of Light got in his fleet?

name: davos
line: I'm sure he doesn't, but we do if we're going to war. If not Renly, Your Grace, join forces with Robb Stark.

name: davos
line: (Whispers to Cressen) Don't.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: I'm sorry about your brother, Your Grace, I wanted to let you know that people grieve for him.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, I --

name: davos
line: And I've never known you to hide from the truth.

name: davos
line: I've come to tell you that what I saw.

name: davos
line: Nothing is worth what this will cost you, not even the Iron

name: davos
line: When do we sail for King's Landing?

name: davos
line: And will you bring Lady Melisandre with you?

name: davos
line: If you take King's Landing with her by your side, the victory will be hers.

name: davos
line: Loyal service means telling hard truths.

name: davos
line: She's a foreigner preaching her foreign religion. Some believe she whispers orders in your ear and you obey.

name: davos
line: You won those bannermen from Renly. Don't lose them to her.

name: davos
line: Your Grace, I'm honored, but my time on the sea was spent evading ships, not attacking them. The other lords won't be happy.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace. And it's four less fingernails to clean.

name: davos
line: Pardon?

name: davos
line: It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now. It reminds me of your justice. It was an honest punishment and you were good with the cleaver.

name: davos
line: A lesson I've tried to teach my son.

name: davos
line: To me? Gods, no. But if your red woman told him to leap from the crow's nest

name: davos
line: I've lived within the law for 17

name: davos
line: Any shore, any night. What am I bringing ashore?

name: davos
line: I am true to Your Grace and always will be, but surely there are other ways, cleaner ways.

name: davos
line: Someone once told me the night is dark and full of terrors.

name: davos
line: I'd say my parts are mixed, my lady, good and bad.

name: davos
line: And which are you?

name: davos
line: Well, that must be very nice for you.

name: davos
line: I do.

name: davos
line: Don't talk about my wife.

name: davos
line: Strange that this Lord of Light asks you to work in the shadows.

name: davos
line: These weren't here before. They've barred the passage.

name: davos
line: Gods protect us.

name: davos
line: Davos Seaworth.

name: davos
line: Unluckily for me.

name: davos
line: Where are you from?  I can't place the accent.

name: davos
line: Ah.  I hear it's beautiful down there.  Palm trees and butterflies.  I haven't been myself.

name: davos
line: This place has changed.

name: davos
line: This is Jon Snow.

name: davos
line: He's King in the North.

name: davos
line: Apologies.  I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know.  But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace.  He's not a lord.

name: davos
line: I wasn't there, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Not to defeat Cersei.  You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall.  Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.

name: davos
line: You don't believe him.  I understand that.  It sounds like nonsense.

name: davos
line: But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North.  You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros.  He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen.  He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.  He was named King in the North.  Not because of his birthright.  He has no birthright.  He's a damn bastard.  All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.

name: davos
line: All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things.  He fought those things for the good of his people.  He risked his life for his people.  He took a knife in the heart for his people.  He gave his own --

name: davos
line: If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die.  And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

name: davos
line: Sounds like a charmer.  Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.

name: davos
line: Fire kills Whites, you told me.  What breathes fire?

name: davos
line: No, too dangerous.

name: davos
line: But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?

name: davos
line: Is that possible?

name: davos
line: I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.

name: davos
line: They won't follow Ser Jorah.

name: davos
line: You can't lead a raid beyond the wall.  You're not in the Night's Watch anymore.  You're King in the North.

name: davos
line: Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.

name: davos
line: There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff.  The guards hardly ever patrol it.  Too many steps.

name: davos
line: I've got my own business in Flea Bottom.

name: davos
line: Then we're fucked.  Best hurry.

name: davos
line: I wasn't sure I'd find you.

name: davos
line: I thought you might still be rowing.

name: davos
line: I looked in shops, taverns, brothels.  I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.

name: davos
line: I haven't been here in years.  Why should they recognize me?  Sometimes I hardly do.  Nothing fucks you harder than time.

name: davos
line: Anybody give you any trouble?

name: davos
line: Don't be so sure.  Safety is never a permanent state of affairs.  Bad things are coming.

name: davos
line: I think you need to understand --

name: davos
line: You should know what you're heading into.

name: davos
line: You might want to bring one of those swords.

name: davos
line: Keep your father's name to yourself.  The situation is complicated enough already.

name: davos
line: I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --

name: davos
line: No weapons, friends.  I promise.  What can I do for you?

name: davos
line: It is.

name: davos
line: Still five gold dragons?

name: davos
line: I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.

name: davos
line: Not more gold.

name: davos
line: Come and have a look.

name: davos
line: Fermented crab.

name: davos
line: Fermented crab.  One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week.  A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth.  Five minutes later, he's back in the race.  Here, have a taste.

name: davos
line: I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.

name: davos
line: I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.

name: davos
line: Perhaps there's some arrangement?

name: davos
line: This is Gendry.

name: davos
line: We're leaving today.  The king's got a lot on his mind.

name: davos
line: He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.

name: davos
line: You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.

name: davos
line: Begging your pardon, Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Yet again.

name: davos
line: He was meant to keep that to himself.

name: davos
line: Don't be a fool.  You're not a soldier.

name: davos
line: He can handle himself.

name: davos
line: As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.

name: davos
line: Yeah.  Nobody mind me.  All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.

name: davos
line: I've been failing at that job of late.

name: davos
line: I'll be staying behind.  I'm a liability out there as you well know.

name: davos
line: Our reasons aren't your reasons.

name: davos
line: You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves.  Perhaps --

name: davos
line: What do you think of her?

name: davos
line: I believe you know of whom I speak.

name: davos
line: A good heart?  I've noticed you starring at that good heart.

name: davos
line: Fewer.

name: davos
line: Speaking of good hearts, Missandei of Naarth.

name: davos
line: King Snow, isn't it?  No?  That doesn't sound right.  King Jon?

name: davos
line: Is the custom different in Naarth?

name: davos
line: The sounds liberating.

name: davos
line: If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?

name: davos
line: That was good of her.  Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?

name: davos
line: You'll forgive me if I switch sides.

name: davos
line: We heard your uncle attacked your fleet.  We thought you were dead.

name: davos
line: Your sister?

name: davos
line: Maybe it still is.

name: davos
line: I wish you hadn't done that.

name: davos
line: Any ideas as to how we might change that state of affairs?

name: davos
line: You are now. Look, I made it through most of my years without ever getting near a fight, but then I survived the Battle of the Bastards. Right outside these walls. If I can live through that, you can live through this. They'll outfit you with weapons at the forge. Right that way.

name: davos
line: Which way do you want to go?

name: davos
line: I'm sure a lot of people would.

name: davos
line: We'll hold off the rest of them for as long as we can.

name: davos
line: The dragons should give us an edge in the field.

name: davos
line: Well, what do we have here?

name: davos
line: No, not for me, thanks. Came here for this.

name: davos
line: I figured I could wait to die freezing my balls off out there or wait to die nice and warm in here.

name: davos
line: Maybe I will have that drink.

name: davos
line: All without a shred of combat ability.

name: davos
line: We're out of wine.

name: davos
line: You'll pray for a quick death.

name: davos
line: Can't argue with that.

name: davos
line: Not so long ago, the Starks and the Karstarks were slaughtering each other on the battlefield. Jon Snow brought peace to the houses.

name: davos
line: Her gratitude is lovely, but that's not my point. The Northmen are loyal to Jon Snow, not to her. They don't know her. The Free Folk don't know her. I've been up here a while, and I'm telling you, they're stubborn as goats. You want their loyalty, you have to earn it.

name: davos
line: A proposal is what I'm proposing. On the off chance that we survive the Night King, what if the Seven Kingdoms, for once in their whole shit history, were ruled by a just woman and an honorable man?

name: davos
line: To Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End.

name: davos
line: The last time I saw her, I told her I'd kill her if I ever saw her again.

name: davos
line: I did. I do.

name: davos
line: Never got the chance. She did it to herself. Or her god did it to her. Lord of Light. We play his game for him, we fight his war and win, and then he fucks off. No signs, no blessings. Who knows what he wants?

name: davos
line: And what if I'm not trying to be happy?

name: davos
line: Thank you. I feel much better.

name: davos
line: We all did.

name: davos
line: That's right, you did.

name: davos
line: How much more defeated do you want them to be? They're on their knees.

name: davos
line: Look around you, friend. We won.

name: davos
line: Easy, men. Easy! Easy.

name: davos
line: Jon. We should speak with the queen.

name: davos
line: Friends, please. We've been cutting each other's throats long enough. Torgo Nudho. Am I saying that properly?

name: davos
line: If it weren't for you and your men, we would've lost the war with the dead. This country owes you a debt it can never repay, but let us try. There is land in the Reach. Good land. The people that used to live there are gone. Make it your own. Start your own house with the Unsullied as your bannermen. We've had enough war. Thousands of you, thousands of them. You know how it ends. We need to find a better way.

name: davos
line: Who, then?

name: davos
line: I'm not sure I get a vote, but aye.

name: davos
line: Your Grace.

name: davos
line: Long may he reign.

name: davos
line: We have. These projects will begin as soon as the Master of Coin and Lord of Lofty Titles provides funding.

name: davos
line: "Any more."

name: davos
line: That’s not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they’ll stop fearing him. He can’t have that. Fear is his power.

name: davos
line: It’s crucial that we let them charge at us. They’ve got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he’ll pursue. Then we’ll have him surrounded on three sides.

name: davos
line: We should all get some sleep.

name: davos
line: You think there’s hope?

name: davos
line: It wasn’t the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

name: davos
line: What?

name: davos
line: No, it’s a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

name: davos
line: Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

name: davos
line: No, he’s not.

name: davos
line: No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.

name: davos
line: I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I’m far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.

name: davos
line: Prepare to charge! Prepare to charge!

name: davos
line: Go! Go! Follow your commander!

name: davos
line: We’ll just kill our own men. Stand down.

name: davos
line: We may as well be taking shits back here.

name: davos
line: Follow!

name: davos
line: With me, lads! Break their line!

name: davos
line: Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

name: davos
line: Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

name: davos
line: Why?

name: davos
line: You burned a little girl alive!

name: davos
line: If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

name: davos
line: I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

name: davos
line: The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

name: davos
line: Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

name: davos
line: I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

name: davos
line: If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

name: davos
line: Easy, easy. Easy.

name: davos
line: What do you remember?

name: davos
line: The lady brought you back.

name: davos
line: Could you give us a moment?

name: davos
line: You were dead. And now you’re not. That’s completely fucking mad, seems to me. I can only imagine how it seems to you.

name: davos
line: I don’t know. Maybe we’ll never know. What does it matter? You go on. You fight for as long as you can. You clean up as much of the shit as you can.

name: davos
line: Good. Now go fail again.

name: davos
line: I’ve never been much of a fighter.

name: davos
line: Apologies for what you’re about to see.

name: davos
line: I'm sorry, my lady. I didn’t mean to interrupt.

name: davos
line: I assume you know why I’m here.

name: davos
line: It’s about the Lord Commander.

name: davos
line: Does he have to be?

name: davos
line: Do you know of any magic...that could help him? Bring him back?

name: davos
line: Can it be done?

name: davos
line: How?

name: davos
line: Have you seen it done?

name: davos
line: But it was. It could be now.

name: davos
line: Not for you? I saw you drink poison that should’ve killed you. I saw you give birth to a demon made of shadows.

name: davos
line: Fuck him, then. Fuck all of them. I’m not a devout man, obviously. Seven Gods, drowned gods, tree gods, it's all the same.

name: davos
line: I’m not asking the Lord of Light for help.I’m asking the woman who showed me that miracles exist.

name: davos
line: Have you ever tried?

name: davos
line: Help me get him inside.

name: davos
line: How many of your brothers do you think you can trust?

name: davos
line: Does the wolf know you?

name: davos
line: We need all the help we can get.

name: davos
line: I can’t speak for the flames, but he’s gone.

name: davos
line: He’ll have seen we didn’t come. Thorne will have made it official by now. Castle Black is his.

name: davos
line: We don’t have the numbers.

name: davos
line: It’s not enough. I didn’t know Lord Commander Snow for long, but I have to believe he wouldn’t have wanted his friends to die for nothing.

name: davos
line: We need to fight, but we don’t need to die. Not if we have help.

name: davos
line: You’re not the only ones who owe your lives to Jon Snow.

name: davos
line: Hear that, lads? Nothing to fear.

name: davos
line: And some mutton. I’d like some mutton.

name: davos
line: I’m not much of a hunter. I’ll need some food if I’m gonna make it south without starving.

name: davos
line: Thank you, Ser Alliser. We’ll discuss amongst ourselves and come back to you with an answer.

name: davos
line: Boys, I’ve been running from men like that ll my life. In my learned opinion, we open that door --

name: davos
line: Aye, but we don’t need to make it easy for them.

name: davos
line: There’s always the Red Woman.

name: davos
line: You haven’t seen her do what I’ve seen her do.

name: davos
line: Aside from the Starks and the Boltons, the most powerful houses in the North are the Umbers, the Karstarks, and the Manderlys.

name: davos
line: The Umbers and the Karstarks have already declared for the Boltons, so we’re not doing so well there.

name: davos
line: I beg your pardon, my lady, but they know that a Stark beheaded their father. I don’t think we can count on them either.

name: davos
line: Precious little, my lady.

name: davos
line: They may well be loyal, but how many rose up against the Boltons when they betrayed your family? I may not know the North, but I know men. They’re more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don’t want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause. If Jon’s going to convince them to fight alongside him, they need to believe it’s a fight they can win.

name: davos
line: I don’t doubt it. But Jon doesn’t have the Stark name.

name: davos
line: I didn’t know the Tullys still had an army.

name: davos
line: That’s good. The Blackfish is a legend. His support would mean a great deal. Stark, Tully, a few more houses, almost starts to look like a winning side.

name: davos
line: My lady.

name: davos
line: Will you stay here at Castle Black?

name: davos
line: You serve Jon Snow now?

name: davos
line: Forgive me, my lady, I thought that was Stannis.

name: davos
line: What happened down there?

name: davos
line: And Shireen? What happened to the princess?

name: davos
line: My lady, I’m Ser Davos Seaworth.

name: davos
line: That’s in the past now.

name: davos
line: Who did?

name: davos
line: If it please, my lady, I understand how you feel.

name: davos
line: Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.

name: davos
line: You needn’t ask your maester about my house. It’s rather new.

name: davos
line: You never thought you’d find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I’d be in my position. I was a crabber’s son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I’m here because this isn’t someone else’s war. It’s our war.

name: davos
line: Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn’t between a few squabbling houses. It’s between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.

name: davos
line: As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won’t stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there’s no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.

name: davos
line: If they’re half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

name: davos
line: Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.

name: davos
line: He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There’s a stream down there for the horses.

name: davos
line: Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.

name: davos
line: It’s not what we’d hoped for. But we still have a chance if we’re careful and smart.

name: davos
line: For fuck’s sake.

name: davos
line: Friends, this is not worth fighting over!

name: davos
line: This’ll be it, now. Right now, we don’t need to be fighting.

name: davos
line: Hold on.

name: littlefinger
line: For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord.  Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children. She has always been positively predisposed toward me.

name: littlefinger
line: Titles do seem to breed titles.

name: littlefinger
line: I'm surprised you're surprised. This is the safest place in the city.

name: littlefinger
line: Thank you, my dear.

name: littlefinger
line: I hear you owe that boy a significant debt.

name: littlefinger
line: You should have him knighted.

name: littlefinger
line: If only. I owe you a significant debt. Our redheaded friend. You secured her release when the queen detained her.

name: littlefinger
line: Apparently, Her Grace believed that you two had some sort of special relationship.

name: littlefinger
line: I know.

name: littlefinger
line: I know. But how would the queen get that idea?

name: littlefinger
line: Keep a low profile.

name: littlefinger
line: Well, you are richer than I am.

name: littlefinger
line: They're only numbers. Numbers on paper. Once you understand that, it's easy to make them behave. Trivial even. You want a real challenge? Try whores.

name: littlefinger
line: Lovely day for it. Watching the ships.

name: littlefinger
line: Might I speak with Lady Sansa alone for a moment?

name: littlefinger
line: I saw your mother not long ago. She's very eager to see you. And your sister.

name: littlefinger
line: You said King's Landing was your home. You are the property of the crown. Stealing you would be treason. If you were to tell just one person ...

name: littlefinger
line: How do I know?

name: littlefinger
line: I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital. When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me. But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.

name: littlefinger
line: Your Grace.

name: littlefinger
line: Of course, Your Grace.

name: littlefinger
line: I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?

name: littlefinger
line: Myself, I often find them a hindrance.

name: littlefinger
line: I shall do my best.

name: littlefinger
line: I assure you that it will.

name: littlefinger
line: That didn't take long.

name: littlefinger
line: Is he? And who's the lucky girl?

name: littlefinger
line: She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?

name: littlefinger
line: It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.

name: littlefinger
line: Lady Margaery wears it that way.

name: littlefinger
line: I have good news. I'll be leaving the city soon.

name: littlefinger
line: It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?

name: littlefinger
line: I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.

name: littlefinger
line: Petyr.

name: littlefinger
line: If you wish to stay, then of course you will stay.

name: littlefinger
line: We'll speak again when I return.

name: littlefinger
line: There aren't There aren't even 200. I've counted.

name: littlefinger
line: Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.

name: littlefinger
line: You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.

name: littlefinger
line: The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.

name: littlefinger
line: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

name: littlefinger
line: (voice over) Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.

name: littlefinger
line: (voice over) And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.

name: littlefinger
line: Petyr... Are you hurt, my lady?

name: littlefinger
