line: Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past.  Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.

name: littlefinger
line: Softly, my friend... Voices carry over water.

name: littlefinger
line: Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?

name: littlefinger
line: I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.

name: littlefinger
line: Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.

name: littlefinger
line: Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

name: littlefinger
line: Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.

name: littlefinger
line: I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?

name: littlefinger
line: Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.

name: littlefinger
line: Pull up your hood. A memorable shade.

name: littlefinger
line: You know what kind of stories poor men enjoy the most? Ones about rich girls they'll never meet.

name: littlefinger
line: The mountains are impassable. If you want to get to the Eyrie, you need to go through the Bloody Gate. It doesn't matter how large your army is, if you attack this gate, you do it on this road, three men abreast and get slaughtered like goats. The first Lords of the Vale didn't have much, but they had these mountains and they knew how to use them. And the fortress they built here has never been overcome. Not once in 1,000 years. Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth 10,000.

name: littlefinger
line: Lord Petyr Baelish and his niece Alayne.

name: littlefinger
line: My lord.

name: littlefinger
line: Oh. I have brought you a gift.

name: littlefinger
line: My lady.

name: littlefinger
line: Go. We'll speak soon.

name: littlefinger
line: Arranging for the ascension of King Tommen I, extricating Sansa, getting her here alive.

name: littlefinger
line: Ought we not... inform the Lords of the Vale about the ceremony?

name: littlefinger
line: I do think that we could wait until...

name: littlefinger
line: Like it was yesterday.

name: littlefinger
line: The deed is done. Faded into nothing. Only speaking of it can make it real.

name: littlefinger
line: Tonight it is, then.

name: littlefinger
line: Let me bathe and dress for the occasion. Once I'm presentable, I'll call on the septon immediately.

name: littlefinger
line: I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.

name: littlefinger
line: Did I kill Joffrey? I've been in the Vale for weeks.

name: littlefinger
line: And who helped me with this conspiracy?

name: littlefinger
line: Why not?

name: littlefinger
line: Then perhaps it was your husband.

name: littlefinger
line: How do you know?

name: littlefinger
line: You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.

name: littlefinger
line: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.

name: littlefinger
line: So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.

name: littlefinger
line: Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?

name: littlefinger
line: I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.

name: littlefinger
line: Children.

name: littlefinger
line: Yes, I saw.

name: littlefinger
line: No, his mother should have a long time ago. Consider it a step in the right direction.

name: littlefinger
line: Let me worry about Aunt Lysa.

name: littlefinger
line: A lot can happen between now and never. If you want to build a better home, first you must demolish the old one.

name: littlefinger
line: I loved your mother more than you could ever know. Given the opportunity, what do we do to those who've hurt the ones we love? In a better world, one where love could overcome strength and duty, you might have been my child. But we don't live in that world.

name: littlefinger
line: You're more beautiful than she ever was.

name: littlefinger
line: Call me Petyr.

name: littlefinger
line: Lysa! Let her go.

name: littlefinger
line: Let her go.

name: littlefinger
line: I'll send her away. I swear on my life. I swear to all the gods. Let her go, Lysa.

name: littlefinger
line: Oh, my sweet wife. My sweet, silly wife.

name: littlefinger
line: I have only loved one woman... only one, my entire life. Your sister.

name: littlefinger
line: You honor me beyond words, Your Grace. I shall have to acquire some sons and grandsons.  The crowd laughs

name: littlefinger
line: My lady. My sincerest condolences.

name: littlefinger
line: You shouldn't say that. You'll be good enough for many things. He'll still enjoy beating you. And now that you're a woman, he'll be able to enjoy you in other ways as well.

name: littlefinger
line: He'll let you go home? Joffrey's not the sort of boy who gives away his toys. You have a tender heart, just like your mother did at your age. I can see so much of her in you. She was like a sister to me. For her sake, I'll help get you home.

name: littlefinger
line: Look around you. We're all liars here. And every one of us is better than you.

name: littlefinger
line: Tell no one what?

name: littlefinger
line: She imprisoned you. She tried to execute you. And you offer her son a princess?

name: littlefinger
line: And I suppose you want me to broker this agreement?

name: littlefinger
line: Yes, I could sing this song to Lysa, if I cared to. What's in it for me?

name: littlefinger
line: Harrenhal is cursed.

name: littlefinger
line: With a single stroke, you'd make me one of the greatest lords in the realm.

name: littlefinger
line: So did Janos Slynt, and he was given Harrenhal, too. Until you snatched it away.

name: littlefinger
line: (Nods.)

name: littlefinger
line: The Queen mustn't know.

name: littlefinger
line: I don't appreciate being made a fool of, dwarf. If Myrcella marries the Martell boy, she can't very well marry Robin Arryn, can she?

name: littlefinger
line: And Harrenhal, I suppose that's off the table as well.

name: littlefinger
line: Leave me out of your next deception.

name: littlefinger
line: Robb Stark will never release the Kingslayer.

name: littlefinger
line: My lord, my lady.

name: littlefinger
line: Stannis will be here in an hour. When he arrives, Renly's bannermen will flock to him. Your former companions will fight for the privilege of selling you to their new king.

name: littlefinger
line: You will note that I am standing here talking to you, not Stannis.

name: littlefinger
line: Stannis.

name: littlefinger
line: Tell me, Ser Loras, what do you desire most in this world?

name: littlefinger
line: I have always found that to be the purest of motivations, but you won't have a chance to put your sword through Stannis, not today. You'll be cut to pieces before he sets foot on solid ground. If it is justice that you want, be smart about it.

name: littlefinger
line: He was, Your Grace.

name: littlefinger
line: Do you want to be a queen?

name: littlefinger
line: Your Grace.

name: littlefinger
line: I'm a practical man.

name: littlefinger
line: And who would you have me be loyal to? Your brother's corpse?

name: littlefinger
line: You still have many friends at court, Your Grace, many who believe Ned Stark erred by not supporting your claim.

name: littlefinger
line: I would give priority to my head.

name: littlefinger
line: I understand that you don't like me, and while that saddens me greatly, I did not come here today seeking your affection. When you march on King's Landing, you may find yourself facing a protracted siege or open gates.

name: littlefinger
line: Your Grace.

name: littlefinger
line: All of these tents look the same to me. -Would you be so kind

name: littlefinger
line: "Your tent"? Not "Our tent"? The king snores, perhaps? Or simply prefers solitude? Pressures of command, no doubt. Four kings vying for the throne.

name: littlefinger
line: If war were arithmetic, the mathematicians would rule the world. I did notice your brother entering His Grace's tent just now.

name: littlefinger
line: And on the night of your wedding, who was by the king's side then?

name: littlefinger
line: Your marriage is quite interesting. Not only to me, but to the realm. The marriage of a wealthy girl always breeds interest, if nothing else.

name: littlefinger
line: I've been unlucky in my affections, sadly.

name: littlefinger
line: You may have heard false reports.

name: littlefinger
line: Betrayed? I wanted him to serve as Protector of the Realm. I begged him to seize the moment.

name: littlefinger
line: No, my lady.

name: littlefinger
line: Cat, I've I've loved you since I was a boy. It seems to me that fate has given us this chance

name: littlefinger
line: Do you want to see your girls again? Sansa, more beautiful than ever? And Arya, just as wild as ever?

name: littlefinger
line: Both girls are healthy and safe. For now. But you know the Queen and you know Joffrey. I fear for their longevity if they remain in the capital.

name: littlefinger
line: The Lannisters will trade your daughters for the Kingslayer.

name: littlefinger
line: I'm not bringing these terms to him. I'm bringing them to you.

name: littlefinger
line: Robb has surprised them all with his skills in battle, but he's not a mother. Consider it, Cat. You may not get another chance. I've brought you a gift.

name: littlefinger
line: Your husband was an honorable man. He should rest beside his family in the crypts beneath Winterfell. You may not believe

name: littlefinger
line: Lord Tywin.

name: littlefinger
line: Thank you.

name: littlefinger
line: I traveled here directly from Renly Baratheon's camp.

name: littlefinger
line: So they say. There has been talk of other forces at work. Dark forces.

name: littlefinger
line: It is my belief that a moment of chaos affords opportunities lost soon after.

name: littlefinger
line: The Tyrells have not yet declared for any of the surviving kings. Loras wants revenge. He blames Stannis for Renly's death. And Margaery

name: littlefinger
line: Yes, she does.

name: littlefinger
line: They did. And perhaps that treason should be punished one day, after Stannis and Robb Stark are defeated.

name: littlefinger
line: They have.

name: littlefinger
line: It's only wine.

name: littlefinger
line: Tonight, with your leave.

name: littlefinger
line: On your son Tyrion's directive, I met with Catelyn Stark.

name: littlefinger
line: He had an interesting proposal for her concerning her daughters.

name: littlefinger
line: It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.

name: littlefinger
line: I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.

name: littlefinger
line: I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.

name: littlefinger
line: Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.

name: littlefinger
line: An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.

name: littlefinger
line: You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?

name: littlefinger
line: Only by reputation. They worship the God of Death, I believe. I never trust godly men.

name: littlefinger
line: She's your sister

name: littlefinger
line: Why did she come to Winterfell?

name: littlefinger
line: Why did she unearth the letter Cersei made you write?

name: littlefinger
line: And after she murders you, what does she become?

name: littlefinger
line: Lady Sansa, forgive me I'm a bit confused.

name: littlefinger
line: I did it to protect you.

name: littlefinger
line: Whatever your aunt

name: littlefinger
line: I know of no such letter.

name: littlefinger
line: I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.

name: littlefinger
line: Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.

name: littlefinger
line: If we could speak alone, I can explain everything.

name: littlefinger
line: Sansa, please.

name: littlefinger
line: Give me a chance to defend myself. I deserve that.

name: littlefinger
line: I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.

name: littlefinger
line: Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.

name: littlefinger
line: I loved you. More than anyone.

name: littlefinger
line: Sansa! (GASPS) I--

name: littlefinger
line: Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.

name: littlefinger
line: I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They’re encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

name: littlefinger
line: I can’t begin to contemplate --

name: littlefinger
line: He beat you.

name: littlefinger
line: Sansa, I --

name: littlefinger
line: Did he cut you?

name: littlefinger
line: I didn’t know.

name: littlefinger
line: I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.

name: littlefinger
line: I’m so sorry.

name: littlefinger
line: And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.

name: littlefinger
line: Do you want me to beg for my life? If that’s what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.

name: littlefinger
line: Then I will die.

name: littlefinger
line: I would do anything to undo what’s been done to you. I know that I can’t. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.

name: littlefinger
line: Your brother’s army.

name: littlefinger
line: Half-brother.

name: littlefinger
line: The Defender of the Vale!

name: littlefinger
line: My lord. Come and see.

name: littlefinger
line: I missed your name day. Go on.

name: littlefinger
line: A gyrfalcon. The greatest and rarest of birds.

name: littlefinger
line: Indeed I was.

name: littlefinger
line: On our way to the Fingers, we were set upon by a large force of Bolton men. Seemed to know exactly when we were traveling and exactly whom we were transporting.

name: littlefinger
line: Tell me, Lord Royce, how many people knew of my travel plans with Sansa Stark? I shared my intentions with you and no one else.

name: littlefinger
line: Your home is the Vale. The Lord of the Vale stands before us. And only his judgment concerns me.

name: littlefinger
line: Lord Royce has served the Vale well. He;s enjoyed a distinguished military career. If we could trust his absolute loyalty, he would make a capable commander in the wars to come.

name: littlefinger
line: I think he deserves one more chance. What do you say?

name: littlefinger
line: I bring good news. My friends in the North tell me Sansa has escaped Winterfell. I expect she’s headed to Castle Black where her brother serves as Lord Commander. But she won’t be safe there, not with the Boltons after her.

name: littlefinger
line: That was my instinct as well.

name: littlefinger
line: Our lord has spoken. Gather the Knights of the Vale. The time has come to join the fray.

name: daenerys
line: Where?

name: daenerys
line: [Speaking to Grey Worm in Valyrian] Lo jention mirre nūmāzme ēza, iderenna qopsa verdagon issa.

name: daenerys
line: [Speaking in the Common Tongue (in this case, English) again] You leave tonight.

name: daenerys
line: We’ve been waiting a long time. [BARRISTAN looks at her]  Haven’t we?  [BARRISTAN shrugs]  Well I don’t know, you tell me.  How long does it take to sack a city?

name: daenerys
line: And Daario Naharis?

name: daenerys
line: You know these men?

name: daenerys
line: Is he more titan or bastard?

name: daenerys
line: How many?

name: daenerys
line: Enough to make a difference?

name: daenerys
line: It's hard to collect wages from a corpse. I'm sure the sellswords prefer to fight for the winning side.

name: daenerys
line: I'd like to talk to the Titan's Bastard about winning.

name: daenerys
line: He will. A man who fights for gold can't afford to lose to a girl.

name: daenerys
line: We have no slaves here.

name: daenerys
line: Give me your Second Sons and I may not have you gelded. Ser Barristan, how many men fight for the Second Sons?

name: daenerys
line: We have more, don't we?

name: daenerys
line: I'm only a young girl, new to the ways of war, but perhaps a seasoned captain like yourself can explain to me how you propose to defeat us.

name: daenerys
line: You're very young to be a captain.

name: daenerys
line: Even if your numbers are right, you must admit the odds don't favor your side.

name: daenerys
line: Or you could fight for me.

name: daenerys
line: I would pay you as much and more.

name: daenerys
line: Ride with me and you'll never need another contract. You'll have gold and castles and lordships of your choosing when I take back the Seven Kingdoms.

name: daenerys
line: A fortnight ago, I had no army. A year ago, I had no dragons. You have two days to decide.

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) These men are our guests. (Speaks common.) You seem to be enjoying my wine. Perhaps you'd like a flagon to help you ponder.

name: daenerys
line: A barrel, then.

name: daenerys
line: Ser Barristan, if it comes to battle, kill that one first.

name: daenerys
line: How can anyone speak 19 languages?

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Drogo said I spoke Dothroaki like one born to it. It gave him great pride.

name: daenerys
line: Athjahaka.

name: daenerys
line: Athjahakar.

name: daenerys
line: Well, I suppose I'm a bit out of practice.

name: daenerys
line: What do you want?

name: daenerys
line: Let her go.

name: daenerys
line: You were sent here to kill me?

name: daenerys
line: So why haven't you?

name: daenerys
line: What do your captains have to say about that?

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: Over what?

name: daenerys
line: You're a strange man.

name: daenerys
line: And this is supposed to impress me?

name: daenerys
line: Why would I trust a man who murders his comrades?

name: daenerys
line: Will you fight for me?

name: daenerys
line: Swear to me.

name: daenerys
line: Perhaps they didn't want to be conquered.

name: daenerys
line: People learn to love their chains.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: (speaking Valyrian)  You do not owe me your freedom.  I cannot give it to you. Your freedom is not mine to give. It belongs to you and you alone. If you want it back, you must take it for yourselves. Each and every one of you.

name: daenerys
line: What does it mean?

name: daenerys
line: It's all right. These people won't hurt me.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) Fly.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) Let me pass

name: daenerys
line: To whom?

name: daenerys
line: Give me your water.

name: daenerys
line: Here, drink.

name: daenerys
line: The blood of my enemies, not the blood of innocents.

name: daenerys
line: Do you disagree, Ser Barristan?

name: daenerys
line: Did you know him well, Ser Barristan?

name: daenerys
line: I wish I had known him. But he was not the last dragon.

name: daenerys
line: They did not. I want to buy them all.

name: daenerys
line: Yes. 8,000. And the ones still in training as well.

name: daenerys
line: I will have them all or take none. Many will fall in battle. I'll need the boys to pick up the swords they drop.

name: daenerys
line: I have dragons. I'll give you one.

name: daenerys
line: One.

name: daenerys
line: One.

name: daenerys
line: Done.

name: daenerys
line: I'll take you as well, now. You'll be Master Kraznys' gift to me. A token of a bargain well struck.

name: daenerys
line: You're both here to advise me. I value your advice, but if you ever question me in front of strangers again, you'll be advising someone else. Is that understood?

name: daenerys
line: Do you have a name?

name: daenerys
line: Do you have a family? A mother and a father you'd return to if you had the choice?

name: daenerys
line: You belong to me now. It is your duty to tell me the truth.

name: daenerys
line: I offered water to one of the slaves dying on the Walk of Punishment. Do you know what he said to me? 'Let me die.'

name: daenerys
line: Is it true what Master Kraznys told me about the Unsullied? About their obedience?

name: daenerys
line: And what about you? You know that I'm taking you to war. You may go hungry. You may fall sick. You may be killed.

name: daenerys
line: Yes, all men must die. But we are not men.

name: daenerys
line: Not fast enough. I can't wait that long. I need an army

name: daenerys
line: The greatest slave-soldiers in the world. The distinction means a good deal to some people.

name: daenerys
line: It's too beautiful a day to argue.

name: daenerys
line: Don't mock them. They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship. They followed me across the poison water. If they'll do it, others will. And with a true khalasar ...

name: daenerys
line: Tell the good master there is no need.

name: daenerys
line: You take a babe from its mother's arms, kill it as she watches, and pay for her pain with a silver coin?

name: daenerys
line: How many do you have to sell?

name: daenerys
line: 8,000 dead babies.

name: daenerys
line: Once I own them, these men ...

name: daenerys
line: Once I own an army of slaves, what will I be?

name: daenerys
line: (to Jorah) The warlocks.

name: daenerys
line: I owe you my life, ser.

name: daenerys
line: You know this man?

name: daenerys
line: These are the ones?

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) You did not choose this life. But you are free men now. And free men make their own choices. Have you selected your own leader from amongst your ranks?

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian)  Remove your helmet

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) What is your name?

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Grey Worm.

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valeryan) From this day forward you will choose your own names. You will tell your fellow soldiers to do the same. Throw away your slave name. Choose the name your parents gave you, or any other. A name that gives you pride.

name: daenerys
line: Is it done, then? They belong to me?

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Unsullied!

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Forward march!

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Halt!

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) A dragon is not a slave.

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, of the blood of Old  Valyria. Valyrian is my mother tongue.

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Unsullied! Slay the masters, slay the soldiers, slay every man who holds a whip, but harm no child. Strike the chains off every slave you see!

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys.

name: daenerys
line: (speaks Valyrian) Unsullied! You have been slaves all your life. Today you are free. Any man who wishes to leave may leave, and no one will harm him. I give you my word. Will you fight for me? As free men?

name: daenerys
line: I don't want half my army killed before I've crossed the Narrow Sea.

name: daenerys
line: How many slaves are there in Yunkai?

name: daenerys
line: Then we have 200,000 reasons to take the city.

name: daenerys
line: You may approach. Sit.

name: daenerys
line: Good. My Unsullied need practice. I was told to blood them early.

name: daenerys
line: My ship?

name: daenerys
line: And what do you ask in return?

name: daenerys
line: I have a gift for you as well. Your life.

name: daenerys
line: And the lives of your wise masters. But I also want something in return. You will release every slave in Yunkai. Every man, woman, and child shall be given as much food, clothing, and property as they can carry as payment for their years of servitude. Reject this gift, and I shall show you no mercy.

name: daenerys
line: I did, but my dragons made no promises. And you threatened their mother.

name: daenerys
line: My gold. You gave it to me, remember? And I shall put it to good use. You'd be wise to do the same with my gift to you. Now get out.

name: daenerys
line: And what happens to things that don't bend? He said he had powerful friends. Who was he talking about?

name: daenerys
line: Find out.

name: daenerys
line: You speak it very well.

name: daenerys
line: I hope I can prove worthy of her admiration. What can I do for you?

name: daenerys
line: I have outfitted mess halls to feed all former slaves and barracks to shelter them.

name: daenerys
line: My Unsullied will make them safe again in short order my friend, this I promise you.

name: daenerys
line: What is it that you want from me?

name: daenerys
line: You want to return to a man who owned you, like a goat or a chair?

name: daenerys
line: I did not take this city to preside over the injustice I fought to destroy. I took it to bring people freedom. But freedom means making your own choices. I will allow you to sign a contract with your former master. It may not cover a period lasting longer than a year.

name: daenerys
line: Approach my friend.

name: daenerys
line: What was her name?

name: daenerys
line: How old was she?

name: daenerys
line: Three. *in Valyrian* And still no word on Drogon?

name: daenerys
line: *in Valyrian* Meet me in the catacombs.

name: daenerys
line: Are they attacking?

name: daenerys
line: What is he doing?

name: daenerys
line: I have something to say to the people of Meereen. First, I will need this one to be quiet. Do I have a champion?

name: daenerys
line: Which is why you must remain by my side.

name: daenerys
line: You are my most trusted advisor, my most valued general, and my dearest friend. I will not gamble with your life.

name: daenerys
line: Very well. You have quite an audience. Make it worth their while.

name: daenerys
line: Yes, win or lose, as long as the whole city is watching.

name: daenerys
line: You sure you don't want a horse?

name: daenerys
line: Horses are faster than men.

name: daenerys
line: (valyrian) I am Daenerys Stormborn.

name: daenerys
line: (valyrian) Your Masters may have told you lies about me, or they may have told you nothing. It does not matter. I have nothing to say to them. Only to you. First I went to Astapor. Those who were slaves in Astapor now stand behind me, free. Next I went to Yunkai. Those who were slaves in Yunkai now stand behind me, free. Now I have come to Meereen. I am not your enemy. Your enemy is beside you.

name: daenerys
line: Your enemy steals and murders your children. Your enemy has nothing for you but chains and suffering and commands. I do not bring commands. I bring you a choice. And I bring your enemies what they deserve. Forward!

name: daenerys
line: Fire!

name: daenerys
line: Ser Barristan.

name: daenerys
line: Where's Daario Naharis? Where's Grey Worm?

name: daenerys
line: Gambling?

name: daenerys
line: How long have they been at it?

name: daenerys
line: What's the prize to winning this stupid contest?

name: daenerys
line: The last man holding his sword can find a new queen to fight for.

name: daenerys
line: Have you ever been to Meereen?

name: daenerys
line: And?

name: daenerys
line: And now an army of former slaves is marching to her gates. You think the Great Masters are worried?

name: daenerys
line: You were told to ride at the back of the train.

name: daenerys
line: All right, what is this matter of strategy?

name: daenerys
line: Would you like to walk at the back of the train instead of riding?

name: daenerys
line: Would you like to walk without shoes?

name: daenerys
line: You are a gambler, aren't you?

name: daenerys
line: How many miles are there between here and Meereen?

name: daenerys
line: You will do no such thing. I will see each and every one of their faces. Remove her collar before you bury her.

name: daenerys
line: Who told you to take the Navy?

name: daenerys
line: So why did you do it?

name: daenerys
line: How many ships?

name: daenerys
line: How many men can they carry?

name: daenerys
line: Would that be enough to take King's Landing?

name: daenerys
line: Please leave me. Not you, Jorah.

name: daenerys
line: It appears my liberation of Slaver's Bay isn't going quite as planned.

name: daenerys
line: You counseled me against rashness once in Qarth. I didn't listen. That all worked out well.

name: daenerys
line: How can I rule seven kingdoms if I can't control Slaver's Bay? Why should anyone trust me? Why should anyone follow me?

name: daenerys
line: I need to be more than that. I will not let those I have freed slide back into chains. I will not sail for Westeros.

name: daenerys
line: I will do what queens do. I will rule.

name: daenerys
line: How are the lessons coming?

name: daenerys
line: You'll have to continue later. It's time.

name: daenerys
line: Remind me, Ser Jorah, how many children did the Great Masters nail to mileposts?

name: daenerys
line: Yes, that was it.

name: daenerys
line: I will answer injustice with justice.

name: daenerys
line: (speaking Valyrian) You stand before Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons. Don't be afraid, my friend.

name: daenerys
line: I thank him for his prayers.

name: daenerys
line: Tell this man I am sorry for his hardship. I cannot bring back his goats,

name: daenerys
line: but I will see he is paid their value three times over.

name: daenerys
line: Send the next one in.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Valyrian) The noble Hizdahr zo Loraq can speak to me himself.

name: daenerys
line: I thank you.

name: daenerys
line: Then it is my honor to receive you.

name: daenerys
line: For that, he has my gratitude. I should be honored to meet him.

name: daenerys
line: Your father crucified innocent children.

name: daenerys
line: I am sorry you no longer have a father, but my treatment of the masters was no crime. You'd be wise to remember that.

name: daenerys
line: And what traditions do you speak of?

name: daenerys
line: And what of the slave children these noble Meereenese crucified? They were rotting in the sun as well. Would you have begged me for their right to a proper burial?

name: daenerys
line: Bury your father, Hizdahr zo Loraq.

name: daenerys
line: How many more?

name: daenerys
line: Send the next one in.

name: daenerys
line: How did you get in here? Your door is well guarded,

name: daenerys
line: Don't do that again.

name: daenerys
line: These are my private quarters. If I want you here, I will summon you.

name: daenerys
line: Tell me why you're here.

name: daenerys
line: I've ordered the Second Sons to patrol the streets to stop the revenge killing.

name: daenerys
line: And as for women, there are thousands in Meereen you can pursue.

name: daenerys
line: You swore me your sword.

name: daenerys
line: So if I command you to stay in Meereen and patrol the streets?

name: daenerys
line: Very well.

name: daenerys
line: Do what you do best.

name: daenerys
line: Take off your clothes.

name: daenerys
line: You're here early.

name: daenerys
line: You don't approve?

name: daenerys
line: You neither approve nor trust.

name: daenerys
line: Didn't you fight for the Golden Company before pledging your sword to my brother?

name: daenerys
line: I trust you.

name: daenerys
line: I could never have faith in a man like Daario. That's why I've sent him and the Second Sons to retake Yunkai.

name: daenerys
line: I have.

name: daenerys
line: That is why I've ordered Daario to execute every master in Yunkai. The masters tear babies from their mothers' arms. They mutilate little boys by the thousands. They train little girls in the art of pleasuring old men. They treat men like beasts, as you said yourself.

name: daenerys
line: And repay the slavers with what? Kindness? A fine? A stern warning?

name: daenerys
line: Let the priests argue over good and evil. Slavery is real. I can end it. I will end it. And I will end those behind it.

name: daenerys
line: And now you are helping me show them to freedom.

name: daenerys
line: The man who came to me the other day about burying his father.

name: daenerys
line: He will accompany the Second Sons and serve as my ambassador to Yunkai. He will tell the masters what has happened in Meereen. He will explain the choice they have before them. They can live in my new world or they can die in their old one.

name: daenerys
line: Well, go and catch Daario before he leaves. Tell him I changed my mind.

name: daenerys
line: No. Tell him you changed my mind.

name: daenerys
line: Where have you been?

name: daenerys
line: I’m not putting my money anywhere.

name: daenerys
line: Has your experience ever involved any actual fighting? You, yourself, have you ever tried to kill a man that was trying to kill you?

name: daenerys
line: That is greatness?

name: daenerys
line: One day your great city will return to the dirt as well.

name: daenerys
line: If need be.

name: daenerys
line: If it comes to that they would have died for a good reason.

name: daenerys
line: Someone else’s reason.

name: daenerys
line: Drogon!

name: daenerys
line: Valahd..

name: daenerys
line: You will not speak. How do I know you are who you say you are?

name: daenerys
line: If you are Tyrion Lannister why shouldn’t I kill you? To pay your family back for what it did to mine

name: daenerys
line: So I should welcome you into my service because you murdered members of your own family?

name: daenerys
line: If you’d rather return to the fighting pits just say the word.

name: daenerys
line: And why are you worth meeting? Why should I spend my time listening to you?

name: daenerys
line: I have a very large army and very large dragons.

name: daenerys
line: So you want to advise me. Very well. (looks to Jorah) What would you have me do with him? I swore I would kill him if he ever returned.

name: daenerys
line: Why should the people trust a queen who can’t keep her promises?

name: daenerys
line: Yes, many opportunities.

name: daenerys
line: No. Not until forced to do so.

name: daenerys
line: So I should kill him?

name: daenerys
line: Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

name: daenerys
line: So have you decided yet? Whether I’m worthy of your service?

name: daenerys
line: It’s probably my safest option.

name: daenerys
line: And what would your father do?

name: daenerys
line: Is that why you killed him?

name: daenerys
line: I know what my father was. What he did. I know the Mad King earned his name.

name: daenerys
line: I’m terrible?

name: daenerys
line: Which kind is that?

name: daenerys
line: I did reopen the fighting pits. Under my rule murder will once again become entertainment.

name: daenerys
line: Perhaps it won’t come to that.

name: daenerys
line: Varys? King Robert’s spy master?

name: daenerys
line: Jorah sent my secrets to Varys. For 20 years the spider oversaw the campaign to find and kill me.

name: daenerys
line: But you trust him?

name: daenerys
line: The brother who killed my father.

name: daenerys
line: Perhaps I will have you killed after all.

name: daenerys
line: I’m not going to kill you.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: You’re going to advise me. (takes his wine cup) While you can still speak in complete sentences.

name: daenerys
line: How to get what I want.

name: daenerys
line: If I want jokes I’ll get myself a proper fool.

name: daenerys
line: I fought so that no child born into Slaver’s Bay would ever know what it was like to be bought or sold. I will continue that fight here and beyond. But this is not my home.

name: daenerys
line: The common people.

name: daenerys
line: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell. They’re all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that ones on top and on and on it spins, crushing the people on the ground.

name: daenerys
line: I’m not going to stop the wheel. I’m going to break the wheel.

name: daenerys
line: We have to go home.

name: daenerys
line: My poor, sweet thing. Does it hurt? (pause) We have to go home. Drogon? Can you take me back to Meereen?

name: daenerys
line: How far did you carry me? (surveys the area)

name: daenerys
line: Drogon, we need to return. My people need me.

name: daenerys
line: Well, there’s no food. At the very least you can hunt us some supper.

name: daenerys
line: It would send a message.

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: Perhaps the only thing that gave him pride was knowing that there was someone lower than he was.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you all for your counsel.

name: daenerys
line: About what?

name: daenerys
line: The Mad King? You're here to remind me of my enemies' lies? Consider me reminded.

name: daenerys
line: Go on.

name: daenerys
line: I'm not my father.

name: daenerys
line: I will not have the Son of the Harpy executed without a fair trial.

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: He was our prisoner, awaiting trial. You had no right.

name: daenerys
line: There are no more slaves. There are no more Masters.

name: daenerys
line: The Harpy's life was not yours to take. Once, the Masters were the law--

name: daenerys
line: The law is the law. Take him.

name: daenerys
line: You opened your gates to me because I promised you freedom and justice. One cannot exist without the other.

name: daenerys
line: A citizen of Meereen was awaiting trial and this man murdered him. The punishment is death.

name: daenerys
line: Leave me.

name: daenerys
line: Drogon...

name: daenerys
line: Sons of the Harpy?

name: daenerys
line: They’ve never killed before.

name: daenerys
line: I didn’t conquer them. Their own people did.

name: daenerys
line: Then they will have to learn to see things differently, Mossador. He did not risk his life fighting for freedom so cowards in masks could take it away. And I did not take up residence in this pyramid so I could watch the city below decline into chaos. What was the name of the man you lost?

name: daenerys
line: I want him buried with honor. Publicly. In the Temple of the Graces.

name: daenerys
line: Angry snakes lash out. Makes chopping off their heads that much easier. Find the men who did this and bring them to me.

name: daenerys
line: Good.

name: daenerys
line: Concessions?

name: daenerys
line: I’m not a politician. I’m a queen.

name: daenerys
line: I don’t expect the Wise Masters to be happy. Slavery made them rich, I ended slavery.

name: daenerys
line: The fighting pits? Where slaves fought slaves to the death?

name: daenerys
line: No fighting pits.

name: daenerys
line: I do not respect the tradition of human cockfighting.

name: daenerys
line: How many times must I say no before you understand?

name: daenerys
line: Whatever he wants from me he’s not going to get it. If he really believes I’m going to reopen the fighting pits…

name: daenerys
line: What?

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: You were sold into slavery, forced to fight to the death for the amusement of the masters, and you’re defending the fighting pits?

name: daenerys
line: That’s why I have the Unsullied patrolling the streets.

name: daenerys
line: I don’t want another child’s bones dropped at my feet. No one’s seen Drogon in weeks. For all I know he’s flown halfway across the world. I can’t control them anymore.

name: daenerys
line: Viserion? Rhaegal?

name: daenerys
line: Easy. Easy. Easy.

name: daenerys
line: "Barristan the Bold" they called him. He crossed a continent to serve me. He was a loyal friend. And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.

name: daenerys
line: I prefer your earlier suggestion. Round up the leaders of each of Meereen's great families and bring them to me.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) Walk forward.

name: daenerys
line: (Valyrian) Another step.

name: daenerys
line: (Valyrian) They will eat you, if I tell them to. They may eat you even if I don’t. Children. Some say I should give up on them. (One of the men is mumbling). But a good mother never gives up on her children. She disciplines them if she must.

name: daenerys
line: (Valyrian) But she does not give up on them.

name: daenerys
line: (Valyrian) Who is innocent? Maybe all of you are, (Looks at Hizdahr), maybe none of you are. Maybe, (Touching Hizdahr’s arm), I should let the dragons decide.

name: daenerys
line: Don't want to overfeed them. Tomorrow perhaps.

name: daenerys
line: If I give everyone what they deserve, I'll have no one left to rule. Ser Barristan counseled mercy when I took this city right up to the morning he died. Daario Naharis thinks I should kill the former Masters and let the rest of the city fend for itself. What do you think?

name: daenerys
line: (Sitting down). You are as fit as anyone I know. You know why I'm here. And you know who will suffer the most if this all falls apart. So what do you think?

name: daenerys
line: What about "Valar Morghulis"?

name: daenerys
line: It takes courage to admit fear. And to admit a mistake. I came here to tell you that I was wrong. I was wrong and you were right. About tradition. About bringing the people of this city together. I will reopen the fighting pits. To free men only. Slavery will never return to Meereen, not while I live.

name: daenerys
line: And in order to forge a lasting bond with the Meereenese people, I will marry the leader of an ancient family. (Hizdahr nods). Thankfully a suitor is already on his knees.

name: daenerys
line: Everyone looks happy enough from up here. (Barristan chuckles). What?

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: He sang to them?

name: daenerys
line: And what did you do?

name: daenerys
line: He was good?

name: daenerys
line: He told me Rhaegar was good at killing people. (Sits down).

name: daenerys
line: And what did you do with the money?

name: daenerys
line: How many others are there?

name: daenerys
line: Will you be joining us, Ser Barristan?

name: daenerys
line: I think I can protect me from Hizdahr Zo Loraq. Go, Ser Barristan. Sing a song for me.

name: daenerys
line: Is that what you used to tell men before you set them to butchering each other for sport?

name: daenerys
line: I do not recognize this tradition.

name: daenerys
line: Don’t be ridiculous. My marriage to Hizdahr is political. I think he’s smart enough to understand that.

name: daenerys
line: Are you jealous?

name: daenerys
line: I do.

name: daenerys
line: You told me yourself, I can’t fight enemies within and without. So when enemies from without come knocking, I need the city of Mereen behind me. I have no choice.

name: daenerys
line: So what else can I do?

name: daenerys
line: Even if I wanted to do such an inadviseable thing, I couldn’t.

name: daenerys
line: No. I can’t

name: daenerys
line: Of course

name: daenerys
line: I am a queen. Not a butcher.

name: daenerys
line: Sitting through the great games will be bad enough.

name: daenerys
line: I think I’ve seen enough.

name: daenerys
line: I’ve sacrificed more than enough for your traditions.

name: daenerys
line: Get him out of my sight.

name: daenerys
line: Who are you?

name: daenerys
line: Astapor?

name: daenerys
line: They have my dragons. A mother does not flee without her children.

name: daenerys
line: You should sail to Astapor. I'm sure you'll be safe there.

name: daenerys
line: Then serve me. If my dragons are in the House of the Undying, then take me there.

name: daenerys
line: And what of my magic? You saw me step into the fire. You watched the witch burn. What did the flames do to me? Do you remember?

name: daenerys
line: They are my children. And they are the only children I will ever have. Take me to them.

name: daenerys
line: Let them try.

name: daenerys
line: Is this a riddle?

name: daenerys
line: Are you trying to frighten me with magic tricks? You want me? Here I am. Are you afraid of a little girl?

name: daenerys
line: (dothraki)  This is dark magic, like the magic that took you from me. Took you from me before I could even Maybe I am dead and I just don't know it yet. Maybe I am with you in the Night Lands.

name: daenerys
line: That sounds like something you would do.

name: daenerys
line: Until the sun rises in the west and sets in the east, until the rivers run dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

name: daenerys
line: This is not my home. My home is across the sea, where my people are waiting for me.

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys.

name: daenerys
line: Come.

name: daenerys
line: Nothing.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you, Xaro Xhoan Daxos. Thank you for teaching me this lesson.

name: daenerys
line: Looks real enough to me. Real enough to buy a ship?

name: daenerys
line: Does it ever end?

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Rakharo, Aggo, Kovarro.. Take our remaining horses. Find out how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

name: daenerys
line: He is blood of my blood.

name: daenerys
line: Who did this?

name: daenerys
line: They will like it far less when I'm done with them.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Shh. They cannot kill his soul.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Shh. We will build him a funeral pyre.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) And I promise you, Rakharo will ride with his ancestors tonight.

name: daenerys
line: He said they ate meat.

name: daenerys
line: My brother didn't know anything about dragons. He didn't know anything about anything.

name: daenerys
line: She was Drogo's first gift to me.

name: daenerys
line: I promised to protect them. Promised them their enemies would die screaming. How do I make starvation scream?

name: daenerys
line: Does it ever end?

name: daenerys
line: And you're sure there's no other way?

name: daenerys
line: No one will take my dragons.

name: daenerys
line: (Turns to Jorah) As you are mine.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Rakharo, Aggo, Kovarro. Take our remaining horses. You will ride east, you southeast, and you northeast.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Cities, living or dead. Caravans and people. Rivers or lakes or the great salt sea. Find how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

name: daenerys
line: (Speaking Dothraki) Rokharo, you are my last hope, blood of my blood.

name: daenerys
line: You never have.

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys. Dracarys.

name: daenerys
line: He'll be able to feed himself from now on.

name: daenerys
line: Let him sleep, Doreah.

name: daenerys
line: (amused) He loves you.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you, my friend.

name: daenerys
line: The last time a rich man gave me a dress, he was selling me to Khal Drogo.

name: daenerys
line: Xaro is our host, but we know nothing about him. Men like to talk about other men when they're happy.

name: daenerys
line: It sounds wonderful.

name: daenerys
line: Please excuse me for a moment.

name: daenerys
line: What are they doing?

name: daenerys
line: (Dothraki)  We are his guests! You can't pry it or chop it or melt it.

name: daenerys
line: (Dothraki) Not even when we leave.

name: daenerys
line: (Dothraki) Our host saved us from the Red Waste and you want to steal from him? I will hear no more.

name: daenerys
line: My brother used to say the only thing the Dothraki knew how to do was steal things better men have built.

name: daenerys
line: That's not the kind of queen I'm going to be.

name: daenerys
line: What is the House of the Undying?

name: daenerys
line: He's not my manservant and he's not in love with me. He's my advisor and he's my friend.

name: daenerys
line: And what about what a woman wants?

name: daenerys
line: To cross the Narrow Sea and take back the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: Because I promised my khalasar I'd protect them and find them a safe home.

name: daenerys
line: I want them because they're mine by right. The Iron Throne is mine and I will take it.

name: daenerys
line: And how did you get all of this? Did someone give it to you?

name: daenerys
line: So you wanted more than you had and you took it. You're a conqueror, too. You're just less ambitious.

name: daenerys
line: What do you want, Xaro Xhoan Daxos? At the gates of the city, you bled for me. Why?

name: daenerys
line: And behind the door?

name: daenerys
line: And it can all be mine?

name: daenerys
line: All I have to do?

name: daenerys
line: That was a romantic proposal.

name: daenerys
line: The Seven Kingdoms are at war with one another. Four false kings destroying the country.

name: daenerys
line: The usurper is dead.

name: daenerys
line: The Starks fight the Lannisters, and Baratheons fight each other.

name: daenerys
line: The time to strike is now. We need to find ships and an army or we'll spend the rest of our lives rotting away at the edge of the world.

name: daenerys
line: And if I'd listened to that advice outside the gates of Qarth, we'd all be dead by now.

name: daenerys
line: Do not speak to me like I'm a child.

name: daenerys
line: What do you want? Tell me.

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: So what would you have me do, as my advisor?

name: daenerys
line: And how do I get the ship?

name: daenerys
line: I look forward to meeting him.

name: daenerys
line: (Valerian) This isn't your horse.

name: daenerys
line: (Valerian) Qarth?

name: daenerys
line: (Valerian) Will they let us in?

name: daenerys
line: What do you know of this place?

name: daenerys
line: I thought we were welcome.

name: daenerys
line: Horde?

name: daenerys
line: My name is Daenerys

name: daenerys
line: You know me, my lord?

name: daenerys
line: And what should I call you?

name: daenerys
line: The beauty of Quarth is legendary

name: daenerys
line: Qarth.

name: daenerys
line: My friend, we have traveled very far. We have no food, no water. Once I see my people fed, I would be honored

name: daenerys
line: I am not a liar.

name: daenerys
line: Where I come from, guests are treated with respect, not insulted at the gates.

name: daenerys
line: What are you doing? You promised to receive me.

name: daenerys
line: If you do not let us in, all of us will die.

name: daenerys
line: Thirteen! When my dragons are grown, we will take back what was stolen from me and destroy those who have wronged me. We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground. Turn us away and we will burn you first.

name: daenerys
line: He shouldn't make me wait.

name: daenerys
line: I already have a husband.

name: daenerys
line: And you are far too smart to think that I will succumb to flattery.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you, my lord. You are a gracious host, but there is no servant alive that can bring me what I want.

name: daenerys
line: My birthright. The Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

name: daenerys
line: I'm not asking you for the kingdoms. I'm asking you for ships.

name: daenerys
line: Whatever you grant me now will be repaid three times over when I retake the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: My father sat there, before he was murdered.

name: daenerys
line: I didn't come here to argue grammar.

name: daenerys
line: Not yet.

name: daenerys
line: There are many there that support my claim.

name: daenerys
line: I left when I was a baby.

name: daenerys
line: The people will rise to fight for their rightful queen when I return.

name: daenerys
line: Do you know lllyrio Mopatis, Magister of Pentos? Yes, we've met.

name: daenerys
line: For my wedding, he gave me three petrified dragon eggs. He believed The world believed that the ages had turned them to stone. How many centuries has it been since dragons roamed the skies? But I dreamt that if I carried those eggs into a great fire, they would hatch. When I stepped into the fire, my own people thought I was mad. But when the fire burned out, I was unhurt, the Mother of Dragons.

name: daenerys
line: Do you understand? I'm no ordinary woman. My dreams come true.

name: daenerys
line: I am not your little princess. I am Daenerys Stormborn of the blood of Old Valyria, and I will take what is mine. With fire and blood, I will take it.

name: daenerys
line: The Spice King refuses me because I'm a bad investment. The Silk King won't support me because of his business with the Lannisters. Why offend his best customer? And the Copper King offers me a single ship on the condition that I lie with him for a night. Does he think I will whore myself for a boat?

name: daenerys
line: You are one of the Thirteen.

name: daenerys
line: Nothing? They're more valuable than anything in the world.

name: daenerys
line: There is no we, so why would you help me get them back?

name: daenerys
line: But it did happen under your roof.

name: daenerys
line: I don't care where you've been.

name: daenerys
line: You came back.

name: daenerys
line: Irri is dead.

name: daenerys
line: She's dead. She died alone. She died for me and I couldn't protect her.

name: daenerys
line: We can't find her. She must be dead, too. I led my people out of the Red Waste and into the slaughterhouse.

name: daenerys
line: You went to find me a ship.

name: daenerys
line: "These people"?

name: daenerys
line: And who is to be trusted? Who are my people? The Targaryens? I only knew one, my brother, and he would have let a thousand men rape me if it had got him the crown. The Dothraki? Most of them turned on me the day that Khal Drogo fell from his horse.

name: daenerys
line: The people in Westeros don't know I'm alive.

name: daenerys
line: And then what? They'll pray for my return? They'll wave dragon banners and shout my name? That's what my brother believed and he was a fool.

name: daenerys
line: You are not your brother.

name: daenerys
line: There it is. "Trust me. " And it's you I should trust, Ser Jorah? Only you? I don't need trust any longer. I don't want it and I don't have room for it.

name: daenerys
line: And you are too familiar.

name: daenerys
line: Find my dragons.

name: daenerys
line: Please, they're my children. I'm begging you.

name: daenerys
line: Without me, the dragons will die.

name: daenerys
line: How?

name: daenerys
line: You have my dragons?

name: daenerys
line: But there is no King of Qarth.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords.  I hope the seas weren't too rough.

name: daenerys
line: Forgive me --

name: daenerys
line: Forever.  So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

name: daenerys
line: Oh.  Well, that is unfortunate.  You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

name: daenerys
line: My father was an evil man.  On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family.  And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father.  Our two houses were allies for centuries.  Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known.  Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North.  I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow.  Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine.  Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North.  Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.

name: daenerys
line: Then why are you here?

name: daenerys
line: Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

name: daenerys
line: And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

name: daenerys
line: But still, I need your help?

name: daenerys
line: Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

name: daenerys
line: You told me you liked this man.

name: daenerys
line: In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

name: daenerys
line: As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

name: daenerys
line: The dead?

name: daenerys
line: Is that another figure of speech?

name: daenerys
line: I was born at Dragonstone.  Not that I can remember it.

name: daenerys
line: We fled before Robert's assassins could find us.  Robert was your father's best friend, no?  I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib.  Not that it matters now of course.  I spent my life in foreign lands.  So many men have tried to kill me.  I don't remember all of their names.  I have been sold like a brood mare.  I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled.  Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile?  Faith.  Not in any gods.  Not in myths and legends.  In myself.  In Daenerys Targaryen.  The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born.  The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea.  Any sea.

name: daenerys
line: They did for me.  I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms.  And I will.

name: daenerys
line: That's fair.  It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms.  By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

name: daenerys
line: You must forgive my manners.  You will both be tired after your long journey.  We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

name: daenerys
line: Not yet.

name: daenerys
line: And?

name: daenerys
line: All of them?

name: daenerys
line: Dragonglass?

name: daenerys
line: Why are we talking about glass?  We just lost two of our allies.

name: daenerys
line: And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

name: daenerys
line: And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

name: daenerys
line: Which wise man said this?

name: daenerys
line: Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

name: daenerys
line: What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people?  Did you notice that?

name: daenerys
line: I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

name: daenerys
line: You lost two brothers as well?

name: daenerys
line: People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are.  Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

name: daenerys
line: He is my Hand.

name: daenerys
line: We all enjoy what we're good at.

name: daenerys
line: You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

name: daenerys
line: I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it.  Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

name: daenerys
line: You better get to work, Jon Snow.

name: daenerys
line: We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

name: daenerys
line: I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

name: daenerys
line: I wouldn't be alone.  I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal.  What can anyone do to them?

name: daenerys
line: What about Casterly Rock?

name: daenerys
line: I wish I could remember it.

name: daenerys
line: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

name: daenerys
line: Good.

name: daenerys
line: Not so many lions.

name: daenerys
line: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

name: daenerys
line: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

name: daenerys
line: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: I never properly thanked you for that.

name: daenerys
line: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

name: daenerys
line: And then you served the man who overthrew him?

name: daenerys
line: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

name: daenerys
line: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

name: daenerys
line: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

name: daenerys
line: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

name: daenerys
line: Who gave the order to kill me?

name: daenerys
line: Who hired the assassins?

name: daenerys
line: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

name: daenerys
line: To keep yourself alive.

name: daenerys
line: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

name: daenerys
line: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

name: daenerys
line: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

name: daenerys
line: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen.  You are very welcome here.  What is your name?

name: daenerys
line: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

name: daenerys
line: We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

name: daenerys
line: The Lord of Light doesn't have  many followers in Westeros, does he?

name: daenerys
line: What does your Lord expect from me?

name: daenerys
line: The prince who was promised will bring the dawn.  I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

name: daenerys
line: No, but I like it better.

name: daenerys
line: And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

name: daenerys
line: You know him?

name: daenerys
line: He sounds like quite a man.

name: daenerys
line: Very well.  Send a raven north.  Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

name: daenerys
line: That's enough.  Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen.  You will treat him with respect.

name: daenerys
line: I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

name: daenerys
line: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council.  I'm grateful to all of you.  But you have chosen to follow me.  I will not attack King's Landing.  We will not attack King's Landing.

name: daenerys
line: We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides.  Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

name: daenerys
line: Do I have your support?

name: daenerys
line: Thank you all.  Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

name: daenerys
line: I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me.  But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

name: daenerys
line: Shall we begin?

name: daenerys
line: I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

name: daenerys
line: Step forward, My Lord.

name: daenerys
line: You will not kneel?

name: daenerys
line: You will not trade your honor for your life.  I respect that.

name: daenerys
line: Who are you?

name: daenerys
line: I meant what I said.  I'm not here to put men in chains.  If that becomes an option many will take it.  I gave them a choice.  They made it.

name: daenerys
line: I'm not beheading anyone.

name: daenerys
line: Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys.

name: daenerys
line: They're beautiful, aren't they?

name: daenerys
line: They're not beasts to me.  No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

name: daenerys
line: You're not sure how you feel about that?

name: daenerys
line: How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

name: daenerys
line: We both want to help people.  We can only help them from a position of strength.  Sometimes strength is terrible.  When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

name: daenerys
line: So it was a figure of speech?

name: daenerys
line: He is my friend.

name: daenerys
line: Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

name: daenerys
line: You look strong.  You found a cure?

name: daenerys
line: It would be my honor.

name: daenerys
line: I'm happy for you.  You don't look happy.

name: daenerys
line: You said you don't have enough men.

name: daenerys
line: And give the country to Cersei?  As soon as I march away she marches in.

name: daenerys
line: I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

name: daenerys
line: And how would you get into King's Landing.

name: daenerys
line: Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

name: daenerys
line: I haven't given you permission to leave.

name: daenerys
line: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

name: daenerys
line: But I've grown used to him.

name: daenerys
line: Soon.  They will come back to me.

name: daenerys
line: What happened?

name: daenerys
line: Many things?

name: daenerys
line: It's all right.

name: daenerys
line: When?

name: daenerys
line: They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters.  Maybe even before there were men.

name: daenerys
line: Doing what?  Fighting each other?

name: daenerys
line: They fought together against their common enemy.  Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together.  We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

name: daenerys
line: And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

name: daenerys
line: I will fight for you.  I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

name: daenerys
line: They will if their king does.  They chose you to lead them.  They chose you to protect them.  Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

name: daenerys
line: What is it?

name: daenerys
line: That's very good to hear.

name: daenerys
line: Isn't it?

name: daenerys
line: You will stay.  All my allies are gone.  They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

name: daenerys
line: Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

name: daenerys
line: The right plan?  Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

name: daenerys
line: Our enemies?  Your family, you mean.  Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

name: daenerys
line: Enough with the clever plans.

name: daenerys
line: I have three large dragons.  I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

name: daenerys
line: My enemies are in the Red Keep.  What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

name: daenerys
line: What do you think I should do?

name: daenerys
line: I'm at war.  I'm losing.

name: daenerys
line: What do you think I should do?

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys!

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys!

name: daenerys
line: Do you know what I like about you?

name: daenerys
line: You're not a hero.

name: daenerys
line: I don't want you to be a hero.  Heroes do stupid things and they die.  Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all try to outdo each other of who can do the stupidist, bravest thing.

name: daenerys
line: Jon Snow's not in love with me.

name: daenerys
line: My apologies.

name: daenerys
line: Yes. That's all.

name: daenerys
line: Your capital will be safe until the northern threat is dealt with. You have my word.

name: daenerys
line: I didn't believe it until I saw them. I saw them all.

name: daenerys
line: A hundred thousand, at least.

name: daenerys
line: Just the King

name: daenerys
line: I'm grateful for your loyalty, but my dragon died so that we could be here. If it's all for nothing, then he died for nothing.

name: daenerys
line: I didn't come all this way to have my Hand

name: daenerys
line: (Nods)

name: daenerys
line: I know. I respect what you did. Wish you hadn't done it, but I respect it.

name: daenerys
line: This place was the beginning of the end for my family. (Speaks Valerian.) A dragon is not a slave. They were terrifying. Extraordinary. They filled people with wonder and awe, and we locked them in here. They wasted away. They grew small. And we grew small as well. We weren't extraordinary without them. We were just like everyone else.

name: daenerys
line: I can't have children.

name: daenerys
line: The witch who murdered my husband.

name: daenerys
line: You were right from the beginning. If I had trusted you, everything would be different.

name: daenerys
line: I can't forget what I saw north of the Wall. And I can't pretend that Cersei won't take back half the country the moment I march north.

name: daenerys
line: (Laughs)

name: daenerys
line: And the Unsullied? We can sail with them to White Harbor, meet the Dothraki here on the kingsroad, then ride together to Winterfell.

name: daenerys
line: I've not come to conquer the North. I'm coming to save the North. We sail together.

name: daenerys
line: When I was a child, my brother would tell me a bedtime story about the man who murdered our father.

name: daenerys
line: Who stabbed him in the back and cut his throat. Who sat down on the Iron Throne and watched as his blood poured onto the floor.

name: daenerys
line: He told me other stories as well. About all the things we would do to that man once we took back the Seven Kingdoms and had him in our grasp.

name: daenerys
line: Your sister pledged to send her army north.

name: daenerys
line: I don't see an army. I see one man, with one hand. It appears your sister lied to me.

name: daenerys
line: "We"?

name: daenerys
line: Like you knew your sister?

name: daenerys
line: Perhaps he trusts his little brother to defend him, right up to the moment he slits my throat.

name: daenerys
line: So why have you abandoned your house and family now?

name: daenerys
line: What does the Warden of the North say about it?

name: daenerys
line: Very well.

name: daenerys
line: Either you knew Cersei was lying and let me believe otherwise, or you didn't know at all. Which makes you either a traitor or a fool.

name: daenerys
line: Not for the first time.

name: daenerys
line: Cersei still sits on the throne. If you can't help me take it back, I'll find another Hand who can.

name: daenerys
line: Have you done something to offend me?

name: daenerys
line: Long ago and long forgiven.

name: daenerys
line: When I named him Hand, I didn't know if I'd ever see you again.

name: daenerys
line: I wasn't under the impression you liked him very much.

name: daenerys
line: He's made mistakes. Serious mistakes.

name: daenerys
line: You're advising me to forgive the man who stole your position?

name: daenerys
line: Lady Sansa, I was hoping we could speak alone.

name: daenerys
line: I thought you and I were on the verge of agreement before. About Ser Jaime.

name: daenerys
line: I wish I could have that kind of faith in my advisors.

name: daenerys
line: I didn't ask him to be my Hand simply because he was good.

name: daenerys
line: I asked him to be my Hand because he was good, and intelligent, and ruthless when he had to be. He never should have trusted Cersei.

name: daenerys
line: I thought he knew his sister.

name: daenerys
line: Ours certainly have been.

name: daenerys
line: We have other things in common. We've both known what it means to lead people who aren't inclined to accept a woman's rule. And we've both done a damn good job of it, from what I can tell.

name: daenerys
line: And yet, I can't help but feel we're at odds with one another. Why is that? Your brother.

name: daenerys
line: That bothers you.

name: daenerys
line: I'm here because I love your brother and I trust him, and I know he's true to his word. He's only the second man in my life I can say that about.

name: daenerys
line: Someone taller.

name: daenerys
line: I take the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: What is it?

name: daenerys
line: Your sister?

name: daenerys
line: But why aren't you with her?

name: daenerys
line: Ser Davos is perfectly capable of waving a torch on his own. You'll be in the crypt.

name: daenerys
line: There are thousands of them and only one of you. You can't fight as well as they can, but you can think better than any of them. You're here because of your mind. If we survive, I'll need it.

name: daenerys
line: Who's that?

name: daenerys
line: My brother, Rhaegar, everyone told me he was decent and kind. He liked to sing. Gave money to poor children. And he raped her.

name: daenerys
line: That's impossible.

name: daenerys
line: Who told you this?

name: daenerys
line: He saw it?

name: daenerys
line: A secret no one in the world knew except your brother and your best friend. Doesn't seem strange to you?

name: daenerys
line: If it were true, it would make you the last male heir of House Targaryen. You'd have a claim to the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you for inviting us into your home, Lady Stark. The North is as beautiful as your brother claimed, as are you.

name: daenerys
line: Whatever they want.

name: daenerys
line: Your sister doesn't like me.

name: daenerys
line: She doesn't need to be my friend but I am her queen. If she can't respect me-

name: daenerys
line: How many today?

name: daenerys
line: The dragons are barely eating.

name: daenerys
line: They don't like the North.

name: daenerys
line: Go on.

name: daenerys
line: Nobody does. Until they ride a dragon.

name: daenerys
line: Then I've enjoyed your company, Jon Snow.

name: daenerys
line: Whatever you can.

name: daenerys
line: We could stay a thousand years-

name: daenerys
line: No one would find us.

name: daenerys
line: So keep your queen warm.

name: daenerys
line: Don't be afraid.

name: daenerys
line: So you're the man?

name: daenerys
line: The one who saved Ser Jorah when no one else could.

name: daenerys
line: I'll have to make some changes in the Citadel when I take my throne. A great service merits a great reward.

name: daenerys
line: Well, there must be something I could give you.

name: daenerys
line: For what crime?

name: daenerys
line: From the Citadel?

name: daenerys
line: Not Randyll Tarly?

name: daenerys
line: I offered to let him retain his lands and titles if he bent the knee. He refused.

name: daenerys
line: Your brother stood with your father.

name: daenerys
line: Of course.

name: daenerys
line: Gendry.

name: daenerys
line: THAT'S right, isn't it?

name: daenerys
line: You’re Robert Baratheon’s son.

name: daenerys
line: You are aware he took my family's throne and tried to have me murdered?

name: daenerys
line: Yes, he's dead. His brothers are too. So who's Lord of Storm's End now?

name: daenerys
line: Does anyone?

name: daenerys
line: I think you should be Lord of Storm's End.

name: daenerys
line: No, you are Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End, the lawful son of Robert Baratheon. Because that is what I have made you.

name: daenerys
line: See? You're not the only one who's clever.

name: daenerys
line: To Arya Stark, the hero of Winterfell!

name: daenerys
line: Are you drunk?

name: daenerys
line: He loved me. And I couldn't love him back. Not the way he wanted. Not the way I love you.

name: daenerys
line: Is that all right?

name: daenerys
line: I wish you'd never told me. If I didn't know, I'd be happy right now.

name: daenerys
line: I try to forget. Tonight I did for a while, and then I saw them gathered around you. I saw the way they looked at you. I know that look. So many people have looked at me that way, but never here. Never on this side of the sea.

name: daenerys
line: (angrily) It doesn't matter what you want. You didn't want to be King in the North. What happens when they demand you press your claim, and take what is mine?

name: daenerys
line: (desperately)You can say nothing. To anyone, ever. Never tell them who you really are. Swear your brother and Samwell Tarly to secrecy, and tell no one else. Or it will take on a life of its own and you won't be able to control it or what it does to people. No matter how many times you bend the knee, no matter what you swear.

name: daenerys
line: I want it to be the way it was between us.

name: daenerys
line: Sansa will want to see me gone and you on the Iron Throne.

name: daenerys
line: She's not the girl you grew up with. Not after what she's seen, not after what they've done to her.

name: daenerys
line: Even if the truth destroys us?

name: daenerys
line: It will. I've never begged for anything but I'm begging you. Don't do this. Please.

name: daenerys
line: We can. I've just told you how.

name: daenerys
line: Cersei will make sure they don't believe it. We will hit her hard. We will rip her out root and stem.

name: daenerys
line: No matter how many lords turn against her, as long as she sits on the Iron Throne, she can call herself Queen of the Seven Kingdoms. We need the capital.

name: daenerys
line: All right.

name: daenerys
line: How long do you suggest?

name: daenerys
line: I came north to fight alongside you at great cost to my armies and myself. Now that the time has come to reciprocate, you want to postpone.

name: daenerys
line: THE longer I leave my enemies alone, the stronger they become.

name: daenerys
line: We have won the Great War. Now we will win the Last War. In all Seven Kingdoms, men will live without fear and cruelty under their rightful queen.

name: daenerys
line: You saw my child fall from the sky.

name: daenerys
line: They took Missandei.

name: daenerys
line: Do you believe we're here for a reason, Lord Varys? I'm here to free the world from tyrants. That is my destiny and I will serve it, no matter the cost.

name: daenerys
line: Speaking to Cersei will not prevent a slaughter. But perhaps it's good the people see that Daenerys Stormborn made every effort to avoid bloodshed, and Cersei Lannister refused. They should know whom to blame when the sky falls down upon them.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Blood of my blood.

name: daenerys
line: You kept all your promises to me. You killed my enemies in their iron suits.

name: daenerys
line: Your tore down their stone houses. You gave me the Seven Kingdoms.

name: daenerys
line: Torgo Nudho.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) You have walked beside me since the Plaza of Pride. You are the bravest of men, the most loyal of soldiers. I name you commander of all my forces, the Queen's Master of War.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) Unsullied. All of you were torn from your mother's arms and raised as slaves. Now you are liberators. You have freed the people of King's Landing from the grip of a tyrant!

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) But the war is not over. We will not lay down our spears until we have liberated all the people of the world!

name: daenerys
