line: (in Valyrian) From Winterfell to Dorne, from Lannisport to Qarth, from the Summer Isles to the Jade Sea! Women, men and children have suffered too long beneath the wheel.

name: daenerys
line: (in Valyrian) Will you break the wheel with me?

name: daenerys
line: You freed your brother. You committed treason.

name: daenerys
line: (In Valyrian) Take him.

name: daenerys
line: When I was a girl, my brother told me it was made with 1000 swords from Aegon's fallen enemies. What do 1000 swords look like in the mind of a little girl who can't count to 20? I imagined a mountain of swords too high to climb. So many fallen enemies, you could only see the soles of Aegon's feet.

name: daenerys
line: It was necessary.

name: daenerys
line: I tried to make peace with Cersei. She used their innocence as a weapon against me. She thought it would cripple me.

name: daenerys
line: He conspired behind my back with my enemies. How have you treated people who've done the same to you, even when it broke your heart?

name: daenerys
line: I can't.

name: daenerys
line: We can't hide behind small mercies. The world we need won't be built by men loyal to the world we have.

name: daenerys
line: And it will be. It's not easy to see something that's never been before. A good world.

name: daenerys
line: Because I know what is good. And so do you.

name: daenerys
line: You do. You do. You've always known.

name: daenerys
line: They don't get to choose.

name: daenerys
line: Be with me. Build the new world with me. This is our reason. It has been from the beginning, since you were a little boy with a bastard's name and I was a little girl who couldn't count to 20. We do it together. We break the wheel together.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) My lord… My sun and stars… Drogo.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) He's tired, that's all. He needs to rest. We've ridden far enough today. We'll camp here.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) We'll camp here. Tell them Khal Drogo commanded it.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Find Mirri Maz Duur. Bring her to me.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Bring her to me unharmed or Khal Drogo will hear why you denied me.

name: daenerys
line: Come. He's very strong. No one understands how strong he is.

name: daenerys
line: He can't. He can't. l won't let him.

name: daenerys
line: l won't leave him.

name: daenerys
line: Even if he dies, why would l run? l am khaleesi, and my my son will be khal after Drogo.

name: daenerys
line: l won't leave him.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Stop it! l don't want her hurt.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) l have never been nothing. l am the blood of the dragon.

name: daenerys
line: l think you should wear your armor tonight, ser.

name: daenerys
line: And now you must save him.

name: daenerys
line: Save him and l will free you. l swear it. You must know a way. Some – some magic.

name: daenerys
line: Do it. Save him.

name: daenerys
line: You'll have gold, whatever you want.

name: daenerys
line: My death?

name: daenerys
line: Kill her and you kill your khal.

name: daenerys
line: l am your khaleesi. l tell you what is forbidden.

name: daenerys
line: Take her and leave. Take her!

name: daenerys
line: No one will enter.

name: daenerys
line: Bring him back to me.

name: daenerys
line: l have to save him.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) This must be.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) No, you can't.

name: daenerys
line: The baby –

name: daenerys
line: … is coming.

name: daenerys
line: Ser Jorah?

name: daenerys
line: My son – where is he? l want him. Where is he?

name: daenerys
line: Tell me.

name: daenerys
line: How did my son die?

name: daenerys
line: What do the women say?

name: daenerys
line: Where is Khal Drogo? Show him to me. Show me what l bought with my son's life.

name: daenerys
line: l want to see him now.

name: daenerys
line: The khalasar is gone.

name: daenerys
line: Drogo! (in Dothraki) My sun and stars. (in the Common Tongue, to the rest) Why is he out here alone?

name: daenerys
line: (looking at Drogo’s catatonic expression) This is not life. When will he be as he was?

name: daenerys
line: Leave us.

name: daenerys
line: l have nothing more to fear from this woman. Go.

name: daenerys
line: You knew what l was buying and you knew the price.

name: daenerys
line: This is not God's work. My child was innocent.

name: daenerys
line: l spoke for you. l saved you.

name: daenerys
line: Your life.

name: daenerys
line: (in Dothraki) Do you remember our first ride, my sun and stars? lf you are in there, if you haven't gone away, show me. You're a fighter. You've always been a fighter. l need you to fight now. l know you're very far away, but come back to me, my sun and stars.

name: daenerys
line: (crying)  When the sun rises in the west and sets in the east. Then you shall return to me, my sun and stars.

name: daenerys
line: They were not given to me to sell.

name: daenerys
line: l must. You don't understand.

name: daenerys
line: ls that what you fear? (kisses Jorah on the cheek, then speaks to the rest of the Dothraki and Lhazareen who stayed with her)  You will be my khalasar. l see the faces of slaves. l free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. But if you stay it will be as brothers and sisters, as husbands and wives.

name: daenerys
line: Ser Jorah, bind this woman to the pyre. You swore to obey me.

name: daenerys
line: I will. But it is not your screams I want. Only your life.

name: daenerys
line: From whom?

name: daenerys
line: Tell them all to stop.

name: daenerys
line: Until I command them otherwise.

name: daenerys
line: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

name: daenerys
line: No!

name: daenerys
line: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

name: daenerys
line: What are you doing?

name: daenerys
line: It’s a boy.

name: daenerys
line: I know.

name: daenerys
line: Isn't there anything else?

name: daenerys
line: Have you ever seen a dragon?

name: daenerys
line: Everywhere? Even in the east?

name: daenerys
line: The moon?

name: daenerys
line: Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories?

name: daenerys
line: How old were you?

name: daenerys
line: Nine?!

name: daenerys
line: Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy?

name: daenerys
line: Will it take three years?

name: daenerys
line: Finish a man?

name: daenerys
line: Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.

name: daenerys
line: I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.

name: daenerys
line: No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.

name: daenerys
line: We’ve been his guests for over a year and he’s never asked us for anything.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: I don’t know.

name: daenerys
line: Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?

name: daenerys
line: Thank you, Magister.

name: daenerys
line: She’s beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don’t know how to say ‘thank you’ in Dothraki.

name: daenerys
line: Do you know the Common Tongue?

name: daenerys
line: Is ‘no’ the only word that you know?

name: daenerys
line: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

name: daenerys
line: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki, could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?

name: daenerys
line: But if they did?

name: daenerys
line: And you know these men?

name: daenerys
line: You sold slaves.

name: daenerys
line: Why?

name: daenerys
line: And where is she now?

name: daenerys
line: Hush now. It's all right. Irri, take her and leave us.

name: daenerys
line: Why did you hit her?!

name: daenerys
line: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

name: daenerys
line: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

name: daenerys
line: Please.

name: daenerys
line: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

name: daenerys
line: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

name: daenerys
line: I hit him. I hit the dragon.

name: daenerys
line: He is still the true King.

name: daenerys
line: No. But the common people are waiting for him. Illyrio said they're sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

name: daenerys
line: What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

name: daenerys
line: I pray for home too. My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms. He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one. He'll never take us home.

name: daenerys
line: You’re hurt.

name: daenerys
line: A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rhaego!

name: daenerys
line: Stop him.

name: daenerys
line: Viserys, please.

name: daenerys
line: He says yes. You shall have a golden crown, that men shall tremble to behold.

name: daenerys
line: No.

name: daenerys
line: He was no dragon. Fire cannot kill a dragon.

name: daenerys
line: According to the prophecy, the stallions will ride to the ends of the world.

name: daenerys
line: The earth does not end at the sea, there are many dirts beyond the sea.

name: daenerys
line: Lands, yes...

name: daenerys
line: It's not a chair. It's a... Throne

name: daenerys
line: A chair for a King to sit upon, or a Queen.

name: daenerys
line: Can't you help me make him understand?

name: daenerys
line: My brother was a fool, I know, but he was the rightful heir to the Seven Kingdoms.

name: daenerys
line: And because he had dragons.

name: daenerys
line: You don't believe it.

name: daenerys
line: My son already has his name, but I'll try your summerwine.

name: daenerys
line: Rise. I'd still like to taste that wine.

name: daenerys
line: You honor me, Ser.

name: daenerys
line: I hope to repay your kindness someday.

name: daenerys
line: Is something wrong?

name: daenerys
line: Do as he says.

name: daenerys
line: You will drink.

name: daenerys
line: What will they do to him?

name: daenerys
line: And when he falls?

name: daenerys
line: King Robert still wants me dead.This poisoner was the first. He won't be the last.

name: daenerys
line: I thought he'd leave me alone, now that my brother is gone.

name: daenerys
line: He will not have my son.

name: daenerys
line: The city is on the rise?

name: daenerys
line: Good. Shall we begin?

name: daenerys
line: I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

name: daenerys
line: You don’t approve?

name: daenerys
line: This is entirely different.

name: daenerys
line: We obviously didn’t communicate clearly. We’re here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

name: daenerys
line: My reign has just begun.

name: daenerys
line: Dracarys.

name: daenerys
line: You’ve brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

name: daenerys
line: And what’s wrong with you?

name: daenerys
line: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

name: daenerys
line: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

name: daenerys
line: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

name: daenerys
line: Will their ships be enough?

name: daenerys
line: So why shouldn’t I wait for him?

name: daenerys
line: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

name: daenerys
line: And you don’t want the Seven Kingdoms?

name: daenerys
line: And that’s all?

name: daenerys
line: Reasonable.

name: daenerys
line: She’s not demanding, she’s asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We’re not going to do that. We’re going to leave the world better than we found it.

name: daenerys
line: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

name: daenerys
line: No more.

name: daenerys
line: You’re not coming with us.

name: daenerys
line: You’re not going to Westeros. You’re staying here with the Second Sons. There’s finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

name: daenerys
line: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I’m going to rule in Westeros, I’ll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

name: daenerys
line: I don’t know. Maybe no one.

name: daenerys
line: I can’t bring a lover to Westeros.

name: daenerys
line: So that’s what you want? To be my mistress?

name: daenerys
line: I can’t.

name: daenerys
line: No one tells me to do anything.

name: daenerys
line: Don’t get angry.

name: daenerys
line: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

name: daenerys
line: We can’t call it Slaver’s Bay anymore, can we?

name: daenerys
line: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

name: daenerys
line: No tears.

name: daenerys
line: It’s not.

name: daenerys
line: Yes, you really are.

name: daenerys
line: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

name: daenerys
line: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

name: daenerys
line: It’s your counsel I need.

name: daenerys
line: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I’m not sure if it’s right.

name: daenerys
line: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

name: daenerys
line: What are you doing?! Take your hands off me! I will have your heads!

name: daenerys
line: You have made a mistake. One you will regret. I am the wife of the Great Khal.

name: daenerys
line: Because I am Daenerys Stormborn, the Breaker of Chains, the Queen of Meereen and the Mother of Dragons. My place is not here with you.

name: daenerys
line: Where else would I go? Every khaleesi becomes Dosh Khaleen.

name: daenerys
line: Do not touch me.

name: daenerys
line: I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, the Unburnt, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar of the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons.

name: daenerys
line: I will not lie with you. And I will bear no children, for you, or anyone else. Not until the sun rises in the west, and sets in the east.

name: daenerys
line: I was wife of Khal Drogo, son of Khal Bharbo.

name: daenerys
line: I know. I burnt his body.

name: daenerys
line: If you will escort me back to Meereen, I will see that your khalasar is given a thousand horses, as a sign of my gratitude.

name: daenerys
line: I banished you twice. You came back twice. And you saved my life. So I can’t take you back and I can’t send you away.

name: daenerys
line: Is there a cure?

name: daenerys
line: How long does it take?

name: daenerys
line: I’m sorry. I’m so sorry.

name: daenerys
line: Do not walk away from your queen, Jorah the Andal.

name: daenerys
line: You have not been dismissed. You pledged yourself to me. You swore to obey my commands for the rest of your life.

name: daenerys
line: Well, I command you to find the cure wherever it is in this world. I command you to heal yourself and then return to me. When I take the Seven Kingdoms, I need you by my side.

name: daenerys
line: That is more than most have.

name: daenerys
line: I need to make water.

name: daenerys
line: I will never run from Dothraki.

name: daenerys
line: I needed fresh air. The old women stink.

name: daenerys
line: You must have been very young when your Khal died.

name: daenerys
line: Too bad he didn’t die sooner.

name: daenerys
line: Mm-hmm.

name: daenerys
line: They do. Would you like to see them one day?

name: daenerys
line: No, don’t hurt her.

name: daenerys
line: We will never get out of Vaes Dothrak alive.

name: daenerys
line: No. We can do more than that. And you’re going to help me.

name: daenerys
line: And you...Have faith in me, Khaleesi. Do not betray me.

name: daenerys
line: Don’t you want to know what I think?

name: daenerys
line: No. I don’t want either of those things.

name: daenerys
line: I know where I am. I have been here before. This is where the Dosh Khaleen pronounced my child the Stallion Who Mounts the World.

name: daenerys
line: This is where Drogo promised to take his khalasar west to where the world ends. To ride wooden horses across the Black Salt Sea as no khal has done before. He promised to kill the men in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses. He swore to me before the Mother of Mountains.

name: daenerys
line: And here, now, what great matters do the Great Khals discuss? Which little villages you’ll raid, how many girls you’ll get to fuck, how many horses you’ll demand in tribute. You are small men. None of you are fit to lead the Dothraki. But I am. So I will.

name: daenerys
line: You’re not going to serve. You’re going to die.

name: daenerys
line: How many days’ ride to Meereen?

name: daenerys
line: How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

name: daenerys
line: And who has that many?

name: daenerys
line: Nobody yet.

name: daenerys
line: I take what is mine.

name: daenerys
line: What was I made for?

name: daenerys
line: Wait here.

name: daenerys
line: Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.

name: daenerys
line: I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?

name: daenerys
line: Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?

name: daenerys
line: Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?

name: daenerys
line: Are you with me?

name: daenerys
line: Now and always?

name: arya
line: Don't! Don't kill him.

name: arya
line: You're so dangerous, aren't you? Saying scary things to little girls. Killing little boys and old people.  A real hard man you are.

name: arya
line: You're wrong.  I know a killer. A real killer.

name: arya
line: You'd be like a kitten to him.  He'd kill you with his little finger.

name: arya
line: No.

name: arya
line: Don't kill him!  Please.  Please don't.

name: arya
line: No one’s going to believe you’re a hog farmer if you eat them all.

name: arya
line: I know they’re still there.

name: arya
line: I’m not afraid.

name: arya
line: I knew fear when I saw it in you.  You’re afraid of fire.

name: arya
line: When Beric’s sword went up in flames, you looked like a scared little girl.

name: arya
line: And I know why, too.  I heard what your brother did to you.  Pressed your face to the fire like you’re a nice juicy mutton chop.

name: arya
line: Might do.

name: arya
line: Someday I’m gonna put a sword through your eye and out the back of your skull.

name: arya
line: There's no one worse than you.

name: arya
line: You're lying.

name: arya
line: Is that the Blackwater?

name: arya
line: Back to King's Landing to Joffrey and the queen.

name: arya
line: But why?

name: arya
line: Why would they be at the Twins?

name: arya
line: But I'm hungry.

name: arya
line: I've got money.

name: arya
line: It's worth a lot.

name: arya
line: Sorry.

name: arya
line: From you.

name: arya
line: The first man.

name: arya
line: (whispers) Valar morghulis.

name: arya
line: Why are you helping him? He takes us prisoner and now he's our friend?

name: arya
line: What am I?

name: arya
line: So I can walk away, then?

name: arya
line: You remember the last time you were here?

name: arya
line: Winterfell.

name: arya
line: What is it?

name: arya
line: That's the tail?

name: arya
line: Good-bye, Hot Pie.

name: arya
line: Hey, Hot Pie. It's really good.

name: arya
line: Would you please shut up about it?

name: arya
line: I'm not listening.

name: arya
line: Shut up.

name: arya
line: Jaqen got us out of Harrenhal, so why are you complaining?

name: arya
line: Where are we going?

name: arya
line: If we were going north, we should have come to the Red Fork River by now.

name: arya
line: It's 100 feet wide. How could we have passed it? If we hit the Red Fork, we can follow it west to Riverrun. My mother grew up there. My grandfather he's a lord. He'll protect us.

name: arya
line: Shut up.

name: arya
line: Shh.

name: arya
line: Don't.

name: arya
line: You go on down the road. Just keep on singing so we know where you are. Leave us be and I won't kill you.

name: arya
line: What friends?

name: arya
line: Who are you?

name: arya
line: No, who do you fight for?

name: arya
line: I don't drink ale.

name: arya
line: We're not children.

name: arya

name: arya

So he brought me here. My father prayed to the many faced god. And I drank the water from this fountain. It healed me.

line: One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick.  I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground.  Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw.  There was one arrow in the target.  There was no one around, just like now.  No one to stop me.  So I started shooting.  And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again.  I wasn't very good.  Finally I hit the bullseye.  It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th.  I don't remember.  But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.

name: arya
line: I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me.  I knew what I was doing was against the rules.  But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong.  The rules were wrong.  I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it.  Now he's dead.  Killed by the Lannisters with your help.

name: arya
line: That's your pretty handwriting.  Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn't write as well as you.  "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart.  Our good King Robert is dead.  Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --

name: arya
line: "Father has been charged with treason.  He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne.  The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort.  I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark.  Your faithful sister, Sansa."

name: olenna
line: So their son will be your nephew. After you're wed to Cersei, of course. And you will be the king's stepfather and brother-in-law. When you marry the king, Joffrey's mother will become his sister-in-law and your son will be Loras' nephew?  Grandson?  I'm not sure. But your brother will become your father-in-law. That much is beyond dispute.

name: olenna
line: Kiss me, child.

line: It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens. We're very sorry for your losses.

name: olenna
line: Gallant, yes. And charming and very clean. He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

name: olenna
line: Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick. That does not make him wise. As to your fathead father-

name: olenna
line: She might think we have some wits about us. One of us, at any rate. It was treason. I warned them. Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother. How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair? We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me. But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders. So here we are to see things through. What do you say to that, Sansa? Shall we have some lemon cakes?

name: olenna
line: So we've been told. (To the SERVANT) Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death? Here, Sansa, come sit with me. I'm much less boring than these others.

name: olenna
line: Do you know my son? The Lord of Highgarden?

name: olenna
line: No great pleasure, believe me. A ponderous oaf. His father was an oaf as well. My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking. They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him. And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse. Now I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

name: olenna
line: You, you. Who else would know better? We've heard some troubling tales. Is there any truth to them? Has this boy mistreated you?

name: olenna
line: Has he ripped out your tongue?

name: olenna

name: olenna

name: olenna
line: Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden is determined that Margaery shall be queen. Even so, we thank you for the truth. Ah, here comes my cheese.

name: olenna
line: Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.

name: olenna
line: No need to speak. Are there any figs? Fetch some. I always take figs midafternoon. They help move the bowels. To what do I owe this summons?

name: olenna
line: I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?

name: olenna
line: Naturally.

name: olenna
line: What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?

name: olenna
line: Good.

name: olenna
line: And?

name: olenna
line: Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.

name: olenna
line: I can't think how it slipped my mind. What is it, 12,000 infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied? 2,000 in support. Provisions so this city might survive the winter. A million bushels of wheat. Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye. 20,000 head of cattle. 50,000 sheep. You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses. I'm quite familiar with them.

name: olenna
line: As is a royal wedding. The people are hungry for more than just food. They crave distractions. And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own. And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces. A royal wedding is much safer. Wouldn't you say?

name: olenna
line: And traditionally paid for by the royal family.

name: olenna
line: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper. Where did you go for them, Volantis?

name: olenna
line: Oh, very well. I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part. We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned. Is that sufficient?

name: olenna
line: Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.

name: olenna
line: There appears to be a good deal of room elsewhere on the premises for everyone else.

name: olenna
line: No, the rest are there to look adoringly upon the 700 to remind them how superior they must be to have the best seats.

name: olenna
line: You were married here, Your Grace?

name: olenna
line: Must seem like only yesterday.

name: olenna
line: Your husband, was he buried here as well?

name: olenna
line: Such a tragedy.

name: olenna
line: I should say not. My son's a hunter. It helps him forget he's never been within a mile of a real battle.

name: olenna
line: All he laid siege to was the banquet table in the command tent.

name: olenna
line: I told him to stay out of Robert's rebellion. He had no business fighting an actual warrior. We mothers do what we can to keep our sons from the grave. But they do seem to yearn for it. We shower them with good sense, and it slides right off like rain off a wing.

name: olenna
line: A ridiculous arrangement, to my mind.

name: olenna
line: Another golden rose. How original. I eat from plates stamped with roses. I sleep in sheets embroidered with roses. I have a golden rose painted on my chamber pot, as if that makes it smell any better. Roses are boring, dear. 'Growing strong.' Ha! The dullest words of any house. 'Winter is coming!' Now that's memorable. 'We do not sow.' Strong. Strong. Those are houses you watch out for. Direwolves and krakens, fierce beasts. But a golden rose growing strong--ha, that strikes fear in the heart.

name: olenna
line: Look, little loves. A spider in the garden. Run along now. Grow strong.

name: olenna
line: The city is made brighter by my presence? Is that your usual line, Lord Varys? Are you here to seduce me?

name: olenna
line: Oh, no, please. Seduce away. It's been so long. Though I rather think it's all for naught. What happens when the nonexistent bumps against the decrepit? A question for the philosophers. But you've come mincing all this way for something. So?

name: olenna
line: No. Come, I've heard you're such a clever man. I'm curious why you've sought me out.

name: olenna
line: Have I? Because I spoke to her once in this garden and one of your little spies came running to tell you? Why shouldn't I take an interest? She's an interesting girl.

name: olenna
line: No, not particularly. But she's had an interesting childhood.

name: olenna
line: Come, come. You surrender rather easily. Walk with me. I know the walls have ears, but apparently the shrubbery does, too.

name: olenna
line: Which is Sansa Stark?

name: olenna
line: Yes. Ned Stark had many admirers, and how many stepped forward when the executioner came for his head?

name: olenna
line: How?

name: olenna
line: That's hardly surprising. She's a beautiful girl with a famous name.

name: olenna
line: It almost feels as if you're about to arrive at the point.

name: olenna
line: And why have you come to me with this matter?

name: olenna
line: (laughs)

name: olenna
line: And if Littlefinger marries her, he'll have the key in his pocket.

name: olenna
line: You must despise him. You're working so hard to undermine him.

name: olenna
line: You are a clever man, Lord Varys.

name: olenna
line: One doesn't need to be clever for that. It's all rather obvious, isn't it?

name: olenna
line: Impossible.

name: olenna
line: My grandson is the pride of Highgarden. The most desirable bachelor in all seven kingdoms. Your daughter--

name: olenna
line: Old.

name: olenna
line: Old. I'm something of an expert on the subject. Her change will be upon her before long. I'll spare you the details of what will happen then. You men may have a stomach for bloodshed and slaughter, but this is another matter entirely.

name: olenna
line: Oh, not at all. A sword swallower through and through.

name: olenna
line: Did you grow up with boy cousins, Lord Tywin? Sons of your father's bannermen, squires, stable boys?

name: olenna
line: And you never--

name: olenna
line: Not once? Not in any way?

name: olenna
line: I congratulate you upon your restraint. But it's a natural thing, two boys having a go at each other beneath the sheets.

name: olenna
line: Lie or not, you must admit many people find it quite convincing. Convincing enough to put swords in their hands and send them off to kill Lannisters and Tyrells thanks to our new affiliation.

name: olenna
line: As an authority on myself, I must disagree.

name: olenna
line: And if Cersei is too old to give Loras children, we're throwing another prized flower into the dirt. It is a chance we simply cannot take.

name: olenna
line: Oh

name: olenna
line: You would have your grandson protected by someone who disgusts you?

name: olenna
line: More than you were with Renly. Less than you would have been if Joffrey had done you the courtesy of consummating the marriage before dying. In any case, this would not be an opportune moment to press the issue.

name: olenna
line: The world is overflowing with horrible things. But they're all a tray of cakes next to death. They brought me your grandfather's body when he died, you know? Made me look at it.

name: olenna
line: They took me to the Great Hall and there he was. The man I'd married and suffered to father my children. A great doughy lump I'd sat next to at endless dinners and tedious gatherings. There he was... lying on a table.

name: olenna
line: Nonsense. Your circumstances have improved markedly. You may not have enjoyed watching him die, but you enjoyed it more than you would have enjoyed being married to him, I can promise you that.

name: olenna
line: Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us. You did wonderful work on Joffrey. The next one should be easier.

name: olenna
line: It feels proportionate.

name: olenna
line: The expected extravagance.

name: olenna
line: You ought to try enjoying something before you die. You might find it suits you.

name: olenna
line: Not now, Mace. Lord Tywin and I are speaking.

name: olenna
line: Anyway, I don't know what you're complaining about. I'm paying my share.

name: olenna
line: No, your heartfelt thank-you is it's own reward. I would imagine I'd be hearing it again before long. Wars are rather expensive. "The Iron Bank will have it's due." How they love to remind everyone. Almost as much as you Lannisters with your debts.

name: olenna
line: We both know you're smarter than that. Come, Tywin, let us celebrate young love.

name: olenna
line: You look exquisite, child. The wind has been at you, though. I haven't had the opportunity to tell you how sorry I was to hear about your brother. War is war, but killing a man at a wedding, horrid. What sort of monster would do such a thing? As if men need more reasons to fear marriage.

name: olenna
line: Lord Tyrion, you see? Not as bad as all that. Perhaps if your pauper husband were to sell his mule and his last pair of shoes, he might be able to afford to bring you to Highgarden for a visit. Now that peace has come and all is right with the world, it would do you good to see some of it. You must excuse me. It's time I ate some of this food I paid for.

name: olenna
line: Help the poor boy.

name: olenna
line: Idiots, help your king. -

name: olenna
line: No. No. You're a queen, not an ox.

name: olenna
line: Your grandfather gave me a necklace just like this one for my 51st nameday.

name: olenna
line: Nonsense.

name: olenna
line: My little dears. Go and speak to the jewelers of King's Landing. Tell them who you are, tell them who sent you. The one who brings me the best necklace will get to keep the next best.

name: olenna
line: The Margaery Tyrell who walks into the sept a fortnight from now will inspire 1,000 songs. Now, how sad it will be if she's wearing rubbish like that.

name: olenna
line: You watch that. Even here, even with me.

name: olenna
line: My word.

name: olenna
line: We know who you are. We've heard all about you. But hearing is one thing. Aren't you just marvelous? Absolutely singular.

name: olenna
line: I hear you knocked my grandson into the dirt like the silly little boy he is.

name: olenna
line: You dare not refuse.

name: olenna
line: The time has come, my dear. There's nothing more tedious than a trial. Except perhaps these gardens. If I have to take one more leisurely stroll through these gardens, I'll fling myself from the cliffs.

name: olenna
line: Have you been to see Tommen yet?

name: olenna
line: I wasn't originally meant to marry your grandfather Luthor, you know. He was engaged to my sister, your great-aunt Viola. I was to be given to some Targaryen or other. Marrying a Targaryen was all the rage back then. But the momentI saw my intended, with his twitchy little ferret's face and ludicrous silver hair, I knew he wouldn't do. So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

name: olenna
line: How absentminded of me.

name: olenna
line: The following morning, Luthor never made it down the stairs to propose to my sister 'cause the boy couldn't bloody walk.

name: olenna
line: And once he could, the only thing he wanted was what I'd given him the night before. I was good. I was very, very good. You are even better. But you need to act quickly. Cersei may be vicious, but she's not stupid. She'll turn the boy against you as soon as she can. And by the time you're married, it'll be too late. Luckily for you ,the Queen Regent is rather distracted at the moment, mourning her dear departed boy. Accusing her brother of his murder, which he didn't commit.

name: olenna
line: He could have done,but he didn't.

name: olenna
line: But I do know. You don't think I'd let you marry that beast, do you?

name: olenna
line: Shh. Don't you worry yourself about all that. You just do what needs to be done.

name: olenna
line: Oh! You can smell the shit from 5 miles away. Well, why are we stopped, go on.

name: olenna
line: Rumors and gossip, that’s all they got. It’s theater, nothing more. If they arrested all the pillow biters in King’s Landing there’d be no room left in the dungeons for anyone else.

name: olenna
line: Renly Baratheon shagged half the stable boys in the Seven Kingdoms. Everyone knew. No one cared.

name: olenna
line: And Loras is the queen’s brother. No, no, no, no, this is unacceptable.

name: olenna
line: Of course she is. She wants to drag our names through the dirt. Put us in our place. Get some rest, dear, you look appalling. Let me deal with Cersei Lannister.

name: olenna
line: Your Grace, I have travelled a long way.

name: olenna
line: Put the pen down, dear, we all know you aren’t writing anything.

name: olenna
line: And the famous tart Queen Cersei.

name: olenna
line: I know you’re behind this absurd incarceration of my grandson.

name: olenna
line: You’ll get your apology when I get Loras.

name: olenna
line: Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

name: olenna
line: Do you expect the alliance to continue after you’ve thrown our future into prison?

name: olenna
line: What veil?

name: olenna
line: I didn’t trust your father. I didn’t particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

name: olenna
line: Well I think that’s quite enough of that.

name: olenna
line: What are you doing? Let us pass.

name: olenna
line: You there! Where would I find the High Septon, or High Sparrow, or whatever bloody fool name he’s got.

name: olenna
line: You should have the decency to stand when you talk to a lady.

name: olenna
line: Don’t spar with me little fellow.

name: olenna
line: Hips.

name: olenna
line: A man of the people, is that your game? It’s an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei’s dirty work for her.

name: olenna
line: Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

name: olenna
line: I’m here for my grandson and granddaughter.

name: olenna
line: Don’t you walk away from me.

name: olenna
line: What is it you want? Gold? I’ll make you the richest septon who ever lived.

name: olenna
line: What then?

name: olenna
line: How do they communicate their demands? By raven or horse?

name: olenna
line: I’ve read the seven pointed star.

name: olenna
line: Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

name: olenna
line: If it’s equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I’ll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

name: olenna
line: No you’re not.

name: olenna
line: Not for your clientele, clearly.

name: olenna
line: You’ve always been rather impressed with yourself, haven’t you?

name: olenna
line: Don’t pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you’d return to the capital once things started going wrong.

name: olenna
line: I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they’ll never even find what’s left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

name: olenna
line: And what did she want?

name: olenna
line: What kind of gift?

name: olenna
line: It's done?

name: olenna
line: And now the rains weep for our whores.  Did we fight well?

name: olenna
line: It was never our forte.  Golden roses indeed.  Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

name: olenna
line: So you'll just let them take it?

name: olenna
line: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

name: olenna
line: Yes.  You must be very wise by now.

name: olenna
line: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry?  I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough.  No more learning from my mistakes, eh?  How will you do it?  With that sword?

name: olenna
line: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it?  Not that he ever used it.  What did he call it?

name: olenna
line: He really was a cunt, wasn't he?  I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders.  I never lost a night's sleep over them.  They were necessary.  And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did.  But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining.  That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination.  She's a monster, you do know that?

name: olenna
line: You love her.  You really do love her.  You poor fool.  She'll be the end of you.

name: olenna
line: What better person to discuss it with?  What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room?  But perhaps you're right.  If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

name: olenna
line: She's a disease.  I regret my role in spreading it.  You will too.

name: olenna
line: How will it happen?

name: olenna
line: Will there be pain?

name: olenna
line: That's good.

name: olenna
line: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple.  It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father.  It was horrible enough for me.  A shocking scene.  Not at all what I intended.  You see, I'd never seen the posion work before.  Tell Cersei.  I want her to know it was me.

name: olenna
line: That's very nice to hear.  Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter.  The common people loved her, the nobles loved her.  And what is left of her now?  Ashes.  Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really.  They won't obey you unless they fear you.

name: olenna
line: So, your master plan is to use our armies?  Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

name: olenna
line: Peace.  Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his?  Peace never lasts, my dear.  Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

name: olenna
line: He's a clever man, your Hand.  I've known a great many clever men.  I've outlived them all.  Do you know why?  I ignored them.  The lords of Westeros are sheep.  Are you a sheep?  No.  You're a dragon.  Be a dragon.

name: olenna
line: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

name: olenna
line: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

name: olenna
line: What is your name again? Barbaro?

name: olenna
line: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don’t presume to tell me what I need.

name: olenna
line: Do shut up, dear.

name: olenna
line: Anything from you?

name: olenna
line: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

name: olenna
line: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I’m after now.

name: olenna
line: And what is my heart’s desire?

name: olenna
line: He’s beaten us. That’s what’s happening.

name: olenna
line: Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.

name: olenna
line: Oh, this is madness!

name: olenna
line: You’re not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

name: olenna
line: ...until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.

name: olenna
line: What have they done to you?

name: olenna
line: We marched for you.

name: olenna
line: And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?

name: olenna
line: Have you lost your mind?

name: olenna
line: He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

name: olenna
line: As a mindless fanatic.

name: olenna
line: You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.

name: olenna
line: I will never leave you. Never.

name: olenna
line: I’ll see you soon, my dear.

name: olenna
line: That is hardly your concern.

name: olenna
line: Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

name: olenna
line: Good.

name: olenna
line: I wonder if you’re the worst person I’ve ever met. At a certain age, it’s hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I’ll never forget it.

name: olenna
line: I’m leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you’re half as bright as you think you are, you’ll find your way out of here, too.

name: olenna
line: What’ll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother’s gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You’re surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You’re going to kill them all by yourself? You’ve lost, Cersei. It’s the only joy I can find in all this misery.

name: qyburn
line: ( coughing ) Water. Water.

name: qyburn
line: Qyburn.

name: qyburn
line: Lucky?

name: qyburn
line: No. The corruption has spread. I fear it must be cut away. The safest course would be to take the whole arm off.

name: qyburn
line: The Citadel stripped me of it. They found some of my experiments too bold. I can leave your upper arm, make the cut at your elbow.

name: qyburn
line: With any luck, that will suffice. You'll need milk of the poppy.

name: qyburn
line: There will be pain.

name: qyburn
line: Quite a bit of pain.

name: qyburn
line: Here. Let me.

name: qyburn
line: It will take time.

name: qyburn
line: How is the pain, my lord?

name: qyburn
line: Well, we've stymied the corruption.

name: qyburn
line: All the good it's done me.

name: qyburn
line: Faint praise, my lord.

name: qyburn
line: No, my lord. That's not my weakness.

name: qyburn
line: Curiosity. The only way to treat disease is to understand disease. And the only way to understand it is to study the afflicted.

name: qyburn
line: On dying men.

name: qyburn
line: My studies have given me insight that has saved many lives.

name: qyburn
line: How many men have you killed, my lord?

name: qyburn
line: Countless.

name: qyburn
line: And how many lives have you saved?

name: qyburn
line: A bird flew off and a bird flew back.  Lord Selwyn Tarth offered 300 gold dragons for his daughter's safe return.

name: qyburn
line: A fair offer. Locke won't take it.

name: qyburn
line: He's convinced Lord Tarth owns all the sapphire mines in Westeros.

name: qyburn
line: He feels he's being cheated.

name: qyburn
line: These men have been at war a long time. Most of them will be dead by winter. She'll be their entertainment tonight. Beyond tonight, I don't think they care very much.

name: qyburn
line: It is, yes, manticore.

name: qyburn
line: Yes there is.

name: qyburn
line: Saving him.

name: qyburn
line: That's for the best. No Maester knows how to save him.

name: qyburn
line: Difficult to say, your grace, but if my past work is any guide. We stand a chance.

name: qyburn
line: Thank you, your grace. You should know, the process may change him, somewhat.

name: qyburn
line: Oh no.

name: qyburn
line: A work of art, really. The craftsmanship is excellent.

name: qyburn
line: The symptoms have abated?

name: qyburn
line: Not a maester, Your Grace, but happy to help whenever I can.

name: qyburn
line: The trial will take place. The High Sparrow will be presenting a substantial case against you.

name: qyburn
line: Fornication, treason, incest, the murder of King Robert.

name: qyburn
line: Of course, Your Grace. My concern is that The Faith does not adhere to the same standards of proof as the crown. And I hope you’ll excuse me for saying it, but belief is so often the death of reason.

name: qyburn
line: I’m afraid not. Your Grace, Grand Maester Pycelle has summoned your Uncle Kevan back from Casterly Rock to serve as Hand of the King. He now presides over the small council.

name: qyburn
line: I implored him to visit you but he would not.

name: qyburn
line: Your arrest, and Queen Margaery’s arrest, the king has not taken well. He remains in his chambers, his servants often find his food in the hall. Left untouched.

name: qyburn
line: I tried my grace, he wouldn’t see me. He wouldn’t see anyone.

name: qyburn
line: There is a way, Your Grace. A way out.

name: qyburn
line: Goodbye my queen. The work continues.

name: qyburn
line: Your Grace. It’s good to have you back. Come. We’ll take you inside. I need to have a look at those feet.

name: qyburn
line: May I have the honor of presenting the newest member of the Kingsguard.

name: qyburn
line: If it please Your Grace, he’s taken a holy vow of silence. He has sworn that he will not speak until all his Grace’s enemies are dead, and the evil has been driven from the realm.

name: qyburn
line: It doesn't matter. (Mace sits down).

name: qyburn
line: I heard this all began in Littlefinger's brothel.

name: qyburn
line: So you were administering to the needs of these devout prostitutes?

name: qyburn
line: Your Grace.

name: qyburn
line: At once, Your Grace. (Walks to his desk).

name: qyburn
line: Very well.

name: qyburn
line: More than I've expected. Still a way to go, but…

name: qyburn
line: Shh. Easy, friend.

name: qyburn
line: Pardon me, Your Grace. I would take it, if you don't mind. It could prove useful for my work.

name: qyburn
line: Over there will be fine.

name: qyburn
line: The Long Farewell.

name: qyburn
line: Difficult to say.  Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

name: qyburn
line: Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

name: qyburn
line: We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

name: qyburn
line: Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

name: qyburn
line: Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

name: qyburn
line: Balerion the Dread.  The beast that Aegon rode across the sea.  Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel.  Powerful, but not invincible.

name: qyburn
line: Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen.  If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

name: qyburn
line: The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace.  If you'd kindly pull that lever.

name: qyburn

line: Apologies for the interruption, but the queen did urge me to hurry.

name: qyburn
line: Poor girl. The pox will take her within the year.

name: qyburn
line: The queen's brothers made promises to you and broke them. Her Grace wants to rectify their mistake.

name: qyburn
line: That was Ser Jaime's doing, not hers. When Queen Cersei wants something, she pays in advance and in gold. Several chests of it, in fact. Waiting for you in a wagon just outside.

name: qyburn
line: She has other plans for the Targaryen girl.

name: qyburn
line: Our queen's brothers are unlikely to survive their Northern adventures. But in the event that they do-

line: She has a keen sense of poetic justice.

name: qyburn
line: When the Citadel expelled me, I thought I would die poor and alone, but in exchange for my service, Queen Cersei made me her Hand. What would she do for the man who rids her of her treasonous brothers?

name: qyburn
line: Your people have heard the Usurper is coming. They are grateful for your protection within the walls of the Red Keep.

name: qyburn
line: My lord.

line: Queen Cersei demands Daenerys's unconditional surrender. If she refuses, Missandei of Naath will die here and now.

name: qyburn
line: My lord, I am only a mouthpiece for our queen.

name: qyburn
line: Cersei is Queen of the Seven Kingdoms. You are her subject.

name: qyburn
line: We understand nothing of the sort. Your queen's last dragon is vulnerable. Your armies are battle-weary and depleted, while ours have been reinforced with the Golden Compan--

name: qyburn
line: Your Grace, several members of the Faith Militant have been permitted entry to the Red Keep.

name: qyburn
line: They demand to see you, Your Grace.

name: qyburn
line: He is, Your Grace. He’s currently in his chambers at prayer.

line: Your Grace...that old rumor you told me about. My little birds investigated.

name: qyburn

name: qyburn

name: qyburn
line: Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

name: qyburn
line: This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

name: qyburn
line: Your Grace, there’s no need--

line: What are your thoughts concerning the king’s funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

name: qyburn
line: I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: qyburn
line: Long may she reign.

name: sansa
line: Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.

name: sansa
line: You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.

name: sansa
line: It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*

line: So you'll be outside the gates fighting in the vanguard?

line: I'm sorry, Your Grace. You're right, I'm stupid. Of course you'll be in the vanguard. They say my brother Robb always goes where the fighting is thickest. And he is only a pretender.

name: sansa
line: Joffrey will. The worst ones always live.

name: sansa
line: I don't know why she wants me here. She's always saying how stupid I am. She hates me.

name: sansa
line: I doubt it.

name: sansa
line: Why would she be jealous?

name: sansa
line: Yes.

name: sansa
line: But we have guards to defend us.

name: sansa
line: You said he was here to protect us.

name: sansa
line: My queen. What are you doing? Praying.

name: sansa
line: Praying.

name: sansa
line: For the gods to have mercy on us all.

name: sansa
line: Yes, Your Grace.

name: sansa
line: Of course, Your Grace.

name: sansa
line: Joffrey is my

name: sansa
line: Your father doesn't believe in the gods?

name: sansa
line: They are your guests under your protection. You asked them here.

name: sansa
line: And if the city should fall?

name: sansa
line: You were Robert's queen.

name: sansa
line: Don't be afraid. The queen has raised the drawbridge. This is the safest place we can be. Joffrey's not hurt. He's fighting bravely. His knights have rallied behind him. They will save the city. Shall we sing a hymn? Gentle mother, fount of mercy...

name: sansa
line: Come with me.

name: sansa
line: The queen said they'd rape everyone.

name: sansa
line: What are you doing here?

name: sansa
line: Where?

name: sansa
line: What about the king?

name: sansa
line: I'll be safe here. Stannis won't hurt me.

name: sansa
line: You won't hurt me.

name: sansa
line: They're right. I'm not good enough for him.

name: sansa
line: But, if he's not marrying me

name: sansa
line: King's Landing is my home now.

name: sansa
line: Pardon, Your Grace. I'm sure your dress will be beautiful, Myrcella. I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the gods.

name: sansa
line: Come in.

name: sansa
line: Who are you?

name: sansa
line: I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden. You're not from here.

name: sansa
line: What are you doing?

name: sansa
line: I shouldn't have to tell you to do things. You should just do them.

name: sansa
line: Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.

name: sansa
line: No.

name: sansa
line: Not now.

name: sansa
line: Clean the table. Have you ever been a handmaiden before?

name: sansa
line: For whom?

name: sansa
line: Lady Zuriff

name: sansa
line: There is no Lady Zuriff in this city.

name: sansa
line: I don't know how they did things in that city, but in this city, handmaidens wait on ladies, not the other way around. And I don't have time to answer a thousand questions and teach you how to do your job.

name: sansa
line: Just brush my hair.

name: sansa
line: It was well struck, Your Grace.

name: sansa
line: Yes, Your Grace.

name: sansa
line: You can't!

name: sansa
line: I only meant… it would be bad luck to kill a man on your name day.

name: sansa
line: My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.

name: sansa
line: Your Grace, whatever my traitor brother has done, I had no part. You know that. I beg you, please

name: sansa
line: (Cries.)

name: sansa
line: I am loyal to King Joffrey, my one true love.

name: sansa
line: My little brother cried when I left Winterfell.

name: sansa
line: It seems a normal thing.

name: sansa
line: No.

name: sansa
line: Please! No! No!

name: sansa
line: Ow!

name: sansa
line: I thought they were going to kill me.

name: sansa
line: He hated me, the man who hit me. I saw it in his eyes. Hated me. He never met me before, but he wanted to hurt me.

name: sansa
line: Why? Why would a stranger

name: sansa
line: I would have given them bread if I had it. I hate the king more than any of them.

name: sansa
line: But you're not the wrong people.

name: sansa
line: I beg pardon, ser. I should have come to you after to thank you for saving me. You were so brave.

name: sansa
line: Does it give you joy to scare people?

name: sansa
line: (gasps)

name: sansa
line: It was his duty. He never liked it.

name: sansa
line: Why are you always so hateful?

name: sansa
line: No, no!

name: sansa
line: No. Oh, no.

name: sansa
line: If the Queen sees, I can have Joffrey's children now.

name: sansa
line: My mother told me, but I thought it would be different.

name: sansa
line: I thought it would be less Less messy.

name: sansa
line: I'm fit to bear children for the king?

name: sansa
line: (nods)

name: sansa
line: His Grace was not with you?

name: sansa
line: I love His Grace with all my heart.

name: sansa
line: But shouldn't I love Joffrey, Your Grace?

name: sansa
line: How much do we have?

name: sansa
line: What does that mean?

name: sansa
line: What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

name: sansa
line: You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

name: sansa
line: We must prepare for that eventuality.  Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be.  We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north.  If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

name: sansa
line: Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

name: sansa
line: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

name: sansa
line: Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

name: sansa
line: So they should be.

name: sansa
line: You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

name: sansa
line: That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous?  Thank you for your wise council.

name: sansa
line: I wish Jon was here.

name: sansa
line: Your father's last living true born son.  You're Lord of Winterfell.

name: sansa
line: I don't know what that means.

name: sansa
line: Try, please, for me.

name: sansa
line: How do you know all of this?

name: sansa
line: I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

name: sansa
line: Bran --

name: sansa
line: I have to go back inside, Bran.

name: sansa
line: Do you think it's really Tyrion?  It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

name: sansa
line: "All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes."  What does that mean?

name: sansa
line: Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters.  He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk.  "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne.  Join us.  Together we can end her tyranny."

name: sansa
line: You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

name: sansa
line: Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather?  The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

name: sansa
line: She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms.  The north is one of those seven kingdoms.  This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

name: sansa
line: Then send an emissary.  Don't go yourself.

name: sansa
line: You're abandoning your people.  Your abandoning your home.

name: sansa
line: Whose?

name: sansa
line: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

name: sansa
line: And then they broke faith.

name: sansa
line: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

name: sansa
line: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

name: sansa
line: Will you start wearing a crown?

name: sansa
line: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

name: sansa
line: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

name: sansa
line: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

name: sansa
line: You're good at this, you know.

name: sansa
line: At ruling.

name: sansa
line: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

name: sansa
line: Why are you laughing?

name: sansa
line: He never said that to me.

name: sansa
line: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

name: sansa
line: I'm not trying to undermine you.

name: sansa
line: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

name: sansa
line: Would that be so terrible?

name: sansa
line: What does she want?

name: sansa
line: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

name: sansa
line: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

name: sansa
line: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

name: sansa
line: I learned a great deal from her.

name: sansa
line: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

name: sansa
line: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

name: sansa
line: At the moment, peace and quiet.

name: sansa
line: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

name: sansa
line: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

name: sansa
line: I know exactly what he wants.

name: sansa
line: You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king.  He is doing what he thinks is best.

name: sansa
line: I warned Jon this would happen.  He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

name: sansa
line: Well, he's not making it easy.  The northern lords are proud.

line: And?

line: Don't do that.

name: sansa
line: Say what you mean.

line: Are you angry with me?

name: sansa
line: I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

name: sansa
line: Glover has 500 men.  Royce has 2,000.  Offend them and Jon loses his army.

name: sansa
line: Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands.  We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together.  Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

name: sansa
line: How can you even think such a horrible thing?

line: He did.  I hope he comes back soon.  I remember how happy he was to see me.  When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

line: You were there?

line: And what did you do?  Did you come running to the rescue?  Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?

name: sansa
line: But you didn't.  Just like me.

name: sansa
line: You should be on your knees thanking me.  We're standing in Winterfell again because of me.  You didn't win it back.  Jon didn't win it back.  He lost the Battle of the Bastards.  The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?

name: sansa
line: Training.  Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.

line: You never would have survived what I survived.

line: What are you doing to do with that letter.

line: Arya --

name: sansa
line: Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting?  This is exactly what she wants.  This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --

line: You're angry.  Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.

name: sansa
line: No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?

name: sansa
line: This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.

name: sansa
line: What does that have to do with anything?

name: sansa
line: You think he wants to marry her?

name: sansa
line: Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.

name: sansa
line: Do you know what she is now? Do you know what the Faceless Men are?

name: sansa
line: They're killers. And Arya was one of them. What do you think she's after?

name: sansa
line: She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.

name: sansa
line: To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.

name: sansa
line: To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.

name: sansa

name: sansa
line: It's not what I want. It's what honor demands.

name: sansa
line: That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.

name: sansa
line: You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?

name: sansa
line: Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?

name: sansa
line: You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.

name: sansa
line: You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.

name: sansa
line: You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.

name: sansa
line: Protected me? By selling me to the Boltons?

name: sansa
line: Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.

name: sansa
line: I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.

name: sansa
line: (Nods.)

name: sansa
line: And yet, you betrayed her.

name: sansa
line: And yet, you betrayed me.

name: sansa
line: When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.

name: sansa
line: It's just strange. In his own horrible way, I believe he loved me.

name: sansa
line: You did it.

name: sansa
line: Does that bother you?

name: sansa
line: You would have. You're the strongest person I know.

name: sansa
line: Well, don't get used to it. You're still very strange and annoying.

name: sansa
line: Father

name: sansa
line: Me, too.

name: sansa
line: You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.

name: sansa
line: You vouch for him?

name: sansa
line: You would fight beside him?

name: sansa
line: I trust you with my life. If you trust him with yours, we should let him stay.

name: sansa
line: Keep them open for as long as you can. There are still people coming in from the countryside.

name: sansa
line: Brienne has been loyal to me, always. I trust her more than anyone.

name: sansa
line: Tyrion is a good man. He was never anything but decent towards me.

name: sansa
line: You never should have either.

name: sansa
line: Families are complicated.

name: sansa
line: A sad thing to have in common.

name: sansa
line: He loves you, you know that.

name: sansa
line: Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.

name: sansa
line: I should have thanked you the moment you arrived. That was a mistake.

name: sansa
line: Who was the first?

name: sansa
line: And what happens afterwards? We defeat the dead, we destroy Cersei. What happens then?

name: sansa
line: What about the North? It was taken from us, and we took it back. And we said we'd never bow to anyone else again. What about the North?

name: sansa
line: You want us to use you as bait?

name: sansa
line: Lurking somewhere.

name: sansa
line: Winterfell is yours, Your Grace.

name: sansa
line: As soon as we heard about the Wall, I called all our banners to retreat to Winterfell. Lord Umber when can we expect your people to arrive?

name: sansa
line: You'll have as many as we can spare. Hurry back to Last Hearth and bring your people here.

name: sansa
line: May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?

name: sansa
line: So does Hand of the Queen. Depending on the queen, I suppose.

name: sansa
line: It had its moments.

name: sansa
line: Apologies for leaving like that.

name: sansa
line: We both survived.

line: Cersei told you her army was coming north to fight for you?

name: sansa
line: And you believed her?

name: sansa
line: I used to think you were the cleverest man alive.

name: sansa
line: Come in.

name: sansa
line: Lord Glover wishes us good fortune, but he's staying in Deepwood Motte with his men.

name: sansa
line: "I will stand behind Jon Snow," he said.

name: sansa
line: "The King in the North."

name: sansa
line: You didn't tell me you were going to abandon your crown.

name: sansa
line: And a Targaryen queen.

line: You know I do.

name: sansa
line: No, she's much prettier.

name: sansa
line: Did you bend the knee to save the North or because you love her?

name: sansa
line: Go on. I believe in you.

name: sansa

name: sansa
line: And what's that?

name: sansa
line: That was a long time ago. I've seen much worse than you since then.

name: sansa
line: And he got what he deserved. I gave it to him.

name: sansa
line: Hounds.

name: sansa
line: Without Littlefinger, and Ramsay and the rest, I would have stayed a Little Bird all my life.

name: sansa
line: The men we have left are exhausted. Many of them are wounded. They'll fight better if they have time to rest and recuperate.

name: sansa
line: I can't say for certain, not without talking to the officers.

name: sansa
line: It's not just our people. It's yours. You want to throw them into a war they're not ready to fight?

name: sansa
line: Arya's the one that killed the Night King.

name: sansa
line: And we will never forget them. That doesn't mean that I want to kneel to someone who--

line: You respect it?

name: sansa
line: You are. You're just as much Ned Stark's child as any of us.

name: sansa
line: How can I promise to keep a secret if I don't even know what it is?

name: sansa
line: I swear it.

line: Why her?

line: That doesn't mean she'll be a good queen.

name: sansa
line: Jon will be Warden of the North, so a good relationship seems likely.

name: sansa
line: Well, I suppose that's up to him.

name: sansa
line: What are you worried about? Jon's taking our army with him. Your queen still has her dragons--

name: sansa
line: You're afraid of her.

name: sansa
line: I don't want Jon to go down there. The men in my family don't do well in the capital.

name: sansa
line: Tyrion. What if there's someone else? Someone better?

name: sansa
line: . . . as are the rest of her advisors.

name: sansa
line: I always wanted to be there when they execute your sister. Seems like I won't get the chance.

name: sansa
line: Where's Jon?

name: sansa
line: So is Lord Tyrion. They were both to be brought to this gathering.

name: sansa
line: If you look outside the walls of your city, you'll find thousands of Northmen who will explain to you why harming Jon Snow is not in your interest.

name: sansa
line: You swore to follow a tyrant.

name: sansa
line: Uncle? Please sit.

name: sansa
line: Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.

name: sansa
line: I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.

name: sansa
line: I wish there had been another way. Can you forgive me?

line: But they lost their king.

line: Where are you going?

line: No, stop! Please, someone stop him!

name: sansa
line: Stop him, stop!

name: sansa
line: She didn't forget. She's with her dancing master.

name: sansa
line: What is it? What's happening?

name: sansa
line: Stay away from me.

line: He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.

name: sansa
line: No, I'm not.

name: sansa
line: Robb.

line: If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...

name: sansa

line: As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.

line: If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

line: Thank you, my lord.

line: No! Please, no!

line: You promised to be merciful.

name: sansa
line: Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –

line: You're an idiot.

line: I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?

name: sansa
line: Pardon me, Ser.

name: sansa
line: I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?

name: sansa
line: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

name: sansa
line: Arya!

name: sansa
line: He the butcher's boy.

name: sansa
line: Arya, stay out of this.

name: sansa
line: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

name: sansa

name: sansa
line: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

name: sansa
line: I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.

name: sansa
line: Arya!

name: sansa
line: He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!

name: sansa
line: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

name: sansa
line: Will you shut up?

name: sansa
line: Would you please shut up.

line: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I’m ugly?

name: sansa
line: He’s so handsome.

line: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?

name: sansa

line: "Kill all who follow Cersei Lannister." These are free men. They chose to fight for her.

name: grey
line: He is our prisoner.

name: grey
line: We will decide what we do with our prisoners. This is our city now.

name: grey
line: And you will find thousands of Unsullied who believe that it is.

name: grey
line: We do not need payment. We need justice. Jon Snow cannot go free.

name: grey
line: You are not here to speak! Everyone has heard enough words from you.

name: grey
line: Make your choice, then.

name: grey
line: You cannot.

name: grey
line: This man is a criminal. He deserves justice.

name: grey
line: It is not enough.

name: grey
line: (in Valyrian) Good. We sail for the isle of Naath.

name: grey
line: ...fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

name: grey
line: Unsullied never drink.

name: grey
line: Rules.

name: grey
line: Tastes like it has turned.

name: grey
line: The Starks and the lannisters, i thought these were enemies.

name: grey
line: That is the worst joke I ever heard.

name: grey
line: I am soldier all my life. You think I never hear joke?

name: grey
line: I make joke.

name: grey
line: No more talking from you. Your talking gave us this.

name: grey
line: You’re trying to tell me what the army should do. You do not know what the army should do.

name: grey
line: We’ll not go to the beach. If we go to the beach, the Masters will take the pyramid. The pyramid is the only place in the city we can defend. We stay here.

name: grey
line: We wait for them to come to us. Then we fight them.

name: grey
line: Patrol. When I am going on patrol with the Unsullied. What we see on patrol. Who we captured on patrol.

name: grey
line: Games are for children.

name: grey
