line: We conquered Asatapor and Yunkai once. We will do it again and execute the Masters.

name: grey
line: If we do not fight them, how can we stop them?

name: grey
line: So we will fight them?

name: grey
line: We are searching for the men who burned the ships, but nobody saw anything.

name: grey
line: If a dragon does not want to eat, how do you force him to eat?

name: grey
line: None.

name: grey
line: Two, but that was the day of the pact. Since then, nothing.

name: grey
line: For now.

name: grey
line: You invite the enemy into our city?

name: grey
line: I don’t make peace with the queen’s enemies. I kill the queen’s enemies.

name: grey
line: Not anymore.

name: grey
line: Do not use me for your lies.

name: grey
line: They respect me because they know who I am. They know I am loyal.

name: grey
line: I am loyal to my queen, not you. If you betray her work, you are my enemy.

name: grey
line: You are wrong to trust these men.

name: grey
line: You don’t know them. You don’t understand them. We are not human in their eyes. They look at me and see a weapon. They look at her and see a whore.

name: grey
line: You will not use them. They will use you. That is what they do.

name: cersei
line: Radiant? Why radiant?

name: cersei
line: You're a musical girl, aren't you?  I imagine you have a lovely voice.

name: cersei
line: Ah, but you know the song 'The Rains of Castamere'?

name: cersei
line: So you know the story of House Reyne of Castamere?

name: cersei
line: House Reyne was a powerful family. Very wealthy. The second wealthiest in Westeros. Aren't the Tyrells the second wealthiest family in Westeros now?

name: cersei
line: Of course, ambitious climbers don't want to stop on the second highest rung. If only you could take that final step, you'd see further than all the rest. You'd be alone with nothing but blue sky above you. So Lord Reyne built a castle as grand as Casterly Rock. He gave his wife diamonds larger than any my mother ever wore. And finally one day, he rebelled against my father. Do you know where House Reyne is now?

name: cersei
line: Gone. A gentle word. Why not say slaughtered? Every man, woman, and child put to the sword.

name: cersei
line: I remember seeing their bodies hanging high above the gates of Casterly Rock. My father let them rot up there all summer. It was a long summer. 'And now the rains weep o'er their halls, and not a soul to hear.'

name: cersei
line: If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps you could talk to your bride-to-be instead.

name: cersei
line: Stay.

name: cersei
line: Nobody cares what your father once told you.

name: cersei
line: A joke. Joffrey did not mean it.

name: cersei
line: Let him make his threats. Hmm? He's a bitter little man.

name: cersei
line: Come along.

name: cersei
line: We have so much to celebrate. A wedding to plan. You must rest.

name: cersei
line: Come.

name: cersei
line: Leave.

name: cersei
line: So, enjoying married life? An unhappy wife is a wine merchant's best friend.

name: cersei
line: Deserve? Be careful with that. Start trying to work out who deserves what and before long you'll spend the rest of your days weeping for each and every person in the world.

name: cersei
line: (chuckles)

name: cersei
line: I won't be marrying Ser Loras.

name: cersei
line: You're not me. You want to make things better for Sansa? Give her a child.

name: cersei
line: So she can have some happiness in her life.

name: cersei
line: Not very. But if it weren't for my children, I'd have thrown myself from the highest window in the Red Keep. They're the reason I'm alive.

name: cersei
line: Until we've dealt with all our enemies.

name: cersei
line: Then I suppose it will go on for quite a long time.

name: cersei
line: (chuckles)

name: cersei
line: I have no doubt you will prove equal to this challenge.

name: cersei
line: That's better. It makes you look very strong.

name: cersei
line: Looks like a Tyrell rose. Give it to Margaery for her wedding gown. Should be more than enough fabric.

name: cersei
line: Tell me what you think of her.

name: cersei
line: Margaery.

name: cersei
line: It is a good match, but what do you think of her? She's beautiful and intelligent.

name: cersei
line: Her concern with the well-being of the common people is interesting.

name: cersei
line: I only meant that to go out of your way to endanger yourself.

name: cersei
line: Margaery Tyrell dotes on filthy urchins for a reason. She dresses like a harlot for a reason. She married a traitor and known degenerate like Renly Baratheon for a reason.

name: cersei
line: You need to ask yourself

name: cersei
line: Protecting me, I assume. Will you let me in?

name: cersei
line: If I wanted to kill you, do you think I'd let a wooden door stop me?

name: cersei
line: I'm not afraid of you, little brother.

name: cersei
line: I wanted to see your face. They said you'd lost your nose, but it's not as gruesome as all that.

name: cersei
line: I should hope so. The rebels came for Joffrey's head, they lost their own. Thanks to Father.

name: cersei
line: No? Curious. Bit of a comedown from chamber of the Hand. But then I don't suppose you need much room.

name: cersei
line: You're meeting Father today?

name: cersei
line: Because I have hundreds of spies in my employ. The Master of Whisperers owes me a favor or two. Father told me. What do you want from him?

name: cersei
line: You're going to make me cry.

name: cersei
line: Because you've slandered me to Father before.

name: cersei
line: You told him I had my guards beat that servant girl at Casterly Rock.

name: cersei
line: I was nine, too.

name: cersei
line: If I remember correctly, she never stole a necklace again.

name: cersei
line: And what's this truth you plan on telling him today?

name: cersei
line: Because you're a liar. I expect you'll tell lies about me, about Joffrey.

name: cersei
line: You're a clever man, but you're not half as clever as you think you are.

name: cersei
line: Yes, it suits you perfectly. I imagine you might be rather cold.

name: cersei
line: You might find a bit of armor quite useful once you become queen. Perhaps before. Joffrey tells me you stopped your carriage at Flea Bottom on your way back from the sept this morning.

name: cersei
line: You're right, of course. But you are your father's son. We can't all have a king's bravery.

name: cersei
line: I'm sure she does.

name: cersei
line: Lord Baelish.

name: cersei
line: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

name: cersei
line: I have reason to believe that House Tyrell do not hold the crown's best interests at heart.

name: cersei
line: My father's a practical man. He appreciates facts.

name: cersei
line: And he appreciates those who aid his family, as you well know. He's almost as generous to those who help us as he is unpleasant towards those who don't. You have a good working relationship with the Tyrells. I thought you might look into it before you leave the capital.

name: cersei
line: Thank you. And your best will prove better than when I asked you to locate Arya Stark?

name: cersei
line: (amused) Yes, it is.

name: cersei
line: She's flowered, I assure you. She and I have discussed it at length.

name: cersei
line: You should be thanking the gods for this. This is more than you deserve.

name: cersei
line: What do you mean?

name: cersei
line: I will not.

name: cersei
line: No, I won't do it.

name: cersei
line: I am Queen Regent, not some broodmare.

name: cersei
line: Father, don't make me do it again, please.

name: cersei
line: The ceremony is traditionally held in the main sanctum, which seats 700 comfortably

name: cersei
line: There aren't more than 700 people of any importance.

name: cersei
line: Are you sure Lady Margaery doesn't find all this a bit macabre?

name: cersei
line: Yes.

name: cersei
line: Seems like a lifetime ago.

name: cersei
line: No, he wanted his remains returned to Storm's End.

name: cersei
line: A fairly predictable tragedy. Hunting and drinking don't mix.

name: cersei
line: I seem to recall he laid siege to Storm's End for the better part of a year.

name: cersei
line: (chuckles)

name: cersei
line: And yet the world belongs to them.

name: cersei
line: The gods have seen fit to make it so.

name: cersei
line: Joffrey. Wait.

name: cersei
line: Yes, about Jaime.

name: cersei
line: I wanted to make sure we're doing everything we can to get him back.

name: cersei
line: You started a war.

name: cersei
line: Whatever you can.

name: cersei
line: Yes.

name: cersei
line: The Tyrells are a problem.

name: cersei
line: Margaery has her claws in Joffrey. She knows how to manipulate him.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps you should try stopping him from doing what he likes.

name: cersei
line: We can have them both killed.

name: cersei
line: Father doesn't discriminate. We're all being shipped off to hell together.

name: cersei
line: The Tyrells were plotting to undermine our family. I did what I did to protect our family.

name: cersei
line: I do admit it. If it weren't for your trick with the wildfire, Stannis would have sacked the city before Father got here. Our heads would still be rotting on the city gate.

name: cersei
line: What do you want me to say?

name: cersei
line: Probably. But not from Joffrey. He won't do anything now Father's here.

name: cersei
line: Not the Tyrells. Soon they won't need to be afraid of him. Joffrey will belong to Margaery, the little doe-eyed whore. And so will his children and their children. History will be taken from our hands.

name: cersei
line: When Jaime gets back, yes. But when do we think that's going to be? He's out there somewhere.

name: cersei
line: Who's going to tell her?

name: cersei
line: Bloody Martells.

name: cersei
line: You're dismissed, Grand Maester.

name: cersei
line: Not anymore.

name: cersei
line: You can save him?

name: cersei
line: Do everything you can. Come to me with anything you need.

name: cersei
line: Will it weaken him?

name: cersei
line: Very well then.

name: cersei
line: I'm opening it again.

name: cersei
line: I will not.

name: cersei
line: I don't care. I will stay in King's Landing where I belong with my son, the king.

name: cersei
line: I'm not interested in hearing another one of your smug stories about the time you won. This isn't going to be one of those times.

name: cersei
line: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle at Blackwater, do you remember?! I was sitting on the iron throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade, that's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

name: cersei
line: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy, my last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in and you will dig your claws in and you will fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

name: cersei
line: I'll tell everyone the truth.

name: cersei
line: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying, of course it's possible. How can someone so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you and you didn't see us. One look in the past twenty years, one real look and you would've known.

name: cersei
line: Everything they say is true. About Jaime and me.

name: cersei
line: Your legacy is a lie.

name: cersei
line: Yes you do.

name: cersei
line: Jaime.

name: cersei
line: For my family, no. I would do things for my family you couldn't imagine.

name: cersei
line: He's not.

name: cersei
line: I do, so do you. You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world-

name: cersei
line: A disease doesn't decide to kill you, all the same you cut it out before it does. What do you decide? What do you choose?

name: cersei
line: I choose you.

name: cersei
line: Yes. Like the ones I just said to father. I told him.

name: cersei
line: I told him about us.

name: cersei
line: I told him I wouldn't marry Loras Tyrell. I told him I'm staying right here with Tommen, with you.

name: cersei
line: Go and ask him.

name: cersei
line: I don't want to talk about Tywin Lannister. I don't choose Tywin Lannister, I don't love Tywin Lannister. I love my brother. I love my lover. People will whisper, they'll make their jokes. Let them. They're all so small I can't even see them. I only see what matters.

name: cersei
line: I don't care.

name: cersei
line: You did this. You did this!

name: cersei
line: Take him! Take him!

name: cersei
line: Where is his wife? Where's Sansa?

name: cersei
line: Where is she?!

name: cersei
line: This is hardly the place or the time.

name: cersei
line: It was Tyrion. He killed him. He told me he would. "A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth." That's what he said to me. You saw it. You saw Joff point at him just before he...

name: cersei
line: Avenge him. Avenge our son. Kill Tyrion.

name: cersei
line: I don't want a trial. He'll squirm his way to freedom given the chance. I want him dead. (CRYING) Please, Jaime. You have to. He was our son. Our baby boy.

name: cersei
line: Jaime, not here, please. Please.

name: cersei
line: Stop it. Stop it. Stop.

name: cersei
line: Stop it. Stop.

name: cersei
line: Stop.  Stop. It's not right.

name: cersei
line: It's not right. It's not right.

name: cersei
line: (CRYING)  Don't.

name: cersei
line: Don't. Jaime, don't.

name: cersei
line: She's the whore I told you about. The dark-haired one.

name: cersei
line: He saw us.

name: cersei
line: You're an example to us all.

name: cersei
line: Did you just bow?

name: cersei
line: Lady Brienne. You're Lord Selwyn Tarth's daughter. That makes you a lady whether you want to be or not.

name: cersei
line: I owe you my gratitude. You returned my brother safely to King's Landing.

name: cersei
line: Did he? Haven't heard that story before.

name: cersei
line: I'm sure you have many fascinating stories. Sworn to Renly Baratheon. Sworn to Catelyn Stark. And now my brother. Must be exciting to flit from one camp to the next serving whichever lord or lady you fancy.

name: cersei
line: But you love him.

name: cersei
line: She'll do no such thing.

name: cersei
line: You should see Qyburn. He's quite good.

name: cersei
line: More repugnant than your gnarled fingers on that girl's thighs?

name: cersei
line: My little brother had you sent to the Black Cells when you annoyed him. What do you think I could do to you if you annoyed me?

name: cersei
line: But you are. You annoy me right now. Every breath you draw in my presence annoys me. So here's what I want you to do. I want you to leave my presence. Leave this wedding right now. Go to the kitchens and instruct them that all the leftovers from the feast will be brought to the kennels.

name: cersei
line: The queen is telling you the leftovers will feed the dogs or you will.

name: cersei
line: I suppose I am.

name: cersei
line: Small pleasures.

name: cersei
line: Can't say I've ever met a Sand before.

name: cersei
line: No? How tolerant of you.

name: cersei
line: I suppose you'll never know, Prince Oberyn. It's a shame your older brother couldn't attend the wedding.

name: cersei
line: Help him! Someone help him!

name: cersei
line: Joffrey!

name: cersei
line: Joffrey! Joffrey!

name: cersei
line: Don't touch him!

name: cersei
line: Joffrey. Please, Joffrey. Joffrey, what is it? Help him!

name: cersei
line: My son.

name: cersei
line: He did this. He poisoned my son, your king. Take him. Take him! Take him! Take him!

name: cersei
line: Better part of an afternoon. There, how does that feel?

name: cersei
line: Elegant, I think.

name: cersei
line: Gone completely. I am in your debt, Maester Qyburn.

name: cersei
line: I've grown rather fond of him. He's quite talented, you know?

name: cersei
line: Symptoms that are not your concern.

name: cersei
line: You jealous?

name: cersei
line: (Laughs) You think I'd let that old lecher put his hands on me? He smells like a dead cat.

name: cersei
line: Well, they smell like Pycelle.

name: cersei
line: Yes.

name: cersei
line: Let's see, you started a brawl in the streets with Ned Stark and disappeared from the capital. My husband died in a tragic hunting accident.

name: cersei
line: My only daughter was shipped off to Dorne. We suffered through a siege.

name: cersei
line: A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive. And now I'm marrying my eldest son to a wicked little bitch from Highgarden while I'm supposed to marry her brother, a renowned pillow biter. So...

name: cersei
line: He can't disown you. You're all he's got.

name: cersei
line: You don't really plan on staying in the Kingsguard, do you?

name: cersei
line: Not now.

name: cersei
line: Everything's changed. You come back after all this time with no apologies and one hand and expect everything to be the same?

name: cersei
line: For leaving me.

name: cersei
line: Don't know what you wanted. You weren't here. You left me alone.

name: cersei
line: You took too long.

name: cersei
line: I'm saying you took too long.

name: cersei
line: Come in.

name: cersei
line: There he is.

name: cersei
line: Long may he reign.

name: cersei
line: Yes. He wasn't, though, was he?

name: cersei
line: You still mourn for Joffrey?

name: cersei
line: He would have been your nightmare.

name: cersei
line: You knew exactly what he was. I did, too. You never love anything in the world the way you love your first child. Doesn't matter what they do. And what he did, it shocked me. Do you think I'm easily shocked?

name: cersei
line: The things he did shocked me. He's only a boy. A good boy. A decent boy. He always has been. Who was the last decent king, I wonder? He could be the first man who sits on that throne in 50 years to actually deserve it.

name: cersei
line: He will need help... if he's going to rule well.

name: cersei
line: A mother is not enough. You're still interested in being queen, I take it?

name: cersei
line: Yes, speak to your father. I'll speak to mine.

name: cersei
line: (CHUCKLES)

name: cersei
line: As soon as decency permits. After we've allowed Tommen the appropriate time to mourn his brother and Margaery to mourn her husband.

name: cersei
line: That seems reasonable.

name: cersei
line: (shakes her head)

name: cersei
line: Shortly after Tommen's.

name: cersei
line: A fortnight.

name: cersei
line: We had that in common.

name: cersei
line: Then whom can we trust?

name: cersei
line: Robert wasn't particularly rich.

name: cersei
line: Haven't a clue.

name: cersei
line: Pounds, tons, ounces?

name: cersei
line: That can't be.

name: cersei
line: Then how do we pay for anything?

name: cersei
line: How much?

name: cersei
line: There must be someone at the Iron Bank you can speak to, come to some arrangement.

name: cersei
line: Someone does work there. It is comprised of people.

name: cersei
line: It's for the good of the family, I understand that. I'm not sure my brothers do.

name: cersei
line: I respect that. We don't need to discuss it.

name: cersei
line: The Lannister legacy is the only thing that matters. You've started wars to protect this family. Turned your back on Jaime for refusing to contribute to its future. What does Tyrion deserve for lighting that future on fire?

name: cersei
line: Prince Oberyn. Writing letters?

name: cersei
line: May I show you the gardens?

name: cersei
line: No, you couldn't.

name: cersei
line: I didn't realize you were a poet.

name: cersei
line: For your paramour?

name: cersei
line: You have several, don't you?

name: cersei
line: Eight? Eight daughters?

name: cersei
line: Beautiful name.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps that's why she's difficult. The gods love their stupid jokes, don't they?

name: cersei
line: You're a prince of Dorne. A legendary fighter. A brilliant man feared throughout Westeros. But you could not save your sister. I'm a Lannister. Queen for 19 years. Daughter of the most powerful man alive. But I could not save my son. What good is power if you cannot protect the ones you love?

name: cersei
line: Yes, we can avenge them.

name: cersei
line: I know he did.

name: cersei
line: We'll have a trial, anyway. I haven't seen my daughter in over a year.

name: cersei
line: I want to believe that. I want to believe she's happy.

name: cersei
line: Everywhere in the world, they hurt little girls. Would you bring her a gift for me? I wasn't there for her name day. I don't know when I'll see her again.

name: cersei
line: The best shipwrights in King's Landing have been working on it for months. Myrcella loves the open water.

name: cersei
line: Please tell her... her mother misses her very much.

name: cersei
line: Your Grace. How formal of you. How many Kingsguards are posted outside Tommen's door?

name: cersei
line: So one? You have one man guarding the future king?

name: cersei
line: The way you protected Joffrey? Why did Catelyn Stark set you free?

name: cersei
line: I've been wondering for months. Ever since that great cow brought you back to the capital. Why did she set you free?

name: cersei
line: She hoped or did you promise?

name: cersei
line: So you made a sacred vow to the enemy.

name: cersei
line: You didn't mean it, then? You have no loyalty to Catelyn Stark?

name: cersei
line: I know you went to see Tyrion. That creature who murdered our son.

name: cersei
line: And?

name: cersei
line: You've always pitied him. Our poor little brother. Abused by the world. Despised by his father and sister. He'd kill us all if he could. I want four men at Tommen's door day and night. That will be all, Lord Commander.

name: cersei
line: A coward and a traitor.

name: cersei
line: Conquered with what?

name: cersei
line: Baby dragons. Larger every year, Your Grace.

name: cersei
line: He's an old man. He wasn't fit to protect my son.

name: cersei
line: Don't tell me you're worried about a child halfway across the world.

name: cersei
line: "I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth and you will know the debt is paid."

name: cersei
line: (Nods.) Shortly before the Battle of Blackwater Bay. I confronted him about his plans to put Joffrey on the front lines. As it turned out, when the attack came, Joff insisted on remaining at the battlements. He believed his presence would inspire the troops.

name: cersei
line: I discovered he'd been keeping whores in the Tower of the Hand. I asked him to confine his salacious acts to the brothel where such behavior belongs. He wasn't pleased.

name: cersei
line: Ser Gregor. Welcome to the capital. Thank you for riding here so quickly.

name: cersei
line: You seem to be in good form.

name: cersei
line: Does it matter?

name: cersei
line: My son. Let me speak to--

name: cersei
line: My face will be the last thing you see before--

name: cersei
line: The charges?

name: cersei
line: All lies.

name: cersei
line: I wish you’d said it sooner. Any word from Jaime?

name: cersei
line: Tell him I need to speak to him.

name: cersei
line: What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--

name: cersei
line: You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.

name: cersei
line: I can’t stay here.

name: cersei
line: Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won’t. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.

name: cersei
line: I’ll get out of here, you realize. Before long.

name: cersei
line: I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.

name: cersei
line: I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.

name: cersei
line: I have sinned. I see that now. How could I have been so blind for so long. I want to be clean again. I want absolution. The Crone came to me with her lamp raised high, and with its holy light--

name: cersei
line: Once I’ve confessed, will I be free?

name: cersei
line: The Mother have mercy then. I lay with a man outside the bonds of marriage, I confess.

name: cersei
line: Lancel Lannister.

name: cersei
line: I was lonely and afraid.

name: cersei
line: A husband of whoring every chance he got.

name: cersei
line: May the gods forgive me.

name: cersei
line: No.

name: cersei
line: No.

name: cersei
line: I do.

name: cersei
line: A lie. A lie from the lips of Stannis Baratheon. He wants the Throne, but his brother’s children stand in his way, so he claims they are not his brothers’. The filth. There is not one shred of truth to it. I deny it.

name: cersei
line: Trial? I have confessed?

name: cersei
line: I bow to the wisdom of your High Holiness. But if I might beg for just one drop of the Mother’s mercy. I haven’t seen my son… I don’t know how long it’s been. I need to see him. Please.

name: cersei
line: Thank you. Thank you.

name: cersei
line: I will, I will. I swear it, day and night.

name: cersei
line: Am I free to go?

name: cersei
line: My atonement?

name: cersei
line: You look very much in love. The first days of marriage are often so blissful. She's certainly very pretty, isn't she? Like a doll, she smiles quite a lot. Do you think she's intelligent? I can't quite tell. Not that it matters.

name: cersei
line: There's nothing for me in Casterly Rock.

name: cersei
line: (Chuckles). Why are we speaking of Casterly Rock?

name: cersei
line: This is my real home now. Where my family lives.

name: cersei
line: I know that. I know you do, my sweet boy.

name: cersei
line: Don't you look lovely. Marriage agrees with you.

name: cersei
line: No, no. I, I can't stay. I just wanted to let you know if, there is ever anything I can do for you.

name: cersei
line: Tommen seems quite taken with his new queen.

name: cersei
line: Good. Good. I'm glad to hear you're happy.

name: cersei
line: I'll leave you to it then. (Turns to leave).

name: cersei
line: There's no need for such formalities.

name: cersei
line: Won’t that be a lovely day.

name: cersei
line: Remember. Anything you need.

name: cersei
line: You were assaulted?

name: cersei
line: What do you want from us, High Septon?

name: cersei
line: And where do I find this man? This High Sparrow?

name: cersei
line: Nonsense, Ser Meryn. These are deeply religious people. (To a man at the bottom of some stairs). Where can I find the High Sparrow?

name: cersei
line: A young man said I would find the High Sparrow back here. Where is he?

name: cersei
line: Why no shoes?

name: cersei
line: Is that why you came to King's Landing? To remind everyone?

name: cersei
line: (Smiles). Perhaps they're right.

name: cersei
line: An unacceptable way to treat the chosen representative of the Gods in this world, wouldn't you say?

name: cersei
line: The High Septon came to speak to me today. He doesn't want me to arrest you, he wants me to execute you.

name: cersei
line: (After a moment). My thoughts on the matter align with your own. The High Septon's behaviour was corrosive, as was his attitude. Having a man like that reside in the Sept eats away the Faith from the inside. So now he resides in the Red Keep's dungeons instead. (The High Sparrow looks up at her surprised). The Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. If one collapses, so does the other. We must do everything necessary to protect one another.

name: cersei
line: Send a raven with this message to Littlefinger in the Eyrie, or wherever he's slithering about. (Hands him the letter).

name: cersei
line: How's your work coming along?

name: cersei
line: You've made progress?

name: cersei
line: Very good. I'll leave you to it then. Make sure Littlefinger is clear on the meaning of the word "immediately".

name: cersei
line: Of course it’s a threat! Our daughter’s in Dorne surrounded by people who hate our family. (mocking) "It's a threat."

name: cersei
line: They blame us for the death of Oberyn and his sister, and every other tragedy that’s befallen their cursed country. I will burn their cities to the ground if they touch her!

name: cersei
line: What?

name: cersei
line: Our daughter’s in danger, and you’re worried I’m speaking too loudly!

name: cersei
line: Then don’t call her your daughter. You’ve never been a father to her.

name: cersei
line: And what has your caution brought? Our eldest child murdered at his own wedding. Our only daughter shipped off to Dorne. Our baby boy sent to marry that smirking whore from Highgarden.

name: cersei
line: You never made anything better.

name: cersei
line: You can’t just ask Prince Doran to give her back! She’s promised his son.

name: cersei
line: You go there with an army, it’s an act of war.

name: cersei
line: Oberyn mentioned the Water Gardens.

name: cersei
line: (scoffs) You’re going to Dorne? A one-handed man? Alone?

name: cersei
line: Not him.

name: cersei
line: That won't be necessary, Ser Meryn. I don't want to dissuade the other hunters. Mistakes will be made.

name: cersei
line: Take the head.

name: cersei
line: Very good.

name: cersei
line: No, Uncle. Clearly it would not be appropriate for a woman to assume that role. I'm merely advising my son until he comes of age and chooses a Hand for himself.

name: cersei
line: You're a good man, Lord Tyrell, but I don't imagine you'll have the time. In addition to being Master of Ships, the king has appointed you Master of Coin.

name: cersei
line: He called your experience and wisdom in financial matters unparalleled. He said he would be honored to have you represent the crown's interests in the same.

name: cersei
line: The King has named Qyburn the new Master of Whisperers.

name: cersei
line: The qualification of loyalty, Grand Maester. That's far more than the eunuch ever had. Far more than many ever have.

name: cersei
line: Uncle Kevan, in light of your position as commander of the Lannister armies, it would please the king if you would serve as his Master of War. No man living better deserves the title.

name: cersei
line: The king is very busy at this moment.

name: cersei
line: He is learning. On this occasion, in his capacity as ruler, he's asked me to speak on his behalf.

name: cersei
line: My brother has left the capital to lead a sensitive diplomatic mission.

name: cersei
line: That is not your concern as Master of War.

name: cersei
line: You would abandon your king in his time of need?

name: cersei
line: Why not?

name: cersei
line: He’ll never know we’ve been gone.

name: cersei
line: You don’t need to be afraid of my father.

name: cersei
line: Yes.

name: cersei
line: Of course we should.

name: cersei
line: No.

name: cersei
line: They said that you were terrifying. With cat’s teeth and three eyes. You’re not terrifying. You’re boring.

name: cersei
line: I know you’re a witch and you can see the future. Tell me mine.

name: cersei
line: This is my father’s land. My land. Tell me my future or I’ll have your two boring eyes gouged out of your head.

name: cersei
line: I’ve been promised to the prince. When will we marry?

name: cersei
line: But I will be queen?

name: cersei
line: Will the king and I have children?

name: cersei
line: That doesn’t make sense.

name: cersei
line: They will keep waiting. I want a moment alone with him.

name: cersei
line: They will wait.

name: cersei
line: He never wanted you to be a King’s Guard, but here you are, protecting his dead body.

name: cersei
line: They?

name: cersei
line: They had nothing to do with it. The man who murdered our father, he tore us apart, he’s the enemy. I’ve been telling you for years, you’ve been defending him for years…

name: cersei
line: ...and now our father is dead. And that little monster is out there somewhere drawing breath. Did you set him free?

name: cersei
line: Tyrion may be a monster but at least he killed our father on purpose. You killed him by mistake. With stupidity. You’re a man of action, aren’t you? When it occurs to you to do something you do it, nevermind the consequences. Take a look. (gestures towards Tywin) Look at the consequences. Here they are. He loved you more than anyone in this world.

name: cersei
line: Thank you so much for your kind words.

name: cersei
line: Cousin Lancel. I hardly recognized you.

name: cersei
line: Uncle, it’s quite alright.

name: cersei
line: I’m sure he’ll grow out of it. Whatever it is. Excuse me.

name: cersei
line: Your wounds from the Blackwater seem to have healed.

name: cersei
line: What can I do for you?

name: cersei
line: What could you possibly have done to warrant my forgiveness?

name: cersei
line: I doubt you’ve ever led anyone anywhere.

name: cersei
line: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

name: cersei
line: The day Tywin Lannister’s soul needs your help…

name: cersei
line: How much can the Crown afford?

name: cersei
line: You're the Master of Coin. How do we pay them?

name: cersei
line: You've already given us too much. (Gets up and walks to a window). No, we must arrange better terms with the Iron Bank.

name: cersei
line: In person.

name: cersei
line: We must send an envoy to the Iron Bank, someone of importance, to show these bankers our respect. As the King's Master of Coin, I can think of no one more qualified.

name: cersei
line: The King has expressed concern about his father-in-law's safety on this voyage. (Smiling). He's ordered Ser Meryn to personally lead your escort.

name: cersei
line: Safe travels, Lord Tyrell.

name: cersei
line: (Walking out). Not small enough.

name: cersei
line: May I offer you some wine, Your Holiness?

name: cersei
line: The old High Septon would have asked the vintage. (Smiles).

name: cersei
line: Hmm.

name: cersei
line: All over Westeros we hear about septs being burned. Silent sisters raped. Bodies of holy men piled in the streets.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps the Gods need a sword of their own. (HS raises an eyebrow). In the days before the Targaryens, the Faith Militant dispensed the justice of the Seven.

name: cersei
line: If I explain the holy purpose to my son, the king, I have no doubt he will sign a decree arming the believers you felt worthy.

name: cersei
line: An army and service to the Gods themselves. And to you, of course. As the chosen representative of the Seven.

name: cersei
line: Which is why you were chosen. (HS smiles). You and I both know how the world works. Too often the wicked are the wealthiest, beyond the reach of justice. The king himself cannot always punish those who deserve it most.

name: cersei
line: (Smiles. Continues after a moment). What would you say if I told you we have a great sinner in our very midst? Shielded by gold and privilege.

name: cersei
line: (Turns around). Did I arrest him?

name: cersei
line: I did. And your wife has every right to criticize. (Begins walking towards her desk). Can't allow fanatics to arrest the Queen's brother, no matter his perversions.

name: cersei
line: I told you I am not holding Ser Loras. You're the King. I'm sure if you speak to the High Sparrow, he'll release the poor boy.

name: cersei
line: The Faith arrested the heir to Highgarden.

name: cersei
line: The King’s orders. Is the King to blame for Ser Loras’ perversion?

name: cersei
line: House Tyrell won’t tolerate it? I’m the insulted party, Lord Baelish. Ser Loras was promised to me, instead he chose the company of boys.

name: cersei
line: Most curious. Lysa Arryn for instance. A sorrily repellent woman. Forgive me. I know you’re still in mourning.

name: cersei
line: She was neither of those things, we both know it. Still, I pity her son. How fortunate that the young Lord of the Vale has a new father to counsel him.

name: cersei
line: If war comes to Westeros will the Knights of the Veil fight for their king?

name: cersei
line: Good. (Cersei gets up) If there’s nothing else.

name: cersei
line: That’s not possible.

name: cersei
line: Roose Bolton is Warden of the North by the grace of my father.

name: cersei
line: We were fools to trust a turncloak.

name: cersei
line: I will skin him and his bastard like that wretch on that bloody sigil.

name: cersei
line: Patience? Sansa helped murder my son, Roose Bolton is a traitor.

name: cersei
line: Winterfell is 1,000 miles away from here. The weather has already begun to turn.

name: cersei
line: My Uncle Kevan has all the courage of a kitchen mouse.

name: cersei
line: Jaime is away on a sensitive diplomatic mission. I’ve no idea when he’ll be back.

name: cersei
line: Forgive me Lord Baelish, you have a reputation as a money lender and brothel keeper, not a military man.

name: cersei
line: And if you succeed?

name: cersei
line: I’ll speak to the king this evening. Have him issue a royal decree.

name: cersei
line: And I’ll l know you’re a man of your word when I see Sansa Stark’s head on a spike.

name: cersei
line: You must be exhausted.

name: cersei
line: Ah, yes, the famously tart-tongued queen of thorns.

name: cersei
line: Beg your pardon.

name: cersei
line: If you apologize for that comment perhaps--

name: cersei
line: I was as shocked as anyone when The Faith arrested Ser Loras. I have no love for these fanatics. But what can the queen mother do?

name: cersei
line: I assure you our alliance with House Tyrell remains--

name: cersei
line: As I said, i didn’t imprison anyone. As for your veiled threats--

name: cersei
line: The Lannister-Tyrell alliance brought peace to a war-torn country. Do you really want to see the Seven Kingdoms slide back into warfare?

name: cersei
line: House Lannister has no rival. The High Septon has called for an inquest, not a trial. Just a small hearing to determine whether the charges against Loras have merit, which I’m sure they don’t. Loras will be freed, our happy alliance will continue, and we’ll forget this unfortunate conversation ever happened. Good day, Lady Olenna.

name: cersei
line: This testimony is an insult to a great house. Why should The Faith or anyone else take the word of a squire over the heir to Highgarden?

name: cersei
line: Starving yourself won't make things any better for her, my love.

name: cersei
line: No matter who you are, no matter how strong you are, sooner or later, you'll face circumstances beyond your control.

name: cersei
line: You know as well as I do who the first casualty in that war would be.

name: cersei
line: We must be strong for those we love. We cannot give in to despair.

name: cersei
line: Let me speak to him on your behalf. The king cannot dirty sully himself negotiating with an unwashed fanatic.

name: cersei
line: Your happiness is all I want in this world

name: cersei
line: No you don’t. You can’t possibly. Not until you have children of your own. I would do anything for you. Anything to keep you from harm. I would burn cities to the ground. That is all that matters. You and your sister. From the moment you came into this world, my boy. My only boy.

name: cersei
line: This is horrible. Unacceptable. Are they feeding you enough at least? I brought you this. Venison. It’s quite good. I had it myself for supper only last night. We did everything we could from the moment they took your brother. Tommen even went to the sept himself to confront the high sparrow, but I fear The Faith has left reason behind.

name: cersei
line: We are making every effort on your behalf. I swear to you by all the seven gods.

name: cersei
line: You’re upset. You’re not thinking clearly. I’ll visit again when you’ve had a chance to calm down.

name: cersei
line: I do hope you change your mind about that. I’ve been told men often go mad in the Black Cells below the Red Keep, but I suppose your isolation will end once your trial begins.

name: cersei
line: Yes, I’m afraid I must. My son needs me now more than ever.

name: cersei
line: Sleep well, sister.

name: cersei
line: Yes.

name: cersei
line: Her accommodations seem sufficient. What happens to her now?

name: cersei
line: Who will stand judge?

name: cersei
line: Will you be one of them?

name: cersei
line: If one or both of them were to confess before the trial…

name: cersei
line: What does The Mother’s mercy entail?

name: cersei
line: Thank you High Septon for bringing them whatever justice they deserve in the eyes of the Seven.

name: cersei
line: I think I may have heard at one point.

name: cersei
line: I’m afraid i don’t.

name: cersei
line: Move. Let me go immediately.

name: cersei
line: You will order her to let me go! I am the queen! I am the queen! Have you lost your mind? Let me go! You filthy… I am the queen! Let me go!

name: cersei
line: Look at me. Look at my face. It’s the last thing you’ll see before you die.

name: cersei
line: Your words are always wise and measured.

name: cersei
line: You brought me something?

name: cersei
line: I know what ten drops will bring.

name: cersei
line: You may not. You must have a lot of work to do. I'm sure many brave men will need your wisdom soon.

name: cersei
line: Sansa.

name: cersei
line: I was wondering where our little dove had flown. You look pale, child. Is your red flower still blooming?

name: cersei
line: Fitting, isn't it? The men will bleed out there and you will bleed in here. Pour Lady Sansa some wine.

name: cersei
line: So? I didn't offer you water. What's he doing here?

name: cersei
line: Ser llyn? He's here to defend us. When the axes smash down those doors, you may be glad to have him.

name: cersei
line: Guards we have paid. Should the city fall, they'll be the first ones out of the doors.

name: cersei
line: The battle's first traitors. Have Ser llyn see to them. Put their heads on spikes outside the stables as a warning.

name: cersei
line: The only way to keep the small folk loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy. Remember that if you ever hope to become a queen.

name: cersei
line: He is. Traitors are a danger to us all. More wine.

name: cersei
line: Sansa, come here, little dove.

name: cersei
line: You're perfect, aren't you?

name: cersei
line: What are you praying for?

name: cersei
line: Oh. On all of us?

name: cersei
line: Even me?

name: cersei
line: Even Joffrey?

name: cersei
line: Oh, shut up, you little fool. Praying to the gods to have mercy on us all. The gods have no mercy. That's why they're gods. My father told me that when he caught me praying. My mother had just died, you see. I didn't really understand the concept of death, the finality of it. I thought that if I prayed very, very hard, the gods would return my mother to me. I was four.

name: cersei
line: He believes in them, he just doesn't like them very much.

name: cersei
line: One for her.

name: cersei
line: Here. Sit. Drink.

name: cersei
line: Not like that. Drink, girl.

name: cersei
line: I should have been born a man. I'd rather face a thousand swords than be shut up inside with this flock of frightened hens.

name: cersei
line: It was expected of me, as it will be of you if you ever become Joffrey's queen. If my wretched brother should somehow prevail, these hens will return to their cocks and crow of how my courage inspired them, lifted their spirits.

name: cersei
line: You'd like that, wouldn't you? The Red Keep should hold for a time, long enough for me to go to the walls and yield to Lord Stannis in person. If it were anyone else outside those gates, I might have hoped for a private audience, but this is Stannis Baratheon. I'd have a better chance of seducing his horse.

name: cersei
line: Have I shocked you, little dove? Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs. Learn how to use it. Drink.

name: cersei
line: Do you have any notion of what happens when a city is sacked? No, you wouldn't, would you? If the city falls, these fine women should be in for a bit of a rape. Half of them will have bastards in their bellies come the morning. You'll be glad of your red flower then. When a man's blood is up, anything with tits looks good. A precious thing like you will look very, very good. A slice of cake just waiting to be eaten.

name: cersei
line: And you will be Joffrey's. Enjoy. I don't think I know this one.

name: cersei
line: Pretty.

name: cersei
line: That's the worst curtsy I've ever seen. Here, it's not difficult. I mastered it when I was four. Straighten your back and bend.

name: cersei
line: Better. You learn fast. How long have you been in Lady Sansa's service?

name: cersei
line: When did you leave Lorath?

name: cersei
line: I had a Lorathi handmaiden once.

name: cersei
line: But she was a nobleman's daughter. You're not. When did you come to Westeros?

name: cersei
line: From Lorathi commoner to the Red Keep in 10 years, all without learning how to curtsy. I imagine that's a very interesting story. What's your name?

name: cersei
line: Tell us a story, Shae.

name: cersei
line: What news?

name: cersei
line: Where is Joffrey?

name: cersei
line: Bring him back inside at once.

name: cersei
line: What?

name: cersei
line: Bring him back to his chambers now.

name: cersei
line: With the women and children? Do you want him to be mocked as a coward for the rest of his life?

name: cersei
line: Now!

name: cersei
line: When I told you about Ser llyn earlier, I lied. Do you want to hear the truth? You want to know why he's really here? He's here for us. Stannis may take the city, he may take the throne, but he will not take us alive.

name: cersei
line: Where is my son?

name: cersei
line: Why do I care what you want?  Bring me

name: cersei
line: Shh! Be calm, my sweet.

name: cersei
line: No one's going to hurt you. I'll tell you a story. You know the one about the mother lion and her little cub? They lived in the woods.

name: cersei
line: Yes, my love. In the Kingswood, there lived a mother and her cub. She loved him very much. But there were other things that lived in the woods. Evil things.

name: cersei
line: Like stags.

name: cersei
line: And wolves.

name: cersei
line: "For one day, all the beasts will bow to you. "You will be king. "All the stags will bow. All the wolves will bow. "The bears in the north and the foxes of the south, "all the birds in the sky and the beasts in the sea, "they will all come to you, little lion, "to rest a crown upon your head.

name: cersei
line: " And the cub said, "Will I be strong and fierce like my father?"

name: cersei
line: "Yes," said his mother. "You will be strong and fierce just like your father.

name: cersei
line: " I will keep you safe, my love. I promise you.

name: cersei
line: Father.

name: cersei
line: (cries)

name: cersei
line: Odd little boy.

name: cersei
line: You and Varys both.

name: cersei
line: He's only a boy.

name: cersei
line: He's not ready.

name: cersei
line: Better than you. Some men have a gift for this sort of thing, some don't. His place is not on the battlefield.

name: cersei
line: Do you think I'm an idiot?

name: cersei
line: You shipped off my only daughter. And now you want to send my eldest son to the battlefield to die.

name: cersei
line: Do you know why Varys is so dangerous?

name: cersei
line: Because he doesn't have a cock.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps I'm dangerous, too. You, on the other hand, are as big a fool as every other man. That little worm between your legs does half your thinking.

name: cersei
line: (laughs)

name: cersei
line: Because I'm happy.

name: cersei
line: Because I have your little whore.

name: cersei
line: Such a droll little fellow. Tell me, have you married this one yet? No? Good. Father will be so pleased.

name: cersei
line: Because a Lannister always pays her debts. You stole my only daughter, you plot to have Joffrey killed.

name: cersei
line: For what? Your skill in battle? Pretty thing, your whore. Lovely body. The bruises will heal in time.

name: cersei
line: Varys isn't the only one who hears whispers. Really, a Lannister lion necklace? You need to hide your secret whores more carefully.

name: cersei
line: Oh? Well, you're the expert. Tell me.

name: cersei
line: You're usually a better liar, baby brother. This one you like. You like her very much. Could it be love? Don't worry, she'll be treated gently enough. Unless Joffrey is hurt. And then every wound he suffers, she'll suffer, too. And if he dies, there isn't a man alive who could devise a more painful death for your little cunt.

name: cersei
line: Would you like to see her? I thought you might. Ser Mandon, bring in my brother's whore.

name: cersei
line: Get out.

name: cersei
line: Your Grace, in the judgment of your Small Council, it would be neither proper nor wise for you to wed the daughter of a man beheaded for treason, a girl whose brother is in open rebellion against the throne as we speak. For the good of the realm, your councilors beg you to set Sansa Stark aside.

name: cersei
line: Soon, darling, when the war is over.

name: cersei
line: The princess just spoke to you.

name: cersei
line: He might. Would you like that?

name: cersei
line: Even if he does, Sansa will do her duty. Won't you, little dove?

name: cersei
line: I will not let you ship her off to Dorne as I was shipped off to Robert Baratheon.

name: cersei
line: Are you mad? The Martells loathe us.

name: cersei
line: She'll be a hostage.

name: cersei
line: You won't get away with this. You think the piece of paper Father gave you keeps you safe. Ned Stark had a piece of paper, too.

name: cersei
line: No.

name: cersei
line: No!

name: cersei
line: Get out! Get out!

name: cersei
line: What are you doing here?

name: cersei
line: I’ve done nothing.

name: cersei
line: What are you asking?

name: cersei
line: “From this time until the end of time, we are not part of your realm, but a free and independent Kingdom of the North.” (Rips up the letter). He has more spirit than his father, I'll give him that.

name: cersei
line: You'll give the Starks our reply, cousin?

name: cersei
line: Did you see my brother when you were the Starks guest?

name: cersei
line: If you speak with him, tell him he's not been forgotten.

name: cersei
line: If that's everything?

name: cersei
line: Another king? How many is that now, Five? I've lost count.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps he's forgotten we're fighting a war. We have no men to spare.

name: cersei
line: One trip to The Wall and you come back believing in grumpkins and snarks. (Walks away, followed by Varys).

name: cersei
line: I have every confidence the brave men of the Night's Watch will protect us all.

name: cersei
line: Lord Janos Slynt was Commander of the City Watch. You had no right to exile him.

name: cersei
line: You're serving as the King's Hand until father gets here. I am Queen Regent.

name: cersei
line: Ha, the people. You think I care?

name: cersei
line: He did what needed to be done. (Now loudly). You want to be the Hand of the King? You want to rule? This is what ruling is! Lying on a bed of weeds, ripping them out by the root one by one before they strangle you in your sleep.

name: cersei
line: I don't care what you think! You've never taken it seriously. You haven't, Jaime hasn't. (Sits down). It's all fallen on me.

name: cersei
line: You're funny. (Laughs). You've always been funny. But none of your jokes will ever match the first one, will they? You remember... back when you ripped my mother open on your way out of her and she bled to death.

name: cersei
line: Now they're gone, for the sake of you. There's no bigger joke in the world than that. (Storms out).

name: cersei
line: You command the City Watch, do you not, Lord Slynt?

name: cersei
line: And are you not a Lord at my command?

name: cersei
line: Then do your job. Shut the gates to the peasants. They belong in the field, not our capital.

name: cersei
line: What are you doing here?

name: cersei
line: What are you doing here? This is the small council.

name: cersei
line: Our father is Hand of the King.

name: cersei
line: Out! All of you out. (The small council members all get up and leave until it is only Cersei and Tyrion. Cersei stands up and approaches Tyrion). I would like to know how you tricked father into this.

name: cersei
line: I've done nothing.

name: cersei
line: I tried to stop it.

name: cersei
line: Robb Stark is a child.

name: cersei
line: What do you know about warfare?

name: cersei
line: Joffrey is King.

name: cersei
line: You are here to advise him.

name: cersei
line: How?

name: cersei
line: One.

name: cersei
line: Arya, little animal, she disappeared.

name: cersei
line: Lord Baelish.

name: cersei
line: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

name: cersei
line: Ned Stark's youngest daughter Arya... we can't seem to locate her.

name: cersei
line: And yet my friends in the North report no sign of her.

name: cersei
line: If we choose to negotiate with the Starks, the girl has some value. Whoever finds her, well, you know what they say about Lannisters and debts.

name: cersei
line: A mockingbird. (Points to a pin on Baelish’s shirt). You created your own Sigil, didn't you?

name: cersei
line: Appropriate for a self-made man with so many songs to sing.

name: cersei
line: I heard a song once about a boy of modest means who found his way into the home of a very prominent family. He loved the eldest daughter. Sadly, she had eyes for another.

name: cersei
line: And which truth is that?

name: cersei
line: Seize him. (Cersei’s guards seize Baelish). Cut his throat. (A guard holds a knife to Baelish’s neck). Stop. Wait. I've changed my mind. Let him go. (The guards let Baelish go). Step back three paces. Turn around. Close your eyes. (The guards do as Cersei says). (To Baelish) Power is power. Do see if you can take some time away from your coins and your whores to locate the Stark girl for me. I would very much appreciate it.

name: cersei
line: What is all this?

name: cersei
line: We can't find Arya Stark.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps. But if not, we need her. They'll never give Jaime back to us for Sansa alone.

name: cersei
line: We need to set our armies to the task of finding her. Send out as many men as we can. I'm sure if you asked grandfather -

name: cersei
line: His life is in danger.

name: cersei
line: Our enemies will say anything to weaken your claim to the throne.

name: cersei
line: Of course it is. No one believes this foul gossip -

name: cersei
line: What are you asking?

name: cersei
line: Killed? By whom?

name: cersei
line: Really? Who'd have thought?

name: cersei
line: Whomever did it, I say well done.

name: cersei
line: Littlefinger says we can outspend him three to one.

name: cersei
line: Aren't there other things you should be doing, like sealing my daughter in a crate so you can ship her away?

name: cersei
line: Yes, I know how concerned you are for her safety.

name: cersei
line: So clever. Aren't you always so clever with your schemes and your plots?

name: cersei
line: No need to concern yourself over it. The king is taking personal charge of siege preparations.

name: cersei
line: You may, specifically, or you may ask vaguely. The answer will be the same.

name: cersei
line: It's the king's royal prerogative to withhold sensitive information from his councilors.

name: cersei
line: One day I pray you love someone. I pray you love her so much, when you close your eyes, you see her face. I want that for you. I want you to know what it's like to love someone, to truly love someone. Before I take her from you.

name: cersei
line: Your mother might have prepared you. You flowered, my dear. No more.

name: cersei
line: In what way?

name: cersei
line: Wait until you birth a child.

name: cersei
line: You're a woman now. Do you have any idea what that means?

name: cersei
line: A prospect that once delighted you, bringing little princes and princesses into the world, the greatest honor for a queen.

name: cersei
line: Joffrey has always been difficult. Even his birth, I labored a day and a half to bring him into this world. You cannot imagine the pain. I screamed so loudly, I was sure Robert would hear me in the Kingswood.

name: cersei
line: Robert was hunting. That was his custom. Whenever my time was near, my royal husband would flee to the trees with his huntsmen and his hounds. And when he returned, he would present me with some pelts or a stag's head, and I would present him with a baby. Not that I wanted him there, mind you. I had Grand Maester Pycelle, an army of midwives, and I had my brother. When they told Jaime he wasn't allowed in the birthing room, he smiled and asked which one of them proposed to keep him out. Joffrey will show you no such devotion.

name: cersei
line: You may never love the king, but you will love his children.

name: cersei
line: That's so very touching to hear. Permit me to share some womanly wisdom with you on this very special day. The more people you love, the weaker you are. You'll do things for them that you know you shouldn't do. You'll act the fool to make them happy, to keep them safe. Love no one but your children. On that front, a mother has no choice.

name: cersei
line: You can try, little dove.

name: cersei
line: Who did you say your mother was again?

name: cersei
line: Since I decided that I can't stand to look at any of my handmaidens for another instant.

name: cersei
line: How many times can you read one raven scroll?

name: cersei
line: More than we have.

name: cersei
line: We have strong, high walls. We'll rain fire down on them from above.

name: cersei
line: Why not? He has a good mind for strategy, doesn't he?

name: cersei
line: I'm sure you'll make a point eventually.

name: cersei
line: I'm not the one giving the boy whores to abuse.

name: cersei
line: Did you?

name: cersei
line: Do you think I haven't tried? He doesn't listen to me.

name: cersei
line: I always hoped he'd be like Jaime. He looks like him. In a certain light.

name: cersei
line: The Targaryens Wed brother and sister for hundreds of years, I know. That's what Jaime and I would say to each other in our moments of doubt. It's what I told Ned Stark when he was stupid enough to confront me. Half the Targaryens went mad, didn't they? What's the saying? "Every time a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin."

name: cersei
line: You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

name: cersei
line: And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

name: cersei
line: You shall have what your heart desires --

name: cersei
line: With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

name: cersei
line: I want you to know I understand.  Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you.  I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head.  I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

name: cersei
line: The sound of your scream.  I never heard a sound like that.  I thought, that's true love.  Oberyn looked beautiful that day.  He really did.  No one moved like him.  No one had such skill with a spear.  Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him.  If only he hadn't taunted him.  He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die.  But that wasn't your lover's way, was it?  Now he's burried somewhere.  And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever.  That must be difficult for you.  When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child.  I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse.  I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms.  I never got to have a mother.  But Myrcella did.  She was mine and you took her from me.  Why did you do that?

name: cersei
line: It doesn't matter now.

name: cersei
line: Your daughter is a beauty too.  Brown eyes, those lips.  A perfect Dornish beauty.

name: cersei
line: I imagine she is your favorite.

name: cersei
line: I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites.  But still, we're only human.  We love who we love.

name: cersei
line: I'm sorry.  I can't understand you.  The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying.  It must be frustrating.

name: cersei
line: We all make our choices.  You chose to murder my daughter.  You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

name: cersei
line: Do you feel powerful now?  I don't sleep very well, not at all really.  I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies.  How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter.  I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's.  It would be poetic I suppose but fast.  Too fast.

name: cersei
line: I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

name: cersei
line: She's so beautiful.  The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

name: cersei
line: Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know.  Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella.  The long goodbye, was that it?

name: cersei
line: That's the one.

name: cersei
line: How long does the poison take?

name: cersei
line: But death is certain?

name: cersei
line: Your daughter will die here in this cell.  You will be here watching when she does.  You will be here the rest of your days.  If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat.  You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

name: cersei
line: Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours.  I don't want her to miss a thing.

name: cersei
line: I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms.  I'll do as I please.

name: cersei
line: Good.  And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

name: cersei
line: The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

name: cersei
line: The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

name: cersei
line: The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

name: cersei
line: And we both know gold wins wars.  Your vaults are empty.  Your late husband's profligacy saw to that.

name: cersei
line: And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

name: cersei
line: That's a fancy way of saying bet.  The war has already begun.  I've drawn first blood.  I decapitated the Dornish snake.  My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

name: cersei
line: Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

name: cersei
line: Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think.  Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl.  You want to invest in her?  I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade.  How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

name: cersei
line: From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch.  In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

name: cersei
line: The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts.  Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

name: cersei
line: Give me a fortnight.  Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

name: cersei
line: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it.  Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell.  But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown.  With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores.  Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts.  Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought.  This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

name: cersei
line: You all remember the Mad King.  You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people.  His daughter is no different.  In Essos her brutality is already legendary.  She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay.  And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

name: cersei
line: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords.  We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

name: cersei
line: No, I can't say I have.  I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

name: cersei
line: They were his trophies.  He couldn't keep them around.  They would have made him look small.  Sometimes he would come down here and look at them.  I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

name: cersei
line: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

name: cersei
line: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

name: cersei
line: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

name: cersei
line: Are you afraid of me?

name: cersei
line: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

name: cersei
line: Enemies to the east.

name: cersei
line: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

name: cersei
line: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

name: cersei
line: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

name: cersei
line: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

name: cersei
line: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

name: cersei
line: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

name: cersei
line: A dynasty for us, then.

name: cersei
line: There's nothing to say.

name: cersei
line: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

name: cersei
line: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

name: cersei
line: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

name: cersei
line: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

name: cersei
line: Not all of them.

name: cersei
line: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

name: cersei
line: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

name: cersei
line: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

name: cersei
line: A queen.

name: cersei
line: If not the most humble.

name: cersei
line: What do you want in return?

name: cersei
line: I decline your proposal.

name: cersei
line: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

name: cersei
line: How many men did we lose?

name: cersei
line: It's armies that win wars.  We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us.  We can buy mercenaries.

name: cersei
line: They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

name: cersei
line: So what do we do?  Sue for peace?  I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered.  And in her mind she's winning.  What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

name: cersei
line: Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

name: cersei
line: You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

name: cersei
line: After all this time it still amazes me --

name: cersei
line: And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

name: cersei
line: And you believed her?

name: cersei
line: I shouldn't have listened to you.  She should have died screaming.

name: cersei
line: So we fight and die or we submit and die.  I know my choice.  A soldier should know his.

name: cersei
line: That won't be necessary.

name: cersei
line: He's Hand of the Queen.  Why are you here?

name: cersei
line: What did our brother have to say?

name: cersei
line: To discuss a surrender?

name: cersei
line: She just won a great victory.  Why would she want a truce now?

name: cersei
line: Are you going to punish him?

name: cersei
line: Bronn.

name: cersei
line: He betrayed you.  He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent.  Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

name: cersei
line: I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest.  She has the numbers.  If we want to beat her we have to be clever.  We have to fight her like father would have.  Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house.  For this.

name: cersei
line: You.

name: cersei
line: Do you remember what father used to say about people?

name: cersei
line: Never betray me again.

name: cersei
line: You're too kind, My Lord.

name: cersei
line: Is on its way.  My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

name: cersei
line: We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

name: cersei
line: My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

name: cersei
line: It will indeed.  I need to expand my armies, my navies.  My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

name: cersei
line: That's good to hear.  I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

name: cersei
line: Why isn't she with them?

name: cersei
line: And the rest of them?

name: cersei
line: Including our brother.

name: cersei
line: If anything goes wrong, kill the silver-haired bitch first, then our brother, then the bastard who calls himself king.

name: cersei
line: Where is she?

name: cersei
line: Didn't travel with you?

name: cersei
line: We've been here for some time.

name: cersei
line: Sit down or leave.

name: cersei
line: So instead, we should settle our differences and live together in harmony for the rest of our days?

name: cersei
line: Then why are we here?

name: cersei
line: I imagine for most of them it would be an improvement.

name: cersei
line: I don't think it's serious at all. I think it's another bad joke. If my brother Jaime has informed me correctly, you're asking me for a truce.

name: cersei
line: That's all? Pull back my armies and stand down while you go on your monster hunt. Or while you solidify and expand your position. Hard for me to know which it is with my armies pulled back until you return and march on my capital with four times the men.

name: cersei
line: The word of a would-be usurper.

name: cersei
line: What are you talking about?

name: cersei
line: He's right to be afraid. And a coward to run. If those things come for us, there will be no kingdoms to rule. Everything we suffered will have been for nothing. Everything we lost will have been for nothing. The crown accepts your truce. Until the dead are defeated, they are the true enemy.

name: cersei
line: In return, the King

name: cersei
line: (CHUCKLES) I would never ask it of you. You would never agree to it. And if you did, I would trust you even less than I do now. I ask it only of Ned Stark's son. I know Ned Stark's son.

name: cersei
line: Then there is nothing left to discuss. The dead will come north first. Enjoy dealing with them. We will deal with whatever is left of you.

name: cersei
line: I shouldn't be surprised, I suppose. She's your kind of woman a foreign whore who doesn't know her place.

name: cersei
line: So you bring her here with her pet Northerner,  whom you've convinced to bow down before her.

name: cersei
line: And now you've got them both working towards the same goal, the goal you've worked towards your entire life.

name: cersei
line: the destruction of this family.

name: cersei
line: You killed our father

name: cersei
line: Oh, poor little man. Your papa was mean to you. Do you have any idea what you did when you fired that crossbow? You left us open. You laid us bare for the vultures, and the vultures came and tore us apart. You may not have killed Joffrey, but you killed Myrcella, you killed Tommen. No one would've touched them if Father--

name: cersei
line: I will not hear it, not from you.

name: cersei
line: I will not hear it!

name: cersei
line: I will not

name: cersei
line: It doesn't matter. Your love doesn't matter. Your feelings don't matter. I don't care why you did what you did. I only care what it cost us. It cost us our future.

name: cersei
line: Not to help my enemies collaborate in my destruction.

name: cersei
line: What did you hope for?  To make Jon Snow submit to your queen.

name: cersei
line: But eventually, you want everyone to bend the knee to her.

name: cersei
line: Why?

name: cersei
line: You said she'd destroy King's Landing.

name: cersei
line: That's the difference between you. I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.

name: cersei
line: That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat. All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.

name: cersei
line: My armies will not stand down. I will not pull them back to the capital. I will march them north to fight alongside you in the Great War. The darkness is coming for us all. We'll face it together. And when the Great War is over, perhaps you'll remember I chose to help with no promises or assurances from any of you. I expect not. Call our banners. All of them.

name: cersei
line: Ser Jaime.

name: cersei
line: My lords, I need a moment with my brother.

name: cersei
line: What are you doing?

name: cersei
line: Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?

name: cersei
line: I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.

name: cersei
line: I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?

name: cersei
line: And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--

name: cersei
line: Our child will rule Westeros.

name: cersei
line: The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.

name: cersei
line: And then we rule.

name: cersei
line: The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.

name: cersei
line: How many dragons did you see at the pit?

name: cersei
line: What happened to the third?

name: cersei
line: She came here with her dragons and her Dothraki and her Unsullied. She came here to show us all her power. No, something happened.The dragons are vulnerable.

name: cersei
line: No, we have something better. We have the Iron Bank. You should've listened more when Father--

name: cersei
line: Do you really think Euron Greyjoy turned tail and sailed back to the Iron Islands? Do you think he abandoned the chance to marry the queen?

name: cersei
line: And you conspired with Tyrion, the man who murdered our father without telling me, your queen.

name: cersei
line: You met with him in secret without my consent. You planned to promote my enemies' interests. That is the definition of conspiracy.

name: cersei
line: And that will be treason.

name: cersei
line: Disobeying your queen

name: cersei
line: I told you no one walks away from me.

name: cersei
line: There's one more yet to come.

name: cersei
line: Good.

name: cersei
line: Twenty-thousand men, is it?

name: cersei
line: Horses?

name: cersei
line: And elephants?

name: cersei
line: That's disappointing. I was told the Golden Company had elephants.

name: cersei
line: In any event, you are most welcome here in King's Landing, Captain Strickland.

name: cersei
line: You are a true friend of the crown and an honored guest.

name: cersei
line: After the war. That was our agreement.

name: cersei
line: You want a whore, buy one. You want a queen, earn her.

name: cersei
line: You're insolent. I've executed men for less.

name: cersei
line: I wanted those elephants.

name: cersei
line: You're insulting my late husband?

name: cersei
line: Robert had a different whore every night, but he still didn't know his way around a woman's body.

name: cersei
line: You enjoy risking your neck, don't you?

name: cersei
line: You're not boring, I'll give you that.

name: cersei
line: You might be the most arrogant man I've ever met. I like that.

name: cersei
line: But now I want to be alone.

name: cersei
line: Our message was well-received, then?

name: cersei
line: You're certain about the dragon?

name: cersei
line: That must have been glorious.

name: cersei
line: When the war is won, the Lion shall rule the land, the Kraken shall rule the sea and our child shall one day rule them all.

name: cersei
line: Of course she is. Keep the gates open. If she wants to take the castle, she'll have to murder thousands of innocent people first.

name: cersei
line: So much for "the Breaker of Chains."

name: cersei
line: (to MISSANEDEI) If you have any last words, now is the time.

name: cersei
line: My son, this is madness.

name: cersei
line: Sansa sweetling, you are innocent of any wrong.

name: cersei
line: Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.

name: cersei
line: Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.

name: cersei
line: You disappoint me, child.

name: cersei
line: That depends.

name: cersei
line: On your brother. And on you.

name: cersei
line: Ser Barristan Selmy.

name: cersei
line: Rise, Ser Barristan.

name: cersei
line: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?

name: cersei
line: The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

name: cersei
line: Careful, Ser.

name: cersei
line: Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

name: cersei
line: Stop talking. Get back into bed.

name: cersei
line: Please, it's nearly healed.

name: cersei
line: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

name: cersei
