line: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

name: cersei
line: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

name: cersei
line: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

name: cersei
line: How would you handle them?

name: cersei
line: A royal army?

name: cersei
line: And if the northerners rebel?

name: cersei
line: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

name: cersei
line: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

name: cersei
line: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

name: cersei
line: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

name: cersei
line: How could you be so stupid?

name: cersei
line: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

name: cersei
line: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

name: cersei
line: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

name: cersei
line: And my husband?

name: cersei
line: Let me go.

name: cersei
line: Let me go.

name: cersei
line: And if you find the proof?

name: cersei
line: What do you mean?

name: cersei
line: It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.

name: cersei
line: I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.

name: cersei
line: The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.

name: cersei
line: Please.

name: cersei
line: This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.

name: cersei
line: It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps this time she'll listen.

name: cersei
line: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

name: cersei
line: Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.

name: cersei
line: Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.

name: cersei
line: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

name: cersei
line: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

name: cersei
line: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

name: cersei
line: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

name: cersei
line: We have another wolf.

name: cersei
line: Where is the beast?

name: cersei
line: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

name: cersei
line: Is this some trick?

name: cersei
line: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

name: cersei
line: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

name: cersei
line: My husband.

name: cersei
line: You should be the Hand of the king.

name: cersei
line: We’ve been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.

name: cersei
line: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.

name: cersei
line: Yes. Lovely country.

name: cersei
line: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?

name: cersei
line: You’re tall. Still growing?

name: cersei
line: And have you bled yet?

name: cersei
line: And your dress. Did you make it?

name: cersei
line: Such talent. You must make something for me.

name: cersei
line: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.

name: cersei
line: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn’t stay hidden up here forever.

name: cersei
line: Stop. STOP.

name: cersei
line: He saw us.

name: cersei
line: He saw us!

name: cersei
line: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

name: cersei
line: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

name: cersei
line: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

name: cersei
line: Is my father wrong?

name: cersei
line: We still outnumber them.

name: cersei
line: Five.

name: cersei
line: What do you want?

name: cersei
line: Our marriage.

name: cersei
line: Every day.

name: cersei
line: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

name: cersei
line: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

name: cersei
line: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

name: cersei
line: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

name: cersei
line: I felt something for you once, you know?

name: cersei
line: It doesn't make me feel anything.

name: cersei
line: You're missing your tournament.

name: cersei
line: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

name: cersei
line: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

name: cersei
line: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

name: cersei
line: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

name: cersei
line: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

name: cersei
line: As was I.

name: cersei
line: Do you know what your wife has done?

name: cersei
line: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

name: cersei
line: You were the King’s Hand!

name: cersei
line: You shall now be held accountable.

name: cersei
line: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

name: cersei
line: I took you for a king.

name: cersei
line: He’s attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

name: cersei
line: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

name: cersei
line: You're in pain.

name: cersei
line: Perhaps it's time to go home.

name: cersei
line: Do you, Lord Stark? Is that why you called me here, to pose me riddles?

name: cersei
line: Jaime would have killed him.

name: cersei
line: My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.

name: cersei
line: The Targaryens wed brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure.

name: cersei
line: Jaime and I are more than brother and sister.  We shared a womb. We came into this world together. We belong together.

name: cersei
line: Do you love your children?

name: cersei
line: No more than I love mine.

name: cersei
line: Thank the Gods.

name: cersei
line: Hated him? I worshiped him.

name: cersei
line: And what of my wrath, Lord Stark? You should have taken the realm for yourself.

name: cersei
line: Oh, but it was.

name: cersei
line: Robert, my sweet...

name: cersei
line: May I see that letter, Ser Barristan?

name: cersei
line: We have a new King now.

name: cersei
line: You condemn yourself with your own mouth, Lord Stark.

name: cersei
line: You think he stands alone?

name: cersei
line: Have been permitted? That’s rather a tortured way of putting it.

name: cersei
line: Who permitted them inside the Red Keep?

name: cersei
line: The king is aware of their presence?

name: cersei
line: His Holiness the High Septon is welcome to see me here in the Red Keep.

name: cersei
line: It is a request, Cousin Lancel. You are asking me for something, I’m refusing.

name: cersei
line: He promised me I could stay in the Red Keep until my trial.

name: cersei
line: Get out.

name: cersei
line: I choose violence.

name: cersei
line: Please tell His High Holiness he’s always welcome to visit.

name: cersei
line: There’s to be a royal announcement?

name: cersei
line: Why wasn’t I informed?

name: cersei
line: To stand by my son.

name: cersei
line: And? Was it just a rumor or something more?

name: cersei
line: Confess. Confess.

name: cersei
line: Confess.

name: cersei
line: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn’t do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

name: cersei
line: You’ve always been quiet.

name: cersei
line: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

name: cersei
line: What? Now? Today? You’re not going to die today. You’re not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

name: cersei
line: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He’s quiet, too.

name: cersei
line: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

name: cersei
line: Shame.

name: cersei
line: Shame.

name: cersei
line: Shame.

name: cersei
line: Show me.

name: cersei
line: Show me.

name: cersei
line: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

name: cersei
line: Varys's little birds?

name: cersei
line: The High Sparrow has hundreds of Faith Militant surrounding him. Ser Gregor will can’t face them all. And he won’t have to. He’ll only have to face one.

name: cersei
line: Not yet.

name: cersei
line: Don’t stop at the city. I want little birds in Dorne, in Highgarden, in the North. If someone is planning on making our losses their gains I want to hear it. If someone is laughing at the queen who walk naked through the streets covered in shit, I want to hear. I want to know who they are. I want to where they are.

name: cersei
line: Why are you here?

name: cersei
line: Thank you for bringing it up. It’s well past time we addressed the abuses I endured.

name: cersei
line: Grand Maester Pycelle, would you sanction that statement?

name: cersei
line: What about Myrcella’s death, Uncle? Do you consider the murder of your own blood a troublesome issue?

name: cersei
line: And seeing as you cannot make us leave, we best get on with it.

name: cersei
line: Get out of my way.

name: cersei
line: What are the king’s orders?

name: cersei
line: You’re barring me from attending my own daughter’s funeral?

name: cersei
line: I would like to speak to my son.

name: cersei
line: Did they put her in the red gown or the gold?

name: cersei
line: Good. It was always her color.

name: cersei
line: I understand. I’m glad to see you.

name: cersei
line: It’s all right.

name: cersei
line: Always.

name: cersei
line: Myrcella…

name: cersei
line: Do you remember the first time you saw a dead body?

name: cersei
line: All I could think about when she died was what would happen to her now. Every day, every night, what does Mama look like now? Has she started to bloat? Has her skin turned black? Have her lips peeled back from her teeth?

name: cersei
line: I think about locking Myrcella in a crypt.

name: cersei
line: I think about her beautiful little face starting to collapse.

name: cersei
line: I have to. I have to. It’s not right she has to suffer alone.

name: cersei
line: She was good. From her first breath, she was so sweet. I don’t know where she came from. She was nothing like me. No meanness, no jealous, just good.

name: cersei
line: I thought if I could make something so good, so pure...maybe I’m not a monster.

name: cersei
line: No, I knew this would happen. The witch told me years ago. She promised me three children. She promised me they’d die. “And gold their shrouds.” Everything she said came true. You couldn’t have stopped it. It’s prophecy. It’s fate.

name: cersei
line: Of course I do. You told me yourself when Father died. You said we had to stay together. You said people would try to tear us apart, take what’s ours. That was a prophecy, too. I didn’t listen to you, and everything you said came true.

name: cersei
line: What are you doing here?

name: cersei
line: Leave.

name: cersei
line: Is this a Small Council meeting?

name: cersei
line: Since I’ve missed the past several Small Coucil meetings, I wanted to speak to you about a few things.

name: cersei
line: As have we all, unfortunately.

name: cersei
line: Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king’s own mother?

name: cersei
line: It’s all right. It's done. It’s in the past. And of course Margaery’s safety is paramount.

name: cersei
line: Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone’s. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.

name: cersei
line: You’ve spoken with him?

name: cersei
line: It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.

name: cersei
line: The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king’s orders.

name: cersei
line: You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one’s rivals.

name: cersei
line: The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he’ll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

name: cersei
line: I agree.

name: cersei
line: You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they’ve done to your son.  Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?

name: cersei
line: Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

name: cersei
line: BEtter you’re elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

name: cersei
line: What, then?

name: cersei
line: You can’t.

name: cersei
line: We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won’t leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it’s ours and because you can.

name: cersei
line: It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They’ve made us both stronger, all of them.

name: cersei
line: They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we’re going to do to them.

name: cersei
line: We’ve always been together. We’ll always be together. We’re the only two people in the world.

name: cersei
line: I heard you were leaving King’s Landing.

name: cersei
line: Your grandson is still a prisoner. You’ll leave him rotting in a cell?

name: cersei
line: You’re right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.

name: cersei
line: I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.

name: cersei
line: You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It’s the only truth I know. We must defend them.

name: cersei
line: Never. I’ll never leave my son.
